story:
Please contribute to Sabrina, our beautiful sister, expression of the divine feminine and Earth mother in our community, to help her on her healing journey. All contributions will go directly to Sabrina for health consultations, medicines, treatments, travel to treatments, childcare, special dietary needs, and other health necessities. Any contribution is deeply appreciated!

In addition, a few friends are offering handcrafted items as tokens of appreciation to the first few generous people who contribute to supporting Sabrina.

Let's be an awesome community circle of support for Sabrina! Together all our small and large contributions of whatever kind make a big difference to a person's life, which makes a big difference to the community and the world.

Thanks and blessings,

Christina Anderman, Diana MacAuley and Natalie Robinson, friends of Sabrina

story: My objective is to raise $1000 for Breast Cancer research. Having been diagnosed 2 years ago I thought my life was over...now being in recession I thought I would take the time to raise money for a charity that has helped me through my tough times. I've started a team "Cathys Crusaders" and every year since I've been diagnosed we walk and raise money and awareness. Last year with the help of my team we raised over $1400 to donate. 100% of ALL money raised go towards the breast cancer association. There is no limit no matter how big or small your donation may be all donations will be greatly appreciated!

story:
I Have ADHD and Anxiety its a big problem in my life i am looking to manage better. Right now its stopping me from living a full life. I have been in contact with a group that can help me manage my symptoms etc, but there is a 300$ fee to become registered, And ODSP does not cover this fee. im hoping to get onto this program to be able to live a more productive life and not have to be hopped up on anti anxiety and adhd medication all the time to control my problems.

sorry it thats minium needed is 500$ thats the lowest they allow

story:
Spokes National

Is a movement to inspire fund and organize mobility, health, and economic vitality through bike culture, cycling industry, and personal health enhanced by bike riding and its connected Industries activities and cycle culture.

With this campaign, we want to provide stipends and scholarships to leaders transportation planning, city planning, and bike advocacy who have dedicated their work to creating equitable outcomes through cycling.

Our goal is to have authentic representation at a local, regional, state, and national level to leverage resources and policy decisions that improve the distribution and allocation of resources to all communities of cyclists.

The funds we raise are used to mobilize our delegations of trainers, facilitators and researchers to bring authentic voices of equity and participation to equity retreats, conferences, forums, and trainings. We encourage companies, municipalities and organizations to match funds and compensate equity facilitators for their professional curriculum, facilitation and consultations. 

Our goal is to develop our intellectual property and collective team building experience into a portfolio of lectures, workshops , and consultancies that can shape organizational social and communities with place-based equity assessment and equitable change coaching.

story:
I WANT IT!

   Ir a la versión en español 

   English version 

 

 

 


Who is Insulclock for?

 

 

 

For the people with diabetes that are treated with insulin: Insulclock can help improve the quality of life and security of diabetic patients, keeping track of an automatic register of the administering of insulin.

For diabetic caregivers: Insulclock utilizes an alert system that enables the caregiver to keep a surveillance of the treatment.

In pediatrics: Insulclock represents a great peace of mind for parents of children with diabetes because they will receive alerts when their child administers or doesn't administers the insulin.
 

 

 

Insulclock is an electronic device that attaches to the insulin pen, recording and processing the data of the treatment administering and sending it to your smartphone to generate reports, establish alerts and to have a record of the insulin administering.


 

  • Clock: Shows when I took my last insulin intake.
  • Amount of insulin administered (in future versions)
  • Type of insulin
  • Alarms: when should I take the next insulin intake, or if I forgot it. In both cases, your caregiver will recieve a message.
  • Data storing: The mobile application automatically creates your daily log, creating periodical reports. Furthermore, if they are authorized, your caregivers and doctors can access your data in real time.
  • Thermometer: Insulclock measures the temperature to assure the correct insulin conservation.
  • Universal: Insulclock adapts to most common insulin pens.
  •  Reusable: Insulclock can be used in several pens of the same kind of insulin until the battery is exhausted. Furthermore, the battery can be changed.
  • Free App: for all Insulclock users
 

Insulclock history

 

 

We are José Luis López and Jesús Arenas. We both know the serious condition diabetes is, because we have family and friends that they are diabetic patients, and especially because José Luis is a diabetic and heknows first hand what diabetes is all about.

Like many others, José Luis has suffered from hyperglycemia and hypoglycemiadue to mistakes in his insulin administration, he is not as strict as he should be with his daily record.
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We couldn't find any solution that helped us to better control the diabetes of José Luis. To our surprise, nobody has applied the latest technology in mobile devices to insulin pens. That's why, we decided to combine our knowledge and creativity to create Insulclock.

José Luis is a web professional with experience in Software, webs, apps, whereas Jesús is Technical Engineering and Technology Industry.

Two years ago we undertook this goal, and looking back at that time, the project has evolved enormously: After many conversations with diabetics, parents of diabetic children and physicians, we have agreed the most useful tools and design for the users.

Now we are a big team as new partners join our team, excited by this project. We have been awarded several prizes for the usefulness that Insulclock will have. We just have finished the last miniaturized prototype that will enable us to reach the final version.

After hard work, we are closer to offer INSULCLOCK to millions of diabetics around the world, and for this we need your help. We offer you the opportunity to take part in this project collaborating with a donation or a pre-purchase of an exclusive Insulclock. This will be very helpful to commercialize Insulclock in the near future.

 

Support us

 

 

 

 

 

Why do we need you?

 

Insulclock is a very ambitious project that can have a prevalent impact, worldwide, since all diabetic people can benefit from its advantages. For its development we have created a small company (startup), Insulcloud, S.L, we are not a big pharmaceutical company but a small group of entrepreneurs, moved by a dream to help the lives of people with diabetes that are treated with insulin. The necessary resources to develop Insulclock have been our own resources and prizes for development of innovation. Now, we begin a crowdfunding campaign in which you have the opportunity of collaborating in this project through donations or buying the packs we offer you.

 

 

 

The resources we acquire in this campaign will be used to finish Insulclock and bring it to the market, so contributing to this cause you will help improve the quality of life, for millions of diabetics that use insulin.

 

 

 

 

Donate Insulclocks

 

 

The costs associated with diabetes are very high, and it is necessary to create a method to control the disease for an affordable price. With this motivation, Insulcock was born, and that is why we offer the possibility to help diabetic children from impoverished backgrounds. Thus, we kindly ask that you donate some money so they can have their Insulclock through our “Insulclock donation” pack.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Other ways to help us

 

 

Although you can´t help us with money, we need you to share this campaign with all your friends in social media and tell them to share again. This way you will help us reach the maximum number of supporters.

 

 

 

 

   Versión en español 

   Go to english version 

 

 

 

¿Para quién es Insulclock?

 

 

 

Para todas las personas con diabetes tratadas con insulina. Insulclock puede ayudar a mejorar la calidad de vida y seguridad del diabético llevando un registro automatizado de la administración de insulina.

Para cuidadores de personas dependientes con diabetes. Establece un sistema de alerta que permite hacer un seguimiento muy estrecho del tratamiento.

En pediatría, Insulclock supone una gran tranquilidad para los padres de los niños con diabetes ya que reciben alertas cuando el niño se administra o no se administra la insulina.

 

 


"¿Me he puesto hoy la insulina?"

"Con este calor ¿Estará la insulina en buen estado?"

"¿Se habrá puesto mi hija la cantidad correcta de insulina?"

¿Serán correctos estos datos del paciente?

 

 

 

 

Insulclock es un dispositivo electrónico que se adhiere a la pluma de insulina recogiendo y procesando datos sobre la administración del tratamiento y enviándolos a tu teléfono para generar informes, establecer alertas y en definitiva llevar un seguimiento de la administración de la insulina.

  •  Reloj: Muestra cuando me puse la última inyección
  •  Cantidad de insulina administrada (en versiones posteriores)
  •  Tipo de insulina
  • Alarmas: cuando me toca la siguiente administración de insulina, o si se me ha olvidado. En ambos casos el cuidador o la persona a tu cargo puede recibir un mensaje de aviso.
  • Almacenamiento de datos: La aplicación confecciona automáticamente tu diario en lo que a la administración de insulina se refiere, generando informes periódicos. Además, si están autorizados, tus cuidadores y médicos pueden acceder a los informes en tiempo real.
  •  Termómetro: Insulclock mide la temperatura para asegurar la correcta conservación de la insulina
  •  Universal: Insulclock se adapta a los bolígrafos de insulina más comunes
  •  Reutilizable: Insulclock se puede utilizar para varias plumas de una misma insulina hasta agotar la batería, y cuando la batería se gasta se puede cambiar por otra fácilmente
  •   Acceso gratuito a la App para todos los usuarios de Insulclock

 

 

Historia de Insulclock

 

 

 

 

Somos José Luis López y Jesús Arenas. Ambos conocemos las dificultades que la diabetes supone, porque ambos tenemos familiares y amigos diabéticos y, en especial, porque José Luis es diabético y vive la enfermedad en primera persona.

Como muchos otros diabéticos, José Luis ha sufrido hipoglucemias e hiperglucemias por errores en la administración de la insulina, o por no haber sido estricto llevando el registro diario de la administración de la insulina…

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

No encontramos ninguna solución que ayudara a controlar mejor la diabetes de José Luis. Ante la incredulidad de que nadie aplicara la última tecnología a las plumas de insulina, nos decidimos a unir nuestro nuestra capacidad creativa y conocimientos y creamos Insulclock.

José Luis es un profesional dedicado a la Creación software, webs, apps y hosting, Jesús es Ingeniero Técnico en Industria y Tecnología.

Hace dos años nos propusimos esta meta, y desde entonces el proyecto ha avanzado enormemente. Tras muchas conversaciones con diabéticos, padres de niños con diabetes y especialistas médicos, se han consensuado las funcionalidades y el diseño que van a resultar más útiles para los usuarios.

Ahora ya somos un gran equipo formado por cada vez más compañeros, enamorados de este proyecto. José Maria (Director comercial de Novonordisk y Sanofi aventis durante mas de 20 años) y Cesar (Ingeniero en telecomunicaciones) son buena prueba de ello. Nos han otorgado varios premios reconociendo la gran utilidad que tendrá Insulclock. Ya tenemos los primeros testeos de nuestro insulclock con resultados asombrosos... 

Después de mucho trabajo estamos cada vez más cerca de poder ofrecer Insulclock a millones de diabéticos en todo el mundo y para ello necesitamos tu ayuda.Te ofrecemos la oportunidad de participar en este proyecto colaborando con una donación o la compra anticipada de un Insulclock exclusivo. Esto nos será de ayuda para llevar aInsulclock a diabeticos de todo el mundo a lo largo del 2016.

 

 

 

 

Confían en nosotros

 

 

 

 

 

¿Por qué te necesitamos?

 

 

Insulclock es un proyecto muy ambicioso de ámbito mundial, ya que pensamos que todos los diabéticos se pueden beneficiar de sus ventajas. Para su desarrollo hemos creado una pequeña empresa (startup), Insulcloud, S.L., esto supone que no se trata de una gran compañía farmacéutica sino de un grupo pequeño de emprendedores movidos por una ilusión, ayudar a mejorar la calidad de vida de las personas diabéticas tratadas con insulina. Los recursos para el desarrollo de Insulclock han sido fondos propios y premios al desarrollo e innovación. Ahora comenzamos una campaña de ayudas en la que tienes la oportunidad de colaborar y formar parte del proyecto a través de donaciones o compra de los packs que te ofrecemos.

 

 

 

Los recursos captados con esta campaña servirán para terminar de desarrollar y poner en el mercado Insulclock, de manera que con tu contribución ayudarás a mejorar la calidad de vida de millones de pacientes diabéticos que utilizan insulina.

 

Dona Insulclocks

 

 

Los costes asociados a la diabetes son muy altos, y es necesario crear un método para controlar esta enfermedad de forma óptima por poco dinero. Con este espíritu nació INSULCLOCK, y por ello lanzamos la posibilidad de ayudar a niños diabéticos desfavorecidos, donando un dinero para que puedan tener su INSULCLOCK a través del pack “Insulclock donations.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

 

 

Aunque no puedas ayudar de forma económica, necesitamos que compartas esta campaña con todos tus amigos en las redes sociales y sugiéreles que ellos también la compartan. De esta forma nos ayudarás a hacerla llegar al máximo número de personas.

story:
Stephanie's Prosthetic 5 years Over Due and Needs Replacement

Stephanie Eager is a beautiful and vibrant woman who battled and survived cancer three times starting at the delicate age of fourteen.  In her last operation she lost her left eye to cancer.  Stephanie needs to wear a prosthetic to cover her eye socket.  This prosthetic is custom fitted, made of silicone, and is rated for five years.  Her current one that Stephanie has been using is nearing its tenth year; five years beyond the manufacturer's rated lifespan.  It is falling apart.  But as a mother of four children--one still just a baby, on Stephanie's SSI there is barely enough to spend what to speak of save. 
My name is Michael Batalon, AKA BitstreamCowboy.  I was so moved by Stephanie's story of courage.  Despite her needs, she puts her children first.  Stephanie is very special,  She refuses to to wear or spend money on makeup, buys frugally at second hand and discount stores exclusively, and lives simply.  She is very spiritual and just sitting with her seems to have a healing quality.
What goes around comes around.  Give in charity and Spirit gives back in the form of good karma.  Please, for just one day, sacrifice a cup of coffee, pack of cigarettes, an alcoholic beverage or even a steak dinner and give that amount in charity.  It will come back to you.  Please help Stephanie get the medical attention she needs.
Thank you.

story:
Noddwch fi i redeg 'Ultramarathon' i Godi Arian i Ysbyty Dr. H. Gordon Roberts, Shillong


(English below)

Ar y 10fed o Hydref eleni fe fydda i'n rhedeg, cerdded, ac, mae'n debyg, yn cropian i gwblhau fy ultramarathon cyntaf o gwmpas penrhyn Gŵyr - taith o ryw 50 milltir. 

Serch hynny, dwi ddim yn un sy'n hoffi dioddef heb reswm - felly dyma glymu'r rhedeg ag achos teilwng iawn sydd a chyswllt â hanes fy nheulu. Roedd fy Nhaid a fy Nain yn genhadon yn Shillong am gyfnod, ac yno y ganed fy nhad a'i chwaer.

Eleni mae Eglwys Bresbyteraidd Cymru yn codi arian i adeiladu adain newydd i Ysbyty Dr. H. Gordon Roberts yn Shillong, gogledd ddwyrain India, mewn pryd i dathlu canmlwyddiant sefydlu'r ysbyty. Mae'r ysbyty wedi gwneud gwaith rhagorol yn darparu gofal iechyd i boblogaeth Shillong a'i chyffiniau ers 1922, ond mae mawr angen diweddaru ac ehangu ei chyfleusterau. Dyma fideo sy'n rhoi ychydig o hanes yr ysbyty ac yn cyflwyno'r apêl:


Os gwelwch yn dda rhowch gymaint ac y gallwch chi. Bydd pob ceiniog yn gwneud gwahaniaeth!

Sponsor me to run an Ultramarathon to raise money for Dr. H. Gordon Roberts Hospital, Shillong

On the 10th of October this year I'll be running, walking, and (quite possibly) crawling to complete my first ultramarathon around the Gower - about 50 miles. 

I'm not a strong believer in needless suffering, so I've decided to use this opportunity to raise money for a worthy cause. That cause has a connection to my family's history - my grandparents were missionaries in Shillong for a time, and both my father and his sister were born there.

This year the Presbyterian Church of Wales are raising money to build a new wing for Dr. H Gordon Roberts Hospital, Shillong, north east India, in time for its centenary celebrations.The hospital has provided excellent healthcare to Shillong and the surrounding areas since 1922, but its facilities are old fashioned and need to be upgraded and expanded. Here's a video that gives the hospital's story and explains the appeal in greater detail:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zTY8cktEGsQ

Please give as much as you can. Every penny will make a difference!

story:
What is flotation therapy &

What is a float tank?


In the News



Overman the "Float Family"


We are a family from Georgia who moved out west with an idea and a passion to help build better people; we are Overman, and we want to bring Flotation Therapy to Fort Collins, Colorado. 

This IndieGoGo campaign is designed to help us raise money and awareness for floating. You, our dearest donor, can help us make this dream of ours into a reality. We know that with your help, we will be able to make the best Flotation Therapy Center in all of Colorado. Help us make you, and Fort Collins, proud!


Bringing flotation therapy to FoCo has been a family effort for nearly two years now and we are thrilled to have our grand opening to the public planned for November 2016. But alas, we need your help!

Bobus, Little Roo, Alex, Blake, Logan, Nathan, and the countless other people who have helped get Overman to this point have made the journey well worth it. Thanks to all of you for your effort and support throughout these years!

The Impact

We at Overman believe that Flotation Therapy can help everyone. The benefits that regular floating provides -with stress relief being the main benefit- are well documented to help with accelerated healing, cortisol reduction, and deep relaxation. 


Specific ailments that benefit include: Anxiety, Arthritis, Asthma, Autism, Diabetes, Digestion Problems, Fibromyalgia, Headaches/migraines, Heart Disease, Insomnia, Jet Lag, Magnesium & Sulfate deficiency, Neck & back Pain, Osteoporosis, Peptic Ulcers, Pregnancy pains, Premenstrual Syndrome, Scoliosis, Sore Muscles, Stroke.


You, our beloved donor, can help us bring this wonderful technology to the city of Fort Collins, Colorado. We think that Fort Collins is the perfect place for our store, and we want to be able to provide this awesome service to this amazing city! 

How can I help bring float therapy to Fort Collins?

We are opening our center this Fall regardless of the campaign, but your help funding this project is crucial in allowing us to offer the best service possible for Fort Collins.


The ever increasing construction costs associated with building our center is the main focus throughout our campaign. Soundproofing and build out are the bulk of the expenses, and also happen to be the most crucial. 
Without proper soundproofing and building design the experience can suffer greatly due to noises being heard while floating. 


This is why we turn to you fellow floater, because with your help we can make it happen!

Help us reach our goal of $40,000 by pre-ordering a float or some swag and telling just one other person about us!


*Pre-order floats are limited in number and will not be available after campaign ends*
*Public float booking will start mid October depending on availability*

What are the perks?


We've got some awesome perks lined up such as early access pre-order floats only available through Indiegogo. Also other fun things like yoga mats, shirts, stress balls and more. 

Bonus perks will be unlocked when new goal levels are reached.

 Unlock them all to get access to all of the exclusive perks!


*Stress Balls, Stickers, Shirts will ship May 2016*

*Yoga Mats will ship May 2016*

*Early access floats and yoga will be available October 2016*


For $10 you get a:
Stress Ball, Sticker, and Original Mandala Digital Wallpaper Artwork. As well as your name (or alias) on our websites thank you page!

For $25 you get a:

Stress Ball, Sticker, Mandala Digital Wallpaper, plus an "Übermensch" T-shirt 


If you're here to float, this is your chance. $55 will get you an:

Early access (Before the public opening) 90 minute float session. No swag, just relaxation.


Want to try flotation and get some goodies? For $75 you get a:

Stress Ball, Sticker, Mandala Wallpaper,"Übermensch" T-shirt, and a 90 Minute Early Access Float


$105 gets you a double dip into the float world with:
Two 90 minute early access floats, Stress Ball, Sticker, "Übermensch" shirt, and custom "Camel" Wallpaper

Already know that floating is for you? For $135 you get: 
Three 90 minute early access floats, Stress ball, Sticker, "Übermensch" shirt, and "Camel" Wallpaper

Want to get our custom designed yoga mat? Or be one of the first to try our Hatha yoga classes before the public?  For only $245 you get: 

4 early access floats, 2 Yoga Sessions, Swag, "Übermensch" shirt, & Exclusive Printed Yoga Mat


You've reached the next level of the Overman journey. For $425 you get a whopping:
8 Early Access Floats, 4 Yoga Classes, Custom Yoga Mat, Swag, "Übermensch" shirt, and custom Lion Wallpaper. *Only 20 Available

You are the most dedicated of all floaters! For just $1750:

52 Floats, 26 Yoga Classes, Custom Yoga Mat, Swag, "Übermensch" shirt, and all Wallpapers  *Only 15 Available


If you are a business or organizer of a group, this package is for you. 

20 individual floats (can be used by anyone), 20 stress balls, and 20 stickers for only $1050! *Only 12 Available


If you are a business or organizer of a group, this package is for you. 
40 individual floats (can be used by anyone), 40 stress balls, and 40 stickers for only $2050! *Only 6 Available


If you are a business or organizer of a group, this package is for you. 
60 individual floats (can be used by anyone), 60 stress balls, and 60 stickers for only $3000! *Only 4 Available


If you are a business or organizer of a group, this package is for you.
 100 individual floats (can be used by anyone), 100 stress balls, and 100 stickers for only $4875! *Only 1 Available

Estimated delivery on all early access float sessions - October 2016
Estimated delivery on swag (Shirt, sticker, stress ball, wallpaper)  - May 2016
Estimated delivery on swag w/ yoga mat  - June 2016
Public Grand Opening - November 2016


Risks & Challenges


Developing an unparalleled relaxation experience comes with a host of risks and challenges. In order for our team to make Overman the fully immersive, stress-free, extraordinary experience that we have envisioned, it will require time and iteration.

In order to accelerate our progress, we’re working with local passionate, driven and dedicated teams and businesses around Fort Collins. Building Overman is a dream come true and we will do whatever it takes to bring  flotation to Fort Collins.

We anticipate the typical trials and tribulations that come with business and have tried to build that into our timeline goals. To get everything just right and deliver the unmatched experience flotation therapy, we’ll likely have some revisions along the way and keep you updated between every step..

Our team is committed to our timeline and constant communication with our backers. As issues arise, we will address and correct them. We’ll be sure to let you know our status at every possible milestone.

Our biggest challenge currently is taking our puny life savings and stretching it to its full potential. We've invested $51,000 personal funds among us and will have $259,000 from the banks, but we sill need an additional $30,000 (after campaign fees & perk costs) to make our float center the vision we have been striving  for. 

We are confident that we will be able to overcome this hurdle with the help of our wonderful community and our drive to succeed. The center will open no matter the outcome of our campaign, but in order to make our vision a true success we would love to be able to put in the little extra to take it from good to great.


Where will the money go?

 

Overman Grand Opening Timeline

Other Ways You Can Help

We would love for you to be able to donate whatever you can, but if you are strapped for cash, but like our idea and vision for Overman, you can really help us out by spreading the word and sharing this with your friends and family. Below this paragraph are the tools you will need to help us get the word out! Share on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, or any social media outlet of your choosing! 

Website - http://www.overmanflotation.com/

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/overmanflotation

Twitter - https://twitter.com/Overman_Floats

Instagram - http://instagram.com/overman_floats

Tumblr - http://overmanfloats.tumblr.com/

Linkedin - https://www.linkedin.com/in/overmanflotation

Pinterest - https://www.pinterest.com/overmanfloats/

story:
iThink
Incite Awards
Startup News
StartupWA

 

DISCLAIMER: Flubar does not diagnose, cure, or treat illness. Flubar detects temperature anomalies in the body and has programmable actions to take depending on the results. Please do not use Flubar to diagnose viral infections. It is an indicator, not a diagnosis.

Read the story of Flubar on our website
 

Did you know that 90% of employees admit to going to work while sick?

source

Employees attending work whilst unwell costs Australia a staggering $34 billion in lost productivity.

 

There is nothing worse than when sick employees come to work!

But it's often not their fault. They don't know yet. They think the discomfort they're feeling is just from not having a good sleep the night before, or that breakfast isn't sitting right. And the scary part is, you will probably not realise it until half of your team has been taken down.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
 

 

 

 

Flubar helps spot the early signs of fever among your team.

 

 

 

Flubar uses facial recognition and AI learning, getting better over time at detecting suspicious temperature anomalies amongst your team and family members.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The annual economic burden of influenza in the United States ranges from $15 billion to $64 billion, of which lost productivity accounts for a substantial proportion.

Could your business survive your whole team falling sick at the same time?

It's a painful question that has to be asked.

It only takes one bad flu season for Flubar to more than pay for itself.

 


 

 

PROTECT YOUR TEAM.

The trickle down effect from the spreading of illness is far reaching. When we spend 8-10 hours a day in the workplace, Flubar is an easy choice when it comes to minimising exposure to the early signs of influenza.

Get a Flubar for your home or office and help #flattenthecurve

story:
CurlyCrown is here to make your life a little easier. 

 

Let’s face it: having curly hair isn’t always what it’s cracked up to be. Yes, we love our hair but it’s a time sucker and has a mind of its own. Many times you want to give up and either put your hair in a bun or constantly straighten it. Both options have disadvantages; you can grow tired of sporting the bun and straightening your hair can damage it. It takes a long time, and you just have to pray for good weather. 

CurlyCrown does what nothing else out there can do: create volume at the roots, dry your hair faster with air drying or with the use of a diffuser. 

Simply flip your hair toward the front and then push CurlyCrown through your hair and then flip it back. Now you can go about your day as you please while CurlyCrown sits comfortably on your head. 

CurlyCrown helps you achieve more volume in your hair by lifting the roots away from the scalp as it dries. By diffusing your hair with CurlyCrown, air can flow through with ease. To accomplish this type of volume, we would usually put our head upside while using a blow dryer for a long period of time, tease it, use the hairspray, and aggressively ruffle it around. All of these actions create frizz and take a lot of time and effort. You can now spend less time in the bathroom and more time sleeping, getting ready, or looking after the children. 

CurlyCrown is sturdy and comfortable. It is designed to fit most head sizes and is best used on medium and long hair. 

You will still have to face the daily challenges of having the perfect hair routine, unwanted or unpredicted weather but at least with CurlyCrown, you can always depend on it to save you time. And maybe it can help you to see your hair as a beautiful attribute and less of a burden.

story:
Who we are

SkinCare by KarenWillour is an all natural skincare company offering responsibly sourced all natural bath and body products as well as men’s beard products.

                

We started this company with the belief that the everyday products you put on your body should be as healthy and natural as what you put in your body. This is why we have dedicated our self’s to making only the finest all natural, simple, bath and body products. We only use USA based suppliers for all of our needs from bottles, bags and ingredients to assure that our money stays in the local economies for as long as possible. We are all about our local community and will donate a portion of our sales to local charities and organizations. Our line of products include

Body Butter,

Body Polish ,Bath Bombs, Bath and body oil, moisturizing body mist, undereye serum, muscle relief balm, men’s and woman’s lip balms, men’s beard balm, men’s beard oil.

We care

We care about the planet our ingredients comes from,

Which is why not only are all of our products responsibly sourced, we also strive to give back to our community by preserving our local environment by providing a portion of our proceeds to environmental preservation causes.

     

What our campaign is all about

We started this company a few months ago and have gotten some great feedback. We have started to really push our product but are facing some great obstacles, As we have self funded this company from the start we are finding that our overall budget for costs such as operation, product, and expansion is getting shorter and shorter. We currently have orders placed and are fulfilling those with no problem but are finding it difficult to move forward due to our decreasing amount of funds. We need you to help realize this wonderful brand to fruition by contributing whatever you can, not only is this helping us out but you are also helping preserve our natural surroundings as we are donating a portion of the raised amount to local nature preservation charities and causes.

Breakdown of costs are

Operation costs such as overhead, equipment, sustainable wages which is 33% of total asked

Product costs such as initial expenditure for ingredients, packaging, and distribution which is 36% of the total asked.

Expansion costs such as marketing and advertising, further development of products, and further expansion of workplace which is 31% of total asked.

Closing Statement

We’d like to thank you for taking the time to check out our campaign. We’d like to stress that we understand that not everyone is in a good financial standing and are not able to donate, please help by sharing our campaign page to your friends on social media, not only are you helping us provide our clients with these wonderful all natural, simple ingredient products that are sensitive skin safe, you are also helping local nature preservation causes all over Florida and in the future all over united states. We’d like to welcome you to follow our mission!

www.Facebook.Com/SkinCarebyKarenWillour

Instagram @SkinCarebyKarenWillour

This is why we have dedicated our self’s to making only the finest all natural, simple, bath and body products. We only use USA based suppliers for all of our needs from bottles, bags and ingredients to assure that our money stays in the local economies for as long as possible. We are all about our local community and will donate a portion of our sales to local charities and organizations. Our line of products includeBody Butter,Body Polish ,Bath Bombs, Bath and body oil, moisturizing body mist, undereye serum, muscle relief balm, men’s and woman’s lip balms, men’s beard balm, men’s beard oil.We careWe care about the planet our ingredients comes from,Which is why not only are all of our products responsibly sourced, we also strive to give back to our community by preserving our local environment by providing a portion of our proceeds to environmental preservation causes.      What our campaign is all aboutWe started this company a few months ago and have gotten some great feedback. story:
For 40 years, Wilhelmina and Fred McEwan have together, successfully trained champion thoroughbreds at their family's Fenwick Farm and now they have discovered a therapeutic fabric that enhances the body's naturally ability to heal and perform.  

It all began with producing high-tech horse blankets in 2007, but a little history first!  The sister-brother team of Wilhelmina and Fred's involvement with horses began in Fenwick, Ontario, Canada.  For Wilhelmina, those riding lessons evolved into a life-long career with horses.  By the mid 1970's Wilhelmina was competing on the Grand Prix circuit in the United States, Canada and Europe.  Wilhelmina was a member of the 1976 Canadian Equestrian Team at Spruce Meadows.  As a licensed thoroughbred trainer and Director of Racing for Spendthrift Farm, home to Triple Crown winners Seattle Slew and Affirmed, Wilhelmina had the opportunity to closely work with some of the top trainers in the world.  

After assisting Wilhelmina on the Grand Prix circuit, Fred began his career in the thoroughbred industry at SamSon Farm in Canada and Spendthrift Farm in Kentucky.  He expanded his industry knowledge at Belmont Park race track in New York with thoroughbred trainers Mike Bell and Peter Howe.  With a constant desire to gain knowledge, Fred transitioned to the breeding and sales arena working with Lanes End Farm and Mill Ridge Farm in Kentucky before coming to Camden to run the family business.

In 2007, an opportunity to develop high performance clothing for horses became available to Wilhelmina and Fred.  We realized the equine industry was lacking in high-performance products, thus Fenwick Equestrian® was born in 2009.  All of our cutting-edge fabrics were an immediate success around the world.   Once we began using our Liquid Titanium® fabric, a Far InfraRed (FIR) therapy, we realized the incredible opportunity we had to enhance our horses well-being "naturally."  Our veterinarians, who were skeptical at first have become believers and endorse LT®.  

After several years of incredible results with LT® and requests from satisfied customers, we began making some human products.  Everyone seems to have aches and pains somewhere. The results were extraordinary.  At 87, our mother became our guinea pig.  Arthritis in her hands had become so painful, she could not hold her book while reading.  She turned 95 this year and she is able to hold her books for hours at a time and read.  When she had back surgery at MUSC several years ago, the doctors were amazed at how quickly the incision healed with little scar tissue, which was due to the hospital gowns we made for her.  We have made her gloves, sleepwear, shorts, socks, leggings, shirts, pillowcases and blankets.  Our friends and family all live in Liquid Titanium fabric.  While researching the effects of LT® on the human body, Dr. W. Lawrence Schoolmeester discovered that LT® accelerated the healing process after surgeries & injuries, in addition to relieving aches & pains.   We immediately knew we had something special! 

We now want to help YOU relax, feel better & heal faster with fewer PILLS!   

We know and have seen what Liquid Titanium® can do for our horses and our friends, so now we want YOU to benefit from the positive effects of Fenwick's® Liquid Titanium® clothing!  We feel our Far Infrared (FIR) therapeutic fabric can revolutionize the world of health and fitness, so we are asking you to help us raise additional funds for a marketing campaign, an informational website, our patent expenses and inventory.

 As a special promotional offering, our Liquid Titanium® shorts, shirts, gloves, scarves and ball caps are now available for purchase at these very low prices.  You will be part of the process in choosing the designs and colors of the shirts we will make for you.  Some of our products are made in the USA and support manufacturing jobs in the state of South Carolina.  Please help us further develop a revolutionary product with your purchase of a Liquid Titanium® product!!

Feel better!  Sleep better!  Perform better!

story:
Ukemi - The Worlds First Parkour / Freerunning Card Game

 

 


Custom card game created for and by the parkour community. The game was created and developed by three practitioners, each with over a decade of experience, to bring you the best and most authentic experience possible. In the main play style of the game, the goal is to get to a set number of points. You achieve points by drawing a combination of cards and successfully replicating the line or movement produced. The more cards you pick the more points you get.

  • Three official game types.
  • Challenge your friends.
  • Get warmed up.
  • Explore new spots.
  • Create your own choreography.
  • Invent your own way to play the game.

Each player get the choice of three types of cards;

Movement (40 cards) - Choose between techniques taken from parkour, tricking and gymnastics.

Condition (30 cards) - Add variance with rotations, combo's, targeted objects and movement qualities.

Wild Card (30 cards) - Put your route on hard mode with a Wild Card. This is not for the faint of heart and you can end up in a tree, wearing your friends' shoes or blindfolded.

Blanks (15) - Each deck comes with 5 blank cards for each card type. This puts you in charge and lets you add your own cards to the game.

The possibilities for different combinations is massive. In fact, we have calculated that each deck allows for over 295 billion possible combinations.

Share your passion with practitioners old and new to celebrate the art of movement.

 

 

 

In order to create an easy to understand and relevant experience, we wanted to show the actions from each card with both text and image. The key reason for this was that certain actions, foundational parkour techniques, in particular, use more than one name. For example, arm jump, cat leap, and saut de bras are all the same thing. By having both it will be easier for the player to identify the intention.

The front of card images also gave us the opportunity to promote playing the game in a variety of locations as well as showing a diverse group of people playing the game. One of our fundraising goals is to increase the diversity of the images even further by working with different parkour athletes and photographers. This diversity would come from being able to use more locations and traceurs which would further promote that parkour is for anyone anywhere.

The inspiration for the general aesthetic came from a mix of calligraphy, fractal patterns and dance notation (drawing of live movement). Using different elements that compliment each other allowed us to create a card game that has distinct sections fit in with an overall aesthetic. This is shown in not only in the different card categories but also in the different card type sub-divisions within the game. To achieve this we have used a mixture of digital graphics, photographs, and drawings. The drawings, used for the multiplier and combo cards, were provided by artist Sally McKay from her collection. Our next step is to bring in Sally to generate images unique to the card game as well as photographers to work with parkour athletes.

 

Physically the product has had a different range of considerations. The game will largely be played outside and as a result, they need to be robust enough to withstand the elements. The first level of protection that comes with the game is a custom tuck box and the second is high-quality gloss finish and top of the range card to ensure they last as long as possible.
 


Ukemi is at the prototype stage. We want to bring the community in more by accessing photographers, artists, and designers with a passion for Parkour and movement. To share Ukemi with as many people as possible we need -

  • Initial production costs
  • Top athletes and coaches for the images
  • Parkour photographers
  • A dance illustrator
  • Marketing costs

Want to get involved? Here's what's up for grabs:

Boost (£5) - We play a line of Ukemi for you.

Frontier (£10) - First edition pack of cards (£5 off RRP)

Supporter (£25) - First edition pack of cards, poster and sticker pack

Contributor (£100) - First edition pack of cards and your chance to be on a card

Stockist (£200) - Stock the game at your store/gym. Box of Ukemi cards (25) RRP £15 each!

Super Backer (£400) - Box of Ukemi cards (25), poster, sticker pack, be on a card, early access to designs/Game. As a super backer you get an insight into the project.

Angel Investor (£1250) - First edition pack of cards, be on a card, say in final designs, a private day-long seminar for you and up to 8 people anywhere in Europe

 

 


Your contribution will allow us to elevate our project from prototype to production. All money raised will be used to add value to the game and, where possible, spent on artists who have a Parkour or movement practice. This ensures a level of quality that can only come from getting close to the source.

  • Support your community.
  • Get involved in a world first.
  • Innovations - the first ever Parkour card game.

 

 

To make the Ukemi card game happen we need to reach £3000. This would produce a base version of the game with minor improvements on the prototype. We don’t want to stop there though and the more we raise the better we can make it. Our fundraising goals to improve the game are -


 

  • Move beyond preliminary designs - work with photographers, illustrators, and athletes to give the game a stronger style.
  • Improve the physical product - we want to use the best materials possible for the cards, tuck box and finish. The more we raise the better quality of card we can produce.
  • Spread the word - See the game at international events and help us bring Ukemi to schools, parks, and gyms around the world.
 


Creating a product for an emerging community comes with added risk and challenges. These include having a large enough market, covering expenses, making sure we represent the active Parkour/Freerunning scene and creating a game that keeps up with the constantly progressing community. We aim to overcome this by -

  • Working on a product for traceurs created by traceurs.
  • Recruiting athletes and coaches to champion our game.
  • Over 30 years of training, coaching and performing experience in the team.
  • Making the game scaleable from beginner, to advance to borderline impossible.

 


No cash? No problem there is plenty of ways you can help -

  • Share our campaign. Parkour largely grew out of the internet, let's make Ukemi do the same!
  • Send us suggestions on stockists and athletes you want to see try the game.
  • Have a go! Send us a message and we will draw cards for you from the prototype for you to try a line.

Many thanks for your contribution,

David, Dan, and Sam.

Get in Contact

Facebook

Website

Community Group

story:
Yoga and goats both make people happy—Put the two together and you have a winning combination. 

Yoga is a strong billion dollar industry which is  growing daily.  People can’t help but smile when they see and interact with goats.  The whole purpose of yoga is to get fit, clear your mind and ultimately  find joy. 

Yoga with goats is a fast growing segment of the yoga industry.  Since the inception of the yoga with goats concepts there have been many studios across the entire nation along with pop-up businesses offering yoga with goats.  There is always a waitlist and it is a "rage" that will be sustainable because of the animal therapy aspect.  

We do provide a results driven yoga practice based on the principles of vinyassa flow yoga.  The yoga is 60 minutes and the entire class is 90 minutes.  We first interact with the goats and get set up interacting with the goats and the small farm space located in Southern Marin County.   

After connecting with the goats, getting that important selfie with the goats and friends,  students will settle  in on our mats we begin our focus with meditation.  

We start with a three minute guided meditation. The class is fun but it is not intended to be a joke.  We will use core body strength and we will sweat.  The goats will come up and interact with us and will in fact jump on people, get under yogi's during the practice and may chew on a mat or two!  The goats will bring light and joy so everyone is encouraged to follow their bliss.  Students can push through poses or take a break to hug a goat the choice is yours.  Every class is an all levels class and designed to give you great core strength but also have a really super fun time.

By funding "Happy Yoga--Yoga with Goats" you will be moving the needle forward for health, happiness and fitness.  You will also gain exclusive access to our classes and programs.  If you want to have your own private Yoga Goat Party we can make that happen for you.  You can come to our classes which will be held six days a week in the heart of Marin;  You can also get "Happy Goat Passes" for your friends to come any time.  We will be selling our class cards, reservations and parties through Eventbrite, Facebook, Groupon and hopefully local groups.  Everyone will be required to be over age 14 to join in classes or parties.  

We will offer bridal showers, birthday parties, holiday parties, corporate parties or events  and we can bring the goats to your location.  We will also offer "Happy Yoga--Yoga With Goats" at Farmer's Markets and local events that focus on fitness and the outdoors.  

What your contribution funds:

Four baby goats and care needed for the goats such as vet costs, food, hoof care, even pajama's for the baby goats along with the land which is leased. Of course, there is insurance that goes with this business which will insure the property, the property owner, the goats and  the mini van to transport the goats.  There will also be fencing needed for the mobile events of yoga parties, etc.  Advertising costs which should be low because social media has proven extremely successful for other pop-up-yoga events which I have been producing.  

Media loves a happy and fun story so this business is sure to go viral and be a sustainable rage and fun fitness business.  There is goat yoga in San Francisco and Petaluma which surround Marin County but they are event based and not provided on a regular bases.  

By Funding This Great Business You Will Be Improving The Quality Of Life For All!  After all, life is about having fun!  We intend to bring light and love to the world.  Join us.  The world needs more goodness and goat yoga!  

Please share this indiegogo campaign and spread the joy!  Naaaa'maaaa ste!  

Footnote:  If we don't reach our goal--We are going for it anyway and will use the funds and scrape by as we go month to month.  The yoga goat businesses throughout the country have massive waiting lists and this is proven to be fun, effective, healthy and gets people moving, laughing and having a ball! We know this Happy Yoga--Yoga With Goats will be a success!

story:
BonBaby Gro, a growth tracker we built with love and heart, is the first household growth-management equipment that blends weight and height scale. The BonBaby app can also monitor multi-dimensional growth index, generate an exclusive growth curve and enable technological supervision of your child’s growth.


We truly believe our efforts can lay a foundation for your baby's lifelong health.

 
 

 

 

 

 

We are a technology-driven company devoted to women's and children's digital health. Now in our fourth year, we have established customer trust in our products and have a promising future.

 

We won our first support on Indiegogo for a basal thermometer. Over the next three years, we focused on researching and developing smart hardware and corresponding apps. Our products can be found on Amazon Europe and America sites and have directed 330,000 women to TTC(Try to Conceive). Last year, we entered the field of children’s products and founded the sub-brand of BonBaby. We have already successfully launched our first product in this series, an ear thermometer—Earmo. 

Parents all over the world want their child to have a healthy body. A healthy child is, for example, better able to participate in sport. The healthier a child is, the more likely they are to receive positive attention from society.

 

Data from the World Health Organization (WHO) shows that in 2016, over 340 million children and adolescents aged 5–19 were overweight or obese. 

Growing up is an irreversible process, and regular tracking is essential to identify growth problems in children. If you miss the right time, and treatment is delayed, it can be difficult to make up for it. 

 

 

To address this issue, our team has developed a personal growth manager for babies, replacing the traditional methods of measuring and recording height and weight with a new solution for the Internet era.

Our aim is to be able to predict children's health as efficiently as adult health, through effective management systems.

 

 

 

Compare your baby’s personal growth with that of children all over the world. To check the growth and symmetry of your baby, just compare their growth curve with the reference curve provided by WHO.

The app would give advice on growth according to our smart algorithm analysis.

 

 

Neutral butter-yellow and with a high brightness and adorable bear shape, BonBaby Gro is not only a baby monitor, but also a playmate for your child. 

 

 All the corners and edges are rounded, and large feet ensure stability, so your child can measure themselves safely. 

 

 

Rotate the level ruler, and the bear’s eyes on the height scale will greet your baby as a signal of the start of measurement. And kids can step on the scale, which has the bear's footprints. All of this provides a reassuring sense of ritual for your child.

Because measurement is no longer a task assigned by parents, children are more willing to participate in it.

 

Winning a 2018 Red Dot Product Award has given us welcome recognition. Also, children taking part in our beta test expressed their love for the product. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The ruler is equipped with 75 bright LED bulbs, making the mode of presentation highly distinctive. The ultra-low power consumption Bluetooth chip makes the transmission of data faster, and the battery life is one year. A highly sensitive ultra-red sensor makes the ruler accurate to a precision of 0.2cm. 

 

The scale selects ultra-white tempered glass, which is tough yet light. The powerful sensor allows accurate measurement. The rounded corners and edges make measuring comfortable. Large feet stabilize the scale, making it harder to roll over. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are Bongmi, the creator of BonBaby Gro, a smart baby-growth tracker. In 2016, we launched our Femometer Indiegogo campaign, which raised $92,730 (over 240% funded). Our second Indiegogo campaign, in 2017, for Earmo, raising $40,512. This increased our confidence in exploring the area of baby products. Thanks to our supporting community of backers, we will continue evolving technologies to enhance wellness for every family. We are proud to be back, bringing you BonBaby Gro to help you take care of your beloved children.

story:
Low back pain affects many of us, and that’s mostly because we tend to neglect our backs. It’s so important that you take good care of it because it’s what keeps you in motion. There are several things you can do to prevent and relieve back pain; and improving your posture with proper support is key. It is never too late to change your posture, and when you practice proper posture, you help keep the natural curves of your spine healthy and aligned.

It's time for you to retire those ancient pillows that offer no customizable comfort and support. In today's market, most posture-pillows don't get the job done. Right?!

So we decided to design a pillow that will provide customizable lumbar support for maximum comfort.

You only get one body, so let's keep it aligned and comfortable!

We introduce to you...

Sleep Yoga - Go Posture Pillow!

The Sleep Yoga- Go Posture Pillow was designed with an ergonomic shape & precise angles that work to fit the natural curves of your body; helping relieve the pressure points in your lower back, but can also be used to relieve tension in your neck, knee, elbows and hands.

Its flexible duo spine design can be adjusted and holds its shape. No need to readjust and reshape a pillow that just doesn't maintain it's shape!

High-density soft-touch memory foam for pressure-relieving support. CertiPUR-US Certified Memory Foam for safe travel.

 

2-way removable strap to keep it in place.

Zippered cover for easy care.

Compact travel friendly bag included

Use the Sleep Yoga - Go Posture Pillow in your day to day life. With endless ways of use and perfect for any setting, this pillow is the perfect partner-in-crime for your daily travels!

With our expertise in comfort and posture, we decided it was time to create the best travel pillow ever – one that can be used anywhere.

After 10 months of prototyping and testing, we have found the solution that satisfied the most demanding pain points in our bodies.

We are the creators of Sleep Yoga Pillows, TataME BED and Hydrologie! Here at our headquarters in Los Angeles, CA. Our mission is to innovate sleeping and comfort products. We all know how good sleep is beneficial to the body in many different ways and, bottom line, our goal is to continue developing products that will help you get a better night's rest.

 

Stay tuned...follow us on facebook, instagram, and twitter for updates and new awesome creations! 


Our team now is geared up for the Sleep Yoga – Go project. We feel excited and confident that our backers will receive another great product from Sleep Yoga!

story:
WHAT IS POPIT SENSE?

Merging the latest innovations in medical adherence research and advanced technology, a small Popit Sense device is attached onto the pill sheet where it automatically detects when you extract a pill. There is no manual input needed. Thanks to its highly accurate sensors and patented technology, Popit Sense monitors your medication activity in real-time and triggers an alarm ONLY if you or a loved one is about to forget the pill.

All you have to do is clip it on to the pill sheet and there is one thing less to remember! Popit Sense works with different pill sheet types and reduces missed pills by over 80%.

Our team has been working on Popit Sense for over 2 years, collaborating with leading hospitals in Finland.

WHO IS IT FOR?

Popit Sense helps everyone. You can use it with different types of pills that come in blisters. These include medications for depression, anxiety, cholesterol, blood pressure, thyroid, type 2 diabetes, ADD/ADHD, asthma, allergy, insomnia, etc.

You can also use it to keep track of how family members have been taking their pills. Popit Sense can send out a notification to a pre-defined caregiver if pills have not been taken according to plan. Get piece of mind knowing medication works as it should for your loved ones.

 

 

WATCH OUR DEMO VIDEO TO SEE HOW IT WORKS

 

 

WHY POPIT?

Remembering to take the daily pill can be difficult when you have a lot of things going on in your life. It is easy to download a reminder app or simply use the smartphone alarm, but they do not take actual pill consumption into account nor are particularly smart.

Our extensive survey with 500 people using daily medication showed that as many as 12% of patients using a smartphone alarm had missed more than one pill during the last month alone. This number is likely optimistic, as nearly 90% of non-adherent people usually report that they are adherent.

How many times have you dismissed the alarm just to find yourself wondering if you took that pill after all? This is why we created Popit Sense. So that you or a loved one wouldn’t have to miss pills and that medication could work as intended!

 

COMPARISON

 

EXAMPLE: Birth Control Pills

1 IN 10 GET PREGNANT WHILE ON THE PILL

Birth control pills are an effective contraceptive method, which in perfect use have a failure rate of approximately 0.3%. A well-documented fact however is that occasional forgetfulness rapidly increases the failure rate by nearly 30x, up to 9%*

Popit helps you get from 9% closer to 0.3%, where you should be.

 

* Trussell J. Contraceptive failure in the United States. Contraception. 2011;83(5):397-404. doi:10.1016/j.contraception.2011.01.021.

 

WHAT THE PRESS IS SAYING

 

TESTIMONIALS FROM OUR TESTERS

 

BENEFITS

AUTOMATIC DETECTION - NO NEED FOR MANUAL INPUT

With the help of Artificial Intelligence, Popit Sense automatically detects when you’ve taken a pill. There is no manual input needed on the app or the device to keep track of daily pills. You simply take your medications and Popit Sense records the activity for you to see in the application.

 

NO INCONVENIENT ALERTS

Popit Sense isn't another alarm notification that you'll learn to ignore. To take better care of you, it is connected to your actual pills, so it notifies automatically when you or a loved one didn't take a pill. In personal use it has the added benefit of forming the habit of taking your pills at the exact same time every day.

Popit Sense can detect when you took the pill with the help of patented technology and three different sensors.

WORKS WITH VARIOUS PILL AND BLISTER TYPES

Popit Sense will work with different types of medications and pill blisters. The application and device are usable for example for blood pressure and cholesterol pill, anti-depressants, thyroid medication, allergy medications etc. The packaging just needs to have about 1/4 - 3/8" (or 6-9mm) of free space on the side for a secure attachment.

Initially the app will also have special content and features for birth control pills.

 

MAKE SURE MEDICATION WORKS AS INTENDED

Missed pills do not work. For example with birth control pills forgetting even once a month can raise chances of pregnancy. According to preliminary clinical research, Popit reduces the amount of missed pills by over 80%.

GO DEEPER WITH PILL CONSUMPTION INSIGHTS

Gain insights into your or a loved ones medication history. Learn about past behaviour and see if there is room for improvement. Popit provides actionable metrics and suggestions.

 

HOW IT WORKS

Starting to use Popit Sense is simple.

  1. You attach Popit Sense onto your pill sheet
  2. Tell the app which pill brand you are using
  3. Popit Sense automatically detects whenever a pill has been extracted.The app keeps you on track by reminding if you are about to miss a pill.

If you take your pills according to plan, there are no reminders. If you forget, you will be reminded until you do take the pill.

 

App features

The free Popit App will be available for both iPhone and Android.

 

BLISTER FIT

Popit Sense fits most pill brands, including round sheets. You just need to make sure your pill sheet has about 1/4 - 3/8" (or 6-9mm) free space anywhere on the edges to attach Popit Sense. Some brands have a hole in the middle, which can also be used for attachment so that Popit Sense will actually be in the middle of the sheet. Wallet-type cardboard packages work as well.

If Popit Sense does not fit your pill sheet, you may return the product for a full refund within the first 30 days upon receiving it.

 

SPECS

 

DEVELOPMENT STATUS

We've been developing Popit Sense for over 2 years now and have already built 4 hardware generations. During that time, over 10,000 pills have been extracted and we've analyzed thousands of data points.

Right now we are finalizing the hardware and starting to build production capabilities so ramp-up can be as smooth as possible when we begin shipping the devices to you!

Shipping globally.

Shipping is included in the price for US, Canada, UK and The Netherlands.

 

HERE'S HOW YOU BACK POPIT ON INDIEGOGO

Check out this video we made if you are new to crowdfunding! Spoiler: it’s really simple.

 

 

How does it work?

Popit Sense uses three sensors; acoustic (there's a mic), accelerometer, and touch. These three sensors combined provide an accurate measurement. The technology is patented. 

Why is it better than a reminder app or smartphone alarm? I use those all the time.

Both are great ways to remember medications better, but they do not track anything. They also do not know if you took the pill or not, triggering an alarm even if you already took it.

Popit Sense is an evolved version of the pill reminder, automatically tracking if a pill has been taken and syncing this information with the app. Popit Sense is connected to your actual pills, meaning it understands your context: pill consumption is automatically recorded in the app and a reminder will go off only if you didn’t take the pill.

We have preliminary data from our clinical pilot that shows the solution reduces missed pills by nearly 80%. Popit Sense quantifies pills and brings them to the digital age.

Does it work with different medications?

Yes! The same device works with various pill brands - but they need to come in blisters. The blister pack will just need to have a bit of space on the edges to allow attachment.

Does Popit Sense need to stay close to my phone in order for it to see that I took a pill? 

No. The Bluetooth range on Popit Sense is very good, about 30m / 100ft. This means that in a normal apartment the smartphone can easily connect to Popit Sense when it needs to, so the two do not need to be right next to each other.

Even if the two would not be able to connect, Popit Sense stores up to several months of data which get synced when the two get back in contact.

Will I miss my pill if Popit Sense cannot connect to my phone?

If for some reason the app would not have received information from Popit Sense about your pill status, it will trigger a reminder as a backup measure. This means data not being in sync will not make you miss a pill.

Does it fit all kinds of pill packs?

You just need to make sure your pill sheet has about 1/4 - 3/8" (or 6-9mm) free space anywhere on the edges to attach Popit Sense. Most rectangular and round sheets have this.

Some brands have a hole in the middle, which can also be used for attachment so that Popit Sense will actually be in the middle of the sheet.

How about wallet-type packages with cardboard?

Some pill brands, like Yaz, or Qlaira on some markets come in a cardboard wallet. We have successfully used Popit Sense with these as well, but in some cases the cardboard might be a bit thick for Popit Sense's opening. That can be overcome by pressing the cardboard a bit tighter or peeling it off a bit.

Will it come off in my bag?

The attachment is quite secure. There are two metal spikes that pierce the sheet so it stays attached. This is what the button on the top is for, to open or close the attachment mechanism.

Can I use one Popit Sense for many medications at the same time?

You will need one device for one medication, two for two, etc.

What if I take too many pills at once?

The app will notify you if you took more than you should have.

Does the mic listen in on what I do?

No. It's not the kind of mic you use to sing My Heart Will Go On in karaoke. This is a contact mic that senses vibrations, as opposed to a non-contact kind. 

What colors are available?

We will have eight colors: Ice Blue, Lemon, Marrs Green, Blue, Pink, Violet, Black, and White. 

 

SHIPPING DETAILS

Popit Sense Smart Pill Reminder will begin shipping in May 2018. Shipping will be fulfilled in the order received.

 

REFUND & RETURN POLICY

You may return our product for a full refund for any reason within the first 30 days upon receiving it. It must be returned in the original packaging with all components included. The price for any missing components will be deducted from the refund.

Please note that you are responsible for the cost of return shipping. Once we receive the unit in our facility, the return will be processed within 24 hours and the funds reflected in the bank account of the user typically within 5 business days.

Popit Sense comes with a 1 year Warranty. It means that for any faulty products we will offer exchanges up until one year from the original purchase date. The client has to contact us to have a RMA (Return Merchandising Authorization). This Warranty does not apply to:

(a) cosmetic damage, including but not limited to scratches and dents;
(b) damage caused by accident, misuse, unreasonable use, immersion in water, neglect, abuse, battery leakage, improper service, or other external causes;
(c) damage caused by operating the product outside the permitted or intended uses described by Popit Ltd. in the accompanying leaflet;
(d) a product or part that has been modified
(e) defects caused by normal wear and tear or otherwise due to the normal aging of the product.

Once we receive the unit in our facility, the return will be processed within 24 hours and the funds reflected in the bank account of the user typically within 5 business days.Popit Sense comes with a 1 year Warranty. It means that for any faulty products we will offer exchanges up until one year from the original purchase date. The client has to contact us to have a RMA (Return Merchandising Authorization). This Warranty does not apply to:(a) cosmetic damage, including but not limited to scratches and dents;(b) damage caused by accident, misuse, unreasonable use, immersion in water, neglect, abuse, battery leakage, improper service, or other external causes;(c) damage caused by operating the product outside the permitted or intended uses described by Popit Ltd. in the accompanying leaflet;(d) a product or part that has been modified(e) defects caused by normal wear and tear or otherwise due to the normal aging of the product.

story:
EN CORTO – Short message

La historia detrás del método (My personal Story)

  • En el 2007, casi me muero por lo eNfermo que estaba! Siendo en Director de Nuevos negocios de una importante empresa de Televisión; produje cientos de conciertos y programas, tenía una oficina de Management de artistas, un estudio de grabación profesional  y una exitosa empresa de producción de eventos. Mientras triunfaba por fuera, me estaba matando por dentro.  Los excesos en la comida y la bebida; mi vida desorganizada y la depresión que acompaña al éxito económico cuando los valores están mal fundamentados fueron solo algunas de las cosas que necesité sanar para RENACER! Hoy 10 años después de haber trabajado y estudiado por todo el mundo, estamos listos para compartir este sistema en un libro y un APP, en una serie de videos,  talleres y retiros que pueden salvar a muchas más personas.
  • In 2007, I was a successful TV New Business Director, Producer and Artist manager, creating one of the top production companies in Mexico and produce events, shows and content all over the world. Within that time, with all of that "success", I suffered from server depression, food and alcohol disorders. The stress I was unable to handle was killing me—physically, emotionally and mentally. After more than 2 years traveling the world and working on my self, I began to create this system (Renacer en 90 Días) that can help others in the same situation. Today, 10 years later, this system has been proven and transcribed into a book, a series of short videos, an iOS APP, and a one-on-one and group coaching system that has the potential to save the lives of many others. 

 

  • EL DINERO RECAUDADO NOS VA A PERMITIR PUBLICAR EL LIBRO  TERMINAR EL DISEÑO DEL APP, EDITAR LOS CONTENIDOS EN VIDEO Y SEGUIR CREANDO RECETAS DE COCINA, EJERCICIOS Y TALLERES PARA TODOS LOS QUE LO NECESITAN REALMENTE.
  • THIS CAMPAIGN WILL SUPPLY THE FUNDS NEEDED TO EDIT AND PRINT THE BOOK, FINISH THE APP AND CONTINUE CREATING THE SUPPORTIVE VIDEOS, ALL WHILE CRAFTING  AND LAUNCHING THE WORKSHOPS, RETREATS, AND CONFERENCES WORLDWIDE.

 

  • Mi historia se que es la de MILES de personas que NO SABEN COMO y que tal vez han perdido las ganas de vivir, de mejorar,  de verse y  de sentirse mejor.  R90D.TV realmente te dice como pero mas importante te ayuda a encontrar el PARA QUE? mediante cientos de ejercicios, meditaciones, visualizaciones y videos cortos.  
  • My story is sadly very common and we create this system to help everybody who needs to remember HOW and most important WHY they are here. We use more than 100 meditations, exercises, cooking tips, in a fun short videos format that make this easy to follow and to learn and apply.

 

 QUE NECESITAMOS /What We Need

  • NECESITAMOS 28,400 DOLARES para terminar las ediciones de los videos, el diseño e implementación del APP y la creación de los primeros KITS de R90D.TV que vamos a utilizar con las personas que decidan unirse al sistema.
  • I NEED 28,400 USD to finish the book formatting and translation, video edits and APP developers fee and programming. In addition, the money will goes towards creating and printing the initial batch of "welcome kits" and VIP packages for a select few as an R90D grant, offering need to those who cannot afford, but will save their life from this program, and your investment.

 

Este sistema va a cambiar la vida de muchas personas gracias a la forma en la que se comparte en redes sociales, mediante el APP y con los testimoniales de cada uno. Al apoyar la campaña no solo recibes el LIBRO y el acceso al APP vas a formar parte del grupo VIP para poder compartir, opinar, comentar y ayudarnos a servir a más personas  en todo el mundo, de una manera más eficiente!

This system will change thousands of lives because is designed to be shared as a community, support system and amongst peers. Available to all, exclusive to no one or country, the app will be available anywhere. When you support this campaign you are getting the book but also the opportunity to be part of the VIP GROUP to share, comment and most importantly, YOU WILL HELP R90D to grow and be able to serve more people around the world.

 

En R90D lo único peligro es no hacer nada.

El sistema que creamos necesita seguirse día a día y por lo que aprendimos en el pasado el APP va a permitir a la gente estar conectada y recibir los mensajes, ejercicios y meditaciones en el tiempo y la forma necesarios para cumplir sus propias metas. Necesito de la ayuda de todos para que cada grupo se conforme y se motive a seguir adelante—JUNTOS es la palabra clave! Si crees que este sistema no es para ti, AYUDANOS A COMPARTIRLO, seguramente alguien cerca lo necesita!

 

In the R90D system the only mistake is DOING NOTHING!

The system requires you to act, to move, to believe and to share.  If you don't think this program is for you, HELP me to share the video and the page with someone this can benefit. Someone near you may need it and be thankful to get a "second chance" at life. The APP will keep us connected and accessible to allow the group to work closely—TOGETHER is the keyword!

story:
Resist your cravings and track your progress

Know when to eat and when NOT to eat, and let the vibrations keep you away from your temptations
 


 

Use FitTo to


 


 

Simple as set and go

FitTo reminds you to not to cheat; the app reminds you when to eat
 

 

What do you get with FitTo? 

 

Featured in 

 

FitTo is there when you need it most

Weight loss is easier when you’re not alone. When it comes to staying on track, FitTo is your best friend. 

 

1) Take control of your eating habits

Choose from recommended eating plans or program your own. Use the app to set the times you want to eat.

2) Avoid temptations with the help of vibrations

The unique FitTo mechanism senses when you eat. The device vibrates for 30 seconds when you take a bite outside of your scheduled eating times, effectively discouraging you from cheating. A push notification on the app motivates you to stay on track.

3) Lock your temptations away 

With the optional locking mechanism, make it easier to commit to your new diet plan.  If you struggle with discipline, let FitTo take care of it. 
*We especially recommend this for the first 1-2 weeks of your weight loss journey.

4) Get notifications when it’s time to eat

Never forget your schedule or skip an important meal. The FitTo app will remind you.

5) Monitor your progress

See your discipline improve as you go, and track your results using the app. Maintain your motivation and make tomorrow better than today.


Slipping off track? Give yourself a shake


 

 

Backed by science, proven by results

When you eat food, your body breaks it down into sugars such as glucose. Your cells use this glucose for energy, and if it isn’t used up then it gets stored as fat. When you don’t eat food for a set period of time each day, the glucose in your body is used up, so your body starts to burn your fat. This process of burning fat is known as ketosis.

Numerous studies show that intermittent fasting is an effective weight loss method. There are a variety of techniques including alternate-day fasting, 5:2 (two days fasting per week), and 6/18 (18 hours fasting per day). Our app assists you whichever option you choose.

 

 

What people are saying about FitTo?


 

"I love that FitTo gives me a shake when I should NOT eat and will remind when to have my meal. The app constantly provides motivation to stay on track and to achieve my goals."

Johnson
Personal Trainer
 

"FitTo has given me a new a way of staying consistent with my diet plans. The FitTo app provides instant feedback and progress on how I am doing."

Dwayne
Retail Manager
 

"FitTo is very easy and simple to use. This is a unique way to transform in better shape and lose weight."

Hannah
Solicitor
 

"FitTo is such a unique product. Many people will understand the struggle of wanting to lose weight but being unable to commit to an eating schedule. FitTo does that work for you, and your schedule becomes something you don’t even have to think about."

Charlie
English Teacher

 


 


Designed by Professionals

We have spent three years perfecting the design of FitTo with style, practicality, and comfort in mind. 

 


 

Design that suits you

FitTo’s sleek good looks, second-skin comfort, and waterproof design means it works whatever you do, and wherever you go.
 

 

Tech Specs

 

 

FitTo Timeline

 

 

FitTo Shipping


 




We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.
 




We plan to ship the product in September 2019. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

For questions about your order, please email: Support@getfitto.info
 



By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first products off the line plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.


Change of Address?  We’ve got you covered.

We make sure that FitTo backers have the absolute smoothest experience possible.

If you need to change your address or anything else about your order, FitTo customer service will be there to help you easily update any of your shipping and delivery details!


Email: Support@getfitto.info

 

Help Out By Sharing With Friends & Families!

 

Share on Facebook

Don’t keep it a secret
