story:
Introducing EZ Teethbrush

The EZ Teethbrush design is a perfect mix of high-tech, elegance, and modern functionality.  Just imagine the money you can save $$$ on dental care by having easier and better cleaning routines along with improved oral health. Brush smarter, not harder with the EZ Teethbrush.   Now you can brush ALL of your teeth, safer,  softer, and faster than ever before.  This revolutionary product uses a state-of-the-art Sonic powered double-sided mouthpiece toothbrush that brushes all of your teeth simultaneously. This amazing product saves time, makes brushing easier, and lets you focus on what you enjoy doing. 

I bet you're a bit like us and sometimes you are in a hurry or just too tired to brush long enough if at all. 
 

The Problem

 

Why The EZ Teethbrush™ Is The Perfect Solution 

Save 75% of the time it takes to brush.  Perfect for anyone that doesn't enjoy or has difficulty brushing their teeth for two minutes, twice a day. Studies show that most people don't brush for the full two minutes and much of the population only brushes once a day. 

 

Did You Know Nearly Half Of Adults Have Gum Disease?

According the CDC, nearly half of the adults in the USA have gum disease. In 2001 the Guisness Book of World Records declared Gum disease as the #1 Disease in The World affecting all of man-kind. 

 

Who is the EZ Teethbrush™ Designed for?

It's for ANYONE that doesn't like to brush their teeth and especially those that don't brush for two minutes, twice a day.  Adults, Kids and people with special needs can also benefit from the EZ Teethbrush.  The EZ Teethbrush design is also great for people with limited dexterity.  

Don't just take our word for it! 

"I recommend the EZ Teethbrush™ to my patients that don't brush for two minutes, twice a day. "  - Dr. Kody Mund DMD -

"I would recommend the EZ Teethbrush™ for anyone that doesn't brush for two minutes, twice a day, and for patients with special needs" - Dr. Nick Spendlove DMD -  

 

 

In 2006, a fresh-faced, Utah-raised, good-to-know-ya fella named Craig Mock, was attending Western Wyoming Community College on a Wrestling scholarship. When his roommate, Wick Taylor was brushing his teeth with a new Sonic powered Toothbrush given to him by his sister that just graduated from dental hygiene school. Craig was brushing his teeth with a traditional soft-bristled toothbrush while his roommate used his fancy new toothbrush that beeped every 30 seconds. This new Sonic Toothbrush was designed to beep every 30 seconds for a total of 2 minutes because the mouth can be divided into 4 quadrants, and each quadrant should be brushed for 30 seconds when using a Sonic Powered Toothbrush. Craig thought there had to be a better way.  And there is! So Craig began developing the EZ Teethbrush™. After over 10 years of Research and Development, testing prototypes, countless hours, thousands and thousands of dollars invested,  the EZ Teethbrush is ready for the World. Prior to the release of the EZ Teethbrush™ Craig worked in the Medical Sector for several years working with durable medical equipment and pharmaceuticals.  Craig transitioned to a career working for the Department of Defense and even worked for DCMA's NASA Product Operations working with rocket motors as an Industrial Specialist. Applying what he learned about the manufacturing of rockets, to the manufacturing of a Sonic Powered Teethbrush. He successfully blended science and producibility.  

  • The World's First Teethbrush
  • Whitens and Removes Stains up to 4x Faster
  • Bacteria Resistant, Soft Mouthpiece
  • Long Life Battery, 45 days, Perfect for Traveling
  • Use Your Favorite Toothpaste or "Teethpaste", 
  • Easy to Use and Dishwasher Safe.

 Your EZ Teethbrush™ will be ready to ship in May and right now is available exclusively to the Indiegogo community. We chose to make it available on Indiegogo for two main reasons:

1. The Indiegogo community invests in the future. We are looking forward to the future and how we can constantly innovate in the hygiene industry. We’re looking for like-minded people to be the first to bring it home.

2. The EZ Teethbrush is shipping in May but that’s just the beginning. We want it to arrive first in the homes of people who want to help us determine its future. That’s you! To do that we want your help identifying future features and new product ideas.

 
 

NOTE: 80% of Adults fit the "Regular" size mouthpiece.

Official Prototype Gallery
story_txt:
Introducing EZ Teethbrush The EZ Teethbrush design is a perfect mix of high-tech, elegance, and modern functionality.  Just imagine the money you can save $$$ on dental care by having easier and better cleaning routines along with improved oral health. Brush smarter, not harder with the EZ Teethbrush.   Now you can brush ALL of your teeth, safer,  softer, and faster than ever before.  This revolutionary product uses a state-of-the-art Sonic powered double-sided mouthpiece toothbrush that brushes all of your teeth simultaneously. This amazing product saves time, makes brushing easier, and lets you focus on what you enjoy doing. Black EZ Teethbrush™ Mouthpiece and HandleEZ Teethbrush™ Charging Dock IPx7 Water ResistantEZ Teethbrush™ Standing in Charging DockI bet you're a bit like us and sometimes you are in a hurry or just too tired to brush long enough if at all.  The Problem Over Brushing causes Non Carious Cervical Lesions (abfraction lesions). Receding gums are more common today than ever before.
More and more research shows that over-brushing is causing abfraction lesions/receding gums at an alarming rate. 
The innovative EZ Teethbrush™ uses cutting-edge technology to safely and efficiently clean all teeth and gums, practically eliminating the extra time, and human error often experienced with traditional brushing and over-brushing.    Why The EZ Teethbrush™ Is The Perfect Solution Save 75% of the time it takes to brush.  Perfect for anyone that doesn't enjoy or has difficulty brushing their teeth for two minutes, twice a day. Studies show that most people don't brush for the full two minutes and much of the population only brushes once a day.  Did You Know Nearly Half Of Adults Have Gum Disease?According the CDC, nearly half of the adults in the USA have gum disease. In 2001 the Guisness Book of World Records declared Gum disease as the #1 Disease in The World affecting all of man-kind.  
Who is the EZ Teethbrush™ Designed for?It's for ANYONE that doesn't like to brush their teeth and especially those that don't brush for two minutes, twice a day.  Adults, Kids and people with special needs can also benefit from the EZ Teethbrush.  The EZ Teethbrush design is also great for people with limited dexterity.  Don't just take our word for it! "I recommend the EZ Teethbrush™ to my patients that don't brush for two minutes, twice a day. "  - Dr. Kody Mund DMD -"I would recommend the EZ Teethbrush™ for anyone that doesn't brush for two minutes, twice a day, and for patients with special needs" - Dr. Nick Spendlove DMD -   Travel KitCarbon Fiber PU Travel Kit In 2006, a fresh-faced, Utah-raised, good-to-know-ya fella named Craig Mock, was attending Western Wyoming Community College on a Wrestling scholarship. When his roommate, Wick Taylor was brushing his teeth with a new Sonic powered Toothbrush given to him by his sister that just graduated from dental hygiene school. Craig was brushing his teeth with a traditional soft-bristled toothbrush while his roommate used his fancy new toothbrush that beeped every 30 seconds. This new Sonic Toothbrush was designed to beep every 30 seconds for a total of 2 minutes because the mouth can be divided into 4 quadrants, and each quadrant should be brushed for 30 seconds when using a Sonic Powered Toothbrush. Craig thought there had to be a better way.  And there is! So Craig began developing the EZ Teethbrush™. After over 10 years of Research and Development, testing prototypes, countless hours, thousands and thousands of dollars invested,  the EZ Teethbrush is ready for the World. Prior to the release of the EZ Teethbrush™ Craig worked in the Medical Sector for several years working with durable medical equipment and pharmaceuticals.  Craig transitioned to a career working for the Department of Defense and even worked for DCMA's NASA Product Operations working with rocket motors as an Industrial Specialist. Applying what he learned about the manufacturing of rockets, to the manufacturing of a Sonic Powered Teethbrush. He successfully blended science and producibility.  
Dr. Brett Ballingham became fascinated with finding a more effective way to brush during his first year of dental school, his dad who was suffering from debilitating Parkinson’s disease and thus was struggling to brush his teeth with conventional methods challenged him to find a way to help him clean his teeth. Brett set out to find a better way. In his search to make a better toothbrush, he was introduced to Craig by mutual friends in the dental community. Together they collaborated and made changes to the mouthpiece culminating with the EZ Teethbrush.
Dr. Brett Ballingham graduated top of his class at Roseman University in Salt Lake City Utah after which he completed a one-year advanced education program at Arizona School of Dentistry with an emphasis in dental work on patients with special needs and children. He has over ten years experience in dentistry.
Dr. Ballingham can be found on social media at Brett_Ballingham on Facebook and Instagram and welcomes any questions or concerns or feedback you have about the EZ Teethbrush.
Thank you for helping to bring this project to the world! 
The World's First Teethbrush

Bacteria Resistant, Soft Mouthpiece

Easy to Use and Dishwasher Safe.

story:
DreamOn emits low-frequency gentle pulses that activate your body’s natural sleep process. Experience a more restful sleep, faster.
 
 
Simply and safely enjoy a quality drug-free sleep that leaves you feeling happier, thinking more clearly, more resilient to stress, and in control of your emotions.
 
 
 
 
 

Each state of mind (awake, light sleep, deep sleep, etc.) has a unique signature known as a BRAIN WAVE PATTERN.

By emitting the low-frequency signal of deep sleep, DreamOn encourages your brain to REPLICATE THAT SIGNAL, sending you into deeper sleep, faster.

 

 

 

Click on the image to earn cash rewards for pledges from your own referral link!

 

 

DreamOn uses a completely natural, tactile approach that leaves
you feeling refreshed, more focused and with a clear mind. Say goodbye
to all those unnecessary sleep aids. 

 

 

A chronic lack of sleep can take a toll on your overall brain health.
DreamOn helps you practice healthy sleep habits that have been
shown to reduce stress and increase focus.

 

 

Our guided meditations can help with night wakings,
common insomnia and other sleep ailments.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Scientists have known since the 1930s that we are able to coax brain
waves into different rhythms.

DreamOn is an advanced form of entrainment, the process of your internal organs copying and matching the stimuli from an external force.

While most entrainment research has used visual and auditory signals like flashing lights or alarms, DreamOn relies on paced signals that travel through your extensive neural network to alter the calibration of our natural brainwaves. The persistent rhythm of the signal locks step with our own rhythmic brainwaves and soothes them down to those needed for deep relaxation.

 
There are several stages of sleep, defined by the type of waves the brain creates for each. In the beginning stages of sleep, your body feels a need to rest and relax. Brainwaves begin to slow as alertness relaxes and the mind drifts into slumber. The body’s need for slow wave sleep is clear, as the very first phase of sleep is known as slow wave non-REM sleep, where the rest-inducing deepest brain waves are recorded. Transitioning from the relatively fast waves of wakefulness to the slow waves of sleep is problematic for most insomnia complainers. DreamOn is designed to assist in that transition.
 
 
Over the past five years research has intensified to develop the optimal configuration for DreamOn's comfort and effectiveness.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

QUALITY OF SLEEP: self-reported improvements across respondents.

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Whether your kids need help sticking to a bedtime or getting a full night’s rest (yes, one without waking you up multiple times), DreamOn can aid in improving their sleeping habits too.

 
 
 
 

Poor quality and low quantity of sleep can lead to chronic health problems such as heart disease, diabetes, depression, and high blood pressure. It might also lead to poor decision making or difficulty in thinking, reacting, or learning.

Research shows that after losing  1-2 hours per night over several nights of sleep, you function as if you had missed a full one or two nights of sleep. That means less productivity at work, school, and in the long run, even a decrease in longevity.

 

 
 
 
 

Most sleep wearables are bulky and uncomfortable. DreamOn
was built to be discreet and attractive.

 

 

 

 

 

DreamOn's companion app lets you personalize your device experience. Sleep tracking, sleep tips, guided meditations, and soundscapes are just a few of its features to help you relax. DreamOn's companion App is not required for use.

 

 

 

Patented sleep technology for a restful sleep begins with
high quality manufacturing.

 

 

 

Height 13mm
Length 41mm
Width 33mm
Weight 2 oz
Materials ABS plastic, Nylon strap
Battery life 10 days
Bluetooth 5.0
Chipset Nordic nRF52832
Mobile App iOS and Android

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Manufacturing Details

We're happy to share these photos of the production molds.

 

 

We are Now Shipping!!


 

 

 

 

We ship worldwide. See reward details for shipping costs.
Prices exclude any local duties or sales tax.

 

After a long development process and a few delays we have started shipping. All orders should go out before June 1st 2019. 

 

By backing now we will give regular production updates and keep you in the
know with everything.

 

 

Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend, family member or
coworker who needs this!


 

 

What is it? DreamOn is a patented, wearable device and companion app that promotes relaxation and helps the wearer ease into restful, refreshing sleep.
Who created it? Dr. Gerrard Sunnen, Martin Sokoloff and Juan Sanabria
Why should we use it? You don't need drugs or special equipment to feel calm and get amazing rest. It just works, guiding your body and mind in to relaxation.
How much does it cost?  Product will enter retail at $200.
Where can we buy it? Right here on Indiegogo!
What do we get when we order? You get the DreamOn band, a usb charger and access to the mobile app with sleep tracking, meditations, soundscapes and other tools to help you sleep better.
Why are you crowdfunding?

Our campaign will allow us to increase production, reach out to more restless sleepers, extend our relationships with sleep experts, and advance our research.

 

What features are available? It works out of the box and the companion app can offer improved calibration, sleep tracking, tips, guided meditations and relaxing soundscapes.
What colors do you offer? It's currently available in black.
What sizes do you offer? It's available in Adult and Children's sizes (band length for wrist)
Is it comfortable / attractive / discreet?

The product is small, comfortable and elegant. It's meant to disappear as you settle into a restful night's sleep.

 

What is the uniqueness of the technology? Many products can track your sleep but DreamOn is unique because it actively helps you fall asleep faster and sleep more restfully.
What is the battery life? Hours of continuous use? How to charge?

Product should be recharged once or twice a week depending on use. It is promised to last for 10 sessions of falling asleep on a single charge.
What are the dimensions and weight? The latest prototype is approx. 41mm X 36mm and weighs about 2 ounces.
How does it work?

It uses a crafted subtle, tactile pulse to activate a physiological process called entrainment that prepares your body and mind for sleep.
What kind of sensors are you using?  Just a motion sensor to track your sleep.
Will there be updates to it in the future? This product is undergoing continual improvement. New versions will feature new personalization options, use-cases and other integrations.
How does it integrate with other connected devices?  It uses bluetooth to send sleep data to a companion app on your smartphone.
Is it waterproof? Not at this time although we are working on it for a future version.
Can DreamOn help with early waking The device can assist you in falling back asleep if you are awaking too early.
DreamOn is designed to help users fall asleep at bedtime, fall back asleep if they awake in the middle of the night and fall asleep faster if trying to take a nap. Note that other medications and underlying health issues may cause night wakings and you should consult your doctor if night wakings are an issue.
Where is it manufactured? Designed in the USA and manufactured in China. 

 

Does it have an app? Which phones does it work with? The product has a fully featured companion app, currently available for closed testing on iOS. An Android app will be released when the product ships.
When will the app be available? The app will be available at launch so you can start using it with the product.
Can we also access app functions on a web browser?  There is no web interface at this time.
How does the device connect to the app? The device and app connect over bluetooth. The pairing process is very simple, requiring a matter of seconds to connect and synchronize.
What can we expect from the app? The app provides sleep tracking and analysis, guided meditations, relaxing soundscapes and suggestions for improving sleep habits.
Will there be updates available through the app? The app will be updated regularly with new meditations and other behavioral tools that can help you sleep better.

 

How do I set it up? Product can be used out of the box, or you can install the companion app and quickly calibrate it to your preferences.
How do I turn it on and off? Turn it on with a single button press. The device automatically turns itself off after a sleep cycle.
How do I control it?

You don't need to do anything special to control the device, it just works. But the device’s effectiveness can be enhanced by guided awareness.
What is the care and cleaning of it? You can clean the device periodically by wiping with a damp cloth.
Is it dishwasher safe / machine washable? Product should not be used in the dishwasher or washing machine.
Does it have an expiry date? Product has a rechargeable battery and will work for several years with regular use.

 

What are the recommended ages? Product is tested to be safe and effective for people of all ages.
Where can I use it?  DreamOn is especially useful for falling asleep but it can be worn and used in any setting to reduce stress and anxiety. 
Is it safe? DreamOn emits no electrical charge or intrusive signals, so it's completely safe and won't interfere with other medicines or therapies. 
What certifications do you have? Our founder is Board Certified in Psychiatry and Neurology, (Ret) Associate Clinical Professor Psychiatry, NYU-Bellevue Medical Center, NY
How durable is it? Product is solid and reliable. It's strong enough for wherever your dreams might take you.
How is my privacy protected? You do not need to provide any personal information to use our product.
Can someone watch or listen to me? Product will only record the amount of tossing and turning you might do in bed. It isn't capable of recording any audio or video.
Does DreamOn emit EMFs  
Not during nighttime use. DreamOn will pulse and collect sleep data but it does not turn on bluetooth unless a user decides to load sleep data to their smartphone app.
Are there any risks associated with use?  DreamOn is a completely risk free device, as safe as a wrist watch.

 

Performance Disclaimer No claims are made as to performance and no results are guaranteed. Individual results will vary.
Health Disclaimer The DreamOn device is not intended to treat or cure any disease or sleep disorder. None of our communications should be taken as medical advice. If you experience anything other than occasional sleeplessness, consult your physician, as this may be a sign of an underlying condition.
FDA Status The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has not evaluated this product.
Earnings Disclaimer We make every effort to accurately represent our products.
Epilepsy Do NOT use any product featuring "brainwave entrainment" if you suffer from epilepsy, due to the theoretical risk of triggering a seizure.

 

When does shipping begin? We plan to ship batch 1 in mid January 2019. Batch 2 will ship in March 2019.
When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps? US and Canadian orders should arrive 2-4 days after shipping
Where does it ship? Worldwide
How much is shipping? Shipping prices vary per country. Please see your selected perk details. 
I'm interested in a distribution partnership. Please contact us at hello@dreamon.co
Do I have to pay VAT / GST? Yes
What are the risks & challenges of getting the device today? There are logistical challenges with manufacturing any hardware product. Fortunately we are well prepared to deal with these.

 

What is your refund policy? Indiegogo purchases are final once campaign ends. For general purchases after we plan to offer a 30 day money back guarantee.
What is your return / exchange policy? If you received a defective product, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping & handling fees.
How do I choose more than one reward?  To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.
How can I check the status of my pre-order? By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.
I'm interested in becoming a Beta Tester.  Only Backers are eligible to become Beta Testers. Pre-order your unit first, and then send us an email with your order confirmation number to receive more info.
Why do I have to wait longer than usual? This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build the device, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.
If I have other questions, who should I contact?

Press: press@dreamon.co
Investment Inquiries: hello@dreamon.co
Support: support@dreamon.co

What is it?
DreamOn is a patented, wearable device and companion app that promotes relaxation and helps the wearer ease into restful, refreshing sleep.


Who created it?
Dr. Gerrard Sunnen, Martin Sokoloff and Juan Sanabria


Why should we use it?

How much does it cost?

Where can we buy it?

What do we get when we order?

Why are you crowdfunding?
Our campaign will allow us to increase production, reach out to more restless sleepers, extend our relationships with sleep experts, and advance our research.

 

What features are available?
It works out of the box and the companion app can offer improved calibration, sleep tracking, tips, guided meditations and relaxing soundscapes.


What colors do you offer?
It's currently available in black.


What sizes do you offer?
It's available in Adult and Children's sizes (band length for wrist)


Is it comfortable / attractive / discreet?
The product is small, comfortable and elegant. It's meant to disappear as you settle into a restful night's sleep.

 

What is the uniqueness of the technology?
Many products can track your sleep but DreamOn is unique because it actively helps you fall asleep faster and sleep more restfully.


What is the battery life? Hours of continuous use? How to charge?
Product should be recharged once or twice a week depending on use. It is promised to last for 10 sessions of falling asleep on a single charge.


What are the dimensions and weight?
The latest prototype is approx. 41mm X 36mm and weighs about 2 ounces.


How does it work?
It uses a crafted subtle, tactile pulse to activate a physiological process called entrainment that prepares your body and mind for sleep.


What kind of sensors are you using? 
Just a motion sensor to track your sleep.


Will there be updates to it in the future?
This product is undergoing continual improvement. New versions will feature new personalization options, use-cases and other integrations.


How does it integrate with other connected devices? 
It uses bluetooth to send sleep data to a companion app on your smartphone.


Is it waterproof?
Not at this time although we are working on it for a future version.


Can DreamOn help with early waking
The device can assist you in falling back asleep if you are awaking too early.DreamOn is designed to help users fall asleep at bedtime, fall back asleep if they awake in the middle of the night and fall asleep faster if trying to take a nap. Note that other medications and underlying health issues may cause night wakings and you should consult your doctor if night wakings are an issue.


Where is it manufactured?
Designed in the USA and manufactured in China. 

 

Does it have an app? Which phones does it work with?
The product has a fully featured companion app, currently available for closed testing on iOS. An Android app will be released when the product ships.


When will the app be available?
The app will be available at launch so you can start using it with the product.


Can we also access app functions on a web browser? 
There is no web interface at this time.


How does the device connect to the app?
The device and app connect over bluetooth. The pairing process is very simple, requiring a matter of seconds to connect and synchronize.


What can we expect from the app?
The app provides sleep tracking and analysis, guided meditations, relaxing soundscapes and suggestions for improving sleep habits.


Will there be updates available through the app?
The app will be updated regularly with new meditations and other behavioral tools that can help you sleep better.

 

How do I set it up?
Product can be used out of the box, or you can install the companion app and quickly calibrate it to your preferences.


How do I turn it on and off?
Turn it on with a single button press. The device automatically turns itself off after a sleep cycle.


How do I control it?
You don't need to do anything special to control the device, it just works. But the device’s effectiveness can be enhanced by guided awareness.


What is the care and cleaning of it?
You can clean the device periodically by wiping with a damp cloth.


Is it dishwasher safe / machine washable?
Product should not be used in the dishwasher or washing machine.


Does it have an expiry date?
Product has a rechargeable battery and will work for several years with regular use.

 

What are the recommended ages?
Product is tested to be safe and effective for people of all ages.


Where can I use it?
 DreamOn is especially useful for falling asleep but it can be worn and used in any setting to reduce stress and anxiety. 


Is it safe?
DreamOn emits no electrical charge or intrusive signals, so it's completely safe and won't interfere with other medicines or therapies. 


What certifications do you have?
Our founder is Board Certified in Psychiatry and Neurology, (Ret) Associate Clinical Professor Psychiatry, NYU-Bellevue Medical Center, NY


How durable is it?
Product is solid and reliable. It's strong enough for wherever your dreams might take you.


How is my privacy protected?
You do not need to provide any personal information to use our product.


Can someone watch or listen to me?
Product will only record the amount of tossing and turning you might do in bed. It isn't capable of recording any audio or video.


Does DreamOn emit EMFs
 Not during nighttime use. DreamOn will pulse and collect sleep data but it does not turn on bluetooth unless a user decides to load sleep data to their smartphone app.


Are there any risks associated with use?
 DreamOn is a completely risk free device, as safe as a wrist watch.

 

Performance Disclaimer
No claims are made as to performance and no results are guaranteed. Individual results will vary.


Health Disclaimer
The DreamOn device is not intended to treat or cure any disease or sleep disorder. None of our communications should be taken as medical advice. If you experience anything other than occasional sleeplessness, consult your physician, as this may be a sign of an underlying condition.


FDA Status
The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has not evaluated this product.


Earnings Disclaimer
We make every effort to accurately represent our products.


Epilepsy
Do NOT use any product featuring "brainwave entrainment" if you suffer from epilepsy, due to the theoretical risk of triggering a seizure.

 

When does shipping begin?
We plan to ship batch 1 in mid January 2019. Batch 2 will ship in March 2019.


When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?
US and Canadian orders should arrive 2-4 days after shipping


Where does it ship?
Worldwide


How much is shipping?
Shipping prices vary per country. Please see your selected perk details. 


I'm interested in a distribution partnership.
Please contact us at hello@dreamon.co


Do I have to pay VAT / GST?
Yes


What are the risks & challenges of getting the device today?
There are logistical challenges with manufacturing any hardware product. Fortunately we are well prepared to deal with these.

 

What is your refund policy?
Indiegogo purchases are final once campaign ends. For general purchases after we plan to offer a 30 day money back guarantee.


What is your return / exchange policy?
If you received a defective product, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping & handling fees.


How do I choose more than one reward? 
To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.


How can I check the status of my pre-order?
By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.


I'm interested in becoming a Beta Tester. 
Only Backers are eligible to become Beta Testers. Pre-order your unit first, and then send us an email with your order confirmation number to receive more info.


Why do I have to wait longer than usual?
This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build the device, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.


If I have other questions, who should I contact?
Press: press@dreamon.coInvestment Inquiries: hello@dreamon.coSupport: support@dreamon.co

story:
Short Summary

Whatsapp is one of the most used applications on all smartphones, since many of us use it to communicate quickly and inexpensively. Usually we say that WhatsApp is FREE and we think we can send as many messages as we want. However, this is not true. WhatsApp is a messaging app that works through Mobile Internet or Wi-Fi. If you always use WhatsApp when you're connected to Wi-Fi then there is no problem, but if you are connected with Mobile Internet and if you use WhatsApp, it will consume data. Wonder Chat allows you to chat unlimited with Whatsapp. Wonder Chat is an international data roaming SIM Card that lets you chat unlimited with Whatsapp with a monthly charge of USD 3 ($36 per year) only.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to jump start this business. For USD 3 per month ($36 per year) you can chat free of charge and without any limits.

We have the following perk for you.

Basic Perk at USD 36

Includes

  • Activation
  • 3 in 1 SIM
  • Unlimited text messages & emojis for one year with Whatsapp.
  • 2400 multimedia credits valid for 120 call minutes.
Free Shipment Worldwide.


The Impact

Your contribution will help us to include more networks in each country and we are planning to offer more multimedia credits for lesser price.

Wonder Chat impacts the following groups.

  1. Young Travellers who are careful with spending.
  2. Teens who wants to text without ending any data plan.
  3. Students away from Home who wants to keep in touch with family and friends.
  4. Malaysians who work in Singapore and travel back to Malaysia daily.

Risks & Challenges

We need to constantly update new networks in each country.  With more backers and more users we will be able to talk to network providers.

Other Ways You Can Help

Any help will be appreciated. You can support us by Supporter Perk. Get involved with the progress of this funding. Give us your feedback and receive regular updates. We will appreciate your feedback. Stand a chance to win 1 Chat Unlimited with Whatsapp - 3 in 1 SIM with Free Shipment.

story:
Short Summary

Salutations, Contributors.  I've been a lot of things in my professional life but my one of my biggest passions is helping people reach peace and rejuvenation through the practice of mediation.  As a volunteer, I've provided classes introducing countless individuals to the basics of meditation and I'd like to expand this to a holistic health and advanced setting with flotation therapy.  

This was once mislabeled as sensory deprivation when it in fact is really turning your mind all the way up.  I say the same about meditation.  It isn't turning off, but tuning in.  This is so important because it can provide relief, insight, and peace to people without the use of drugs of any kind.  This creates an affordable option with no negative side effects for a variety of ailments like depression, anxiety, pain disorders, and countless others.  

What We Need & What You Get

Here's the breakdown on funding:

  • The total funding goal is $50,000
  • This figure includes the purchase and installation of two pod units as well as renovation and fitting for a newly leased building
  • If the goal isn't reached, the funds raised will go to the pod units first
  • Check out some of the fun perks offered in thanks for your help!

Your Impact & The Pros

What is really powerful about this project is that it brings an affordable and drug free alternative to people with a vast array of ailments.  As we become more and more aware, we learn some of the pharmaceuticals regularly prescribed have side effects worse than the original symptoms of treatment.  By no means am I suggesting floatation therapy is a magic bullet, but it is a scientifically proven method of treating many things.  No drugs, no negative side effects, and an opportunity to allow me to earn a living helping people in my community.

What's really exciting to me is that while I haven't been able to secure private funding, I do have a growing interest from local spas, physicians, and holistic health practitioners looking for alternative treatment options.  That means there is an already existing and growing referral network in the area.  

Floatation therapy isn't new science by a long shot but the technology is getting  better by leaps.  While there are numerous floatation therapy centers in the country, the nearest one from my location is roughly an hour away.  We could really help some smaller communities at a cost lower than an average massage!

Risks & Challenges

Risk is a part of any business or investment.  That just comes with the territory.  I'm asking that you trust my extensive background in consultation, operations, design, and public speaking in addition to my professional network to handle these issues.  

As mentioned, private funding has been difficult to come by.  What I do have a plethora of is professionals that I've donated time and resources to over the years eagerly waiting to return the favor with support for my venture.  When I can't provide a solution, I have advisors, accountants, and even lawyers a phone call away to help.

This isn't risk free, but I'd certainly call it minimal risk.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute funds.  I respect that you're still reading and looking to help!  Share this with anyone that might like the idea of drug free treatment for helping with things like depression.  Maybe you know someone that has a painful disorder like fibromyalgia that is looking for relief.  If I can't reach them, maybe you can direct them to another facility in their area.  Sure I'm here to make some money, but the real goal is helping people feel better.  Money will come. Let your friends know they may have options they don't realize to help them feel healthier and you'll be doing a lot of good.
story_txt:
Short Summary Salutations, Contributors.  I've been a lot of things in my professional life but my one of my biggest passions is helping people reach peace and rejuvenation through the practice of mediation.  As a volunteer, I've provided classes introducing countless individuals to the basics of meditation and I'd like to expand this to a holistic health and advanced setting with flotation therapy.  
This was once mislabeled as sensory deprivation when it in fact is really turning your mind all the way up.  I say the same about meditation.  It isn't turning off, but tuning in.  This is so important because it can provide relief, insight, and peace to people without the use of drugs of any kind.  This creates an affordable option with no negative side effects for a variety of ailments like depression, anxiety, pain disorders, and countless others.     What We Need & What You Get Here's the breakdown on funding:  The total funding goal is $50,000 This figure includes the purchase and installation of two pod units as well as renovation and fitting for a newly leased building If the goal isn't reached, the funds raised will go to the pod units first
Check out some of the fun perks offered in thanks for your help!    Your Impact & The Pros What is really powerful about this project is that it brings an affordable and drug free alternative to people with a vast array of ailments.  As we become more and more aware, we learn some of the pharmaceuticals regularly prescribed have side effects worse than the original symptoms of treatment.  By no means am I suggesting floatation therapy is a magic bullet, but it is a scientifically proven method of treating many things.  No drugs, no negative side effects, and an opportunity to allow me to earn a living helping people in my community.
What's really exciting to me is that while I haven't been able to secure private funding, I do have a growing interest from local spas, physicians, and holistic health practitioners looking for alternative treatment options.  That means there is an already existing and growing referral network in the area.  
Floatation therapy isn't new science by a long shot but the technology is getting  better by leaps.  While there are numerous floatation therapy centers in the country, the nearest one from my location is roughly an hour away.  We could really help some smaller communities at a cost lower than an average massage!
    Risks & Challenges  Risk is a part of any business or investment.  That just comes with the territory.  I'm asking that you trust my extensive background in consultation, operations, design, and public speaking in addition to my professional network to handle these issues.  
As mentioned, private funding has been difficult to come by.  What I do have a plethora of is professionals that I've donated time and resources to over the years eagerly waiting to return the favor with support for my venture.  When I can't provide a solution, I have advisors, accountants, and even lawyers a phone call away to help.
This isn't risk free, but I'd certainly call it minimal risk.   Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute funds.  I respect that you're still reading and looking to help!  Share this with anyone that might like the idea of drug free treatment for helping with things like depression.  Maybe you know someone that has a painful disorder like fibromyalgia that is looking for relief.  If I can't reach them, maybe you can direct them to another facility in their area.  Sure I'm here to make some money, but the real goal is helping people feel better.  Money will come. Let your friends know they may have options they don't realize to help them feel healthier and you'll be doing a lot of good.

story:
We are growing! Literally!

Over the past three years, we at Dover Vineyards have produced some of North Carolina's Best Wine. Currently, we have 4 acres of grapes- Chambourcin and Villard blanc. These wines are selling so well that we are ready to expand! In the Spring of 2016, we will be planting 1.3 acres of Cabernet Franc, 0.9 acres of Petite Verdot, and 1 acre of Villard blanc!


The one problem is this: it takes 4 years for us to start getting a return on our investment from this new project. First, you have to let the grapes grow for three years! Then, on the third year, you pick the grapes, and make the wine. Approximately a year after picking, you have a product ready for sale. Your contribution to our campaign will help make this expensive process much less painful. Every dollar counts. Every dollar helps buy a vine, or a piece of rebar, or goes towards moving this utility pole that's in the middle of the field! 

In order to plant a vineyard, we need

  • 3,000 grapevines
  • 3,000 pieces of rebar
  • 12,000 feet of landscape fabric and 6,000 staples to hold the fabric down (weed control)
  • fertilizer
  • water tank for getting water to the vines (we will install irrigation, trellis, and wires next year) 
  • to move the pole that's in the middle of the field- Duke Energy said it would be about $5,000.

Why we are doing this

We know that we are blessed to have 4 acres of grapes that produce high quality North Carolina wine. However, right now, we are not operating at full capacity. If we are able to plant more acres of vines, we will be able to operate more efficiently. We will then be able to support hiring a person to manage the sales and marketing of the wine, as well as a person to manage the vineyard. 

Also, we would like to improve our market mix. Growing Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot will allow us to produce even better wine than we do now. We will be able to blend in a few grapes with the Chambourcin to make it more complex. Depending on how the grapes turn out, we might make a Cab Franc blend with the Petit Verdot, or make two new stand-alone wines. With the new Villard blanc planting, we hope to do a late harvest wine, something similar to a Sauternes. 

Risks & Challenges

As with anything in agriculture, the weather, pests, and other acts of God can easily wipe out a crop or a planting. Nevertheless, we have researched these varieties extensively and after working with them at other vineyards, we are confident that we can produce some great Cabernet Franc, Petit Verdot, and Villard blanc. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Planting this vineyard is not simply about raising the money! We will also need help in planting! If you're interested in joining us for planting this Spring, the vines will arrive April 6th and we will need all the help we can get. Email me at thefarmatdovervineyards@gmail.com to sign up!! 

Use the IndieGoGo share tool to get the word out. We honestly can't do this without you.

story:
VISION

Hi, I'm Jacqueline Fountain, President and Co-Owner of URO-GRIP Technology Inc.

I had a very common problem… a problem that all women share. When I had a doctor’s appointment in April 2013, I knew it was time for that dreaded urine sample, but I persevered and got through it.  Urinating on your hands, on toilets seats, and all over the place is not very pleasant.  At that moment, I thought to myself that there has to be a better way.  After pondering for several weeks, it hit me… a device that can attach directly to the specimen cup. It was then that the Uro-Grip urine specimen device was born. I shared my idea with my friend, Raymond, who immediately saw my vision as well. Together, we experimented with several designs and finally came up with a revolutionary product. This device has a wider surface area, a handle for easier use, and screws directly on to the specimen cup.

To make a long story short, we decided to create a company to market and distribute the Uro-Grip. This device is our initial product offering and we're looking forward to developing other unique products in the near future.  

Uro-Grip is coming to a doctor's office near you!  


                    

                                         




Uro-Grip is a Patent Pending, distinctive pear shaped specimen assistant for a single use urine sample collection. The device is intended for females, but anyone can use it!  Uro-Grip becomes leak proof once screwed onto a specimen cup and allows for any overage to be discarded; this device alleviates contamination of the urine sample with its extended handle and wide surface.  The wider surface also allows you to hold the device more closely to the vaginal area to prevent sprinkles and splatters on your hands and toilet seat. Uro-Grip is sterilized and packaged in a clean room environment and latex free for those with skin allergies. 

Let's spread the word about Uro-Grip!


PROTOTYPES


PROTOTYPES


FREQUENTLY ASK QUESTION

1. What is the Uro-Grip device function?

A: Uro-Grip is a urine sample assistant designed to assist in the urine sample process. 

2. Is it just for Females?

A: No, anyone can use it, although it was designed with females in mind and the issues females face when providing a urine sample. 

3. Is it re-usable?

A: No, it is a disposable device to ensure an accurate urine sample reading. 

4. Is Uro-Grip Sterile?

A: Yes, this device is manufactured in a clean room environment. 

5. How does it keep your hands dry?

A: The Uro-Grip was created and designed with a handle for you to grip and hold to avoid urinating on your hands.

6. Is this device latex free?

A: Yes, Uro-Grip is latex free for those with skin allergies.


PROTOTYPES


TESTIMONIALS


                                                              

Whenever I go to a doctor I dread having to give a urine sample. As a woman, it is just annoying and nasty. It always ends up getting on your hands and/or the sides of the cup. The Uro-grip is easy to screw onto the cup and acts as a funnel. The handle keeps your hand safely away from the cup, so it stays nice and dry. When finished it screws off easily and you can put the lid on. What a great product!

                                                             

Really loved this device! The handle makes it easy to use. So much easier than the balancing act at the doctor’s office with control and no spills!  Perfect for ALL ages to use, I recommend this to all medical fields for their patients. This was a great idea and I did love it and congrats to you for the great idea!


                                                               

Wow! Who would have thought such and awesome device would make giving a urine sample so much simpler and easier.  I can’t believe how much better this is than trying to aim in the small holes of those urine sample cups they give you, just to wind up with urine on your hands, running down your legs, it is so frustrating.  This is a “Great” device!  I believe every female would love it!  I can’t wait to see it at my doctor’s office.



Where Will the Funds Go?

We have gotten through the molding process and our prototype is ready for production. We have already partnered with manufacturers that are qualified to produce the medical-grade device and are waiting to finalize the Uro-Grip and proceed with mass production.

  • We’ll use the first 12,000 USD, to jump start the production process to bring Uro-Grip to market. 
  • Help us reach 25,000 USD. This will help us pay engineering fees, complete the redesigns and improvements.
  • Reaching 35,000 USD will help us with production, shipping cost, advertising and operational cost.

OUR STORY

                                                                                         
           Jacqueline                                                                             Raymond


URO-GRIP TECHNOLOGY INC. The Uro-Grip was developed by Jacqueline and Raymond, who are natives of Tennessee. The idea for Uro-Grip itself began with Jacqueline's frustration with the urine collection process at her local doctors office. It was at that point that she came up with the idea for the Uro-Grip device, which she thought would benefit women all across the world. The two entrepreneurs came together to pursue that idea of change. With the help and support of family and friends, they proceeded to create the company URO-GRIP Technology Inc. in 2014.



PROBLEMS FEMALES DESPISE w / URINE SAMPLES

Disgruntled female: For whatever reason I get nervous when I have to pee in a cup because I can't seem to get the cup positioned just right to get it all in and then it just makes a mess.  I feel like I need a funnel!  :)

Ta Davis: I agree, I can never aim right; I hate it, so gross. So yeah peeing in a cup is something I totally despise!

Kandy: Ha Ha!  My doc’s office has instructions posted in the bathroom and I still can't get it right.  My big belly gets in the way when I'm trying to position the cup, follow instructions and look down there all at same time.

Jasmine: I despise having to give a urine sample, it just makes a mess. The cup is to small and always overflowing, running down your leg, hands get wet….just plain gross!!


NEW DESIGN COMING SOON!





THE IMPACT

Uro-Grip has the potential to change the way females perform urine samples. We believe it will ensure a better, more accurate reading every time. By contributing to our campaign, you will not only get to try Uro-Grip yourself, but you will be supporting our efforts to reach more females who struggle with the urine sample process. 

  • Your support helps us introduce Uro-Grip to the world.
  • The Uro-Grip team is working hard to develop other great products. 
  • We plan to continue to develop other new and innovative products to make the urine sample collection process cleaner and more convenient.
          


Other Ways You Can Help!

Please, spread the word.  Help us bring Uro-Grip to your doctor’s office!

Please use the Indiegogo sharing tool! Thanks for your Support!

story:
Our Goal:

We are running this campaign in efforts to provide CSGI’s ultraviolet light disinfection and education to Long-term and Skilled Nursing Facilities that struggle with infection control measures and education.  

Never Again!!


We are raising $25,000 dollars so that we can bring our technicians and technology to Long-term and skilled Nursing facilities who are high risk for infection!


The Threat

1-3 million serious infections (HAIs) occur in patients at nursing homes and skilled-nursing facilities each year, resulting in $673 million in healthcare costs and as any as 380,000 annual deaths (CDC, HHS). Additionally, HAIs are a frequent cause of transfer from sub-acute to acute care hospitals and could account for more than 150,000 hospitalizations (HHS).

Dangerous germs persist on surfaces long after a patient has discharged. Some pathogens can survive for months in the inanimate environment and contaminated surfaces increase the risk of infections from MRSA, influenza, norovirus, Clostridium difficile and many drug-resistant microorganisms -- especially for the immunocompromised and elderly. 

Currently, private insurance and the Medicare do not pay for advanced disinfection technology and infection prevention education for Skilled-Nursing/Long-term care and At-home care agencies. The Acute care centers, such as, hospitals, endure large penalties for infections that patients may acquire in these facilities up to 90 days after the patient is discharged.   

Owners of these sub-acute facilities often lack the financial resources or desire to improve the environment to ensure healthier patients.  Additionally,  their staffs often lack important infection prevention knowledge that could reduce infections and the persistence of superbugs in their facilities.


The Solution

CSGI’s prevention education breaks the chain of infection by targeting systemic transmission vectors within a medical facility, including both clinical and non - clinical space. Our Services include:

  • Infection prevention and control basics
  • Identifying Nursing Facility specific weaknesses 
  • Isolation fundamentals 
  • PPE basics 
  • Prevention of Cross - Contamination 
  • Proper Guidelines on Containing Specific Organisms 
  • Information on current Infection Control Protocols
  • Application of UV-C disinfection technology
  • Providing a cleaner, safer environment


Other Ways You Can Help!

"Winning means you're willing to go longer, work harder, and give more than anyone else" - Vince Lombardi

  • Please share this Indiegogo campaign. Use the Sharing tool at the top of the campaign.
  • Let your friends know that you've donated!
  • Stay in touch. You can contact us anytime through our website at CSGIUSA.COM!

story:
NAŠA VIZIJA - OUR VISION

Snažna sportska zajednica u BiH u kojoj se mladi sportisti razvijaju, imaju potpun i jednak pristup mogućnostima, koja se brine za njihovo dobro i blagostanje, gdje svako ima slobodu da definiše djelokrug svog života i svoje budućnosti te da ostvare svoj puni potencijal. Naša vizija nije samo da poboljšamo život pojedinih igrača, već da služimo zajednici.

To develop  strong sports community in BIH, where young players can thrive, have full and equal access to the opportunities, which will ensure their health and well-being, provide them with the freedom to define their ultimate future goals, and to achieve their full potential. Our vision is not only to improve the lives of individual players, but also to serve the entire communities.


NAŠA MISIJA - OUR MISSION

Omogućiti mladim sportistima alate, sredstva i resurse koji će im pomoći da se razviju u vrhunske igrače, pomažući im pri tome da načine ispravne životne izbore koji će im omogućiti da svoj sportski potencijal razviju do maksimuma. Nadamo se da ćemo kroz ekonomsku podršku, obrazovanje i pozitivnu promociju sporta među mladima dalje razviti i produbiti njihov interes i poboljšati rezultate u bh. sportu, što će svijetu poslati ljepšu sliku o BiH.

To provide highly skilled youth interested in sports with the tools, funds and
resources to develop into great players.  To assist them in making positive life choices that would enable them to maximize their sports potential. We hope that through the economic empowerment, education and positive promotion of sports among the youth, we will further develop and strengthen their interest and results in the world of BIH sports, which will also promote positive BIH image in the world.


O NAMA - ABOUT US

„Budućnost Sporta" ima za cilj da poboljša živote mladih sportista u potrebi. Kroz naše inicijative, mi ćemo podržati razvoj igrača, njihovo zdravlje, obrazovanje i time pozitivno uticati na našu cjelokupnu zajednicu.  Naši projekti se bave nedostatkom institucionalne podrške države talentovanim igračima i omladini, a fokusirani su na obrazovanje, razvoj i zdravlje mladih igrača.

Currently, the government of Bosnia-Herzegovina does not provide any funds for the support of its talented, young athletes.  The goal of this initiative is to close this gap, and provide our skilled youth with the programs that will support the overall athletic education, enable young player’s development and welness.


NAŠA POSVEĆENOST

Povećati uticaj sporta kroz društveno-odgovorne projekte koji prenose pozitivne vrijednosti i iskustva bivših i sadašnjih igrača, trenera, menadžera i sportskih radnika na buduće generacije naših sportista.

NAŠA VIZIJA - OUR VISION
Snažna sportska zajednica u BiH u kojoj se mladi 
sportisti razvijaju, imaju potpun i jednak pristup mogućnostima, koja se
 brine za njihovo dobro i blagostanje, gdje svako ima slobodu da 
definiše djelokrug svog života i svoje budućnosti te da ostvare svoj 
puni potencijal. Naša vizija nije samo da poboljšamo život pojedinih 
igrača, već da služimo zajednici.To develop  strong sports community in BIH, where young players can thrive, have full and equal access to the opportunities, which will ensure their health and well-being, provide them with the freedom to define their ultimate future goals, and to achieve their full potential. Our vision is not only to improve the lives of individual players, but also to serve the entire communities.
NAŠA MISIJA - OUR MISSION
Omogućiti mladim sportistima alate, sredstva i resurse 
koji će im pomoći da se razviju u vrhunske igrače, pomažući im pri tome 
da načine ispravne životne izbore koji će im omogućiti da svoj sportski 
potencijal razviju do maksimuma. Nadamo se da ćemo kroz ekonomsku 
podršku, obrazovanje i pozitivnu promociju sporta među mladima dalje 
razviti i produbiti njihov interes i poboljšati rezultate u bh. sportu, 
što će svijetu poslati ljepšu sliku o BiH.To provide highly skilled youth interested in sports with the tools, funds andresources to develop into great players.  To assist them in making positive life choices that would enable them to maximize their sports potential. story:
Adolescent Mental Health Care
Is In Crisis.

We're creating an app to help fix that.

www.psychmedia.net

psych.E is a mobile app that helps teenagers take control of their own mental health care by using the visual & social media tools they live by. It gives them a safe, anonymous community, videos to educate and inform, and tracking tools to stay engaged with their own care. 


Problem

Current modes of adolescent mental health care aren't working. 

20% of American teenagers have a diagnosable mental health disorder. That's 1 in 5!  But only about a third of those who need help get any treatment at all. And even though more than $8.9 billion is spent on mental health care for Americans under 18 each year, most available treatments are inadequate, ineffective, and outdated. 

Solution

Build tool to engage young people in their own mental health care. Have that tool exist on the mobile devices where they spend most of their time. 

Actively engaged patients consistently have better outcomes and can cut costs up to 21% (source: Health Affairs/RWJF policy brief). 


There are numerous UX and design changes that will be implemented, but the above video of our rough mockups will give an idea of the overall concept and features.

How It Works




What We Need

We already created a rough concept of mockups to demonstrate some of the features that the app will have. The response has been tremendous. Now we need the funds to enhance the user experience and the design, and then bring it to life.
  • The $100K we are raising will go towards creating a beautifully designed prototype of the app, ample user surveys, legal fees, along with sample versions of educational videos. 
  • A well designed prototype will allow us to test the concept and get real world feedback from teenagers so that we can build the most powerful and effective platform possible. With that feedback, we can then raise additional funds.
  • Additional funding would go towards developing a minimal viable product (MVP) of the app to have a robust product for beta testing, as well as additional consultant and legal fees, outreach, content creation and partnerships. 


The Team

psych.E is a product of Psych Media, and is the brainchild of three people impassioned to improve the lives of young people struggling with mental health issues. We each have a deep personal and/or professional connection to the cause of improving child and adolescent mental health care.

Strategic Consultant: Julian Keuzenkamp, MSc Developmental Neuroscience and Psychopathology.

Advisors include: the Director of Mount Sinai Hospital's Child and Behavioral Health Center, a prominent tech investor, Facebook's first Director of Public Policy, a former senior official from HHS, an Emmy-Award winning producer, a healthcare consultant, privacy experts, psychiatrists, and a technology consultant. 

What You Get

Truly the most important thing we can directly offer is our deep and unending gratitude for any support you can offer. The knowledge that your money is going to help address a critical need for America's teenagers is pretty cool, too. But there are also some fun perks. Who couldn't use a brain to squeeze, right? And you know you are just dying to have a limited edition psych.E T-shirt! And there's more! Check them out on the upper right side of this page.


What are the risks and challenges of the psych.E project?

This is tough stuff. When building an app for young people, especially young people with mental health concerns, it’s so important that we test and test and test to make sure that not only is the experience engaging and useful, but also one that is as safe as technically possible.

During the past year and a half  we at Psych Media have researched and interviewed mental health experts, teenagers, and agencies, companies, and organizations that focus on adolescent mental health. We've had meetings with top government agencies and politicians. We've spoken to numerous app developers and user experiences experts. We've met with privacy attorneys and cyber security activists. 

From the concept to the mock ups and video we have created, we have gotten enthusiastic and positive feedback from all of them.  

In order to get buy-in from the insurance companies that will ultimately fund the bulk of the subscriptions, we need to be able to show them a deeply tested and proven product, with irrefutable evidence that when teenagers use psych.E regularly, their outcomes will improve.

With the funds we raise with this Indiegogo Campaign, we can work with an impressive team of developers, privacy experts, and mental health specialists to bring this dream to reality.

Other Ways You Can Help

Your support also includes sharing this campaign everywhere and with everyone you know. Even if you can't contribute a dime (and we totally get that!), simply helping to get the word out is enormously helpful.

  • Tweet all about it! Make some noise!
  • It's super easy to spread the word. Just look on the upper left side of the page for all the share tools Indiegogo provides.
  • If you know of any teenagers who might be interested in joining our Teen Advisory Board or participating in feedback surveys, please let us know.

And that's all there is to it.

Other Ways You Can Help

Tweet all about it! Make some noise!
It's super easy to spread the word. Just look on the upper left side of the page for all the share tools Indiegogo provides.
If you know of any teenagers who might be interested in joining our Teen Advisory Board or participating in feedback surveys, please let us know.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Clinical Precision Plus® 

A Behavioral Healthcare “Therapy Jump Start”
for people suffering from emotional and addiction disorders

The nation’s call for early identification and early intervention for mental health and substance abuse symptoms and conditions is, at last, reaching critical mass. This awareness has grown, in part, by frequent, high-profile; mass school shootings and other violent community tragedies caused, triggered at times, by emotionally troubled citizens. In such cases, failure to identify early warning signs and failure to intervene are among the noted shortcomings. 

We have created a web-based, behavioral health care clinical screening service that identifies mental health and substance abuse symptoms and conditions among adults, adolescents and youth. It is based on more than a decade of behavioral health care clinical screening and clinical outcome experience with thousands of clients.

The Clinical Precision Plus® Service creates a comprehensive behavioral health care clinical profile, prior to the initial client therapy session, providing valuable upfront clinical information leading to earlier therapeutic intervention. Consequentially, emotionally troubled clients will experience relief more quickly.


“It’s like having three sessions of clinical information sitting in your lap, 
just prior to meeting the client for the first time. It is, as they say: 
A Great Jump Start!”

What We Need & What You Get

The Clinical Precision Plus® venture needs only $15,500.00 to launch the service in 2016.

We need financing to:

1.  Complete the software development of the four remaining client-specific intake and discharge reports for adolescent and youth clients (identical in scope and layout to the already completed adult intake and discharge reports).

2.  Develop non-English versions of the Clinical Precision Plus® instrumentation.

3.  Upgrade the company server operating systems to accommodate the software development applications, plus “harden” the security of the Internet-based service.

A tool that helps to more quickly determine mental health status and assists in the prioritization of therapeutic interventions within a high-volume care giving facility will significantly contribute to the overall service quality effort on a national level.

Clinical Precision Plus® has undergone an 18-month development process with more than 80% of our software development now complete and Proof of Concept fully established. Completion of the project is now within sight.

Help us to successfully cross the “finish line”.

The Impact

The client-specific reports are graphics-intensive, designed for clinician quick review and comprehension, intended for use in a high-volume, time-compressed therapeutic work environment.

For clients seeking services, it builds self-awareness and personal insight, enhances personal confidence, and insures that their behavioral symptoms and conditions do not go undetected.

For clinicians, it serves as a "therapeutic jump start" by placing in the hands of clinicians’ summary reports prior to meeting their clients, helps to guide the actual therapeutic session, and results in a far more complete clinical profile than from clinician inquiries alone.

FAQ

·  Which interviews are self-administered and which are not?

The adult and adolescent version of the screening interview is self-administered. Parents (or guardians) complete the screening interview for children under age 12.

·  Where do clients complete the interview?

Clients arrive for initial intake 20 minutes early to complete the Internet-linked interview on-site, from the privacy of their own home or from anywhere using their tablet or cell phone.

·  How do clients react to the interview?

The interview adds a degree of professionalism to the process and helps the client achieve an enhanced understanding of his/her condition. In short, they appear to significantly value the experience from what is viewed as a highly thorough effort. 

·  How secure are these interviews since the Internet is being used?

The service uses an SSL, 128-bit encryption process to assure confidentiality and conforms in every manner to current HIPAA standards.

·  Once the interview is completed, how soon do we get a report?

Immediately! In less than a minute! It’s recommended that the printing process occur somewhere else in the facility that is both private and secure.

·  How do the Interval/Discharge Summary Reports differ from the Intake Summary Reports?

They are near identical in layout and appearance but contain side-by-side gauge graphs of intake and interval/discharge distress ratings for important measures of DSM-V symptoms and Personal Functioning Ratings, enabling providers to pinpoint areas of clinical improvement.

·  How valid is the instrumentation?

The screening instrumentation was developed in the early 1990's and has undergone extensive psychometric testing and revision involving many thousands of clients. The net result is a current battery of measures that demonstrates a high degree of construct validity for scaled measures and a high degree of reliability overall.

·  How long has the service been in existence?

The screening service has been professionally offered for more than a decade, as a telephone-administered service. This service represents a conversion to the web modality but is nearly identical to the original.

·  In what manner is this service likely to improve the quality of service delivery?

The screening service is a highly disciplined approach to assessing the presence of behavioral healthcare symptoms, providing a broad coverage of inquiry as a valued adjunct to clinician assessments. It is additionally, a “jump start” on identifying, isolating and treating behavioral healthcare conditions within a shorter time frame.

Risks and Challenges

The development of a fully integrated clinical screening and clinical outcomes service has hinged on the technological achievement of successfully linking a clinical interviewing electronic database with a report-crafting software process, delivering real time reports via an encrypted Internet link.

Proof of Concept has been achieved with completion of the Adult Intake and Discharge Summary Reports.

Aside from a lack of funding, no other risks related to the successful completion of the project have been identified. The only challenge remains the need to generate the revenue required to complete the project.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please tell others who support mental health and substance abuse services to donate to our cause.
