story:
Thank you for taking the time to read about our project. I am Dr Steele and together with my colleague Dr Khara, we are co-authors of this project to improve English in hospitals and related environments around the world. 

As doctors we rely on a mastery of Medical English to allow good communication between doctors and patients, and between doctors and other healthcare professionals. Unfortunately, in clinical practice we have witnessed situations in hospitals where imperfect English can worsen already stressful scenarios for patients. We have also seen medical teams become less efficient because of poor English use. To overcome such difficulties we believe strongly that patients deserve doctors who can make the best possible use of the English language.


                                  


What is the issue?

·  There are more than 60 million healthcare workers in the world and English is the dominant language of communication in Medicine; this is obviously particularly true in the USA, Canada, UK, Australia and New Zealand.

·  Because of the movement of doctors between countries, 20-30% of the doctors in these most popular countries are International Medical Graduates (IMGs) from outside the respective country.

·  It is this group of doctors who most frequently have difficulties in the use of the    English language in the workplace.

·  There are similar language challenges in all of the disciplines allied to Medicine, such as Nursing, Osteopathy, Physiotherapy, Pharmacology etc.    

In our experience as native UK trained doctors working side by side with our colleagues, we see how hard our fellow doctors are working to overcome linguistic difficulties. We see the same effort when doctors come to us for Medical English lessons.

What we would like to do is provide much needed help by creating a modern, comprehensive and accessible resource in the form of our Medical English book.


What we need.

We are looking for £40,000 to help fund the production of our Comprehensive Medical English book. This money will go towards helping us to support the writing, design, publication and advertising of this book for an international audience of healthcare workers.                                                             

                                                 

Our previous book, Steele’s Guide to Scientific, Technical and Medical English has provided us with part of the template for a more comprehensive book. We plan to collaborate with fellow healthcare staff to publish a UK/US edition in July 2018. In line with the requests of our students there will also be an electronic version of the book.


What you get.

As well as contributing to longterm improvements in healthcare in your country, community and family, we also offer the following rewards:

·  Free copies of the electronic book.

·  Free copies of the signed hardcopy book.

·  Free Skype Medical English lessons.

·  Free weekend IELTS course.

·  Written thanks by name in the acknowledgements section.

·  The opportunity to name and commemorate/remember your friends, family or          any other nominated individual.

·  The opportunity to become an editor of a respected medical text.

·  The opportunity to become a co-author a Medical English book.


Why this book?

The co-authors Dr Steele and Dr Khara have over 27 years experience of healthcare including the National Health Service, Private Hospitals and Medical School teaching/training.  Moreover, Dr Steele is one the UK’s leading experts in Medical English (www.eliteacademicmedical.com) and has enjoyed teaching Medical English to doctors from the UK and abroad since the 1990s.


                                                                         Academic Medical Press

               


As doctors and medical educationalists we are privileged to help medical students and doctors reach their full potential. We are particularly happy facilitate their achievement of career ambitions through improved education. Accordingly, as a group of doctors we have published five books in four years via Academic Medical Press (www.academicmedicalpress.com) which is part of a charity designed to supply underserved areas in medicine and to further medical education.

In our collective experience we understand that the best people to teach doctors authentic Medical English are other doctors. We are pleased to state that the major advantage of our book over books in the marketplace is that it will be written by doctors who are also qualified in English teaching. Even more helpfully, the book will include the following:

·  A section covering history and examination that is pertinent to all the medical and    surgical subspecialities.

·  An accessible and comprehensive glossary of all medical abbreviations.

·  A section covering idioms/colloquialisms used by doctors and patients.

·  Key differences between American and British Medical English.

·  Medical English for common medical scenarios.

·  A section to improve medical writing.

·  Sections on technical English relevant to medicine.

Modern medicine is delivered through multidisciplinary cooperation which means that the different healthcare professionals must communicate effectively with each other. So our book will reflect this shared language. Accordingly Comprehensive Medical English will have real value for doctors, nurses, osteopaths, physiotherapists, pharmacists and all allied healthcare groups.


Why support our project?

By supporting this project you will be helping to produce a high quality book of use to a large number of individuals because of our unique features:

·  As co-authors we have experience of publishing and teaching in medical           education and Medical English. We actively use the books we produce and receive feedback directly from our own students.

·  We are doctors writing for doctors – none of the authors of Medical English books   can guarantee this.

·  Uniquely, the creator(s) are formally dual qualified in EFL (CELTA) and medicine.

·  Our Medical English is strongly influenced by our Experience of Oxford and Cambridge Medical Schools and the Oxford Intensive School of English.

·  We have already published a well reviewed and functional Medical English book. We are recognized experts in Medical English and run an international Skype Medical English service.

·  We have writers, designers, editor and a publisher in place at the beginning of this project, all of which are experienced in these types of medical publications.

By supporting this book project you are making sure that the book will be completed and available as a resource for healthcare workers before July 2018. You will be helping to provide this much needed Comprehensive Medical English book to improve medical education and healthcare.


Our Primary Institutional Supporter:

We thank the Oxford Intensive School of English for their encouragement and support of this project.

                                                     


How you can help:

·  You can still help if you cannot donate - you can spread the word of this project.

·  We would be more than grateful if you could tell as many of your contacts as you can about this project (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Whatsapp, Email). Give everybody a chance to offer a few words of support!

·  If you would like to support us in other ways please or would like to collaborate please do not hesitate to contact us.

·  You never know how far your facebook message, tweet or email might go – so please SHARE, SHARE, SHARE!
story_txt:
Thank you for
taking the time to read about our project. I am Dr Steele and together with my
colleague Dr Khara, we are co-authors of this project to improve English in hospitals and related environments around the world. As doctors we rely on a
mastery of Medical English to allow good communication between doctors and
patients, and between doctors and other healthcare professionals.
Unfortunately, in clinical practice we have witnessed situations in hospitals where
imperfect English can worsen already stressful scenarios for patients. We have also
seen medical teams become less efficient because of poor English use. To
overcome such difficulties we believe
strongly that patients deserve doctors who can make the best possible use of
the English language.                                  
What is the issue?
· 
There
are more than 60 million healthcare workers in the world and English is the
dominant language of communication in Medicine; this is obviously particularly
true in the USA, Canada, UK, Australia and New Zealand. 
· 
Because
of the movement of doctors between countries, 20-30% of the doctors in these
most popular countries are International Medical Graduates (IMGs) from outside
the respective country.
· 
It is
this group of doctors who most frequently have difficulties in the use of the    English
language in the workplace.
· 
There
are similar language challenges in all of the disciplines allied to Medicine, such as Nursing, Osteopathy, Physiotherapy, Pharmacology etc.    
In our
experience as native UK trained doctors working side by side with our
colleagues, we see how hard our fellow doctors are working to overcome
linguistic difficulties. We see the same effort when doctors come to us for
Medical English lessons. 
What we would
like to do is provide much needed help by creating a modern, comprehensive and
accessible resource in the form of our Medical English book. 
What we need.
We are looking for £40,000 to help fund the production of our
Comprehensive Medical English book. This money will go towards helping us to support the writing, design,
publication and advertising of this book for an international audience of
healthcare workers.                                                                                                              
Our previous book, Steele’s Guide to Scientific, Technical and Medical
English has provided us with part of the template for a more comprehensive
book. We plan to collaborate with fellow healthcare staff to publish a
UK/US edition in July 2018. In line with the requests of our students there
will also be an electronic version of the book.

What you get.
As well as contributing to longterm improvements in healthcare in your country, community
and family, we also offer the following rewards: 

· 
Free
copies of the electronic book.
· 
Free
copies of the signed hardcopy book.
· 
Free
Skype Medical English lessons.
· 
Free
weekend IELTS course.
· 
Written
thanks by name in the acknowledgements section.
· 
The
opportunity to name and commemorate/remember your friends, family or          any other
nominated individual.
· 
The
opportunity to become an editor of a respected medical text.
· 
The
opportunity to become a co-author a Medical English book.


Why this book?
The co-authors
Dr Steele and Dr Khara have over 27 years experience of healthcare including the National
Health Service, Private Hospitals and Medical School teaching/training.  Moreover, Dr Steele is one the UK’s leading
experts in Medical English (www.eliteacademicmedical.com) and has enjoyed
teaching Medical English to doctors from the UK and abroad since the 1990s.
                                                                         Academic Medical Press               
As
doctors and medical educationalists we are privileged to help medical students
and doctors reach their full potential. We are particularly happy facilitate their achievement of
career ambitions through improved education. Accordingly, as a group of doctors
we have published five books in four years via Academic Medical Press
(www.academicmedicalpress.com) which is part of a charity designed to supply
underserved areas in medicine and to further medical education. 
In
our collective experience we understand that the best people to teach
doctors authentic Medical English are
other doctors. We are pleased to
state that the major advantage of our book over books in the marketplace is that
it will be written by doctors who are
also qualified in English teaching. Even more helpfully, the book will include the
following:
· 
A section covering history and examination that is pertinent to all the
medical and    surgical subspecialities.
· 
An accessible and comprehensive glossary of all medical abbreviations.
· 
A section covering idioms/colloquialisms used by doctors and patients.
· 
Key differences between American and British Medical English.
· 
Medical English for common medical scenarios.
· 
A section to improve medical writing.
· 
Sections on technical English relevant to medicine.
Modern
medicine is delivered through multidisciplinary cooperation which means that
the different healthcare professionals must communicate effectively with each
other. So our book will reflect this shared language. Accordingly Comprehensive Medical English will have
real value for doctors, nurses, osteopaths, physiotherapists, pharmacists and
all allied healthcare groups.

Why support our project?
By supporting
this project you will be helping to produce a high quality book of use to a
large number of individuals because of our unique features:

· 
As
co-authors we have experience of publishing and teaching in medical           education
and Medical English. We actively use the books we produce and receive feedback
directly from our own students.
· 
We
are doctors writing for doctors – none of the authors of Medical English books   can
guarantee this.
· 
Uniquely,
the creator(s) are formally dual qualified in EFL (CELTA) and medicine.
·  Our Medical English is strongly influenced by our
Experience of Oxford and Cambridge Medical Schools and the Oxford Intensive
School of English.
· 
We
have already published a well reviewed and functional Medical English book. We
are recognized experts in Medical English and run an international Skype
Medical English service.
· 
We
have writers, designers, editor and a publisher in place at the beginning of
this project, all of which are experienced in these types of medical
publications.
By supporting
this book project you are making sure that the book will be completed and available as a resource for
healthcare workers before July 2018. You will be helping to provide this
much needed Comprehensive Medical English book to improve medical education and
healthcare. 
Our Primary Institutional Supporter:
We thank the
Oxford Intensive School of English for their encouragement and support of this
project.                                                     How you can help:
· 
You can still help if you cannot donate - you can spread the word of
this project.
· 
We would be more than grateful if you could tell as many of your
contacts as you can about this project (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Whatsapp,
Email). Give everybody a chance to offer a few words of support!
· 
If you would like to support us in other ways please or would like to
collaborate please do not hesitate to contact us.
· 
You never know how far your facebook message, tweet or email might
go – so please SHARE, SHARE, SHARE!

story:
How It Works


Introducing UBALLN® Basketball



While the ability to connect with anyone, anywhere, focused to a specific interest, exists thru numerous social networks, you'd be hard pressed to find the mother-of-all pickup basketball networks.

The way we connect with each other has evolved. Yet everyday hoopers still have to rely on traditional means – text messages, emails, phone calls – to organize a game with their friends. Organizing or finding high quality pick-up basketball games in anywhere and at any time, well that just doesn't exist.

Enter the UBALLN® Basketball app.

With UBALLN®, you’ll never have to guess when or where competitive pickup games are being played. All it takes is a simple tap of the screen to show you all you need to know.


UBALLN® Referral Program

HOW TO REFER A FRIEND: 1) Log into your account on Indiegogo, 2) Directly share your unique link via social media or email or copy your unique link by clicking on "link" button and paste into your social media, emails or messages.


We'll know how many referrals you have acheived from the Indiegogo database. We will contact you about your cash back rewards via email once the campaign ends and has been fully funded.


You can always check on your referrals by clicking on your username at the top of the page, then on "My Profile". Then click on the "Referrals" tab.


Why UBALLN® Basketball is so unique

The UBALLN® Basketball app is the only app of its kind that allows you to find a game anywhere at anytime, check-in at a court and invite your friends with the tap of a button, schedule a private or public game for anyone to join or gender, age and/or skill-level specific, and challenge your friends to a friendly game of horse, a three-point contest or 1-on-1.

This app is, by far, the best way to find competitive pickup basketball games.


Revolutionary App

Although there are several Pickup Basketball apps currently in the market that provide quality games, we know their game selection is still very limited. They may provide private and public games, but they lack premium locations and a large enough user population to make it worth wild for the individual users. This may be okay for their heavier user populated areas, but still is not optimal for reaching users nationally and abroad. When people want to hoop, location and player availability should never be a limitation. We already know how frustrating this can be, so we developed the UBALLN® Basketball app to solve this problem.


The UBALLN® Team

UBALLN® was founded by User Experience and App Designer Jeremy Gaston in 2014. As a former semi-professional basketball player and technology enthusiast, he found the existing method of finding a pickup game to be more annoying than beneficial. So, he came up with the idea of developing an intuitive mobile app, to combine together the functions which people care about most, and provide a seemingly native user experience.

UBALLN® consists of a team of technology experts, product designers, and experienced engineers. In addition to their commitment to technical excellence,    UBALLN® believes that sports tech should be stylish and on trend.


Frequently Asked Questions

1. Will UBALLN® be free?

Absolutely!

2. What devices will it be available for?

At launch, UBALLN® will be available on all iOS, Android and Windows devices.

3. When will UBALLN® be available?

UBALLN® will officially be available to everyone by February, but by contributing $15+ on this very Indiegogo campaign, you can get early access to the app in December.

4. How does UBALLN determine experience levels?

If I told you that, then I'd have to explain to you the meaning of life. Ain't nobody got time for that! ;)

Whatever the reason may be, the effects are same and worrisome. Apart from this, there are also chances where your love partner needs more from you even after you ejaculate.

It is just a matter of spraying it once and neither complications to work on nor any exercise routine to get your desire on fire. Carrying a small bottle of spray will help you get to your world in minutes, in seconds in fact.

Enjoy your youthfulness forever:

If you feel you have turned out to be old and have problems erecting then you do not have to worry about it anymore. This magical spray will give out that comfort level that you wander for. You can have all your desires fulfilled even in a difficult situation where you feel you might not be able to perform. Get back your manliness with the help of this spray. You will not believe your own eyes with the kind of result that this product brings to you. So why not give it a try to see how it works wonders for you and support you in your love life. Purchase love spray for the sizzling sex life you and your partner deserve.

Each bottle of LOVE SPRAY contains a supply with normal use (10-15 uses)

A new product, which makes a strong and huge erection possible with all occasions when you want it only... without delay!

Comments from our testers: 

- I had the largest erection of my life!  After erectile dysfunctions problems,  i was happy to test this new product and i had experienced the largest and most wonderful erection of my life!This product changed my relationship.

- I make love 4 times a day 

- This is an excellent product. It's more enjoyable for my partner. It does not sting or smell, and it's easy to rinse off. I really enjoy using this product.

SCHEDULE

Our product is finished and has been tested by 25 couples.Now we are raising funds for the production.

We’re so close, but we need your help. Please join us be a part of this project!

Launch Campaign:  September 2015 Start mass production:  1 November 2015

Begin product shipments:  15 December 2015Retail distribution:  2016Retail price will be 9$ for each spray

Thanks for your interest in Love Spray!

Even if you’re not able to donate funds to our campaign today, you can still help us out by sharing our campaign with friends and family. Check out the Indiegogo share tools!


RISKS & CHALLENGES

We will start shipping Love spray to our backers in December 2015. We already have fully working product. We just need the funds to start the production 

We will keep you updated on our progress every week.

story:
Version de ce projet en français


Who we are

HON is a non-profit, non-governmental organisation (NGO):

  • In special consultative status with Economic and Social Council of the United Nations (ECOSOC).
  • In official relation with the World Health Organisation (WHO).

What we do 

  • Promote the dissemination of useful and reliable online health information worldwide; Every day, millions of certified pages are viewed by Internet users.
  • Provide the most widely used certification initiative: The HONcode seal - translated into over 30 languages and present in 93 countries.

History 

The HON Foundation was born in 1996 when the Internet was booming. Several visionary medical experts from around the world realised that health-related websites were proliferating with no control over the accuracy or reliability of their content. They thus decided to create an organisation specially dedicated to educating people on, advocating for, and maintaining transparent health information online.

How it works

HON functions through a code of conduct which consists of 8 principles which health websites choose to conform to in order to obtain our certification (renewable annually) and boast their own unique HONcode seal and certificate to promote their  trustworthiness.


Today

HON is the oldest and most respected quality code of conduct for online health information with over 8,000 HONcode certified websites worldwide. Many of them are highly respected, visited thousands of times daily and have been members of the HON Foundation for years (www.webmd.com, www.clevelandclinic.org, www.nlm.nih.gov/medlineplus etc.)


Our Challenges

  • With the number of health websites increasing daily, there is a huge demand for HONcode certification which requires websites to be reviewed by experts - this is time-consuming and costly.
  • The annual certification process used to be free, now it is a paying service with a yearly fee ranging from 55 USD to 360 USD.
  • Not all entities can afford to contribute e.g. websites of bodies located in developing countries, individual patients, small associations, etc.
  • Uncertified websites are not penalized. Our concern lies with the end-user/the reader who must be given access to transparent and reliable health information.

Our Solutions

1)  The ‘HONcode for All’ project: A fund pool to finance these websites and render reliable health information accessible to all.

2)  Simplified access to certified websites. 

What we need

  • To raise US$100,000 to help support the annual recertification of websites in need.
  • To raise awareness of the importance of quality health information online and of the HONcode certification programme.
  • To allow HON to continue performing its excellent work.

The impact of donors’ help

  • The Internet allows people to actively participate in their own healthcare, but being misguided by wrong health-related information can be devastating - our goal is to avoid this! 
  • By donating, you help raise the quality of health-related information on the Internet and thus empower citizens worldwide.
  • When you support HON, you commit to a service that is key to upholding reliable and trustworthy medical information. 

Other Ways You Can Help

There are certainly a variety of ways to help the HON Foundation achieve its goals:

  • Help spread the word about our project through your website, emails, social media etc.
  • Promote the use of the HONcode seal by adding this banner to your website.
  • Encourage your website visitors/clients/partners to advocate for reliable and trustworthy health information on the Internet
  • Visit/Share/Like the HON Facebook and Twitter accounts

Financial transparency

We  guarantee the financial transparency of our campaign which will be audited and available to donors. Please note that Indiegogo charges 5% + commissions on foreign currency transactions if we reach our objective of US$100,000, if not, Indiegogo charges 8%. 

The HON Foundation appreciates donations of all amounts. Please not that because we are a Swiss registered nonprofit organization, your donation is tax-deductible in Switzerland under certain conditions.

For ethical purposes, HON claims the right to maintain control over the visibility it grants to donating parties as perks. 


Thank you.

story:
My name is Sarah Savickas and I am the Mother to a 5 year old boy who was born with kidney disease.  When your child is diagnosed with a life threatening illness, you often feel like you have nowhere to turn.  Since having my son, it has become apparent to me that I need to find a way to help families like mine.  Parents shouldn't have to feel like they are helpless when it comes to caring for their child and their family.  They shouldn't have to have a worry on their mind other than the well being of their child.

That is where this campaign comes into play.  It is my mission to become a non-profit organization called, "The Childhood Kidney Foundation".  We will be the very first organization tailored to the specific needs of children fighting childhood kidney disease and urological defects.

We will be the backbone for the childhood kidney community, the 1st place parents can reach out to either at the initial diagnosis, or down the line when they feel they need help.  We will work closely with hospitals and doctors to ensure their patients needs and wants are being met outside of the medical aspect.
Your contribution to this campaign is so much more than a dollar amount.  You will be enhancing the lives of children by providing the tools they need or want to keep a smile on their face throughout their battle.

What We Need

I need your help to become a tax-exempt non-profit organization (501c3).
To Become Tax-Exempt
  • IRS Filing Fee $400-$850
  • Michigan Filing Fee $20
Marketing & Advertising $1,500
  • Webpage & Website Design
  • Personalized Logo
  • Trademark
  • T-shirts, Bracelets, Pens and other Marketing Materials
  • PO Box
Initial Program Funding $2,630
  • Christmas Parties for Children at the hospital/Unit
  • Christmas Adopt a Family
  • Gas Cards
  • Meal Vouchers
  • Utility/Housing Assistance
  • Grocery Gift Cards
  • I-Pads for passing time in the hospital, on dialysis and appointments
  • Books
  • Retreats for families to meet up and support one another
  • Vehicle Assistance (Maintenace, Oil Changes, Tires)
  • Assistance with Co-Pays
  • Assistance with Medicine and Medical Supplies
  • Gift bags
  • Hospital survival bags for newly diagnosed children/parents
  • Birthday program (cake & gift)
  • Support groups
  • Super Siblings Program
  • Grants for Funeral/Burial/Cremation

The Impact

When your child is diagnosed with kidney disease, your whole family is diagnosed. There are so many obstacles that families must face. 

By launching the Childhood Kidney Foundation, our goal is to ease the financial and emotional burden on families so they can solely focus on the health and well being of their child(ren).

I am very active in the childhood kidney community and I know first hand how much families will benefit from having a foundation they can reach out to when they are in need.

There are very little resources available to families that are targeted specifically for children diagnosed with kidney disease. 

Challenges

This is a cause that is very close to my heart.  I have watched so many children fight kidney disease including my own son.  Watching these children go through so much and still have a smile on their face blows me away.  So many children have lost their fight and their parents had difficulty in affording a burial or headstone.  I vow to commit to overcome any challenges put in my way for these children and families.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, it doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Share this campaign!
  • Tell your friends why this cause is important to you
  • Donate product
  • Reach out to your local media
  • Donate your time (web design, attorney, graphic design, etc)


Here are some of our amazing children who are in the fight against kidney disease




Help make this foundation tailored specifically for children with kidney disease and urological defects a reality.
After seeing the photos of these kids you can see that the need for an organization like this is huge.
story_txt:
My name is Sarah Savickas and I am the Mother to a 5 year old boy who was born with kidney disease.  When your child is diagnosed with a life threatening illness, you often feel like you have nowhere to turn.  Since having my son, it has become apparent to me that I need to find a way to help families like mine.  Parents shouldn't have to feel like they are helpless when it comes to caring for their child and their family.  They shouldn't have to have a worry on their mind other than the well being of their child.


That is where this campaign comes into play.  It is my mission to become a non-profit organization called, "The Childhood Kidney Foundation".  We will be the very first organization tailored to the specific needs of children fighting childhood kidney disease and urological defects.We will be the backbone for the childhood kidney community, the 1st place parents can reach out to either at the initial diagnosis, or down the line when they feel they need help.  We will work closely with hospitals and doctors to ensure their patients needs and wants are being met outside of the medical aspect.

Your contribution to this campaign is so much more than a dollar amount.  You will be enhancing the lives of children by providing the tools they need or want to keep a smile on their face throughout their battle.   What We Need
I need your help to become a tax-exempt non-profit organization (501c3).
To Become Tax-Exempt

IRS Filing Fee $400-$850
Michigan Filing Fee $20

Marketing & Advertising $1,500


Webpage & Website Design
Personalized Logo
Trademark
T-shirts, Bracelets, Pens and other Marketing Materials

story:
Short Summary

I'm sure, like myself, you are not the first person to have spent hours of their life trawling through the internet in vain hope of finding that one pre-workout with the correct recommended formula for an increased workout.

I have tried many of the pre workouts from the top 10 pre workouts list and whilst some gave me the buzz and a slight boost I came to realise that all of them had the same things in common.

To save on costs, the 6 main ingredients in your usual pre-workouts (4 of them being some of the more costly ingredients) are in a much lower quantity than recommended for it to be a good workout. As well as this, when you scoop, it is impossible to guarantee the exact quantities of each ingredient. With our product, you get individually packed sachets so you are guaranteed to get the exact dose of each ingredient.

Because of this I set out to make my own preworkout for my own needs. It was not designed for sale at first, I just wanted the maximum benefit from my sessions. It was only later on that I thought, why not pass on my creation to others like me that want to get the most from their time in the gym?

I'm sure the one question you’re asking is "Why should I use Predominate?"

Predominate is a pre-workout that has the maximum recommended dosage for each of its 6 ingredients in the pre workout. (There are actually only 7 ingredients in total, the final being flavouring.)

Predominate comes in individual sachets with a specifically mixed daily allowance. Yes, that means no more scoop! Simply pour and go!

You can also have Predominate in 4 different flavours, so if you buy a months supply, you can have a mix of all 4! Who doesn't like variety?

Finally, in my rewards, I have mentioned that the Pre workout is customizable. At the moment the Caffeine and Theanine (linked) can be changed based on the customers request. The options are 200mg, 400mg or 600mg which can be requested at no additional cost.*

***PLEASE NOTE*** - Don't just ask for 600mg caffeine serving just because you can. As a guideline, a standard 500ml energy drink contains 160mg of caffeine.
I myself only take a single serving whereas BigBen products owner takes a triple dose (he is however 140kg+ strongman competitor).
Exceeding what is safe can be dangerous. If in doubt, start low and build up.

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking for funding to the sum of £3,000. This will allow us to get the ingredients for our first batch. 

If our goal isn't achieved, we have a couple of potential investors that we will reach out to for the remaining. The reason we don't just go to them to begin with, is we want to give you guys the opportunity to try out the product first.

The Impact

If you are seriously considering this pre-workout but don't see how your £2 will help look at it from this perspective; 1,500 people will fund what we need to get this ship moving. I understand that  there are just so many other pre-workouts out there. All I can say is, I suggest you take a quick look around and you will notice there are no others like Predominate.

Questions & Answers

When will I receive my Predominate?
Production will begin in January, we will commence distribution early February all being well. 
What are the 4 flavour options for Predominate?
The options are Orange, Apple, Mixed Berries or Lemon & Lime.
What would you recommend for my caffeine dosage?
Based on initial testing, those who weighed less than 100kg took a 200mg serving, between 100kg - 125kg took a 400mg serving and those above 125kg took a 600mg serving,  Caffeine tolerance differs from person to person only you know your own limits.
What is in a serving of Predominate?
Predominate is made  from the following:
Citrulline Malate 2:1 - 6g
Beta alanine - 5g
Betaine Anhydrous ( Trimethylglycine) - 2g
L-Ornithine alpha Ketoglutarate - 2g                                                                                             Caffeine - 200mg/400mg or 600mg                                                                                            L-Theanine - 200mg/400mg or 600mg                                                                   Flavouring - 2g

Other Ways You Can Help

As one of our first supporters we hope you can promote our campaign with others on social media sites. using the share tools will let you to post to Facebook, Instagram and Twitter.

**If you share news of your purchase using one of the above tools then we will provide you with an additional reward

story:
"Earn Your Body" is the motto for Luceen's new gym! After years of bringing energy and fun to gyms around Amman, I am finally fulfilling my lifelong dream of opening my own gym! I needed something to help give me purpose and direction in life. This style of fitness became that for me. It wasn't just a new trend for staying in shape but it was a community to be apart of, a lifestyle, and an opportunity. Coaching fitness and bringing people together is what I am meant to do! I want to be a major part of improving fitness and quality of life for the people in our community and send positive energy!

What We Need - Basic equipment for the gym & a sound system. The overall atmosphere of the gym is important to us!

What You Get - There will be benefits for all those who choose to participate in my fundraising efforts. I am offering donors free T-Shirts, free private classes and free one month subscriptions. More details below!

Please share, spread the word & thank you for making this dream a reality!

story:
Short Summary

HoliDrink was first developed by Benny Lee in 2009 in Vancouver Canada. The reason Benny developed his own healthy drink, was because he was diagnosed with diabetes, and realized 99.99% of bottled juice and adulterated honey in the market have preservatives, sugar added, artificial sweetener and flavour, additives and lots of chemicals, which are not healthy and bad for diabetes.

So Benny made many experiments and perfected HoliDrink's secret formula. The main ingredients of HoliDrink are Honey and Lime, hence the "Holi" portmanteau name. By the way, HoliDrink only uses Raw/Real/Pure unpasteurized Canadian honey. Benny has been drinking HoliDrink daily ever since 2009. His neighbour, after tasting HoliDrink, told Benny that he wants to drink it every day.

Some of the benefits Benny has been gaining from drinking HoliDrink, are boosted immune system (he doesn't even get a flu/cold/cough), boosted memory and alertness, slim body, radiant skin, excellent digestion, no gastrointestinal disorder, sleep well, is no longer diabetic, free from colorectal cancer, no urinary tract infection, arthritis-free, etc. Basically a lot of conditions diagnosed by Benny's doctor are gone. 

There is a misconception that honey is bad for a diabetic person. The truth is real pure honey is beneficial to a type 2 diabetic person (it helps regulate your blood sugar), while adulterated honey is not pure honey (with additives, syrup or refined sugar or artificial sweeteners) so it is not beneficial to diabetic person. Reference: http://www.benefits-of-honey.com/diabetic-diet.html

Benny is in his 50s in 2016, fitter, healthier and looks younger than most people of his age, wants other people to benefit from HoliDrink too, hence he is sharing his HoliDrink with the world. Benny strongly believes that, drinking and eating healthily, coupled with regular physical exercises and positive mentality, will lead to optimal health, for your body, mind and spirit.

But in order for Benny to bring HoliDrink to the public, he needs a lot of support, so please support his Crowdfunding campaign and tell other people about HoliDrink, to help make the project a reality, so more people would gain optimal health from drinking HoliDrink.

Together, let's create history, let's make HoliDrink a beverage people drink daily instead of the caffeinated, carbonated, artificially flavored, sugar/syrup and preservatives added drinks out there, and help more people become healthier or regain their health. Your body will thank you for drinking HoliDrink.

What We Need 

We aim to raise C$30,000 in this crowdfunding campaign. This is just a small sum of the total sum required to launch a beverage business.

You can contribute from the minimum amount of C$10, $20....$200 (see next Section "What You Get" for our unique perks).

Below is the breakdown for the needed C$30,000:

$10,000 for equipment purchase, eg cooler, juicer, utility cart, stainless steel pot with faucet, bottles, caps, labels, raw materials, etc.

$10,000 for initial 6 month rent of a commercial kitchen in an industrial zone, or pay an existing beverage manufacturer to co-pack for (or manufacture on behalf of) HoliDrink.

$10,000 for creating a proper e-commerce site, so folks can purchase HoliDrink online.

If we don't reach the C$30,000 target, we shall still go ahead with the launch of HoliDrink, with whatever funds we received, and we will ship your perks.

What You Get (HoliDrink's Unique Perks)

For $10, you get 10% discount on your first HoliDrink online purchase.
For $20, you get 20% discount on your first HoliDrink online purchase.
For $40, you get half a dozen HoliDrink's Original Taste with free shipping within BC Canada. In other words, you get 6 bottles of 300mL Original Taste.
For $50, you get half a dozen HoliDrink's Holi EH Taste with free shipping within BC Canada. In other words, you get 6 bottles of 300mL Extra Holi* Taste.
For $60, you get half a dozen HoliDrink's Original Taste with free shipping anywhere outside BC, but within Canada and USA (excluding Alaska/Hawaii). In other words, you get 6 bottles of 300mL Original Taste.
For $70, you get half a dozen HoliDrink's Holi EH Taste with free shipping anywhere outside BC, but within Canada and USA (excluding Alaska/Hawaii). In other words, you get 6 bottles of 300mL Extra Holi* Taste.

For $80, you get a dozen HoliDrink's Original Taste with free shipping within BC Canada. In other words, you get 12 bottles of 300mL Original Taste.

For $100, you get a dozen HoliDrink's Holi EH Taste with free shipping within BC Canada. In other words, you get 12 bottles of 300mL Extra Holi* Taste. 

For $120, you get a dozen HoliDrink's Original Taste with free shipping anywhere outside BC, but within Canada and USA (excluding Alaska/Hawaii). In other words, you get 12 bottles of 300mL Original Taste.

For $140, you get a dozen HoliDrink's Holi EH Taste with free shipping anywhere outside BC, but within Canada and USA (excluding Alaska/Hawaii). In other words, you get 12 bottles of 300mL Extra Holi* Taste.

*Please note that Holi EH (Extra Holi) may be a bit spicy/hot for some people, it contains ginger and a tiny bit of red chili pepper.

Please also note that the shelf life for HoliDrink kept in room temperature is 2 weeks. If refrigerated, its shelf life is 2 months.

We have not finalized how much is the retail price, but expect to be similar cost to a cup of coffee/latte, so $4 for HoliDrink Original Taste and $5 for Holi EH taste, per 300ml bottle. For your info, HoliDrink uses 2 very expensive ingredients Real Honey and Lime, but its great taste and tons of health benefits make it worth far more than a cup of coffee.

For the above perks, we could ship only after we have received your funding from Indiegogo (normally they release the fund to us 15 days after the closing date of this campaign). 

If you need to order HoliDrink's Original or Holi EH before the end of this campaign, you can contact us via our website www.HoliDrink.com with your enquiry or order quantity and shipping address, we can advise you the cost, tax and shipping charges. Right now, we produce HoliDrink in very small batches via a commercial kitchen in Vancouver.

Where else can you buy HoliDrink

(1) MoonPennies Cafe, 1102 West Pender St, Downtown Vancouver, Canada.  
(2) North Shore Table Tennis Club, 1110 Gladwin Dr, North Vancouver, Canada.
(3) C.C Violin Patisserie & Café, 1564 Marine Dr, West Vancouver, Canada. 
(4) Vancouver Table Tennis Club, 3925 Fraser St, Vancouver, Canada.
(5) Meinhardt Fine Foods at 609 Granville St, Vancouver, Canada. 


The Impact

If you have or know someone who has, similar health conditions like Benny used to have, then it is in your/their best interests to drink HoliDrink daily.

Your financial contribution to our crowdfunding campaign will make a difference in many people's healths, and it will allow us to share the benefits of drinking HoliDrink with more people and at a faster rate.

Let's create history together, let's make us healthier by drinking HoliDrink daily, and make HoliDrink the choice over caffeinated coffee/tea, alcoholic wine/beer and other juice with preservatives (or from concentrates) or carbonated soft-drink. Let's make HoliDrink the next Coca Cola but in the healthy drink category.

The Super Ingredients and their Health Benefits

Risks & Challenges

Like any business venture, there is a risk of failure, but let's be positive, HoliDrink is not only a thirst quencher or cold buster, but it is also very tasty and nutritious with tons of health benefits, it could be the next Coca Cola but in a healthy drink category.

It is a matter of getting the word out, letting people try and see for themselves the many health benefits from drinking HoliDrink daily for a period of time.

There are already lots of hoops to jump and many hurdles to overcome, for instances, getting HoliDrink made in a commercial kitchen that is approved by the Health Authority, in an area that is approved by the Municipal Zoning Authority, and bottle labels that comply with the complex rules and regulations of the Canadian Food Inspection Agency.

It is notorious, that starting a beverage manufacturing business is insanely hard, it is extremely difficult and costly to get it marketed and distributed, most startups got squashed by the big multinational beverage companies, but I am confident, with your support and my perseverance, and my vast business development working experience (including the successful launch of my 3 other businesses), plus my engineering/business/legal study, HoliDrink will succeed.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • So please help to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign, share it on your facebook/twitter/google+/instagram/pinterest.
  • Please like our facebook page (www.facebook.com/HoliDrink)
  • Please follow us on Twitter (www.twitter.com/HoliDrink)
  • Please visit us www.holidrink.com
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT - financially or non-financially.

Truly yours, Benny Lee, Founder of HoliDrink

For your info, HoliDrink uses 2 very expensive ingredients Real Honey and Lime, but its great taste and tons of health benefits make it worth far more than a cup of coffee.
For the above perks, we could ship only after we have received your funding from Indiegogo (normally they release the fund to us 15 days after the closing date of this campaign). 
If you need to order HoliDrink's Original or Holi EH before the end of this campaign, you can contact us via our website www.HoliDrink.com with your enquiry or order quantity and shipping address, we can advise you the cost, tax and shipping charges. Right now, we produce HoliDrink in very small batches via a commercial kitchen in Vancouver.

Where else can you buy HoliDrink
(1) MoonPennies Cafe, 1102 West Pender St, Downtown Vancouver, Canada.  (2) North Shore Table Tennis Club, 1110 Gladwin Dr, North Vancouver, Canada.(3) C.C Violin Patisserie & Café, 1564 Marine Dr, West Vancouver, Canada. (4) Vancouver Table Tennis Club, 3925 Fraser St, Vancouver, Canada.(5) Meinhardt Fine Foods at 609 Granville St, Vancouver, Canada.   
The Impact If you have or know someone who has, similar health conditions like Benny used to have, then it is in your/their best interests to drink HoliDrink daily.
Your financial contribution to our crowdfunding campaign will make a difference in many people's healths, and it will allow us to share the benefits of drinking HoliDrink with more people and at a faster rate.
Let's create history together, let's make us healthier by drinking HoliDrink daily, and make HoliDrink the choice over caffeinated coffee/tea, alcoholic wine/beer and other juice with preservatives (or from concentrates) or carbonated soft-drink. Let's make HoliDrink the next Coca Cola but in the healthy drink category.

The Super Ingredients and their Health Benefits







   Risks & Challenges Like any business venture, there is a risk of failure, but let's be positive, HoliDrink is not only a thirst quencher or cold buster, but it is also very tasty and nutritious with tons of health benefits, it could be the next Coca Cola but in a healthy drink category.
It is a matter of getting the word out, letting people try and see for themselves the many health benefits from drinking HoliDrink daily for a period of time.
There are already lots of hoops to jump and many hurdles to overcome, for instances, getting HoliDrink made in a commercial kitchen that is approved by the Health Authority, in an area that is approved by the Municipal Zoning Authority, and bottle labels that comply with the complex rules and regulations of the Canadian Food Inspection Agency.
It is notorious, that starting a beverage manufacturing business is insanely hard, it is extremely difficult and costly to get it marketed and distributed, most startups got squashed by the big multinational beverage companies, but I am confident, with your support and my perseverance, and my vast business development working experience (including the successful launch of my 3 other businesses), plus my engineering/business/legal study, HoliDrink will succeed.   Other Ways You Can Help Some of you can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help:  So please help to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign, share it on your facebook/twitter/google+/instagram/pinterest.
Please like our facebook page (www.facebook.com/HoliDrink)
Please follow us on Twitter (www.twitter.com/HoliDrink)
Please visit us www.holidrink.com
 Please use the Indiegogo share tools!   THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT - financially or non-financially.Truly yours, Benny Lee, Founder of HoliDrink

story:
I designed the Hooded infinity Scarf and was awarded my Patent (D 693,096) in November 2011. I produced this design originally as a high end knitted silk wool product, went into production and it is selling online and in boutiques and Ski Shops now. But it is very expensive and i really wanted to get my design to a wider audience... and then...

In January of this year, after gaining a few pounds over the holidays it was back to the gym for me! What I noticed at the gym was people draping their towels on the equipment (YUK!), or wearing oversized or too small towels around their necks and over their heads. I realized what I needed was a towel version of my Hooded Infinity Scarf!

So I made one, and tried it, and I fell in love with it. 

When I'm on the treadmill or bike I can use the hood to screen out distractions and keep me focused. It never falls off my shoulders during my workout, and I'm never draping a sweaty towel over the equipment. After my workout in the winter, when my hair is sweaty or freshly showered, the hood protects me from the cold and wind. And it's stylish and pretty.

I made some for my friends and they say it's genius.

I currently have my first test market order of towels and I am now offering a limited amount here on Indegogo! 150 white towels and 50 black towels are available NOW! Once those are gone, I would need to fund my next order. So if I can raise $12,000 I can do a manufacturing run large enough to produce them in multiple colors, that I can sell them for $20 each. I really think you'll love my Hooded Infinity Sport Towel if you try it.

(And if you're an organization, the towels are a great giveaway to clients, or employees, or at a business event. I can do customized towels with a saying or your logo.)

Thank you,

Team Laura Alison

story:
There are many Muslims around the United States, who are struggling to find Halal food. I have personally experienced that problem and was anemic all throughout college, because I didn’t have proper nutrition and my meat intake was low. After doing some research and collecting good resources, I have decided to create a platform for those who are experiencing similar issues. This is not only a great way to help the people but it’s also going to be a great business with potential to grow fast, because of the high demand.

Just because it’s healthy, it should never taste bland. To provide you with the most exciting dishes, we have been talking to some of the most experienced dieticians and chefs from around the world to bring you food that is not only healthy but tastes amazing. Our food quality will exceed your expectations. We are promising to keep a quality standard for all our products.   We also cut the cost dramatically by providing this feature online, so what you pay is affordable and proportional to your diet. Our plan gives you the option to meet any dietary goals you may have in the near future. Our delivery process takes a week from your online order to your doorstep. What makes us different from other dietary plans is our versatile collection of food and recipes.

We intend to have one of the most cost-efficient meal delivery plans on the market. Our plan includes keeping  our in-house cost low so you can get the same meal you would otherwise made at home, delivered without wasting ingredients you never needed. Through the expertise of our in-house chef and in-house dietician, we plan to create different plans for each person's individual needs. We have reached out to local farmers that provide halal meat and groceries to provide you with some exotic flavors you might have never tried. Our plan is to reach all 50 states by the end of 2016.

To achieve the goal of spreading this business to all over the US, I need proper funding to scale properly and efficiently. Since there aren't many Halal diet plans offered countrywide, it would be a great opportunity for us and for our contributors.

    In order for me to get started on this idea, I would need some equipment, stove, refrigerators, storage and packaging material, and some inventory. I need all the resources I can get to provide the best ingredients in a timely manner. I am hoping that you would support this idea and allow me to help promote better health and lifestyle.  

    This may not be as important to you as for some people, but it would do great things and bring a positive change in people's life.  I am not only looking for funds but I am also looking for people to promote this idea and spread the word. Please help me get the word out and bring this idea to life.

story:
Summary

Jerry, born in South Africa, moved to Holland mainly looking for treatment for himself, having first being diagnosed with Parkinson's at the age of 39, a shock at first to anyone so young as this is a disease traditionally thought of for older people.

In launching this Foundation we wanted to bring together my experiences personally with dealing with this disease, as well as collectively as a family.   In sharing our knowledge, we hope our experiences and insights may assist others in finding new ways in which to help make life a little easier for those with Parkinson's, their families and care-givers and to find new ways better to practically assist others.

Stichting Parkinson's on the move


Globally over four million people suffer from Parkinson’s disease. For patients themselves as well as their families and care-givers dealing with Parkinson’s, it is often difficult to understand this illness. Our main objective is to help and support patients and people dealing with Parkinson's around the world.

  • Support

  • Awareness

  • Education

"The secret of learning to be sick is this:
Illness doesn't make you less of what you were.
You are still you." ~ Tony Snow

My sister and her husband invested in a pair of GaitAid glasses as a gift for me a year ago.  Following wonderful and very visible results from these glasses, we decided that we would initiate a project through the Foundation, where other Parkinson's patients could benefit from using the glasses.  

As the glasses are expensive for individual use, the Foundation would like to make this available to hospitals and clinics dealing with Parkinson's in order that Parkinson's patients would benefit from the use of these glasses on a larger scale.


  • GaitAid Glasses Project

  • A Revolutionary concept in treating Parkinson's disease walking difficulties.

    - Easy to use

    - Improve mobility and confidence

    - A few minutes daily practice can lead to improved walking, balance and freedom from freezing

    It's a training device - not something to walk around with daily. A residual effect, increases the more you practice. The residual effect is different from person to person. 

    Unfortunately this device is not affordable for most people and establishments. We would like to make this available to hospitals and clinics dealing with Parkinson's and this way Parkinson's patients would benefit. 

    Our aim between 1 October 2015- October 2016 is to be able to donate at least six GaitAids to Institutions dealing with Parkinson’s in the Netherlands, Europe and UK and from 2016 onwards, to continue this project to more Institutions throughout the world within key capital centres (Asia, Africa, Latin America) with a list provided off key Intuitions per country/ region being reached.

    All funds go directly to our GaitAid  project which is managed by our foundation: www.parkinsononthemovefoundation.org

    If we don't reach our goal, the funds still go to our GaitAid project - Even one GaitAid for an establishment dealing with Parkinson's can still help at least 20 patients.


Get Involved

Our Foundation started with a main objective:

Help Parkinson's Patients around the world.

Parkinson's on the move projects

GaitAid glasses are E2200 a piece including postage and we would like to be able to buy six for this year, to be able to give to establishments dealing with Parkinson's.

All funds go directly to our GaitAid  project which is managed by our foundation: www.parkinsononthemovefoundation.org

If we don't reach our goal, the funds still go to our GaitAid project, even one GaitAid for an establishment dealing with Parkinson's can still help at least 20 patients.


Donate with one of our perks:

Donate E1.00 you will receive a personal hand written thank you note


Donate E100 and receive one of our foundation T-Shirts 

Donate E150.00 and receive a beach bag

Donate  E200 and receive a sweatshirt


How the GaitAid Works

The GaitAid consists of a small lightweight control unit and a set of high-tech display glasses. You clip the control unit onto your belt or clothing. The control unit connects to special display glasses designed to be comfortable and easy to use. The glasses contain a see-through display and built-in earphones. You wear them just like eyeglasses.

The control device creates images and sounds by responding to your movements. Stepping over the images of the black and white tiles while listening to the sound cues, improves your stride length and rhythm, helping to restore your normal walking ability.


As you can see in the picture on the right, the images are clearly visible with high contrast. They are very easy to focus on, helping you to imagine stepping on them. While using the glasses, you see the tiled floor image and your surroundings at the same time. The usual therapy routine simply means going for a walk while stepping on the virtual tiles displayed on the glasses.

Practice on any safe walking path – in your home, in your own neighborhood, or a walking trail. You benefit the most by walking in different environments as you improve. The glasses may be detached and the GaitAid can be used with head phones alone. The auditory feedback alone was shown to bring great improvement to walking. With some people, positive effects begin immediately during the first use. Practice is fun and is typically a 20 to 30-minute session. Each new session brings on a longer lasting improvement.
GaitAid Press

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign with your friends and family, through social media or email, using the GaitAid Glasses link 

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/gaitaid-glas...

story:
Features

  • Bluetooth Enabled - connects to your Smartphone to choose your Kruzin' tune
  • LED lights for Kruzin' at night
  • Awesome Colors - Choose from Red, Black or Blue
  • Max Speed - 7 mph
  • Max Miles on one charge - 10 miles
  • Max Load - 220 pounds
  • Charging Time - 2 hours
      *Includes carrying tote

 Specifications

  • Motor power - 700 W
  • Tire Size - 6.5"
  • Max climb - 15 degrees
  • Battery - Lithium Ion 36V
  • Measurements - 24" long, 8.5" wide, 7" tall
  • Weight - 20 pounds

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS


Is the Kruzer easy to learn to ride?
 Yes, the Kruzer is easy to learn. The keys are balance and confidence.
 Be sure to firmly place your feet on the Kruzer platform and lean forward
 slightly to go. Avoid sudden, jolting movements. It is best to hold onto a
 railing until you get the feel of it. Once you do, just believe in
 yourself and confidently start kruzin!

 What is the maximum weight the Kruzer can hold?
 220 pounds

 What is the minimum age/weight for the Kruzer?
 We recommend that a child be at least 5 years old and 45 pounds before
 trying the Kruzer. A child should always be supervised and ride the Kruzer
 with a properly fitting helmet.

 What is the maximum speed the Kruzer can go?
 7 mph

 How many miles can the Kruzer go on a single charge?
 10 miles

 How long does the Kruzer need to charge?
 2 hours

 What does the Blue Tooth feature do?
 This allows you to connect your Smartphone and listen to your own music as
 you Kruze.

 Do you need a helmet when wearing the Kruzer?
 We recommend that every rider wear a helmet and knee and elbow pads when
 Kruzin.

 Can the Kruzer go on ramps?
 The Kruzer does have a max climb of 15 degrees, but it is not intended for
 tricks on ramps. It is intended for Kruzin' on flat surfaces or surfaces
 with slight inclines.

 How much does the Kruzer weigh and how do you carry it?
 The Kruzer weighs 20 pounds. You can either carry it in your arms or in the
 convenient carry tote included with your Kruzer.

PAYMENT & SHIPPING

 How does the current price compare to the regular Kruzer retail price?
 After the Indiegogo campaign, the Kruzer price will go up to $699 per unit.

 Can I pick up my Kruzer?
 Kruzers are only available to be shipped at this time - not available for
 pick-up.

 When will my Kruzer arrive?
 You can expect to receive your Kruzer by March 12, 2016.

 I want to give the Kruzer as a Christmas gift. Will it arrive
 in time?
 If you wish to give your Kruzer as a Christmas gift, we will
 send you a special Kruzer gift certificate to give to your recipient in
 time for the holidays. We will ship gift certificates on December 16
 so you must order before then to get a gift certificate for the
 holidays. The Kruzer itself will arrive by March 12, 2016.

 How will my Kruzer be shipped?
 We will use Fed Ex for shipping all Kruzers.

 What is the cost of shipping?
 Your shipping cost will depend upon your location and Fed Ex charges to
 that location from the point of origin - Lopez Island, WA. Approximate
 shipping cost will be $50 for U.S. and $115 for international.

SUPPORT/WARRANTY/RETURNS

 I have a question about Kruzers. Who can I contact?
 Please contact us at support@thekruzer.com

 Is there a warranty?
 We offer a mechanical warranty for 12 months. If your Kruzer stops
 functioning, you can ship it to our U.S. location and we will replace it.

story:
What is Nutrifiz?

Nutrifiz is the world’s first range of effervescent wheatgrass tablets. Wheatgrass is a highly nutritious plant packed with vitamins, minerals and plant based nutrients. Our products are designed to make it easy for anyone to enjoy the benefits of wheatgrass. Just add water and Nutrifiz delivers organic wheatgrass in a delicious and convenient drink.

Our Story

We started our journey to make a superplant more accessible and tasty to everyone. Nutrifiz is about health, nutrition, great taste and convenience. Each effervescent tablet contains all the health benefits associated with wheatgrass, as well as 20 essential vitamins and minerals.

Why do we need your help?

We ensure all our products are as natural as possible, vegan friendly, and free from anything nasty. When we produced our original range of effervescent tablets, they needed to contain certain non-natural ingredients to ensure they held together and dissolved properly when the time comes; similar to all effervescent tablets. 

We can and will improve on this through research and development with our existing network of accredited nutritionists, chemists and university researchers. To achieve this, we need to raise £6,000 to meet the minimum costs of development and production run for the effervescent tablets. 

The result? Nutrifiz Plus! The most natural formula possible without compromising on our core values of health, nutrition, convenience and great taste. We have a strong relationship with a large award-winning effervescent tablet producer and new recipes ready to go, which means we can have new products ready within 3 months of a successful campaign. Having already started work with flavour experts, we can assure you our new recipes will be even more delicious, natural and nutritious than our original ones.

We'll also be moving into the world of convenient powder sachets after an extremely successful trial with Hair of the Dog and Nutrifiz Sport! These can be much more flexible with bespoke formulas and taste, without compromising on nutrition - they'll  be all natural and contain as much nutrition as we can fit in! Production of these new powders will cost £4,000.

As you can see from our existing products, we’re pretty good at squeezing lots of vitamins, minerals and plant-nutrition! So you can enjoy the benefits of  wheatgrass and many other nutritious offerings from nature on-the-go. Just pop a sachet in your pocket or bag with no mess and no fuss! 

We want everyone to be able to enjoy the benefits of wheatgrass and other wonderfully nutritious offerings from nature in the most delicious, convenient and nutritious formats. We will be giving sneak peaks of our progress as the campaign progresses and thank you for your support!
story_txt:
What is Nutrifiz?
Nutrifiz is the world’s first range of effervescent wheatgrass tablets. Wheatgrass is a highly nutritious plant packed with vitamins, minerals and plant based nutrients. Our products are designed to make it easy for anyone to enjoy the benefits of wheatgrass. Just add water and Nutrifiz delivers organic wheatgrass in a delicious and convenient drink.




Our Story
We started our journey to make a superplant more accessible and tasty to everyone. Nutrifiz is about health, nutrition, great taste and convenience. Each effervescent tablet contains all the health benefits associated with wheatgrass, as well as 20 essential vitamins and minerals.


Why do we need your help?
We ensure all our products are as natural as possible, vegan friendly, and free from anything nasty. When we produced our original range of effervescent tablets, they needed to contain certain non-natural ingredients to ensure they held together and dissolved properly when the time comes; similar to all effervescent tablets. 
We can and will improve on this through research and development with our existing network of accredited nutritionists, chemists and university researchers. To achieve this, we need to raise £6,000 to meet the minimum costs of development and production run for the effervescent tablets. 
The result? Nutrifiz Plus! The most natural formula possible without compromising on our core values of health, nutrition, convenience and great taste. We have a strong relationship with a large award-winning effervescent tablet producer and new recipes ready to go, which means we can have new products ready within 3 months of a successful campaign. Having already started work with flavour experts, we can assure you our new recipes will be even more delicious, natural and nutritious than our original ones.
We'll also be moving into the world of convenient powder sachets after an extremely successful trial with Hair of the Dog and Nutrifiz Sport! These can be much more flexible with bespoke formulas and taste, without compromising on nutrition - they'll  be all natural and contain as much nutrition as we can fit in! Production of these new powders will cost £4,000.
As you can see from our existing products, we’re pretty good at squeezing lots of vitamins, minerals and plant-nutrition! So you can enjoy the benefits of  wheatgrass and many other nutritious offerings from nature on-the-go. Just pop a sachet in your pocket or bag with no mess and no fuss! 
We want everyone to be able to enjoy the benefits of wheatgrass and other wonderfully nutritious offerings from nature in the most delicious, convenient and nutritious formats. We will be giving sneak peaks of our progress as the campaign progresses and thank you for your support!

story:
What is Leg Circle?

Leg Circle is the first fitness device for off-center rotating , keep you far away from Joint pain ! 

Why Leg Circle? 

We love this question. It is not uncommon to hear the leg or shoulder pain. Did you know that 26% of the adult population in the US suffers from leg or shoulder pain? Causation can be varied; over use, under use, mobility restrictions, caused poor blood circulation and muscular imbalances are some of the main factors that can cause this pain.

    

But no matter what caused the pain, you or your friends don’t have to live with it. Because we created the Leg Circle! Leg Circle is designed to target the blood circulation in your legs/shoulders. Leg Circle could prevent/release the pain by increased mobility and blood circulation! It’s effective, natural and safe!

 

How do I use it? 

It’s simple, 3 exercises.

Exercise 1. Sit and foot rotating.

To stronger your knee joints

 

Exercise 2. Stand and foot rotating.

To stronger your knee joints and target your waist

Exercise 3. Stand and hand rotating.

To stronger your shoulders!

 

What can I get after the exercise 1,2 and 3? 

The Leg Circle can make your legs and shoulders stronger and pain-free!

 

 

Why it's effective? 

How does the Leg Circle can make your legs and shoulders stronger and pain-free? The secret is the Leg Circle’s patent design, which could increase blood circulation. Beneath the Leg Circle is a soft pivot and two wheels, which creates an off-center rotation. By constant off-center movement to increases blood circulation and mobility to stronger your legs and shoulders and pain-free. 

Read what LiveStrong.com has to say about circulation:http://www.livestrong.com/article/323211-benefits-of-increased-blood-circulation

 

Why it's natural? 

In the same manner the earth orbits the sun, your foot will orbit the pivot. Every orbit Increases your mobility and blood circulation. So, it’s the most natural and safest way to increase blood circulation. Simple to use, place your foot on the Leg circle and slowly rotate, it will start off-center rotation immediately. The off-center exercise are always needed, but quite few in the daily life. Now you can enjoy it as much as you want. The off-center exercise also keep your brain refresh.

Why it's safe? 

It’s safe because the user isn’t adding any pressure to the joints. Only using the natural weight of the arm or leg, allows for body movement without undue stress on your joints. By using the Leg Circle, you benefit from a safe way to exercise and increase blood flow without the rigors of a weighted arm or leg workout. The kinetic movement alone will increase the tone of your legs, arms, and shoulder muscles.

Where can I use Leg Circle? 

Use at home

Why not sit and rotating? Why do nothing while watching your favorite show on television. The Leg Circle can be used anytime you are in a stationary position. At home or office…

Use at work 

Do you work in an office, or a small cubical all day? While sitting at your desk you can use the Leg Circle. The Leg Circle has a small footprint, you can use it anywhere. You can stand up in your cube or office, put one foot on the Leg Circle, and do the exercise. In the standing position, you gain the added benefit of hip rotation.

Use at traveling 

The Leg Circle is small enough to fit into a carry-on bag! You can take it anywhere, work travel, vacation, or just the weekend getaway. It’s also very convenient to store away. The foot print is so small it allows you to perform an efficient exercise anywhere, anytime. The Leg Circle only needs a 1.5x1.5 foot (50x50cm) working space.

But, I already have a treadmill. Do I really need a Leg Circle?

Treadmill, Bike were excellent fitness equipment. They are probably one of the most commonly for exercising. But all of them are concentric exercise, the body forward, which may hurt your knees easily. The Leg Circle will give you one more choice of “off-center exercise”. Before the strong exercising, the Leg Circle will make your body warm, reduce the chance of the injury.

And you can't bring the treadmill when traveling, but you can put the Leg Circle into the suitcase.  

I Don't have Knee pain or Shoulder pain, should I exercise on Leg Circle? 

We think so. Everyone would like to stay in good health, such as strong joints!

Maybe you will agree with that prevention is better than cure. We believe that 10 minutes a day of Leg Circle, will increased mobility and blood circulation and keep your joint much stronger. The off-center exercise also keep you more balance and fresh the brain. Maybe it is good idea to get one for your parents.

Tech Specs

The Leg Circle can be used for Leg rotating without assembly. Or snap the handle of The Leg Circle into place, and we can do arm circles!  Don't need tools

Main body：Engineered plastic made of Propene Polymer (PP), strong! The wheels are made of Thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) with a stainless steel axle. The maximum weight capacity is 300lbs

The salient points can massage sole of the foot, especially after long day of high heels or running.

Principle: Off-center rotation is a safe and effective exercise for joints. Simple design for maximum benefit.

Rewards

 

 

The Team

This is Simon who have a passion for designing solutions to problems we come across in daily life..

The Story

I met with Mihail in 2013, a yoga instructor with 20 years’ experience.  He came out with the idea of the Leg Circle. I was happen to have the knee joint pain at that time, which caused by too much running. We loved the idea and then made samples for testing. It is strange that my knee joint pain which was gone after 30 days exercise tested on the sample. I was very happy with that.

On Mother’s day this year, I gave one as gift to my mother. She liked it so much, she exercised every day when watching TV. The leg pain was relieved after 1 month. My father likes it as well, and our neighbors. All would like to get one.  So I thought why not have a campaign on Indiegogo to help those who are also suffer from leg or shoulder pain. Sometimes it’s difficult to choose gifts for our family or friends. With the Leg Circle, you now don’t have to worry. Get one, or a pair of Leg Circles for your next gift!

Why become Leg Circle Backer? 

Our dream is to help someone to alleviate leg or shoulder pain, and help everyone to prevent the pain. Our goal is to make Leg Circle available to everyone, and to achieve this we need your help! To cover initial production cost we need a minimum number of orders. With potential users everywhere who suffer from leg and shoulder pain, they can benefit from Leg Circle by increasing blood circulation and returning to the vigor of earlier years. There is no specific age group for The Leg Circle. If you sit or stand in a stationary position for long periods of time, you can use it.

Timeline

Risks and challenges: 

The Leg Circle is a whole new product which requires high precision. Like any new product on the market today, there were challenges, with that said, there may be slight delays due to any reason. But due to our experience in production. We have 15 years experience in production, quality control, logistics, we are very familiar with the entire process.  We foresee any challenges that we will not be able to overcome.
