story:
My name is Dr. Martin Falappino. I am a family practice physician of 32 years.  About 20 years ago I significantly changed my focus from disease orientation (classical medicine), to optimal health education and the natural treatment of medical problems.  Over the last 20 years I have developed numerous natural treatment protocols that allow patients to get off medications by using natural supplements, precursors, hormones, and lifestyle modification techniques to "fix" their medical conditions.  From this perspective, KSK Cold Spray (KSK) was born and developed.  

What's in KSK?  KSK is a blend of minerals,  nano-particle minerals, and herbal elixirs.  All of the ingredients are germicidal in nature.  How it works and its uniqueness is complex and lengthy.  Go to www.kskcold.com  for all the details you could ever want. 

This campaign is both a working production-shipping campaign.  I have a working product based on 2 years of trial and improvement with about 400 of my patients.  200 of these patients participated in a clinical trial.  The results showed a 75% success rate based on elimination or near elimination of cold and flu symptoms within 1-2 days.  Total side effect rate is about 19%.  The side effect is nasal burning from spraying.  It always goes away within seconds.  Less than 10% of patients stopped using KSK due to the burning.  The other 10% with slight burning were able to continue because the burning stops after the first few sprays.

The campaign is both for continued R & D of KSKspray  (specifically to continue the development of a children's spray) but also for production funds and advertising.  Indiegogo's approach is important to me  for 2 reasons.  First, I don't want massive loan debt to start this company. 

Secondly, to connect with people that see the bigger societal picture.  That being, the massive abuse by physicians in over prescribing antibiotics for cold & flu illnesses.  Antibiotics don't work against viruses which cause colds and flu's.  We doctors give patients antibiotics knowing they are useless, just to get rid of the patients.  I resisted doing this for 30 years, but finally, patients just wore me out.   I began to do what I despised, giving worthless antibiotics to get rid of patients who were begging for "a magic cure" for  their flu virus symptoms.  This drove me to research this problem so I could give something real to my patients.  Hence, the discovery and development of KSK Cold Spray.     

The magnitude of KSK Cold Spray is this:  It's  more than just a germicidal product for sale.   It is truly part of the answer to a problem that must be addressed.  We doctors cannot continue to indiscriminately give out antibiotics to appease patients (for its placebo effect).   The unfortunate truth is, it has become a business tactic that helps pay the overhead.  And, it is getting worse,  not better.  The consequence to this action is, we doctors are contributing to the rampant mutation of common bacteria into resistant strains.  These bacterial strains can be devastating(even lethal) to significantly ill patients.  People think that the MRSA bacteria is bad(the resistant staph you hear about).  MRSA is child's play compared to some of the new resistant bacteria that most of you have not heard of.   KSK is one small part of how this problem will be effectively handled.  Why?  Because patients will not go to their doctor for useless antibiotics for a cold or flu.   They will use KSK and their own immune system will get them better in 1-2 days.    

More Specific Details on KSK:

Funding:  I hope to reach the goal of 500K for  R & D, production costs, and advertising.   R & D will need about 125K.  I need to formalize my first study and start a second formal study with a medical school.  Most likely it will be with my alma mater.  I am a former associate professor with the Department of Family Practice at the Western University of Health Sciences in Pomona, California.  I have discussed the study concept in detail with the Dean of the Medical School and she would be excited to do a study like this. 

Production costs would consume another 200K.  Equipment, 2 employee salaries, and raw materials would utilize these funds.  Currently, I have about 1000 bottles of KSK in stock.  Current production capabilities are 2000 bottles per week.   Furthermore, the person+machine production style initially affords me the ability to rapidly increase production at a .5 logarithmic rate each 6 week cycle as necessary.

Shipping is a different animal.  During the campaign, it will take 10-14 days for contributors to receive the product.  After the campaign, that will improve.  If shipping is delayed, you will receive extra bottle(s) as compensation.  Also, something worth mentioning:  It's not hard to find complaints against Indiegogo on the net.  The main one being, contributors never getting the product.  I am a physician with a reputation to uphold.  I am not invisible.  Plug my name in the internet and you can instantly find my office.  You will get the product.  Its just I am 62 years old trying to re-invent my life.  So I ask for a little patience.  Thanks.

So, continuing the funding discussion,  advertising would also be significant fund consumer.  I have looked extensively at, and obtained professional consulting regarding the  most cost effective advertising models.  I have settled on an internet model that uniquely manipulates the affiliate marketing constructs for optimal efficiency.  I am open to discuss the precise nature of this approach with appropriate contributors. 

At the end of the campaign, if I don't reach the goal, I will apportion the funds to "start" production, sales, and advertising .

Other details worth mentioning: 

What are the perks? The pain perk is getting  the product well below retail.  This allows you to share the product with friends and family.  You will be amazed at how effective KSK really is. 

Risks:  KSK is all natural.  It's totally safe and next year we will have a children's formula delivered by nebulizer that all the mom's in American will love.  Because their children will also get better in 1-2 days.  The problem that remains is in the 9-10% of people that just can't take KSK in the nose due to the burning.  Still working on that, and will in the end develop (R & D needed) a KSK "mild spray" for these people. But for sore throats, you will be blown away.  When KSK is started at the first sign of sore throat, it has a 90% success rate to destroy the symptoms!!  And only 3% of people said it burns!

And finally, who am I?  To understand me, and the mission I am on at this point in my life, go to www.drdebunk.com for details on who I am becoming.  Dr. Debunk, my YouTube name, is the "medical truth teller".  The purpose of Dr. Debunk is twofold.  First.  To be an free educational resource for all Americans to understand the medical concepts that produce the "optimal health lifestyle".  The purpose being,  to age as slowly as possible, and retard/eliminate the process of disease.  I have watched patients die for 32 years.  It is very different process to die of old age vs. dying of a disease process.  All of us in the optimum health field aspire to objectify the process of having optimum energy, motivation, endurance, and strength to the end of our "old age, non diseased" lives. 

And secondly, Dr. Debunk is here to  to debunk the myths, garbage, and crap spread by doctors and other health professions so Americans can enjoy optimal health at all decades of life.  Unfortunately, since aspects of medicine are counter-productive to your optimum health.  Dr. Debunk feels compelled to illuminate these areas in medicine.

So at the end of the day, what am I passionate about is simple this:  Defining what quality of health means and furthermore, what are the lifestyle factors that produce optimal energy, motivation, endurance and strength at all decades of life.  After studying this for the last 22 years of my 32 years as a physician, I have something to contribute.  People today over 50 years old that are "in the know", will age 20-25 years slower than the rest of the population, and die of old age at 105 (+10 or -5 years), and not of disease from 72-80 (with the last 5-10 years sucking badly).  I am Dr. Debunk, the Medical Truth Teller.

So at the end of the day, what am I passionate about is simple this:  Defining what quality of health means and furthermore, what are the lifestyle factors that produce optimal energy, motivation, endurance and strength at all decades of life.  After studying this for the last 22 years of my 32 years as a physician, I have something to contribute.  People today over 50 years old that are "in the know", will age 20-25 years slower than the rest of the population, and die of old age at 105 (+10 or -5 years), and not of disease from 72-80 (with the last 5-10 years sucking badly).  I am Dr. Debunk, the Medical Truth Teller.

story:
How many times have you had your hands full carrying your phone, water bottle and keys…and then misplaced one or all of them?

Next Bottle is an all-in-one, innovative hydration station. By combining a detachable water compartment, High Fidelity Bluetooth-connected speaker and a phone dock with a built-in power bank, Next Bottle can hold any electronic device the size of an iPhone 6 or smaller and charge any electronic device using a micro USB connector, while quenching your thirst at the same time.


Next Bottle keeps you connected to all of your items and lets you carry them with just one hand. You can even blast your favorite music from Next Bottle’s High Fidelity Bluetooth-connected speaker. It has volume control, playback options and you can answer calls using the LCD touchscreen display. Whether you’re heading to the pool, the gym or you’re just on the go for the day, Next Bottle has everything you need to stay hydrated and in sync with your mobile device.


Our next step is to raise the money for the tooling and manufacturing costs associated with meeting our delivery deadline. We ask for your support in making the distribution of this product a reality. We know that once you experience the convenience and pleasure that this product creates, you will be glad that you were a part of getting it out to the world.

When we began this journey, we didn’t think that we would make it this far so quickly. Thanks to the extensive networking that we were able to do at the 2015 CES trade show, we are confident that we acquired all of the key elements that we need to move on to the next phase of our project and get the Next Bottle onto retail shelves all over the world.

So please help support our campaign by not only contributing, but also sharing this exciting new product with your families and friends. We are confident that they will thank you for it!

story:
Short Summary

Dava Muramatsu introduces her hand-crafted one of a kind jewelry collection, Nymph Jewels.  

The hallmark of Dava's work is the use of primitive shapes and the natural state of precious and semi-precious stones to evoke a feeling of ancient royalty in a contemporary setting.  Accented with vintage beads, her pieces have the aura of being recently uncovered in an archaeological dig, yet are absolutely modern and wearable every day.  

Every season, the Nymph Jewels collections begins with the sourcing of the finest gemstones in a myriad of richly colored hues - each stone embodies their own unique traits and meanings to empower the wearer.  She then imagines a hand-crafted design which is all at once elegant, organic, and powerfully demure.  Ethically sourced and made by hand in Massachusetts, Dava’s creations allow women to layer and select their favorite colors and meanings in order to tell their one-of-a-kind life story.

What is the life story you wish you create?  To promote a clear mind and create a level of determination to achieve goals, the ruby is your go-to stone.  To awaken your intuition, labradorite is key and olive wood provides the wearer to become grounded and protected.  

"Creating jewelry is a way that I can trigger women's imaginations" says Dava.  "Wearing one of these unique pieces, a woman can express herself through style.  Each piece, like the essence of a perfume, adapts to the woman who wears it -- and for each woman, embodies something uniquely divine."


What We Need & What You Get

Inspired to create jewelry that entices and engages the senses, funding will allow formally trained artist and  Boston fashion icon, Dava, to source rare materials and the finest gemstones  for her new collections of Nymph to further empower women.  Each Nymph piece is  locally crafted, of the finest matierials with a global tone.

  • My initial goal is $3600.
  • I am pleased to provide the following unique Perks for those that decide to contribute to this campaign. I have made it easy and affordable to all!
Perks: 
$25 : Birdie Letter Opener in  variety of colors, exclusively imported from Japan.

$45:  Hand made organic soap. Packaged with Japanese flair . Lavender, Pine, Bergamot Orange, Grassy Field, Citrus Lavender, Patchouli, Peppermint. 

$65:  Enhancing your environment.; 5 Elements soy base candle, poured and packaged by hand. Includes Rumi poem. 60 hour burn time.  Air, Fire, Earth, Water, Sky.

$100:  4 available, or similar.  Olive wood bracelet with stone focalbead. Nymph. Olive wood is a dense, smooth and easily dyed natural wood. Offering protection and grounding to the wearer. Olive wood promotes peace, joy and deep devotion.

  $195:  5 available or similar. Roll on Olive wood bracelet with stone charm and vintage focal bead. Nymph. Olive wood is a dense, smooth and easily dyed natural wood. Offering protection and grounding to the wearer. Olive wood promotes peace, joy and deep devotion.

  $300:  2 Available; Adjustable Jasper charm bracelet on brass. Nymph.  Jasper is known as the supreme nurturer. Sustains and supports during times of stress, bringing tranquility and wholeness.

$495: One of a kind, Emerald necklace with faceted emerald slab surrounded by a halo of clear diamonds. Nymph. Emerald is a stone of inspiration and infinite patience. One of the most prestigious gemstones in the world. A wonderful balance inspiring opulence and elegance. 17" in length.

$750:  2 available:  This piece was created in harmony with lava, pyrite,ebony, diamonds, black spinel. The  Ebony tusk with diamond "halo" cap adds mystery to this unique piece.  These stones are earthy and grounding. Diamonds offer purity to the wearer and inspires new beginnings. 32" in length.

New Perk: $245- 1 available

Fresh Water Peach Pearl Roll on Bracelet with Agate Charm, Brass Bezel.  Pearls were thought to be the perfectly and effective love potion. The power of the pearl; Romans wore pearls for the medicinal and protective qualities. Pearls represent purity, encouraging good health and wealth. They balance hormones, and are also considered to be a very nurturing gem. 
Pearl is the birthstone for June.

The Impact

Hopefully, I've inspired you with my story and my designs.  In doing so, those who contribute will not only have an opportunity to get a unique Perk, but also become a part of  a distinctive following.

  • With my fashion history and design experience, I have taught women how to present their "best" self and feel confident within.

Risks & Challenges

Your contributions will enable me to expand beyond my existing resources for sourcing natural gemstones. The challenge I have is in the ability to acquire rarer materials that will heal and enhance lives.  An additional challenge is my ability to broaden global awareness and reach.  This initial campaign will allow me to increase my marketing capability for my jewelry designs.

Other Ways You Can Help

I am proud to launch this campaign and invite you to enroll your personal and business contacts to spread the beauty, passion and creativity.  I will be so grateful to have you share this opportunity.  And, remember Indiegogo has excellent, easy to use sharing tools!

story:
Hello!  I am Vanessa Kelly, owner of Function Egoscue and Pilates Studio, located in Tempe, AZ.  Over the last seven years of teaching Pilates, I discovered my passion in helping people who may be experiencing pain, suffering from a condition or simply wanting to work on their personal health goals.  My approach through corrective exercise is extremely important to me because there are many people who struggle with the thought of surgery or taking medicine and are searching for a holistic approach to achieving their goals.

“I am fortunate to have Vanessa Kelly as my Pilates Instructor. After being diagnosed with a back issue, I have taking Pilates for years. It can be difficult to find someone who has the experience and expertise and awareness to treat clients with injuries. Vanessa has been wonderful. She is knowledgeable and interested in my well being always being cognizant of my limitations. In addition, Vanessa has a thirst for learning.  I personally recommend Vanessa as a Pilates Instructor.”              - Patricia Curtis

The funding I need to expand is simply to purchase (2) additional reformers for the studio.  I do not take health insurance so the type of service I provide can become costly for most people.  By having a small group of three clients to work with at the same time, this will help keep the financial cost down for them and increase the number of people I can see in an hour during the most demanded times throughout the day.  Even if I do not receive the entire amount requested, I will be putting the money towards one additional reformer and other props and equipment I can use with my clients.

“I love Pilates... and it's because of Vanessa. I'd never taken a single class prior to a year ago, and after one short introductory session I was convinced I needed to give it a shot. Vanessa has worked very closely with me to help alleviate some chronic neck and hip issues that I've been suffering with for a long time. I have no doubt that without Vanessa's expertise I'd be suffering with much more discomfort and pain. On top of that, she makes Pilates fun!”  - Suzanne Riffel 

My Pilates studio is very different than other studios nationwide due to the background and certifications I hold in Egoscue (postural therapy) and Pilates.  Everyone starts with a posture assessment, gait analysis and functional testing.  We sit down and discuss their health history and goals before I put together a customized program for them to do at home and in the studio.  Every 4 weeks I retake their photos and make adjustments to their programs.  This is the motivation that some people need to keep going.  By seeing their photos every 4 weeks, this also helps to keep them on track to achieve their goals.

“For years I have struggled with lower back pain, the results of old sports injuries combined with a desk job that also requires a large amount of travel.  Over the past year of regular Pilates sessions I have seen a dramatic decrease in my back pain, as well as a noticeable increase in my core strength and stability.  My instructor, Vanessa Kelly, is incredibly knowledgeable and always has new workouts planned to continue to build strength and flexibility, while also keeping workouts fun and interesting.  I would recommend Pilates classes and training with Vanessa without reservation to anyone.”  -Scott Schmidt

I cannot express how much I appreciate the time you have taken to read about what I do and how I want to continue to change peoples lives.  The best thing you can do for my potential clients is continue to spread the word amongst your friends, family and colleagues who you may think can help with the studio expansion.  And if you're in the area please come by to check out the studio for yourself!

“For several years, I’ve had severe back pain and problems with both knees. After two knee surgeries and several forms of therapy to help reduce the pain caused by bulging discs in my back, I was still in constant pain. I didn’t want to live my life with pain, nor did I want to continue taking pain medications. With the advice from my chiropractor, I decided to take a different approach.  I started practicing Pilates with Vanessa Kelly about a year ago. Her name was given to me by a trusted trainer - I only wanted the best if I was going to venture down a different path.  I started feeling results within the first month. By no means was I pain free, but the progression during this past year has been incredible. With the personally tailored exercises Vanessa gives me each workout in combination with her expertise knowledge of how to strengthen my body without causing stress to my knees or back, I don’t live with pain every day. Granted, there are days when my knees or back might bother me still, but it’s nothing compared to before I started practicing Pilates with Vanessa on a regular basis. To this day, I am progressively getting better and better. She has shown me how to take that alternate approach to my health and the results have followed.”
- David Mizrahi

story:
...και να που έφτασε η στιγμή να τρέξουμε τον δεύτερο Μαραθώνιό μας… αυτή τη φορά, όμως, λίγο πιο μακριά από την πατρίδα μας, στην Ζυρίχη της Ελβετίας. Η απόφαση ήτανε κοινή όχι μόνο για την επιλογή του αγώνα, αλλά και για τον σκοπό..

Αλλά, ας τα πάρουμε τα πράγματα από την αρχή! Είμαστε η Χριστίνα, η Αγγελική και η Ελένη και πρόσφατο πάθος μας είναι οι αγώνες μεγάλων αποστάσεων. Γνωριστήκαμε μεταξύ μας από την κοινή αγάπη μας για το τρέξιμο, το οποίο μας ωθεί κάθε φορά να το μετουσιώνουμε σε κάτι καλό για όσους και όσα μας πλαισιώνουν.

Ενόψει της συμμετοχής μας στον Μαραθώνιο της Ζυρίχης (42 χλμ) στις 19 Απριλίου 2015 αποφασίσαμε να τρέξουμε για τον Σύλλογο γονέων και Κηδεμόνων Παιδιών με Νεοπλασματικές Παθήσεις  "Η ΠΙΣΤΗ" που ιδρύθηκε στου Ζωγράφου Αττικής το 1993 και έχει ως σκοπό τη δημιουργία αξιοπρεπών, επαρκών, ασφαλών και υψηλού επιπέδου συνθηκών νοσηλείας, που να εξασφαλίζουν ίσες πιθανότητες ίασης με τις υπόλοιπες χώρες της Ευρωπαϊκής Ένωσης και των Η.Π.Α. στα παιδιά με Νεοπλασματικές Παθήσεις, την υποβοήθηση του έργου των ιατρών και των νοσηλευτριών και του λοιπού προσωπικού των Αιματολογικών – Ογκολογικών κλινικών και της Μονάδας Μεταμόσχευσης Μυελού των Οστών, την προώθηση της ιατρικής επιστήμης, σε θέματα νεοπλασιών (χορήγηση υποτροφιών, οργάνωση συνεδρίων κλπ), την Ψυχική και οικονομική στήριξη των οικογενειών, με παιδί που πάσχει από καρκίνο και τέλος την κάλυψη εξωνοσοκομειακών εξετάσεων όπως σπινθηρογραφήματα, ακτινοθεραπείες, pet scan κ.α.

Σε αυτόν τον διπλό ‘’αγώνα’’ ζητάμε την δική σας συνδρομή για να καταφέρουμε να κάνουμε το χαμόγελο να φωτίσει τα πρόσωπα όσο πιο πολλών παιδιών μπορούμε! Σκοπός μας είναι να μαζέψουμε  700 ευρώ περίπου μέχρι την ημέρα διεξαγωγής του αγώνα που είναι την Κυριακή, 19 Απριλίου 2015 για να τα κάνουμε δωρεά στο Σύλλογο ‘’Η ΠΙΣΤΗ’’. Ωστόσο, η βοήθεια που σας ζητάμε δεν θα θέλαμε να προσδιοριστεί, να περιοριστεί, ή να σταματήσει μόνο εκεί. Κάθε είδους προσφορά, ακόμα και η απλή προώθηση των σκοπών του Συλλόγου θα ήταν για μας ένα μεγάλο Eυχαριστώ για τον τωρινό μας στόχο (για περισσότερες πληροφορίες για την τρόπο που μπορείτε να βοηθήσετε, παρακαλω, επισκεφτείτε την σελίδα www.pisti.gr  ή τηλεφωνήστε στο 210-7488961)

Ένα μεγάλο ευχαριστώ στον κ. Χρήστο Βλάχο, πρόεδρο του Συλλόγου ‘’Η Πίστη’’ που αγκάλιασε την προσπάθειά μας από την πρώτη στιγμή και ένα προσωπικό Ευχαριστώ και στον προπονητή μας, Χρήστο Τούλα, που μας μύησε και μας υπενθυμίζει κάθε φορά πόσο εύκολο είναι να ξεπερνάς τα όρια του εαυτού σου, όταν πραγματικά το θέλεις από καρδιάς...

Σας Ευχαριστούμε ΟΛΟΥΣ προκαταβολικά για τον χρόνο σας!!

Φιλικά,

Χριστίνα Στεφανίδου,

Αγγελική Τσιλιφίδου

Ελένη  Φαλτάκα 

                                             -------------------------------------------------

Dear all, 


This April we will be running our second Marathon (42klm) in Zurich Switzerland and we are more than overwhelmed for that. This time we are fundraising for a Greek,  non-profit, volunteers' organization established in 1993 in Zografou Athens, called ''I PISTI'' (Faith) providing help to poor children with cancer and their families. To find out more about '' I PISTI'', please visit www.pisti.gr  

Many thanks to Mr. Christos Vlahos, president of the NGO ''I PISTI'' for supporting our effort and of course to our beloved coach, Christos Toulas, for reminding us that it's not that hard to overcome your own self and your personal limits, if you really want to..

Thank you all in advance for your time and generosity!!


Kind Regards, 

Christina Stefanidou,

Aggeliki Tsilifidou,

Eleni Faltaka

σκοπό..
Αλλά, ας τα πάρουμε τα πράγματα από την αρχή! Είμαστε η Χριστίνα, η
Αγγελική και η Ελένη και πρόσφατο πάθος μας είναι οι αγώνες μεγάλων αποστάσεων.
Γνωριστήκαμε μεταξύ μας από την κοινή αγάπη μας για το τρέξιμο, το οποίο μας
ωθεί κάθε φορά να το μετουσιώνουμε σε κάτι καλό για όσους και όσα μας
πλαισιώνουν. 
Ενόψει της συμμετοχής μας στον Μαραθώνιο της Ζυρίχης (42 χλμ) στις 19
Απριλίου 2015 αποφασίσαμε να τρέξουμε για τον Σύλλογο γονέων και Κηδεμόνων Παιδιών με Νεοπλασματικές Παθήσεις  "Η ΠΙΣΤΗ" που ιδρύθηκε στου Ζωγράφου
Αττικής το 1993 και έχει ως σκοπό τη δημιουργία αξιοπρεπών, επαρκών, ασφαλών
και υψηλού επιπέδου συνθηκών νοσηλείας, που να εξασφαλίζουν ίσες πιθανότητες
ίασης με τις υπόλοιπες χώρες της Ευρωπαϊκής Ένωσης και των Η.Π.Α. στα παιδιά με
Νεοπλασματικές Παθήσεις, την υποβοήθηση του έργου των ιατρών και των
νοσηλευτριών και του λοιπού προσωπικού των Αιματολογικών – Ογκολογικών κλινικών
και της Μονάδας Μεταμόσχευσης Μυελού των Οστών, την προώθηση της ιατρικής
επιστήμης, σε θέματα νεοπλασιών (χορήγηση υποτροφιών, οργάνωση συνεδρίων κλπ),
την Ψυχική και οικονομική στήριξη των οικογενειών, με παιδί που πάσχει από
καρκίνο και τέλος την κάλυψη εξωνοσοκομειακών εξετάσεων όπως σπινθηρογραφήματα,
ακτινοθεραπείες, pet scan κ.α.
Σε αυτόν τον διπλό ‘’αγώνα’’
ζητάμε την δική σας συνδρομή για να καταφέρουμε να κάνουμε το χαμόγελο να
φωτίσει τα πρόσωπα όσο πιο πολλών παιδιών μπορούμε! Σκοπός μας είναι να
μαζέψουμε  700 ευρώ περίπου μέχρι την ημέρα
διεξαγωγής του αγώνα που είναι την Κυριακή, 19 Απριλίου 2015 για να τα κάνουμε
δωρεά στο Σύλλογο ‘’Η ΠΙΣΤΗ’’. Ωστόσο, η βοήθεια που σας ζητάμε δεν θα θέλαμε να προσδιοριστεί, να
περιοριστεί, ή να σταματήσει μόνο εκεί. Κάθε είδους προσφορά, ακόμα και η απλή
προώθηση των σκοπών του Συλλόγου θα ήταν για μας ένα μεγάλο Eυχαριστώ για τον τωρινό μας στόχο (για
περισσότερες πληροφορίες για την τρόπο που μπορείτε να βοηθήσετε, παρακαλω,
επισκεφτείτε την σελίδα www.pisti.gr  ή
τηλεφωνήστε στο 210-7488961) 
Ένα μεγάλο ευχαριστώ στον κ. Χρήστο Βλάχο, πρόεδρο του Συλλόγου ‘’Η Πίστη’’
που αγκάλιασε την προσπάθειά μας από την πρώτη στιγμή και ένα προσωπικό Ευχαριστώ
και στον προπονητή μας, Χρήστο Τούλα, που μας μύησε και μας υπενθυμίζει κάθε
φορά πόσο εύκολο είναι να ξεπερνάς τα όρια του εαυτού σου, όταν πραγματικά το
θέλεις από καρδιάς...
Σας Ευχαριστούμε ΟΛΟΥΣ προκαταβολικά για τον χρόνο σας!!
Φιλικά, 
Χριστίνα Στεφανίδου,
Αγγελική Τσιλιφίδου
Ελένη  Φαλτάκα                                              -------------------------------------------------Dear all, This April we will be running our second Marathon (42klm) in Zurich Switzerland and we are more than overwhelmed for that. This time we are fundraising for a Greek,  non-profit, volunteers' organization established in 1993 in Zografou Athens, called ''I PISTI'' (Faith) providing help to poor children with cancer and their families. To find out more about '' I PISTI'', please visit www.pisti.gr  Many thanks to Mr. Christos Vlahos, president of the NGO ''I PISTI'' for supporting our effort and of course to our beloved coach, Christos Toulas, for reminding us that it's not that hard to overcome your own self and your personal limits, if you really want to..Thank you all in advance for your time and generosity!!Kind Regards, Christina Stefanidou,Aggeliki Tsilifidou,Eleni Faltaka

story:
Did you know?

Women who do not receive quality prenatal care are 3 times more likely to have a low-weight baby; and their baby is 5 times more likely to die before its first birthday.


Does this apply to you or someone you know or care about?

Too many women/couples who do their best to have healthy pregnancies and babies have bad outcomes, including disability and death. 

Most of the time better quality health care/information, received in a timelier manner, can prevent a bad pregnancy or childbirth experience - such as pregnancy loss, premature birth, a low birth-weight baby or an overweight baby. However, many people don’t know how to assess the quality of care they are receiving or may have insufficient information/education available to them.


If provided with a chance, would you help turn the tables?

Would you help to prevent these bad health outcomes for our most vulnerable citizens?  Would you help reduce the risk of death and lifelong health challenges for babies and mothers? By supporting BPN you can.


BPN is a very unique organization.

We have been leading collaborative health service efforts, over the 27 years of our existence, to ensure better birth experiences and give babies a healthier start in life.


PLEASE GIVE a donation of any amount.

This will enable BPN to continue all the important work we do to help women and families get access to the healthcare and information they need, and ensure the survival of babies.  The impact of our work will allow us to:

●  Implement a Perinatal Health Information Technology (PHIT) system called e-health link, to ensure fast and secure communication of critical patient information across service providers, and timely updates to health records.

●  Ensure significant improvements in the quality of care delivered to high risk women

●  Provide innovative screening tools to help identify health risks at earlier stages in care

●  Develop better systems of coordinated care for families and more timely referrals for care


We hope that you are just as excited about this project as we are and will send us your donations and encourage your friends, family, co-workers and others to also donate.

For More Information please visit Brooklyn Perinatal Network’s website www.bpnetwork.org

 







  • .

story:
What Is PTSD?

Post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) is a mental health condition that's triggered by a terrifying event — either experiencing it or witnessing it. Symptoms may include flashbacks, nightmares and severe anxiety, as well as uncontrollable thoughts about the event.

Getting effective treatment after PTSD symptoms develop can be critical to reduce symptoms and improve function.


PTSD Statistics

  • One in Five Veterans are diagnosed with PTSD.  That is 300,000 veterans.
  • One veteran a day will take his life because of PTSD.
  • Veterans account for 20% of all suicides.
  •  $85.9 Million has been spent on treating PTSD...with very little success.
  • 5.2 Million people have some sort of PTSD in any given year.
  •  About 6 of every 10 (or 60%) of men and 5 of every 10 (or 50%) of women experience at least one trauma in their lives. Women are more likely to experience sexual assault and child sexual abuse. Men are more likely to experience accidents, physical assault, combat, disaster, or to witness death or injury.
  • About 7 or 8 out of every 100 people (or 7-8% of the population) will have PTSD at some point in their lives.

What Is Floating?

The great people over at the float house (http://floathouse.ca/) put together a video that explains it all.


How Does Floating Help PTSD

At puREST we are working with local doctors and scientist studying the effects of floating and to find out why there is such a high success rate for people with anxiety and stress related issues. 

What we do know is that during a float session external stimuli is restricted from your brain. Floating slows down the parts of the brain associated with day to day stimulating activity giving it a much needed rest.  It has also been proven to greatly decrease the production of cortisol and adrenalin which are your body’s natural stress hormones.  This creates a unique stress free relaxing environment.  The great thing is that it doesn’t end there.  The extreme relaxation created by floating can carry on for days after the float.  This is extremely helpful for hypervigilance which is a symptom of PTSD.  Another great benefit is that in a float room, you are in a zero gravity environment.  This gives your body a much needed break from the relentless stress of gravity. 


About puREST and Our Goals

At puREST our goal is simple.  We want to research and promote the endless benefits of floating.  While floating is greatly beneficial to everyone, what really grabbed our attention is the amazing stories we have found where floating helped people in ways no other medication or therapy could.  A quick google search will yield massive amounts of testimonials on how floating helped.

Two of our co-founders are veterans and one is active duty.  They see first hand on a daily basis what PTSD can do.  We plan to leverage these kind s of resources to bring relief where it is needed the most.

We are designing our facility to accommodate people with stress and anxiety disorder.  This puts a greater financial burden on the startup cost.  We understand that people with stress and anxiety disorders often don’t feel comfortable in new places.  And the traditional tank/pod float configuration could greatly detour people from ever even setting foot into a float.  Our efforts so far have been funded by the founders alone and we are asking for you to please help the cause.  Please help spread the word and donate if you can.  Together we can make a difference!

We have signed a lease and are ready for construction in Trumbull, CT

At puREST we will be working with physicians and scientists across the nation to get Floatation Therapy recognized and covered by insurance.  However, until then we have created a plan to allow PTSD patients to float free of charge in our float center.  Our float a hero program will allow us to keep giving this much needed relief to people that need it the most.  We will also be donating to other organizations such as the LIBR (http://www.laureateinstitute.org/justin-feinstein.html) and Hope For Heroes (http://heroeshope.org/) that continually push forward the research of PTSD and are dedicated to providing relief for everyone who suffers from PTSD.

 


Testimonials

Zero Gravity (http://www.zerogravityinstitute.com/)

Float Diary of a Veteran at Float Boston (http://www.floatboston.com)

“I remained happy, and carried with me the positive feeling into the next two days. It was almost a ‘celebratory’ feeling. One that has not been produced by any other medications, therapies, or methods of dealing with the individual diagnoses I live with. I didn’t feel the need for the anti-anxiety medications for nearly two days. Which, in my current state, almost never happens.” —Andrew

[After my third float] I felt calm and happy, an experience I can’t remember having in a long time. So much so that I was unfamiliar with it, and didn’t know what to do with the positive happy feeling. I know how to take care of myself in the dark troubling times, but over the last few years, have lost the innate knowledge of how to feel happy, and what to do with that time.

Full Diary at http://www.floatboston.com/a-story-of-anxiety-and-ptsd/#more-689

How You Can Help

If you can donate, it is much appreciated  Please share on social media and get the word out.  It will benefit not only PTSD sufferers in the future, but the chances of you helping someone that that needs immediate help is greater if we just get the word out.  Thank You!

story:
Our Mission

At I AM ME we have set out to individualize health. Every person is unique. Therefore, their nutrition and fitness plan should reflect their custom needs to live a healthy lifestyle. We focus on your current state and will create a specialized plan to get you to your goal in a healthy manner. 

www.iammeapp.com


Our Needs = Your Rewards

The Plan:

With the received funding we will allocate portions to build the website, an iOS app, and an Android app. There will be a user database which will allow users to track their progress, obtain customized suggestions to meet their requirements, and have the ability to form teams. Users can specify any dietary restrictions (gluten free, vegan, vegetarian, lactose intolerant, paleo, etc.), bodily injuries, and available equipment. I AM ME will only provide suggestions that meet your custom needs.


Here's a preview of the mobile app layout for iOS and Android.


How it Works

After subscribing you will be asked 17 questions including: age, height, weight, gender, body style, body type, bodily injuries, food allergies, dietary restrictions, available equipment, etc. Once we have a grasp of where you currently stand and where you are attempting to get we can put together a plan that encompasses all aspects of your new healthy lifestyle. 

Every day you will receive three suggestions for each meal that meet your caloric requirements to help get you to your goal. By allowing you to choose a meal from these suggestions we are leaving the final decisions up to you. This way you are more likely to stay on track as every meal will be something you personally picked. For those who want to prepare meals ahead of time, or even avoid daily shopping, you can choose your meals days in advance to create a customized shopping list. For each day that you are working out you will receive multiple suggestions about which activities you should be doing in order to meet your goal. These suggestions come with pictures and descriptions of how to do each exercise. You will even be provided with the number of reps and sets for each workout. 

Since no person is perfect you may have some off days. Don't feel bad. After each week the software will consider your current weight and recalculate your entire plan. By constantly checking in each week we can assess your gains and losses and reconfigure to keep you on track. 


How It's Different:

  1. Individualized - Every users output data will be 100% unique. No person is the same and your health plan will be just as individual as you are. The plan continues to grow with you as you continuously update and track your personal progress. 
  2. Fully Encompassing - Some programs focus on nutrition while others focus on fitness. I AM ME encompasses all aspects of a healthy lifestyle.
  3. Suggestions NOT Restrictions - By allowing our software to only make suggestions we aren't restricting, or even telling you what to do. You're creating your own custom suggestions through advanced software  that are healthy and meet your pre-described requirements.
  4. Only What Your Capable Of  - I AM ME only makes fitness suggestions based on the equipment that you have available to you. If you have any bodily injuries they will be noted and avoided during your suggested workouts. Why create a plan that you can't even achieve, or worse, may cause harm?
  5. Dynamic - I AM ME is constantly changing. As your body changes week after week I AM ME will dynamically change your output suggestions to meet your changing needs. If you are not succeeding it will re-configure itself to provide more, or less, nutrition and fitness to get you back on track. Once you hit your goal I AM ME will re-formulate to allow you to maintain your new healthy lifestyle.
  6. Customized Shopping Lists - By choosing your weekly meals ahead of time I AM ME can create a custom shopping list to meet your specified nutrition plan for the week. Being able to plan ahead gives you the ability to prepare for success. 
  7. Support - With a growing online forum I AM ME will provide the space for users to guide one another to stay on track and cheer each other on. If you have questions about health we are here to provide feedback, answers, and case studies.

AS SEEN ON....



The Risks & Challenges of Development

Understanding ALL the required steps to make something happen are essential to any successful business. We have laid out our timeline to show you both the cost and time associated with each stage in the process.





Why I AM ME Matters

Life Changing:

When health becomes incorporated into your daily life the changes will be incredibly uplifting. You may begin to show signs of increased energy, more youthful skin, ease of pain, the removal of the need for medication, lower blood pressure, higher self-esteem, the desire to help others, and a deeper love for yourself. 

Once humans are in their healthiest state of being they have the ability to accomplish anything. Tasks will seem easier and soon others will want to follow your example. Changes that affect the world are started at an individual level.


Beyond the Services

We need your help and therefore we want to make sure you are rewarded greatly. By providing you with awesome rewards that come along with the I AM ME services, we hope that you will be motivated to continue with your healthy new lifestyle. 

CHECK OUT OUR AWESOME PERKS!!!!


If we surpass our goal of $20,000 we want to make sure there are extra perks for everyone. Providing the ease of a healthy lifestyle to everyone is our goal.



In the meantime we are providing you a free online calculator that can provide you all the guiding information for you to create a nutrition and fitness plan on your own. 

I AM ME Free Online Calculator

Start by answering a few basic questions. Then the free calculator will advise on the length of time to meet your goal. It will also give you a snap shot of your current body status by showing you your body fat percentage and body mass index. For each meal you will be provided the gram weights for your macronutrients to get you to your total daily caloric intake target. 

For fitness you are provided with the number of cardio and strength workouts that you should be doing each day you workout, along with the length of time. By providing you with a target and maximum heart rate we also want you to know the level of intensity you should be shooting for. 

                                           



More Ways to Support I AM ME

If living a healthy lifestyle is important to you then we simply ask to join us on our mission and let others know what we are trying to do. If there is anyone in your life that can benefit from a healthier lifestyle then please spread the word and tell them about I AM ME.

At the very least we hope that you check out our free online calculator which allows you to create your own custom health plan. We will provide the guidelines and you can develop your own nutrition and fitness plan.


http://www.iammeapp.com/calculator/


Meet the Team

                                             

Eric Butler: Visionary

Eric spent over a decade working in the electronics manufacturing industry handling project development and management. He has a background in design which has been utilized to bring simplicity and ease to I AM ME. As an artist, gardener, yogi, and overall nature enthusiast, Eric brings a sense of well being and care to all of his projects. 


                                                

Jesse Smith: Health Correspondent

Jesse has been heavily involved in the health and fitness world since age 15. He has a deep understanding and knowledge about the human body and how to reverse engineer dis-ease. With this information the I AM ME software has been developed to meet the requirements of each individual. It is Jesse’s vision and intent to provide the public with the greatest of ease in their journey to health.



                                            

Chris Pieri: Marketing

Chris has been an actor and musician for most of his life. He has years of training in speech, public speaking and teleconferencing in the tech world. These skills have given him the ability to communicate with others and develop strong connections. He is focused on a healthy lifestyle which comes before all else. When asked to be a part of the I AM ME team he took the challenge as a sign to not only promote an amazing application guided towards structuring a healthy and active lifestyle, but to bring awareness to the simplicity of what we are trying to do. He has a fondness for nature and believes in the human experience as a collective.

If you are not succeeding it will re-configure itself to provide more, or less, nutrition and fitness to get you back on track. Once you hit your goal I AM ME will re-formulate to allow you to maintain your new healthy lifestyle.

Customized Shopping Lists - By choosing your weekly meals ahead of time I AM ME can create a custom shopping list to meet your specified nutrition plan for the week. Being able to plan ahead gives you the ability to prepare for success. 

Support - With a growing online forum I AM ME will provide the space for users to guide one another to stay on track and cheer each other on. If you have questions about health we are here to provide feedback, answers, and case studies.
AS SEEN ON....



The Risks & Challenges of Development
Understanding ALL the required steps to make something happen are essential to any successful business. We have laid out our timeline to show you both the cost and time associated with each stage in the process.





Why I AM ME MattersLife Changing:When health becomes incorporated into your daily life the changes will be incredibly uplifting. You may begin to show signs of increased energy, more youthful skin, ease of pain, the removal of the need for medication, lower blood pressure, higher self-esteem, the desire to help others, and a deeper love for yourself. Once humans are in their healthiest state of being they have the ability to accomplish anything. Tasks will seem easier and soon others will want to follow your example. Changes that affect the world are started at an individual level.
Beyond the ServicesWe need your help and therefore we want to make sure you are rewarded greatly. By providing you with awesome rewards that come along with the I AM ME services, we hope that you will be motivated to continue with your healthy new lifestyle. CHECK OUT OUR AWESOME PERKS!!!!If we surpass our goal of $20,000 we want to make sure there are extra perks for everyone. Providing the ease of a healthy lifestyle to everyone is our goal.In the meantime we are providing you a free online calculator that can provide you all the guiding information for you to create a nutrition and fitness plan on your own. I AM ME Free Online CalculatorStart by answering a few basic questions. Then the free calculator will advise on the length of time to meet your goal. It will also give you a snap shot of your current body status by showing you your body fat percentage and body mass index. For each meal you will be provided the gram weights for your macronutrients to get you to your total daily caloric intake target. For fitness you are provided with the number of cardio and strength workouts that you should be doing each day you workout, along with the length of time. By providing you with a target and maximum heart rate we also want you to know the level of intensity you should be shooting for.                                            




    More Ways to Support I AM ME If living a healthy lifestyle is important to you then we simply ask to join us on our mission and let others know what we are trying to do. If there is anyone in your life that can benefit from a healthier lifestyle then please spread the word and tell them about I AM ME.
At the very least we hope that you check out our free online calculator which allows you to create your own custom health plan. We will provide the guidelines and you can develop your own nutrition and fitness plan.

http://www.iammeapp.com/calculator/


Meet the Team
                                             
Eric Butler: Visionary
Eric spent over a decade working in the electronics manufacturing industry handling project development and management. He has a background in design which has been utilized to bring simplicity and ease to I AM ME. As an artist, gardener, yogi, and overall nature enthusiast, Eric brings a sense of well being and care to all of his projects. 

                                                
Jesse Smith: Health Correspondent
Jesse has been heavily involved in the health and fitness world since age 15. He has a deep understanding and knowledge about the human body and how to reverse engineer dis-ease. With this information the I AM ME software has been developed to meet the requirements of each individual. It is Jesse’s vision and intent to provide the public with the greatest of ease in their journey to health.


                                            
Chris Pieri: MarketingChris has been an actor and musician for most of his life. He has years of training in speech, public speaking and teleconferencing in the tech world. These skills have given him the ability to communicate with others and develop strong connections. He is focused on a healthy lifestyle which comes before all else. When asked to be a part of the I AM ME team he took the challenge as a sign to not only promote an amazing application guided towards structuring a healthy and active lifestyle, but to bring awareness to the simplicity of what we are trying to do. He has a fondness for nature and believes in the human experience as a collective.

story:
Children do NOT deserve to suffer such a pain...

Our little Angel Liya is just a 9-months old pearl from Kazakhstan. She was born to a shimmering spring and we will help her to see many of those! On 8th of February, 2015 she has been diagnosed "Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia" (blood cancer). Her family was in rush to find the best way to get her a cure! Our aim is to reunite those who wants Her to grow older, go to school, make her own family and raise healthy children to a brighter future... Fighting for Life at Hospitals are not for babies... Can we just help her out?

Instagram: @help_lia

Russian: 

Наш маленький ангелочек Лия нуждается в помощи! Ей всего лишь 9 месяцев, но она уже вынуждена сражаться за свою жизнь. 8 февраля 2015 года ей поставили страшный диагноз: Острый Лимфобластный Лейкоз (рак крови). Было принято решение срочно госпитализировать ребенка в одну из лучшик клиник в Азии. Наши молитвы обращены к вам, помогите нашей маленькой принцессе вырости здоровым и счастливым ребенком, пойти в школу, создать собственную семью... Пожалуйста помогите Лие!

Turkish:
Küçük meleğimiz Liya henüz 9 aylık ve Kazakistan'da yaşıyor. Mutlu ve parlak bir bahar ayında doğan Liya'ya daha nice 9 aylar görmesi için yardım ediyoruz. Liya'ya 8 Şubat 2015'te Lösemi (kan kanseri) teşhisi kondu ve şuanda Güney Kore'de tedavisine devam ediliyor. Ailesi en iyi tedaviyi en hızlı ve etkili bir şekilde sağlayabilmek için var gücü ile çabalarken bizler de Annesi Yana Tregubova'nın arkadaşları olarak aileye yardım ediyoruz. Liya'nın sağlığına kavuşması, tekrar hayata tutunması ve ilerde okullara gidip sağlıklı bir aileye ve çocuklara sahip olması için elimizden geleni yapmaktayız. Hastaneler ve bu hastalıklar çocukların kaldırabileceklerinden çok daha ağır... Bir el de biz uzatalım!


What We Need

Liya is currently in Severance Hospital, Seoul, South Korea, with her mum, Yana Tregubova (Kaminitskaya). She will get the best treatment ever possible by one of the best Pediatric Oncologist in Asia.  30 000 USD is already been spent for her initial diagnosis at the International Health Care Center, Severance Hospital, South Korea. Liya will receive chemotherapy for the next 6 months and will get a bone marrow transplantation, which will take another 6 months of treatment or even more, depending on the results of the bone marrow biopsy. Her father Evgeny Tregubov is in charge of any financial responsibilities;

We need to raise 125 000 USD to start her treatment procedures.

The cost of the treatment is estimated to be around 270 000 USD, excluding tests, hospital accommodation and donor material, and additional fee may be added during the treatment. For more information about the treatment plan, costs and medical certificates please follow us on Instagram: @help_lia

Russian:

В настоящее время Лия находится в клинике Северанс в Сеуле, Южная Корея, со своей мамой Трегубовой (Каминицкой) Яной. Это одна из лучших клиник по лечению детского лейкоза в Азии. Родители уже оплатили свыше $30 000 за диагностикую Врачи составили план лечения: 6 химиотерапии, пересадка костного мозга и еще 6 месяцев лечения-реабилитации. На данном сайте мы пытаемся собрать сумму в $125 000 на первоначальное лечение, однако общая сумма лечения выйдет порядка $270 000, без оплаты анализов, пребывание в госпитале и донорский материал. Лие предстоит пройти 6 курсом химиотерапии, $15 000 за курс, и пересадку костного мозга - $150 000. На дальнейшее лечение и реабилитацию может понадобиться больше денег. 

Turkish:

Liya şuan itibari ile Güney Kore'de bulunan Severance Hastanesinde çocuk onkolojisi kliniğinde tedavi görüyor. Sadece hastalığının tanısı için harcanan miktar 30.000 Amerikan Doları. Önümüzdeki 6 ay boyunca kemoterapi görecek olan Liya'ya uygun kemik iliği bulunduğu takdirde kemik iliği nakli operasyonu gerçekleştirilecek ve sonrasında bir 6 ay daha tedavisine devam edilecek. Baba Evgeny Tregubov ailenin bu etkinlikten elde edeceği paradan sorumlu olacak.

Bu etkinlikteki hedefimiz 125.000USD ...

TEdavinin toplam masrafları tahmini olarak 270.000USD tutacak. Bizim amacımız ise en fazla bu miktarın yarısı kadarını elde edebilmek. 


The Impact

Our prayers are for Liya's healthy days and we hope the treatment will be success at the end, as soon as possible! Then the excess money we collected will directly be used for Pediatric Hematology & Oncology Services in Kazakhstan. Liya will grow older and grow strong to help others to get better to those who suffer the same conditions...
Russian:
Мы молимся за здоровье Лии, чтобы поскорее приблизить те дни когда она снова будет здорова и радоваться жизни. Мы верим что наша девочка выростит здорой и крепкой и будет помогать в будущем всем нуждающимся с такой же проблемой. 
Turkish:
Dualarımız Liya ve ailesiyle birlikte. Biz Liya'nın bu tedaviden sağ salim ve tekrar eskisi kadar sağlıklı olarak çıkacağına inanıyoruz. Tedavis süresince harcanan miktar elde ettiğimiz miktardan az olur ve bir ihtimal toplanan parada herhangi bir fazlalık olursa para taahhüt edilen şekilde Kazakistan'da bir çocuk onkolojisi servisine yönlendirilecek. En azından bu hastalığa yakalanan başkalarına bir ışık olabilmek umudu ile.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this with your friends and people you know! We appreciate any help for  little princess Liya!

Thank you in advance for your generosity!

PayPal account: help.liya9@gmail.com

Instagram: @help_lia

Russian:

Пожалуйста поделитесь этой информацией и ссылкой со всеми людьми которых вы знаете! Даже самая маленькая сумма пожертвования внесет огромный вклад в выздоровление нашей принцессы!

Вы также можете переводить деньги через PayPal: help.liya@gmail.com

Instagram: @help_lia - здесь вы можете получить подробную информацию о диагнозе (справки и отчеты)

Спасибо вам огромное! Храни бог вас и ваши семьи!

Turkish:

Sizden beklediğimiz bizlere katkıda bulunarak yardımcı olmanız. Yardımlarınız gerek bütçeye mali olarak destek olarak, gerekse bu etkinliği yakınlarınızla paylaşarak farkındalık oluşturarak olabilir. Göstermiş olduğunuz cömert katkılarınız için şimdiden sizlere teşekkür ederiz...



Open Letter From Liya

From the very first day of my birth, I am happy with every moment of my life! I met my mom and dad and found that I have grandparents! Every day for me is an incredible discovery and adventure! In the world there are so many unknown and interesting things for me! Can you imagine how many discoveries have I made in this 9 months and how many interesting things are waiting for me in my life! But unfortunately,  I have recently been diagnosed with – leukemia … If you are familiar with this term, it is “blood cancer”...

Me and my parents we need your help! Thanks to the kind people, we have already raised $ 30,000 for a trip to South Korea for the final examination and confirmation of the diagnosis … and unfortunately the diagnosis was confirmed! Now we will have a tough and very expensive treatment! Only at the first stage, we need at least 250,000$... That might not be the last! Further treatments might require more money!..

All I ask is to respond kind people to help me, I know that each of you is a very kind and generous person! And I really need your help!

I love my life just as much as anyone does... And I want to know the whole world!

Kind regards,
Liya


Turkish(Liya's open letter):

Doğduğum ilk günden beri hayatımın her anından büyük keyif aldım. Annem ve babamla tanıştım ve ailemin diğer büyükleri ile de... Hayatımın her günü bir macera gibi yeni şeyler, yeni yerler keşfetmekle geçti! Bilmediğim ve öğrenmek için sabırsız olduğum o kadar şey var ki... Bu 9 ay boyunca yaptığım seyahatleri ve gördüklerime inanamazsınız! Ancak ne yazık ki kısa zaman önce ailem Lösemi olduğumu öğrendi. Bu deyim "Kan Kanseri" demekmiş...
Ben ve ailemin size ihtiyacı var! Bu güne kadar sizler sayesinde 30.000$ biriktirerek tedavime başlanması sağlandı. Teşhis Güney Kore'de ki bir hastane tarafından da doğrulandı! Şimdi ise sırada zor ve pahalı bir tedavi süreci beni bekliyor. Tedavimin toplam 250.000$ tutabileceği söylenmiş.
Ben de hayatımı en az sizler kadar seviyorum. Daha görülecek çok şey, gezilecek çok yer olduğunu biliyorum ve sizlerin de bu günlerimde yanımda olarak geleceğimin elimden kayıp gitmesine engel olacağınıza inanıyorum...
Sevgilerle,
Liya

story:
Il tè come lo conoscono (quasi) tutti:

-  far bollire l'acqua

-  buttare dentro la bustina a prescindere dalla quantitá di acqua

-  assaggi il tè

-  il tè é troppo caldo

-  lasci raffreddare il tè

-  dimentichi il tè

e qui inizia la mia storia.....perché, credeteci o meno, ci sono almeno 5 errori nella storiella qui sopra (per intenderci non sono tutti nell'ultimo punto).

Io sono sempre stato un appassionato di tè ma l'atmosfera di "snobbismo" che si trova nei negozi specializzati mi ha sempre dato fastidio.

Da qui nasce l'idea di Tè Mat....una rivendita di tè moderna dove tutti si possono sentire a proprio agio con prodotti a base di té e, sopratutto, tè di altissima qualità ma con prezzi abbordabili per tutti.

Conti alla mano, al prezzo di una bustina di un tè da supermercato, puoi gustarti degli "infusi" davvero speciali.

L'idea di Tè Mat é un negozio carino, accogliente, amico dell'ambiente (tante attrezzature sono reciclate da oggetti inutilizzati – scrivania – vetrina – banco espositivo). Tutti questi accorgimenti saranno utilizzati per trasferire sui clienti irrisori costi di allestimento.

Detto questo, comunque, ci sono stati dei costi di start-up al supporto dei queli é finalizzata la mia campagna. In una campagna come questa ogni aiuto serve.....se la campagna non raggiungerá l'obbiettivo, mi avrete comunque aiutato a cominciare l'attivitá e se la campagna supererà il suo obiettivo, mi permetterá di arricchire l'inventario di prodotti particolari e ricercati.

La campagna é fializzata a rientro delle spese di start-up (se raggiungo l'obiettivo) ma soprattutto puoi aiutarmi per ampliare il "servizio al cliente" con corsi gratuiti di degustazione e una piú ampia  varietá e tipologia degli articoli al fine di accontentare quanti piú gusti possibili.

Altri modi  come potete aiutarmi é divulgare a vostri contatti FB la mia pagina di Té Mat che riporterá il link a questa pagina.
story_txt:
Il tè come lo conoscono
(quasi) tutti:
- 
far bollire l'acqua 
- 
buttare dentro la bustina a prescindere dalla quantitá di acqua
- 
assaggi il tè
- 
il tè é troppo caldo
- 
lasci raffreddare il tè
- 
dimentichi il tè
e qui inizia la mia
storia.....perché, credeteci o meno, ci sono almeno 5 errori nella storiella
qui sopra (per intenderci non sono tutti nell'ultimo punto).
Io sono sempre stato un
appassionato di tè ma l'atmosfera di "snobbismo" che si trova nei
negozi specializzati mi ha sempre dato fastidio.
Da qui nasce l'idea di Tè
Mat....una rivendita di tè moderna dove tutti si possono sentire a proprio agio
con prodotti a base di té e, sopratutto, tè di altissima qualità ma con prezzi
abbordabili per tutti.
Conti alla mano, al prezzo di
una bustina di un tè da supermercato, puoi gustarti degli "infusi"
davvero speciali. 
L'idea di
Tè Mat é un negozio carino, accogliente, amico dell'ambiente (tante
attrezzature sono reciclate da oggetti inutilizzati – scrivania – vetrina –
banco espositivo). Tutti questi accorgimenti saranno utilizzati per trasferire
sui clienti irrisori costi di allestimento.
Detto
questo, comunque, ci sono stati dei costi di start-up al supporto dei queli é
finalizzata la mia campagna. In una campagna come questa ogni aiuto
serve.....se la campagna non raggiungerá l'obbiettivo, mi avrete comunque
aiutato a cominciare l'attivitá e se la campagna supererà il suo obiettivo, mi
permetterá di arricchire l'inventario di prodotti particolari e ricercati.
La
campagna é fializzata a rientro delle spese di start-up (se raggiungo
l'obiettivo) ma soprattutto puoi aiutarmi per ampliare il "servizio al cliente" con corsi gratuiti di degustazione e una piú ampia  varietá e tipologia
degli articoli al fine di accontentare quanti piú gusti possibili. 

Altri modi  come potete aiutarmi é
divulgare a vostri contatti FB la mia pagina di Té Mat che riporterá il link a
questa pagina.

story:
Help us:
1.Fund the creation of a tool to put the power of personalized expert cruise information in the palm of your hand.
2.Get 1000 users who will be our founding beta testing team.


Our Story:

My wife and I spent the last 4 years working on cruise ships as Future Cruise Consultants. Over our combined 12 years working in the cruise industry, we noticed that there was a huge disparity between websites, community message boards and other “expert” cruise information resources. Currently you have to spend hours searching between 5-8 websites to get information on travel.  This includes flights, hotels and booking your cruise. There are great sources of information, but you have to go through so many different reviews, travel blogs, forum posts and top 10 articles to get the information that matters to the reader.  The overwhelming amount of information leads people to give up and just go with the flow.  This often results in lost opportunities, financial losses and added stress during a much needed vacation.    We vowed we would do what we could to help as many people get targeted expert information quickly and painlessly.  


Introducing Cruise Collective:

We're not travel agents trying to sell you a cruise. Our core focus is connecting people to answers.   It’s about making sure our users have access to the personalized information they need to make the right decisions when planning their cruise so it’s a success. 

We want to create the world’s best cruise knowledge base that provides expert cruise information in concise, bite-sized chunks that is tailored to the user through a smartphone app.

The core features will be the fast personalized search results accessible anytime on a mobile phone and the ability to push questions to a community of experienced cruise experts who have been on cruises and best matches their profile.  Our community of experts will understand how answering a simple question in real time will make a huge impact in someone’s busy life. Users will have the ability to add pushed answers into the knowledge base so that quality information may be accessible to others.

Ask or Push from the start            Answers with Related Questions


New community members set up a profile and tell us their cruise experience and goals. This step is critical, as it will create the foundation for our profile filter that is based on our years of consulting with thousands of guests.  Taking time up front to ask the right questions saves so much time later on when trying to provide personalized answers that make an impact.  Our knowledge base will be created from the start using the most advanced search technology and designed to learn as it grows, nearly able to guess which question you’ll ask before you finish typing it out.  

New community members who have never taken a cruise will get a list of suggested answers to read that best matches their travel style and goals.  It will be similar to a 'getting started' guide, but as if it were written specifically for them.   This will get them up to speed quickly on the items that matter most to them. 

Pushed Questions                                See what's Trending

Based on their confirmed cruise experience, new users may immediately become experts that can start answering pushed questions. Questions will be based on many filter tags including cruise lines, ships, ports, restaurants, entertainment, shore excursions, activities for children  and much more.  Based on these tags, experts will only have relevant questions pushed their way.  We value their time as well and don't want to bombard them with questions. 


Impact:

We want to build a community that puts importance on the value of another member’s time, are excited about cruising and helping others by providing their knowledge and guidance. By getting expert, focused and personalize information, community members will spend less time researching and make better decisions. By focussing on mobile devices, we allow our members to access this information whenever they have a spare moment in their busy lives, making the most of every minute. 

   

What We Need & What You Get (See Pictures of Perks at the end):

We have a team of technology developers and engineers that have worked in the financial services, mobile and  big data sectors for over 20 years (combined). They will work with us if we get the minimum amount of funding and beta users.  They understand that for this project to truly succeed, a community of active beta users is critical. The base target is just for core functionality, and the more we raise, the more user feedback generated features will be added and tested.

We will use 75% of the funds to set up the foundations for the knowledge base and the search function which is key. 20% will go to the development of the app itself, and the other 5% will go to general expenses like contracts, cloud storage, etc. We plan on using proven open source technology as much as we can. We plan on creating an IOS app first but if the funding it high enough, may be able to develop an additional Android App.   

Below is our breakdown of our funding goals:

●  $15000 – Core Knowledge Base, Search, Push Functionality and user account creation for up to 1000 beta users.

●  $20 000 – Moderate

Expanded Knowledge Base, Improved Search, Push Functionality, User Account Creation with profile (Facebook, Google+) 

●  $25000 – Stretch Goal

Expanded Knowledge Base including photos, Improved Search, Push Functionality, Ability to upvote a pushed answer, User Account including photos linked to account.

●  $50 000  -- Ultimate Stretch Goal

Stacked Knowledge Base, Fast Search, Smarter Push Functionality, Filtering of answers based on user profile settings and lots of bug fixes.

Our Background:

I (Neil) worked in software for 5 years, then moved to mobile technology, sales and hospitality. I was a workaholic and I missed out on a lot of important events as a result.  After losing my mother to breast cancer, I decided to take a year off to travel as I had to regroup and rethink things. On a whim, I took a job working on cruise ships, and ended up doing that for another 8 years. 

My wife Natalia, a former lawyer with a degree in economics, hails from St. Petersburg, Russia. We met by chance during a vacation in Indonesia. We both have a passion for travel and I convinced her to join me working as a Future Cruise Consultant and travel the world, which we did for 4 years (and have been to over 40 countries together).  Sometimes I think our story is better than most movies we’ve watched lately.   

This project will allow us to work on something that we both believe will make a positive impact on the lives of thousands, and hopefully millions of people.  We believe travel is important for the body, mind and soul, and more people should go out and explore this amazing world.

Sand Dunes in Peru


Other Ways You Can Help:

If you can’t donate at this time, there are still ways to help! Please share our project on social media, through email, and word of mouth. Let people know you like our idea and want to support our project!

Thank you in advance!


P.S.

"Perhaps travel cannot prevent bigotry, but by demonstrating that all peoples cry, laugh, eat, worry, and die, it can introduce the idea that if we try and understand each other, we may even become friends."

Maya Angelou

We believe this quote represents cruise travel at its core since we have seen so many people from all over the world create new friendships while taking their cruise.


The perks 

Founder Member Perk (No Brainer)


Country Ambassador Perk

                                

Cruise Ship Ambassador Perk   

                             

Cruise Line Ambassador Perk   

                       Short Summary

story:
As a single mother of three children, ages 11, 15, and 18, I am their sole provider. I have received ZERO child support in 18 years and I have always managed to take care of my children on my own. I don't like to ask for help. As a matter of fact, I really don't have anyone to ask. By single, I mean I have no husband, parents, grandparents, siblings, and very few friends, that I could ask to help me. I was recently admitted to the hospital and the reality is, no one came.

I have devoted all of my time and energy to my children, leaving little time to cultivate the relationships and bonds that are required to sustain friendships and now I am in a serious situation that I cannot handle by myself.

Over the past two years I have been experiencing a series of medical problems that has me slowly declining in health. Although I have severe pain and cannot even get out of bed some days, I have, by the grace of God, managed to hang on to my house, my car, and keep the utilities on, but it is all slipping away quickly since I had to be admitted through the ER for emergency surgery to remove my gallbladder.

I was already anticipating to have two more surgeries over the next 3 months and I don't know how I will be able to keep the roof over my children's heads and pay the monthly expenses for my family while I recover. If I don't have the procedures done, I will spend half of my time in too much pain to be productive and the other half killing myself further just trying to catch up.

The fact is, if I do, maybe I can finally get back to having a real life and be able to play with my kids again, run again, LIVE and enjoy life again. I really need to do that. My kids don't have a 35 year old mother anymore and I want nothing more than to be able to actively participate in their lives again.

My family would greatly appreciate your help to cover our monthly expenses so that I can have this done and recover and get back to work, and life. We don't own our home, we rent. I don't drive a fancy car, it's a 5 year old Nissan. I struggle through school clothes, and Christmas, and birthdays every year and I'm okay with that. But I really, REALLY, don't want my children to experience losing our home because their mother is ill. Especially when we have nowhere to go. I'm all they have and they think I'm Superwoman. This Superwoman needs some help this time. Thank you and God Bless you!

story: • ABOUT TIFFANY, a courageous Curves of Color woman, always finding a way to stay positive and help make others better through her challenges. Tiffany was diagnosed with type 1 diabetes (1), requiring daily dose of insulin since 1990, and with Hashimoto's disease (2). She also had thyroid cancer (3), yet was able to fight that with chemo. And if that was not enough, she also had a miscarriage when she was seven months pregnant. The only thing that kept her going is HOPE. Hope to find a cure for type 1 diabetes that literally affects millions. A few days ago, her diabetes was determined to take her life again, finding out that she was dying of organ failure. A poison had entered into her blood stream, called sepsis, along with a buildup of a dangerous amount of potassium. This has caused her kidney failure. When your kidneys fail, they can’t perform their job of removing extra potassium from the body. So she is in need of a kidney donor. Currently she is being hospitalized. Doctors are doing a lot of testing, blood work, biopsies and closely determining what caused the kidney failure. She is at a stage 5 (4) and getting iron injections and had her first-ever dialysis treatment. It causes her to feel horribly sick and weak. Her kidneys for now are stable at 28%, yet it’s still the same struggle everyday to just feel “normal”. It is her hope that she is blessed with a new kidney sooner than later and the gift at living a life that doesn’t consist of being sick all the time. Your donation will allow her to do dialysis from home. She just became a nurse after years of studying and is looking forward to living her dream of helping others. Her insurance however does not cover everything. The cost of a year’s worth of treatments is about $38,000, with an upfront co-pay of $4,437. After just starting her job at the hospital and an unpaid internship two weeks, she does not have the money to cover the co-pay…causing stress her body cannot afford. Thank you for your donations in advance, sharing this opportunity and showing your support for a woman that makes positive difference for us all. https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/help-us-help... WHAT IS IT? (1) Type 1 Diabetes http://www.diabetes.org/diabetes-basics/type-1/ (2) Hashimoto's Disease http://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/h... (3) Thyroid Cancer http://www.webmd.com/cancer/tc/thyroid-cancer-t... (4) Stage 5 Kidney Failure http://www.davita.com/kidney-disease/overview/s...

ABOUT TIFFANY, a courageous Curves of Color woman, always finding a way to stay positive and help make others better through her challenges. 

Tiffany was diagnosed with type 1 diabetes (1), requiring daily dose of insulin since 1990, and with Hashimoto's disease (2). She also had thyroid cancer (3), yet was able to fight that with chemo. And if that was not enough, she also had a miscarriage when she was seven months pregnant. The only thing that kept her going is HOPE. Hope to find a cure for type 1 diabetes that literally affects millions. 

A few days ago, her diabetes was determined to take her life again, finding out that she was dying of organ failure. A poison had entered into her blood stream, called sepsis, along with a buildup of a dangerous amount of potassium. This has caused her kidney failure. When your kidneys fail, they can’t perform their job of removing extra potassium from the body. So she is in need of a kidney donor.

Currently she is being hospitalized. Doctors are doing a lot of testing, blood work, biopsies and closely determining what caused the kidney failure. She is at a stage 5 (4) and getting iron injections and had her first-ever dialysis treatment. It causes her to feel horribly sick and weak.

Her kidneys for now are stable at 28%, yet it’s still the same struggle everyday to just feel “normal”. It is her hope that she is blessed with a new kidney sooner than later and the gift at living a life that doesn’t consist of being sick all the time. 

Your donation will allow her to do dialysis from home. She just became a nurse after years of studying and is looking forward to living her dream of helping others. Her insurance however does not cover everything. The cost of a year’s worth of treatments is about $38,000, with an upfront co-pay of $4,437. After just starting her job at the hospital and an unpaid internship two weeks, she does not have the money to cover the co-pay…causing stress her body cannot afford. 

Thank you for your donations in advance, sharing this opportunity and showing your support for a woman that makes positive difference for us all. https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/help-us-help...
