story:
An Ode To True Health.

Let's face it.  We are living an era of extreme health and environmental issues. These issues are directly or indirectly related to the demise of our natural resources due to human action.  

1. Animal food production has released sufficient quantities of greenhouse gasses into the atmosphere over the last century that we are now starting to feel the effects of an inevitably warmer world.  Pronounced droughts, floods, wildfires, and storms are happening more frequently, rising seas are inundating coastlines, and climate patterns are reconfigured around the planet. 

2. Radioactive materials, pesticides, herbicides, fungicides, nematocides―all of these man-made products kill or harm life. Dangerous radioactive materials last for millennia.  Similarly, the heavy use of pesticides, herbicides, fungicides and other toxins continue to have highly deleterious effects on the health and well-being of people and ecosystems. 

3. Overfishing has decimated most fisheries and the oceans are now devoid of over 95% of its larger predatory fish, such as sharks, Bluefin tuna, and billfish. Coral reefs are degrading almost everywhere they occur due to warming and acidifying (caused by more carbon dioxide in the atmosphere) seas, overfishing, and sediment- and toxin-laden runoff from the land. In addition, the tons and tons of discarded plastic that ends up in the ocean kills and sickens marine life up and down the food chain. As this plastic breaks down the resulting micro pellets will continue to cause lasting harm in ecosystems.

4. A conservative estimate is that well over a hundred species a day are going extinct, with the rate of disappearing species accelerating as natural habitats shrink, fragment, and degrade and commercial exploitation of vulnerable species escalates. The fewer the species remaining on this planet, the more tenuous our own existence.

What does all of this have to do with you and me?  

As it turns out, everything.  What you decide to consume,  is the ultimate and most powerful form of proactive change.  We must be that change we want to see in the world, but the key is to know exactly which things promote disease and which protect us from it.  Believe me, they are not the ones that mainstream media promote and want you to believe.    

What can be done?

Humanity needs an international effort to regulate and enforce sustainable food, products, services, and a sustainable health system.  It all starts from you and me, what we eat, what we buy, and how we live.  We don't have the luxury to look the other way and not care because it is our children who will live the consequences of our choices.  

Cheap food is cheap for a reason and our lives are not worth the risk. It is simply a slow form of poison for you and I.  It is really ourselves that we are hurting―our bodies, our animals, our oceans, our biodiversity, our natural resources, and our planet in vast proportions.

I invite you to stand up with me in the defense and proliferation of real food.  Food that loves us back. Food that respects mother Earth and food that protects us from chronic diseases.  

Only together we will make a difference.

Margarita Restrepo
Founder and Editor-in-chief
Naked Food Magazine


The Facts.

It is not just cancer.  Did you know that cancer, type 2 diabetes, heart disease, high cholesterol, high blood pressure, Alzheimer’s, lower respiratory diseases, and Nephritis have one thing in common? They are all linked to nutritional factors.  This simply means that chronic degenerative diseases are not only preventable but in most cases, reversible.

  • During 2009 and 2010, more than one-third of adults, or about 78 million people, were obese (defined as body mass index [BMI] ≥30 kg/m2). Nearly one of five youths aged 2–19 years was obese (BMI ≥95th percentile). In the HBO documentary The Weight of the Nation, it was noted that if you “go with the flow” in the US, you will eventually become obese.
  • Seven of the top 10 causes of death in 2010 were chronic diseases. Two of these chronic diseases, heart disease and cancer, together accounted for nearly 48% of all deaths.
  • In 2011, it was reported that in some areas of the country, the rate of obesity is 39% and is increasing at a rate of 5% per year. 
  • Risks of obesity, diabetes, hypertension, and cardiovascular disease, along with their ensuing complications (e.g., behavioral health and quality-of-life problems) often go hand-in-hand and are strongly linked to lifestyle, especially dietary choices. 
  • Of all the diets recommended over the last few decades to turn the tide of these chronic illnesses, the best but perhaps least common may be those that are plant-based. 



The Hard Costs.

The majority of US health care and economic costs associated with medical conditions are for the costs of chronic diseases and conditions and associated health risk behaviors.  Despite the strong body of evidence favoring plant-based diets, including studies showing a willingness of the general public to embrace them, many physicians are not stressing the importance of plant-based diets as a first-line treatment for chronic illnesses. This could be because of a lack of awareness of these diets or a lack of patient education resources.

  • Eighty-four percent of all health care spending in 2006 was for the 50% of the population who have one or more chronic medical conditions. 
  • The total costs of heart disease and stroke in 2010 were estimated to be $315.4 billion. Of this amount, $193.4 billion was for direct medical costs, not including costs of nursing home care.
  • Cancer care cost $157 billion in 2010 dollars.
  • The total estimated cost of diagnosed diabetes in 2012 was $245 billion, including $176 billion in direct medical costs and $69 billion in decreased productivity. Decreased productivity includes costs associated with people being absent from work, being less productive while at work, or not being able to work at all because of diabetes. 


The Proof.

Obesity.

In 2006, after reviewing data from 87 published studies, authors Susan E. Berkow, Ph.D. and Neal Barnard, MD reported in Nutrition Reviews that a vegan or vegetarian diet is highly effective for weight loss. They also found that vegetarian populations have lower rates of heart disease, high blood pressure, diabetes, and obesity. In addition, their review suggests that weight loss in vegetarians is not dependent on exercise and occurs at a rate of approximately 1 pound per week. The authors further stated that a vegan diet caused more calories to be burned after meals, in contrast to non-vegan diets which may cause fewer calories to be burned because the food is being stored as fat.


Heart Disease

In the Lifestyle Heart Trial, Dr. Dean Ornish found that 82% of patients with diagnosed heart disease who followed his program had some level of regression of atherosclerosis. Comprehensive lifestyle changes appear to be the catalyst that brought about this regression of even severe coronary atherosclerosis after only 1 year. In his plant-based regimen, 10% of calories came from fat, 15% to 20% from protein, and 70% to 75% from carbohydrate and cholesterol was restricted to 5 mg per day.


High Blood Pressure

In 2010, the Dietary Guidelines Advisory Committee performed a literature review to identify articles examining the effect of dietary patterns on blood pressure in adults. Vegetarian diets were associated with lower systolic blood pressure and lower diastolic blood pressure. One randomized crossover trial found that a Japanese diet (low sodium and plant-based) significantly reduced systolic blood pressure.



Diabetes

Plant-based diets may offer an advantage over those that are not plant-based with respect to prevention and management of diabetes. The Adventist Health Studies found that vegetarians have approximately half the risk of developing diabetes as nonvegetarians. In 2008, they reported that nonvegetarians were 74% more likely to develop diabetes over a 17-year period than vegetarians. In 2009, a study involving more than 60,000 men and women found that the prevalence of diabetes in individuals on a vegan diet was 2.9%, compared with 7.6% in the nonvegetarians. A low-fat, plant-based diet with no or little meat may help prevent and treat diabetes, possibly by improving insulin sensitivity and decreasing insulin resistance.


The Revolutionary Magazine.

In 2013 Naked Food Magazine was born and was offered as a free digital download. In 2014 Naked Food became a printed publication and acquired national distribution through health food stores and selected bookstores.  It was also recognized for its own merits, welcomed and praised by plant-based nutrition experts, doctors, designers, media, press, photographers, and many others. 


The Enlightened Lifestyle.

The real cure for any of these chronic conditions does not depend on a new development, a new therapy, a new laser, or a new drug.  The real cure is lifestyle medicine, which simply means, what we eat, and how we live.

Health is the basis of our existence, and nutrition is key.  Only through knowledge we are able to escape from the lies, deceits, misinformation, and poisons that threaten our health and the health of our planet.



The NAKED Initiative.

Naked Food is a national health initiative that proposes the switch from the Standard American Diet (S.A.D.) to the New Authentic Kind & Enlightened Diet (N.A.K.E.D.).  It is a quarterly print magazine that bridges the gap between captivating, world-class gourmet food and truly healthy living.

Naked Food stands for whole, organic, low-fat, whole food, plant-based foods that prevent and even reverse chronic diseases such as cancer, diabetes, heart disease, Alzheimer’s, nephritis, and other conditions such as obesity, osteoporosis, chronic pain, digestive health, anxiety, depression, and hypertension among others.



What We Need.

By supporting our crowdfunding campaign, we will strive to provide the following:

Availability. Increase the availability and visibility of the magazine in other outlets such as hospitals, clinics, schools, universities, community centers, wellness centers, and doctor’s offices.

Dissemination. Help educate physicians, nurses, health practitioners, dietitians and nutritionist to guide patients and embrace a low-fat, whole food, plant-based nutrition to health.

Quality and Staff. Increase the quality of the publication with the support of better customer service, new recipe developers, photographers, copy editors, digital/print designers, social media managers, and web developers.

Presence. Increase awareness through the community and national events regarding the effects on food in the human body, along with the prevention and reversal of diseases through lifestyle medicine.

Extra Tools.  Easy-to-use tools that can assist, educate, and inspire people to live a healthier lifestyle. These include cookbooks, apps, guides, and other tools that can help support the Naked Food message.


Our Challenges.

Lack of Staff.  Naked Food has been created, developed, designed, managed, operated, and financially supported by one person.  Its future depends on your help in order to maintain a pure, unbiased, transparent, and true publication.  Our goal is to become a one-stop source for science-based, medical, and educational information through a fresh, exciting, attractive, modern, and beautiful magazine.

Lack of Advertising. We stand behind our message and support truth in advertising. Therefore, we reject and avoid any kind of advertising and editorial to products or services that do not promote a sustainable, whole, and naked approach to their business.  This makes it challenging to keep a publication alive.


Other Ways You Can Help.

If you are unable to financially contribute to the campaign, you still can play a vital role by sharing this link on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and all other social media platforms. Only with your help this magazine can keep going. Thank you!

We can still use a great deal of help from experts in the fields of marketing / PR, recipe development, copy editing, web design, graphic design, event organizing, translators, etc. To lend your unique skills to Naked Food, please let us know how you would like to help by writing us at help@nakedfoodmagazine.com. Thank you! 


My Inspiration. 

This is my story; one of the millions of stories out there. Probably similar to yours or maybe someone you know. After losing my boyfriend to brain cancer, I embarked on a journey that has led me to support a great cause.

I have made a vow to make this cause a reality that can change the present and the future of health.  It can change your life and the lives of your loved ones.  This is a personal promise to myself, and, therefore, to you.  This is the journey to prevent and eradicate chronic disease and empower everyone to experience the glory of true health through the most simple and basic form of medicine: Food.


A Real Life Story.

While working on our first music record together, my boyfriend and band partner started experiencing bothersome headaches in the morning and night hours of the day. We visited the doctor a couple of times and their advice was to take some time off and get a muscle relaxant or a sleeping aid until the symptoms disappeared.  They gave him a prescription for Valium. A few weeks later he felt sick to his stomach and decided to go the ER to get checked.  An MRI of his brain showed a 2-inch (5cm) brain tumor in the right side of his brain.  He was given 10-30 days to live.



The Last Music Record.

After brain surgery for tumor extraction, a 9-inch scar across his head was a reminder of a terrifying reality. How could a young,  semi-professional athlete and runner, positive human being, and super talented musician get this sick, and so quickly? My bed had become a hospital chair and my only focus was to beat this horrific cancer. Accompanied by large dosages of painkillers and the doctor’s advice to submit to chemotherapy and radiation, the hospital food menu included gelatin, macaroni and cheese, meatloaf, milk, and packaged apple juice, among others; a terrible combination for someone who was hoping to get better.

The Not-Recommended Therapy.

He opted to skip chemotherapy.  It was a solid decision. He was not able to avoid taking pain medications and blood thinners.  He was also taking steroids for his brain swelling. We were following doctor’s orders. We were told that traditional therapies didn’t have positive results with this type of cancer, so we decided, as a last resort, for a nutritional change. Doctors didn’t mention it and we didn’t know whether it was going to work out.  But at that point, we had no other options. 


The Real Cure.

From one day to the next, we both stopped eating processed sugar, flour, fats, and all animal foods.   Instead, we started eating whole foods and all of our meals were based on plants.  Sounded logical enough. Three months later, the results of the second MRI showed a 25% decrease on his tumor growth.  It was a true miracle.  Statistically speaking, this cancer (Glioblastoma Multiforme) does not ever stop growing. 

The Ever After.

In between morphine dosages, Coumadin shots, blood clots, hospital visits, and very long nights, we still celebrated this amazing discovery. We knew this was something big though the cure had just come too late. He passed away five months later.  A stage IV, Glioblastoma Multiforme is a cancer monster that devastates and the effects of the drugs were extremely damaging. His brain had swollen; his blood kept clogging, and his bones had weakened. 

His eyes, however, always kept shining. His hope and love for life never disappeared.


The Lesson Learned.

Among many things, I have learned to not sweat the small things and focus on what really matters.  Yes, life is too short, but living a long life without knowledge is equally paralyzing. 

No one should experience cancer.  No one should lose his/her life to a preventable or even reversible disease.  No one should be defeated by a preventable disease. No one should feel completely unable to help a loved one.  Knowledge is power, and the cure that many talk about has been in our hands for centuries.
story_txt:
An Ode To True Health.Let's face it.  We are living an era of extreme health and environmental issues. These issues are directly or indirectly related to the demise of our natural resources due to human action.  1. Animal food production has released sufficient quantities of greenhouse gasses into the atmosphere over the last century that we are now starting to feel the effects of an inevitably warmer world.  Pronounced droughts, floods, wildfires, and storms are happening more frequently, rising seas are inundating coastlines, and climate patterns are reconfigured around the planet. 2. Radioactive materials, pesticides, herbicides, fungicides, nematocides―all of these man-made products kill or harm life. Dangerous radioactive materials last for millennia.  Similarly, the heavy use of pesticides, herbicides, fungicides and other toxins continue to have highly deleterious effects on the health and well-being of people and ecosystems. 3. Overfishing has decimated most fisheries and the oceans are now devoid of over 95% of its larger predatory fish, such as sharks, Bluefin tuna, and billfish. Coral reefs are degrading almost everywhere they occur due to warming and acidifying (caused by more carbon dioxide in the atmosphere) seas, overfishing, and sediment- and toxin-laden runoff from the land. In addition, the tons and tons of discarded plastic that ends up in the ocean kills and sickens marine life up and down the food chain. As this plastic breaks down the resulting micro pellets will continue to cause lasting harm in ecosystems.4. A conservative estimate is that well over a hundred species a day are going extinct, with the rate of disappearing species accelerating as natural habitats shrink, fragment, and degrade and commercial exploitation of vulnerable species escalates. The fewer the species remaining on this planet, the more tenuous our own existence.What does all of this have to do with you and me?  As it turns out, everything.  What you decide to consume,  is the ultimate and most powerful form of proactive change.  We must be that change we want to see in the world, but the key is to know exactly which things promote disease and which protect us from it.  Believe me, they are not the ones that mainstream media promote and want you to believe.    What can be done?Humanity needs an international effort to regulate and enforce sustainable food, products, services, and a sustainable health system.  It all starts from you and me, what we eat, what we buy, and how we live.  We don't have the luxury to look the other way and not care because it is our children who will live the consequences of our choices.  Cheap food is cheap for a reason and our lives are not worth the risk. It is simply a slow form of poison for you and I.  It is really ourselves that we are hurting―our bodies, our animals, our oceans, our biodiversity, our natural resources, and our planet in vast proportions. I invite you to stand up with me in the defense and proliferation of real food.  Food that loves us back. Food that respects mother Earth and food that protects us from chronic diseases.  Only together we will make a difference.Margarita RestrepoFounder and Editor-in-chiefNaked Food Magazine

story:
THE BEGINNING

I have a small tight-knit family. The four of us -- my mom, dad, brother and myself -- have gone through everything together. In fact, there was little to no mystery in our two bedroom beach bungalow in Santa Cruz, CA. Everyday, my Dad, a self employed real estate appraiser, would be working hard to support our family.

My brother, Conor, is my role model. He introduced me to golf when I was eight years old. Every day after school, I would go to DeLaveaga, my local golf course, with Conor and practice until sunset. Golf was becoming my life. Soon, I was focusing all my efforts on junior golf tournaments, and after three years I began competing around the county as a part of the Santa Cruz County Junior Golf Association. 

NEXT STEPS

It would become clear to me in 2008/2009 that I had potential to pursue my dream of playing Division I college golf. In my first appearance at the US Junior Amateur tournament at Shoal Creek, I qualified for matchplay. I won the Trusted Choice Big I California State Junior at my home course, DeLaveaga, followed by a second place finish in Junior Nationals at Dornick Hills Country Club in Ardmore, Oklahoma. Through my second place finish, I was exempt into Junior Nationals the following year at Old Yorke Country Club in New Jersey where I was fortunate to have another second place finish, shooting a course record final round 8- under par, 64. 

COLLEGE GOLF

My college golf career began with a top-ten program, at the University of Washington -- where I received a full athletic scholarship. As a freshman, I played in every tournament, highlighted by a fourth place finish in UCLA's tournament  at CordeValle. After my sophomore year at the University of Washington, I decided it was time for a change. I transferred to the University of San Francisco, Conor's alma mater, where I seized the opportunity to become the team's top golfer.

AMATEUR GOLF

The summer of 2013 was the highlight of my golf career thus far. I ended my semester of college golf with a top 10 finish at NCAA Mid-West regionals. That finish gave me the confidence for what was to come. I began my summer with advancing through US Open Local Qualifying at Half Moon Bay Golf Course, moving onto US Open Regionals in Newport, California. After rounds of 69, 69, I ended up in a three man playoff for two spots where I advanced to the 113th US Open at Merion Golf Club in Philadelphia. Although I was unable to make the cut at the US Open, competing with the worlds top players made me realize I had the game to make a living as a professional golfer. 


The day after returning from Philadelphia, I competed in the first round of the California State Amateur where six days later I would take the title in the 36 hole final.  After my victory in the California State Amateur, I earned a top 100 world amateur ranking which exempted me into the worlds top amateur events. 


My high tournament finishes that summer included a second place finish at the Pacific Coast Amateur, advancement to the round of 16 at the Western Amateur and advancement to matchplay in the US Amateur. By the end of the summer of 2013, my world amateur ranking vaulted as high as #13.

PROFESSIONAL GOLF

I have since turned professional, and am chasing my dream at the highest level.  I have no doubt I will be able to continue to achieve success as a pro, but along with my hard work comes expenses for travel and entry fees along the way.  Join my team.  Help me achieve my goals and lets have some fun along the way.  I am hoping to put together a small group of partners for this journey.  

You can contact my agent Brent Brockermeyer at Brent@yeedubin.com if you are interested in having your company logo on my clothes or golf bag, or for more information. 

Thank you!



CORY MCELYEA IN THE MEDIA

Qualifying for the U.S. Open

-http://www.santacruzsentinel.com/20130612/santa-cruzs-mcelyea-fulfills-long-time-goal-of-qualifying-for-us-open

Post U.S. Open Qualifying Interview -                                        http://www.scga.org/scga-video/tournaments/cory-mcelyea-qualifies-for-2013-u.s.-open

Winning the California State Amateur-http://www.montereyherald.com/sports/20130622/santa-cruzs-cory-mcelyea-wins-state-amateur-golf-title

Interview after California State Amateur Title-      https://www.sport195.com/videos/usf-golfer-cory-mcelyea-the-102nd-california-state-amateur-champion-355251

Hosting DeLaveaga Clinic with Roger Maltbie and Kay Cockerill 

http://www.ncga.org/2014/04/21/roger-maltbie-cory-mcelyea-and-kay-cockerill-host-junior-clinic-in-santa-cruz/

Winning the Monterey City Amateur Back to Back-http://www.montereyherald.com/sports/20130630/santa-cruz-resident-cory-mcelyea-wins-monterey-city-amateur


The following are tours and tournaments in which I have or will compete in: 


                  

  

TO MY SUPPORTERS:

Even if you can’t be a sponsor, you can still contribute by helping my campaign go viral! Share the video or like the page on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pintrest and other social media. Thanks! 

If you are connected to Facebook you can also "like" my golf page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Cory-McElyea-Golf/1553407234914992

In fact, there was little to no mystery in our two bedroom beach bungalow in Santa Cruz, CA. Everyday, my Dad, a self employed real estate appraiser, would be working hard to support our family.My brother, Conor, is my role model. He introduced me to golf when I was eight years old. Every day after school, I would go to DeLaveaga, my local golf course, with Conor and practice until sunset. Golf was becoming my life. Soon, I was focusing all my efforts on junior golf tournaments, and after three years I began competing around the county as a part of the Santa Cruz County Junior Golf Association. NEXT STEPSIt would become clear to me in 2008/2009 that I had potential to pursue my dream of playing Division I college golf. In my first appearance at the US Junior Amateur tournament at Shoal Creek, I qualified for matchplay. I won the Trusted Choice Big I California State Junior at my home course, DeLaveaga, followed by a second place finish in Junior Nationals at Dornick Hills Country Club in Ardmore, Oklahoma. Through my second place finish, I was exempt into Junior Nationals the following year at Old Yorke Country Club in New Jersey where I was fortunate to have another second place finish, shooting a course record final round 8- under par, 64. COLLEGE GOLFMy college golf career began with a top-ten program, at the University of Washington -- where I received a full athletic scholarship. As a freshman, I played in every tournament, highlighted by a fourth place finish in UCLA's tournament  at CordeValle. After my sophomore year at the University of Washington, I decided it was time for a change. I transferred to the University of San Francisco, Conor's alma mater, where I seized the opportunity to become the team's top golfer.AMATEUR GOLFThe summer of 2013 was the highlight of my golf career thus far. I ended my semester of college golf with a top 10 finish at NCAA Mid-West regionals. That finish gave me the confidence for what was to come. I began my summer with advancing through US Open Local Qualifying at Half Moon Bay Golf Course, moving onto US Open Regionals in Newport, California. After rounds of 69, 69, I ended up in a three man playoff for two spots where I advanced to the 113th US Open at Merion Golf Club in Philadelphia. Although I was unable to make the cut at the US Open, competing with the worlds top players made me realize I had the game to make a living as a professional golfer. The day after returning from Philadelphia, I competed in the first round of the California State Amateur where six days later I would take the title in the 36 hole final.  After my victory in the California State Amateur, I earned a top 100 world amateur ranking which exempted me into the worlds top amateur events. My high tournament finishes that summer included a second place finish at the Pacific Coast Amateur, advancement to the round of 16 at the Western Amateur and advancement to matchplay in the US Amateur. By the end of the summer of 2013, my world amateur ranking vaulted as high as #13.PROFESSIONAL GOLFI have since turned professional, and am chasing my dream at the highest level.  I have no doubt I will be able to continue to achieve success as a pro, but along with my hard work comes expenses for travel and entry fees along the way.  Join my team.  Help me achieve my goals and lets have some fun along the way.  I am hoping to put together a small group of partners for this journey.  You can contact my agent Brent Brockermeyer at Brent@yeedubin.com if you are interested in having your company logo on my clothes or golf bag, or for more information. Thank you!CORY MCELYEA IN THE MEDIA

Qualifying for the U.S. Open
-http://www.santacruzsentinel.com/20130612/santa-cruzs-mcelyea-fulfills-long-time-goal-of-qualifying-for-us-open
Post U.S. Open Qualifying Interview -                                        http://www.scga.org/scga-video/tournaments/cory-mcelyea-qualifies-for-2013-u.s.-open
Winning the California State Amateur-http://www.montereyherald.com/sports/20130622/santa-cruzs-cory-mcelyea-wins-state-amateur-golf-title
Interview after California State Amateur Title-      https://www.sport195.com/videos/usf-golfer-cory-mcelyea-the-102nd-california-state-amateur-champion-355251
Hosting DeLaveaga Clinic with Roger Maltbie and Kay Cockerill 
http://www.ncga.org/2014/04/21/roger-maltbie-cory-mcelyea-and-kay-cockerill-host-junior-clinic-in-santa-cruz/
Winning the Monterey City Amateur Back to Back-http://www.montereyherald.com/sports/20130630/santa-cruz-resident-cory-mcelyea-wins-monterey-city-amateur



The following are tours and tournaments in which I have or will compete in: 




                  
  TO MY SUPPORTERS:
Even if you can’t be a sponsor, you can still contribute by helping my campaign go viral! Share the video or like the page on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pintrest and other social media. Thanks! 
If you are connected to Facebook you can also "like" my golf page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Cory-McElyea-Golf/1553407234914992

story:
Short Summary

CocoLeisure juice blend is made from fresh whole fruits that are chock full of vitamins, essential minerals, amino acids, and antioxidants. These are the beneficial nutrients that our body needs most, yet they are often what we leave out of our daily diet! 

This innovative new juice blend is made with naturally hydrating coconut water, along with essential electrolytes and some of the best-tasting fruits on the planet. All of the ingredients used in CocoLeisure organic juice blends are grown in the Philippines with traditional organic farming methods.



Local Solution, Global Change

The all-natural ingredients of CocoLeisure juice blends are grown in the Philippines using sustainable organic farming methods, resulting in some of the healthiest and most delicious fruits in the world.

Not only are the ingredients good for you, but the drink itself has a wonderful aroma of exotic fruit and a subtle, refreshing taste. Most people have low standards for the flavor of healthy drinks, but CocoLeisure is remarkably tasty.

We have developed our supply chain and have successfully sourced the best ingredients for our CocoLeisure juice blends here in the Philippines. Our facility is up and running, and we’re ready to get CocoLeisure into your hands!

As a company supporting traditional organic farming practices, we wanted to make a difference in that world. Many small farmers are at or below the poverty line, so we want to help farmers do business better, improve their farm planning, and give assistance to certified organic plantations.

We are more than just an organic juice company; we are dedicated to working with our farmers to help them overcome their farm management, environmental, social, and economic issues to improve their lives and spur positive change.

We want to create as much value for farmers as possible, because high-quality organic farming is essential for better health and wellness!



More about the Project

Most people don’t think of getting their daily nutrients from beverages, and certainly not from ones that taste so good, but CocoLeisure organic blend offers the perfect balance of sweet and sensible in every bottle!

We are very excited about bringing our unique All Natural Coconut Fruit juice blends to the market, and you should be too! These blends are ideal for busy people that are always on the go and find it hard to squeeze in healthy meal options. 


The Rewards



This pre-sale offer through Indiegogo is the first time that we’ll be offering our CocoLeisure! This will be your first chance to experience this new combination of unforgettable flavors and a healthy boost to your system.

At each reward level, except for our CocoLeisure! Kit $5 and $20 reward, we are offering you a 16.9 oz (500ml) bottle (s) of CocoLeisure shipped straight to your door. Thanks for your support! We know that we’re on track to create something great and we’re thrilled for you to be a part of it!



OUR STRETCH GOAL! 

Our stretch goal is $25,000, which will fully cover the extensive costs of our first production run and get CocoLeisure off to a great start.


Why we need your help

Our CocoLeisure favors have been made with love and care to be both healthy and extremely delicious! However, it takes more than that to start a business. We have everything set to get CocoLeisure to you, but we need your help to fund the production, packaging, and logistical costs for our first release of CocoLeisure!  

In order to understand where your support would go, we’ve included a brief breakdown of where donations and investments are used.

Manufacturing, Raw materials, Labor  - 51%

Transporting, Warehousing, Logistics Freight - 21%

Other unforeseen expenses - 12%

Consulting & legal fees - 6% 

Indiegogo & credit card fees - 10%

We know that nothing worth doing is ever easy, and with your support, we will turn this healthy dream into a reality.


Thank You!

Along with your support of this Indiegogo campaign, you can also help to share our story (and our campaign) with friends and family on your social media outlets. 

Remember, you’re not the only one trying to stay healthy! Spread the word and play your part in increasing the health and wellness of those you care about.

story:
Thank you for being here!!

UPDATE!! A generous donor has committed to gifting $500/month to fund Alison Sher's J2SYL.org PR/Journalism/Social Media/Design position with J2SYL for a YEAR :D!!  YAHOO!!!


Journal To Save Your Life thrives with YOU, our Donors!

Hi! My name is Jasper Faolan, and as a Psychiatric Nurse in an acute care facility, I see every DAY how important mental health is, and how much we lack quality mental health programs in this country. With my mother, Dr. Susan Werstein, we have developed a forever-free, 1-52 week mental health program for girls & women aged 13-25. We're ready to launch with five new organizations around the nation - and I'm asking you to please help fund some key employees so that I can keep doing ALL the work I/we do. :) Thank you for your consideration.

Please consider donating, Lovely! You are loved!!
Have a beautiful day, & dance all around after you donate, ok? :) OK. Thank you!
~Jasper.
www.JournalToSaveYourLife.org ~ Our Information & Engagement Site.

* * *

JOURNAL TO SAVE YOUR LIFE (J2SYL) is a 52 week, Forever-Free, research-based mental health app that is set to rock (y)our world!


J2SYL: Art HEALS. Cognitive Reframing HEALS. Social Skills HEAL. We are ready for our next phase.

As always, we can only happen with you. Are you with us?

In 2013 - 2014, we gifted $17,000+ of YOUR DONOR DOLLARS and hired OLIVE DESIGN of Austin, Texas and Successfully BUILT www.J2SYL.org: A comprehensive, six-part, totally kick ass, accessible APP & online mental health program for girls and women. J2SYL.org is for those who want to be even stronger in their minds ~ and therefore their communities. We're expanding to boys & men next year.

We need your help! Please support us so that we can carry out our Mutual mission to provide more quality mental health services to the world. Please.


Why you should care about us! ;)

In Journal TO SAVE YOUR LIFE's SIX PART online mental health app, we highlight life aspects a young person may need to look at in order to develop their OWN healthy sense of self.

Adolescence and Emerging Adulthood (ages 12 - 25) represent a key point of brain development in which self-destructive psychological patterns can be identified and addressed, so J2SYL.org strikes this phase while it's hot. J2SYL.org doesn't shy from anything ~ because we know we can make it through anything.

Why now?

The U.S. DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH & HUMAN SERVICES states that in 2012, $2.5 billion dollars of need (43.7 MILLION Adults & 3.1 MILLION youth) received mental health services, but $9 billion dollars of Need for mental health services was NOT met.


Barriers to Mental Health: STIGMA, THE SYSTEM, ACCESS, LACK OF FAMILY SUPPORT, FINANCES.




JOURNAL TO SAVE YOUR LIFE:

J2SYL.org: Forever-free. 
1-52 weeks long.
Exclusively online. Research based.

Heart founded.

J2SYL PROGRAM ELEMENTS: http://j2syl.nationbuilder.com/the_program

J2SYL CORE VALUES: http://j2syl.nationbuilder.com/core_values 


J2SYL.org = Platform for OBSERVATION. ARTISTIC EXPRESSION. TOOLS to seek, find, and trust YOUR own unique VOICE. No answers, only questions…

* * *

J2SYL TEAM! --> WHO WE ARE.

WE ARE ARTISTS, SOCIAL STEWARDS & MEDICAL PROFESSIONALS COMMITTED TO ACTIVISM - POLITICAL, ECONOMIC, AND EMOTIONAL EMPOWERMENT FOR ALL MEMBERS OF SOCIETY. 

 



What's NEXT: Connecting with young women everywhere.


YOUR PRETTY DOLLARS FUND:

  • J2COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT NATIONWIDE: ALISON SHER ~ The Public VOICE of J2SYL.org. Staff Writer. Social mission developer. Creator of Journal To Save Your Life Nationbuilder community and database website ~ to manage our J2Community. (Jasper sucks at updates, you know? Alison will take care of this! :))
  • MENTAL HEALTH FILM ACTIVISM: CHELSEA HERNANDEZ ~ PBS and University of Texas at Austin film maker, Chelsea is J2SYL's videographer. $750 already paid, more videos to be made.

  • ADVOCACY VIA SOCIAL MEDIA: ERIC T. TUNG ~ Social media consultant. Eric is also a speaker and trainer, recognized as the #33 “social media talent” in the world by Forbes and is ranked among the top 5% of social media consultants worldwide.
  • CONNECT J2SYL.org WITH ORGANIZATIONS LOCALLY & NATIONALLY: JASPER FAOLAN ~ Support J2SYL.org Founder, Jasper Faolan, do speeches and tour with her concept of forever-free, innovative, cutting edge mental health care. YES!!

* * *

What You GET!

FIRST: Be a part of our Revolutionary approach to mental health. Currently mental health is underfunded, stretched thin, and whiney (really..). TOGETHER we can change the world ~ with healthy minds, we change the world. Period. Feel good knowing you've supported change.

CAMPAIGN PERKS: Get personalized attention. Professional business consultancy. Nonprofit launchpad. Mental Health Communication. Tom's Shoes - dedicated to You & the World & Austin's Homeless Shelter. See our Perks!
$75: Exclusive Run ~ Unconditional J2SYL.org HOODIE - 50 Available Only.
$30: a raw hummingbird by J2SYL.org Founder, Jasper Faolan.
This is the book that started J2SYL.org. Back Cover:


TOM'S SHOES ~ $125 to purchase one pair then gift the other to a child in need worldwide..or donate both pairs - one worldwide, the other to Austin Homeless Shelter where many mentally ill live.

Austin's Homeless Shelter. The Mentally Ill are often without good shoes, and for those who are bipolar ~ they walk until their shoes fall apart. Let's gift them GOOD shoes this year.


Your (In)SANITY Game: Mental Health Table Talk Game ~ Break your mind open.


Be the J2SYL Revolution.

  • DONATE!
  • PLEDGE HERE: www.j2syl.nationbuilder.com 

  • INVITE all Friends and Family to our J2SYL Campaign Facebook Event: https://www.facebook.com/events/1505658426384218/?notif_t=plan_user_joined

  • SHARE: http://igg.me/at/J2SYLBreakFree/x/858925

  • SHARE: J2SYL PROMO VIDEO https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J9gRCLawE8U&noredirect=1

  • CONNECT us to further Organizations who will benefit from J2SYL.org!
  • IGNITE your own Mental Health REVOLUTION ~ and TELL US ABOUT IT: JF@JournalToSaveYourLife.org.


Journal To Save Your Life © is a 501©3, and all of your lovely donations are tax deductible. Thank you in advance for donating to my heart song and lifelong calling to shift stigma, access, and quality of mental health.

JOURNAL TO SAVE YOUR LIFE: MENTAL HEALTH IS A HUMAN RIGHT.


Please donate to make our next phase a reality. Thank you, Loves.

story:
To our international readers/Para nuestros lectores internacionales.

Appreciated backers! Please note that the content of this campaign is both in English and Spanish, you will find the Spanish version first and then the English version. Thanks!

¡Apreciados backers! Esta campaña está en Inglés y Español, podrán ver la versión en Español primero, y seguido, la versión en Inglés. ¡Muchas gracias! 

 

Safe Teamwork: Protege a tu equipo de trabajo del COVID-19.

 

Safe Teamwork monitorea el bienestar de tus colaboradores así como los espacios de trabajo para garantizar la salud y seguridad de tu empresa.

 

Nuestra misión es ayudar a los negocios a mantenerse abiertos y seguros.

 

¿Recuerdas el día que todo esto empezó? ¿El día que tuviste que decirle a tus empleados que trabajaran desde casa? ¿O simplemente cerrar tu negocio y despedirte de tus trabajadores leales debido a la pandemia? Nosotros lo recordamos claramente, porque ese día, comenzamos a pensar en crear una solución para ayudar a reabrir los negocios de manera segura.

Como gerentes o administradores de negocio, necesitamos saber quién está en riesgo o quién ha sido afectado por el COVID-19, ya que las empresas por ley tienen el deber de cuidar a sus empleados.

No completar una evaluación de riesgos que tenga en cuenta el COVID-19, podría constituir una infracción de la ley de salud y seguridad en el trabajo.

Safe Teamwork incluye una evaluación de riesgo individual para cada empleado que ayuda a abordar este problems. Además, si un empleado resulta positivo para COVID-19, se debe notificar al encargado para que pueda coordinar los implementos necesarios para el trabajo desde casa y también lleve el informe correspondiente a las autoridades de salud y seguridad.

Safe Teamwork incluye una función de notificación de incidentes para que esta información se centralice y se realice un seguimiento adecuado.

 

Creemos firmemente que la única forma de reactivar la economía y mantener seguros a los trabajadores implica lo siguiente:

 

1. Contar con una normativa clara y mecanismos de seguimiento que permitan mantener las condiciones de bioseguridad adecuadas para prevenir la propagación del virus.

2. Sensibilizar a las personas ante esta nueva realidad y mantener el autocuidado y respeto a dichas normas.

3. Empresas que puedan asegurar que sus espacios de trabajo cumplan con las normas y que valoren el bienestar y la salud de sus trabajadores.

Para poner en marcha estos 3 elementos proponemos el uso de la tecnología, que facilita los procesos y al mismo tiempo genera hábitos positivos en las personas tanto en los espacios de trabajo como en el hogar.

Para solucionar los problemas antes mencionados, hemos desarrollado una solución tecnológica llamada Safe Teamwork, que combina una plataforma web y una aplicación móvil para gestionar de forma integral las operaciones de empresas u organizaciones en el contexto de la pandemia.

Queremos luchar contra Covid-19 mejorando la comunicación en los equipos, capacitando a todos para que estén atentos al enemigo invisible: ¡El Coronavirus!

 

¿Qué es Safe Teamwork?

 

Safe Teamwork es una aplicación que verifica la salud por medio de un sistema de auto-reportes que monitorea al personal y los espacios de trabajo.

El sistema es fácil de configurar y económico de operar.

 

Protegemos tu privacidad al no necesitar de Bluetooth o GPS para saber tu ubicación.

 

Safe Teamwork es una aplicación web y móvil con 4 elementos principales:

 
  1. Creación de perfiles de riesgo epidemiológico para los empleados.
  2. Comprobador de síntomas para COVID-19.
  3. Monitoreo de los empleados y espacios de trabajo.
  4. Registro y reporte de infecciones.
 

Información importante de acerca de la privacidad

La aplicación sigue el Reglamento General de Protección de Datos (RGPD) que es un reglamento de la ley de la UE sobre la protección de datos y privacidad. Hemos optado por seguir este reglamento para ofrecer la máxima protección a nuestros usuarios.

Los perfiles de riesgo de los empleados son anonimizados y no se almacenan como información personal. En cambio, se calcula y se asigna un factor de riesgo a cada empleado. En la política de privacidad se documenta el uso de la información personal guardada para cada usuario.

La arquitectura del sistema utiliza bases de datos separadas por empresa, para que un intruso en una empresa no tenga acceso a la información de otras. Además, la información está cifrada a nivel de base de datos con claves de seguridad específicas del usuario y mecanismos de rotación, de modo que la información personal está protegida de accesos no autorizados.

 

¿Cómo funciona?

Safe Teamwork sigue el mismo principio de la aplicación COVID Symptom Study, una de las herramientas más innovadoras del Reino Unido en la lucha contra COVID-19 y que es también  el estudio de COVID más grande del mundo.

Con Safe Teamwork, cada miembro del equipo responde tres preguntas sencillas:

1. ¿Cómo te sientes hoy físicamente?

2. ¿Desde dónde planeas trabajar hoy?

3. ¿Te sientes seguro al regresar al lugar de trabajo? (Si trabaja en el sitio)

 

¡Usa STW en 5 pasos!

1. Crea una cuenta para tu empresa

2. Invita a tu equipo a tu empresa

3. Tu equipo acepta la invitación

4. Tú y tus compañeros de trabajo envían informes diarios rápidos 

5. ¡Mira actualizaciones importantes en un solo lugar y actúa!

 

Utilizando esta información podrás:

  1.  Detectar los síntomas de COVID de manera temprana para aislar a los miembros infectados del equipo.
  2. Monitorear la salud de tu equipo.
  3. Monitorear la ocupación máxima de varios lugares de trabajo.
  4. Comprender el sentimiento del equipo sobre el regreso al lugar de trabajo.
 

Beneficios

Nuestra solución beneficia tanto a los empleados como a los gerentes de las empresas

  • Los empleados se sienten seguros en su espacio de trabajo
  • Tiene un sistema de auto reporte con mínima intrusión en la privacidad de los trabajadores.
  • Los administradores pueden monitorear a los empleados y hacer un manejo adecuado de los espacios de trabajo.
  • Es fácil de adoptar y tiene bajo costo de operación.

 

Futuras características 

Con tu contribución planeamos implementar las siguientes características:

  • Gestión segura de turnos
  • Rastreador de prueba / vacuna
  • Previsión de hotspots
  • Planificación de espacios de trabajo

 

¿Quién puede usar STW?

Todo tipo de organizaciones que necesiten tener a sus empleados en el lugar de trabajo para reactivar sus operaciones y cumplir con la normativa de bioseguridad de la Organización Mundial de la Salud contra la propagación del COVID-19 en sectores como:

  • Servicios
  • Comercio
  • Manufactura e industria
  • Educación
  • Construcción
 

¿Quiénes son nuestros clientes actuales?

  • Interfisica, empresa de salud.
  • DobleClick, empresa de TI.
  • Codescrum, empresa de TI.
  • Secretaría de Salud Municipal de Popayán (Colombia).
 

¿Quién es Safe Teamwork?

Safe Teamwork ha sido desarrollado por Codescrum, un equipo de personas talentosas cuya misión es crear software personalizado que haga posible lo impensable.

Con 10 años de operaciones en Londres y Colombia, queremos trabajar por un mundo mejor, creando soluciones que ofrezcan un impacto que vaya más allá de las expectativas.

 

Conoce nuestro equipo

Actualmente nuestro equipo está compuesto por:

  • Jairo Diaz. Lider del proyecto.
  • Carlos Andrade. Director de Innovación.
  • Miguel Diaz. Líder de desarrollo de productos.
  • Isabela Restrepo. Líder de marketing.
  • Rumel Vargas. Líder de Diseño Gráfico.
  • Jean Paul Erazo. Líder de Soporte al Cliente. 

 

 

Experiencia de nuestros usuarios

"Safe Teamwork hizo posible regresar al trabajo en la oficina de manera segura". - Interfisica del Cauca (empresa de salud)

"Hemos podido evitar infecciones masivas gracias a Safe Teamwork". - DobleClick (empresa de servicios de TI)

 

Otras formas en que puedes ayudar

A través de tu aporte, podremos seguir evolucionando y agregando funcionalidades a Safe Teamwork, lo que nos permitirá seguir luchando contra el COVID-19 en nuestros espacios de trabajo. Quienes nos apoyen tendrán un descuento especial en la nueva versión.

Donar no es la única forma en la que puedes ayudarnos a ayudar a los demás; aquí hay algunas formas en que tú o tu asociación podrían contribuir:

Comparte nuestra solución con aquellos que creas que la necesitan.

Puedes seguirnos en nuestras redes sociales (@SafeTeamwork en Twitter y @safeteamworkapp en Facebook)

Si tienes preguntas sobre Safe Teamwork, ¡no dudes en contactarnos!

 

 

----  SAFE TEAMWORK IN ENGLISH ----

 

 

Do you remember the day this all started? The day you had to tell your employees to work from home?

Or just shutting down your business and saying goodbye to loyal workers due to the pandemic?

We remember it clearly, because that day, we began to think about creating a solution to help reopen businesses safely.

As managers we need to know who is at risk or has been affected by COVID-19 because businesses by law have a duty of care to their employees.

Failure to complete a risk assessment which takes account of COVID-19 could constitute a breach of health and safety law.

Safe Teamwork includes an individual risk assessment for each employee helping to address this concern.

Additionally, if an employee tests positive for COVID-19, the manager needs to be notified to manage the home provision and carry the appropriate reporting to Health and Safety authorities.

Safe Teamwork includes an incident reporting function so that this information is centralized and appropriately tracked.  
 

 

 

Safe Teamwork is an employee self-reporting application that helps managers to check the wellbeing of their team and workspace. 

The system is easy to adopt and inexpensive to operate.

It protects privacy by not using locations or public contact tracing APIs.

 

Safe Teamwork is a web and mobile application with 4 main elements:

1. Creation of health risk profiles for employees.

2. A symptoms checker for COVID-19.

3. The monitoring of employees and workspaces.

4. The registration and reporting of infections.

 

 

Important Privacy Information

The application follows the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), which is a regulation in EU law on data protection and privacy in the European Union. We have chosen to follow this regulation to offer the highest protection to our users.

The risk profiles of the employees are anonymized and are not stored as personal information. Instead, a risk factor is computed and assigned to each employee. Personal information saved for each user is documented with their use in the privacy policy.

The system architecture uses separate databases per company so that an intruder in one company does not have access to information from other companies. Furthermore, information is encrypted at database level with user-specific security keys and rotation mechanisms, so that personal information is not accessible to unauthorized parties.

Safe Teamwork follows the same principle as the COVID Symptom Study app, one of the UK’s most innovative tools in the fight against COVID-19 and the largest COVID study in the world.

With Safe Teamwork, every member of the team, answers three simple questions: 

1. How do you feel physically today?
2. Where do you plan to work from today?
3. Do you feel safe returning to the workplace? (If working onsite.) 

 

 

 

By using this information you can:

1. Detect COVID symptoms early to self-isolate infected team members.

2. Monitor the team’s health.

3. Monitor the maximum occupancy of several workplaces.

4. Understand the feelings of the team about returning to the workplace.

 

   Our solution benefits both company employees and managers:

 

 

Admin Features 

 

 

Employee Features 

 

 

 

 

With your contribution we plan to implement the following features: 

 

All kinds of organizations that need employees at their workplace to reactivate their operations and to comply with the World Health Organization biosafety regulations against COVID-19 propagation in sectors such as:

  • Services
  • Commerce
  • Manufacturing and Industry
  • Education
  • Construction

 

 

Who are our current clients?

 

  • Interfisica, Healthcare company
  • DobleClick, IT company
  • Codescrum, IT company
  • Municipal Secretary of Health of Popayán, Governmental Agency

 

Safe Teamwork has been developed by Codescrum, a team of talented people whose mission is to create custom software that makes the unthinkable possible.

With 10 years of operations in London and Colombia, we want to work for a better world by creating solutions that offer an impact beyond expectations.

 

Our team is currently composed of:

  • Jairo Diaz. Project Manager.
  • Carlos Andrade. Innovation Director.
  • Miguel Diaz. Product Development Lead.
  • Isabela Restrepo. Marketing Lead.
  • Rumel Vargas. Graphic Design Lead.
  • Jean Paul Erazo. Customer Success Lead.

 

 

We believe that businesses and employees need to go back to work to reactivate the economy, but all companies are required to ensure employees’ safety in the workplace.

With people needing to go back to the office responsibly, we started to think about how to use our software development abilities against COVID-19 and, as a result, our project Safe Teamwork was born.

 

 

 

With the help of your contribution, we can continue to evolve Safe Teamwork and add functionalities that will allow us to continue fighting COVID-19 in our workplaces. All contributors will be given a special discount on this new version.

Donating is not the only way you can help us to help you; here are some ways that you or your association could contribute:

  • Share our solution with the ones you think that need it.
  •  You can follow us on our social media  (@safeteamworkapp on Facebook and @SafeTeamwork on Twitter)

If you have questions regarding Safe Teamwork, feel free to contact us!

To our international readers/Para nuestros lectores internacionales.
Appreciated backers! Please note that the content of this campaign is both in English and Spanish, you will find the Spanish version first and then the English version. Thanks!
¡Apreciados backers! Esta campaña está en Inglés y Español, podrán ver la versión en Español primero, y seguido, la versión en Inglés. ¡Muchas gracias! 
 
Safe Teamwork: Protege a tu equipo de trabajo del COVID-19.
 
Safe Teamwork monitorea el bienestar de tus colaboradores así como los espacios de trabajo para garantizar la salud y seguridad de tu empresa.
 
Nuestra misión es ayudar a los negocios a mantenerse abiertos y seguros.
 
¿Recuerdas el día que todo esto empezó? ¿El día que tuviste que decirle a tus empleados que trabajaran desde casa? ¿O simplemente cerrar tu negocio y despedirte de tus trabajadores leales debido a la pandemia? Nosotros lo recordamos claramente, porque ese día, comenzamos a pensar en crear una solución para ayudar a reabrir los negocios de manera segura.
Como gerentes o administradores de negocio, necesitamos saber quién está en riesgo o quién ha sido afectado por el COVID-19, ya que las empresas por ley tienen el deber de cuidar a sus empleados.
No completar una evaluación de riesgos que tenga en cuenta el COVID-19, podría constituir una infracción de la ley de salud y seguridad en el trabajo.
Safe Teamwork incluye una evaluación de riesgo individual para cada empleado que ayuda a abordar este problems. Además, si un empleado resulta positivo para COVID-19, se debe notificar al encargado para que pueda coordinar los implementos necesarios para el trabajo desde casa y también lleve el informe correspondiente a las autoridades de salud y seguridad.
Safe Teamwork incluye una función de notificación de incidentes para que esta información se centralice y se realice un seguimiento adecuado. Creemos firmemente que la única forma de reactivar la economía y mantener seguros a los trabajadores implica lo siguiente: 1. Contar con una normativa clara y mecanismos de seguimiento que permitan mantener las condiciones de bioseguridad adecuadas para prevenir la propagación del virus.
2. Sensibilizar a las personas ante esta nueva realidad y mantener el autocuidado y respeto a dichas normas.
3. Empresas que puedan asegurar que sus espacios de trabajo cumplan con las normas y que valoren el bienestar y la salud de sus trabajadores.
Para poner en marcha estos 3 elementos proponemos el uso de la tecnología, que facilita los procesos y al mismo tiempo genera hábitos positivos en las personas tanto en los espacios de trabajo como en el hogar.
Para solucionar los problemas antes mencionados, hemos desarrollado una solución tecnológica llamada Safe Teamwork, que combina una plataforma web y una aplicación móvil para gestionar de forma integral las operaciones de empresas u organizaciones en el contexto de la pandemia.

El sistema es fácil de configurar y económico de operar. Protegemos tu privacidad al no necesitar de Bluetooth o GPS para saber tu ubicación. Safe Teamwork es una aplicación web y móvil con 4 elementos principales: 
Creación de perfiles de riesgo epidemiológico para los empleados.

story:
We notice the importance of hygiene practices. Young kids, the elderly, adults with weak immunity and even smokers are at higher risk of infection.

We have launched CleanAire, the world’s first portable product that incorporates ozone and Ultraviolet C (UVC) rays for combined sterilisation.

With its dual disinfection capabilities, CleanAire provides users with 360° protection against germs in the immediate environment, thoroughly sterilising the air and surface areas within a  2 square meter (21.5 square feet) radius. Let's protect the health of you and your loved ones!

How It Works

When exposed to germs, UVC rays compromise their DNA (Deoxyribonucleic acid) and RNA (Ribonucleic acid) structures, stopping reproduction and interaction with human cells. By emitting UVC rays from a concealed and harmless light source, CleanAire provides users with protection while using the product. 

Providing an extensive approach to sterilisation, CleanAire also comes with a built-in ozone generator. The ozone generated into the air is able to bypass shielded areas as well as obstacles and sets off a biochemical oxidation reaction that destroys the DNA and RNA of germs.

Usage Instructions

Offering a user-friendly interface and not to mention a sleek and chic design, CleanAire is created to operate with just one touch power switch. To start using CleanAire, touch and hold the power switch – located at the top of the device – for 5 seconds and let it run its course. You will see the atmosphere lamp of the cartoon rabbit and UV tube light up while the device is running. CleanAire will thoroughly sterilise the air and surface for 30 minutes at a time, and will automatically shut off upon completion of its task.

To charge the device fully, simply connect it to a USB cable and power source for 2 – 3 hours. During charging, the power indicator will flash regularly. Once fully charged, the indicator will stop flashing. Each full charge will yield up to 15 rounds of automatic sterilisation.

Please note:

  • Ozone smell may be detected while the device is working in a closed area. Once sterilization is done, ozone will gradually turn to oxygen and leave no smell. 

  • There will be low static noise from the ozone generator while the device is working.

Application Scenarios

The portable nature of CleanAire allows for various applications across multiple scenarios and locations. Measuring at just 120 mm x 56 mm (4.7 in x 2.2 in), CleanAire can fit comfortably in backpacks, handbags and any luggage for ease of carrying.

CleanAire can also be placed on desks at work to clean the air in the immediate vicinity; given that workstations are places most people spend substantial amounts of time apart from personal spaces such as homes.

Regardless of dining in or out, the compact nature of the device makes it convenient to place on the dining table for sterilisation while eating, offering comprehensive protection within the immediate area.

With cars being another location that we frequent and regularly interact with others at, it is vital to disinfect the interiors as thoroughly as possible. Turn on CleanAire and leave it working for 30 minutes while running errands, further maximising time spent.

Apart from open areas, CleanAire can also be used in small spaces such as wardrobes and cabinets. Before the contents are used, let CleanAire clean the air within the storage area and on the objects to increase further protection.

While bathrooms are usually associated with personal hygiene. Take action and prevent incubation by disinfecting bathrooms with CleanAire.

Testimonials

Specifications 

Certification

CleanAire has been certified by the Guangdong Detection Centre of Microbiology to have maximum sterilisation rates of 99.9%.

Shipping

Our product is ready for shipping to United States, Canada, Europe, Australia, New Zealand, Malaysia, Hongkong, and Singapore.

  • Shipping within Singapore is free.

  • International shipping fare will vary based on destination and is not inclusive of taxes and duties (if any).

If your country is not included in the list, don't hesitate to let us know. When there is enough demand, we will be able to arrange shipping. 

Media

  • Live event with HoneyKids Asia - Recorded Video Link

  • Featured in HoneyKids Asia blog - Article Link

  • Featured in The Straits Times - Article Link

  • Featured in tech360.tv - Article Link

  • Featured in Alvinology.com technology blog - Article Link

  • Featured in superadrianme.com technology blog - Article Link

  • Featured in AVENUE ONE Magazine - Article Link

  • Featured in Home & Decor Singapore Magazine - Article Link

  • Featured in Expat Living Singapore Magazine

  • Featured in zaobao - Article Link

About Us

Initially launched in Singapore at the start of 2020, CleanAire seeks to allay the fears of today’s increasingly health-conscious consumers across the globe through our first product - dubbed CleanAire, the eponymous portable air and surface steriliser.

We are a part of NVC International, a global leader in the lighting industry founded since 1998. CleanAire leverages on NVC International's cutting edge technology and innovation to hopefully become your one-stop shop for total hygiene solutions in the future.

Why Indiegogo?

CleanAire has been launched in Southeast Asia – starting with Singapore early this year before it was rolled out to further countries in the region. However, we are not stopping there; we have ambitions of bringing CleanAire onto the wider international stage. To do that, we believe that it is essential to establish relationships with health-conscious and tech enthusiasts individuals who go to crowdfunding platforms such as Indiegogo to discover innovative products. 

In gathering feedback and first-hand reviews from the international community, we aim to solidify our credentials and use them to further grow CleanAire as a brand. We cannot wait for the rest of the world to try CleanAire and appreciate your contribution to our project. 

Follow us on social media and check out our official websites:

  • Facebook 

  • Instagram 

  • CleanAire Website
story_txt:
We notice the importance of hygiene practices. Young kids, the elderly, adults with weak immunity and even smokers are at higher risk of infection. We have launched CleanAire, the world’s first portable product that incorporates ozone and Ultraviolet C (UVC) rays for combined sterilisation. With its dual disinfection capabilities, CleanAire provides users with 360° protection against germs in the immediate environment, thoroughly sterilising the air and surface areas within a  2 square meter (21.5 square feet) radius. Let's protect the health of you and your loved ones!How It WorksWhen exposed to germs, UVC rays compromise their DNA (Deoxyribonucleic acid) and RNA (Ribonucleic acid) structures, stopping reproduction and interaction with human cells. By emitting UVC rays from a concealed and harmless light source, CleanAire provides users with protection while using the product. Providing an extensive approach to sterilisation, CleanAire also comes with a built-in ozone generator. The ozone generated into the air is able to bypass shielded areas as well as obstacles and sets off a biochemical oxidation reaction that destroys the DNA and RNA of germs.Usage InstructionsOffering a user-friendly interface and not to mention a sleek and chic design, CleanAire is created to operate with just one touch power switch. To start using CleanAire, touch and hold the power switch – located at the top of the device – for 5 seconds and let it run its course. You will see the atmosphere lamp of the cartoon rabbit and UV tube light up while the device is running. CleanAire will thoroughly sterilise the air and surface for 30 minutes at a time, and will automatically shut off upon completion of its task.

To charge the device fully, simply connect it to a USB cable and power source for 2 – 3 hours. During charging, the power indicator will flash regularly. Once fully charged, the indicator will stop flashing. Each full charge will yield up to 15 rounds of automatic sterilisation.
Please note:

Ozone smell may be detected while the device is working in a closed area. Once sterilization is done, ozone will gradually turn to oxygen and leave no smell. 
There will be low static noise from the ozone generator while the device is working.

Application Scenarios

The portable nature of CleanAire allows for various applications across multiple scenarios and locations. Measuring at just 120 mm x 56 mm (4.7 in x 2.2 in), CleanAire can fit comfortably in backpacks, handbags and any luggage for ease of carrying.
CleanAire can also be placed on desks at work to clean the air in the immediate vicinity; given that workstations are places most people spend substantial amounts of time apart from personal spaces such as homes.Regardless of dining in or out, the compact nature of the device makes it convenient to place on the dining table for sterilisation while eating, offering comprehensive protection within the immediate area.With cars being another location that we frequent and regularly interact with others at, it is vital to disinfect the interiors as thoroughly as possible. Turn on CleanAire and leave it working for 30 minutes while running errands, further maximising time spent.Apart from open areas, CleanAire can also be used in small spaces such as wardrobes and cabinets. Before the contents are used, let CleanAire clean the air within the storage area and on the objects to increase further protection.While bathrooms are usually associated with personal hygiene. Take action and prevent incubation by disinfecting bathrooms with CleanAire.TestimonialsSpecifications CertificationCleanAire has been certified by the Guangdong Detection Centre of Microbiology to have maximum sterilisation rates of 99.9%.ShippingOur product is ready for shipping to United States, Canada, Europe, Australia, New Zealand, Malaysia, Hongkong, and Singapore.
Shipping within Singapore is free.
International shipping fare will vary based on destination and is not inclusive of taxes and duties (if any).
If your country is not included in the list, don't hesitate to let us know. When there is enough demand, we will be able to arrange shipping. MediaLive event with HoneyKids Asia - Recorded Video LinkFeatured in HoneyKids Asia blog - Article LinkFeatured in The Straits Times - Article LinkFeatured in tech360.tv - Article LinkFeatured in Alvinology.com technology blog - Article LinkFeatured in superadrianme.com technology blog - Article LinkFeatured in AVENUE ONE Magazine - Article LinkFeatured in Home & Decor Singapore Magazine - Article LinkFeatured in Expat Living Singapore MagazineFeatured in zaobao - Article LinkAbout UsInitially launched in Singapore at the start of 2020, CleanAire seeks to allay the fears of today’s increasingly health-conscious consumers across the globe through our first product - dubbed CleanAire, the eponymous portable air and surface steriliser.We are a part of NVC International, a global leader in the lighting industry founded since 1998. CleanAire leverages on NVC International's cutting edge technology and innovation to hopefully become your one-stop shop for total hygiene solutions in the future.Why Indiegogo?CleanAire has been launched in Southeast Asia – starting with Singapore early this year before it was rolled out to further countries in the region. However, we are not stopping there; we have ambitions of bringing CleanAire onto the wider international stage. To do that, we believe that it is essential to establish relationships with health-conscious and tech enthusiasts individuals who go to crowdfunding platforms such as Indiegogo to discover innovative products. In gathering feedback and first-hand reviews from the international community, we aim to solidify our credentials and use them to further grow CleanAire as a brand. We cannot wait for the rest of the world to try CleanAire and appreciate your contribution to our project. Follow us on social media and check out our official websites:
Facebook 
Instagram 
CleanAire Website

story:
Arctic X helps in different parts of your body

 

How to use Arctic X?

Regular and orthodox use of the arc prevents and treats stiffness, pain, and ailments. It improves mobility and speeds up recovery. It also refreshes your mind and improves work efficiency.

What does experts say about Arctic-X?

Caira design draws its inspiration from the beautiful nature of Lapland. Our product line consists of high quality, stylish and ecological wellness products that are made using the best natural materials, respecting traditional craftsmanship methods.

Our ancestors moved in the wild, fishing, hunting and gathering berries. Their bodies were in harmony with nature. Today, people are sitting in the office, driving a car, and browsing cell phone. The back is sore, the shoulders are stuck, and the head is overwhelmed. Even then, life must go on, and that is why we developed the ARCTIC X massage arc.

story:
Our campaign was featured at AskMen.com as a "Best of" Kickstarter project!

 

Since the Silver is bonded to the cotton at a molecular level, it doesn’t wear off. Even after 50 washes, the SGS testing agency found the towel was still greater than 99% effective!

 

BackerLand

 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We have the prototypes and have done the SGS testing for effectiveness. The factory we are working with has 12+ years of experience making textiles, so we're confident they can deliver. The biggest risks are delays, which we will do our best to avoid by working closely with the factory on timelines.

story:
About

 

Looking for a cool, premium and affordable golf glove?

So were we but we couldn’t find any. So we decided to make one ourselves and we aced it! We felt there was no reason for a premium golf glove to be so expensive and we also felt that they could look a lot less lame.
 


Instructions. You got this!

The Ace Case (limited supply)

FINALLY a smart and cool way to store your golf gloves so that banana you forgot in your bag (again) doesn't f*ck them up. It can hold up to 8 golf gloves plus it has a pocket for your phone and other stuff. 5 fresh color ways are now available for pre order.

 

The Colour Options

The Gloves Sizing Options

Major Ace aims to leave no golfer behind and will serve man woman or cadet, both right and left handed eventually. However, to ensure timely delivery after this campaign we won't be offering cadet sizes at this moment. Sorry! The sizing/fit is comparable to that of our big brand competitors and we’ll ask for your hand + size after the campaign is over.

Hassle-free returns

Wrong size after all? No sweat! We won't leave you hanging. Simply return your glove(s) to us and we’ll send you the right size free of charge.

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We have been working on Major Ace for the past 18 months because we wanted to make sure that every element is perfected. We're confident we'll be able to execute production and delivery smoothly and on time. We set out to make a truly awesome and amazing looking glove, and we're very proud of the final product. The next important milestone will be mass-production and we've already made lots of progress on that frontier. We know that unexpected delays could happen, but we're fully committed to ensuring all our backers will get the best product and on time.

story:
Why Are We Making A Cardio Turf War Fitness App/Game?

We're raising $10,000 to build an MVP for our social, gamified cardio fitness app. Why?

Well, let's be real: Cardio is boring. Like really, really boring...

As a bored college kid stuck in his apartment during quarantine during the global-health-crisis-that-shant-be-named, my cardio fitness plan of amateur 5-on-5 basketball & running to the bars was disrupted. And in its place was a fate I wouldn't wish on my worst enemy: running by myself.

It was awful...so I tried to spice it up with other cardio fitness apps. And they were equally awful!

Sadly, most of the apps you can use for tracking your cardio activities and workouts are equally boring. What's the point of using an app to track your cardio if you don't feel inspired enough to get out there and do the workout at all? While there are dozens of apps that offer leaderboards to show off your vanity metrics, and apps that offer gimmicks you engage with by yourself, there are few options that make cardio a social and gamified experience while rewarding everyone, whether they run marathons daily or walk their dog down the block.

So we're changing that!

Introducing Cardii.io (Pronounced "Cardio"), the newest way to turn something most people hate into something fun, engaging, competitive, and collaborative, by turning your running, walking, and biking into turf you fight for with your friends against your foes!

So what makes our app different to the dozens that already exist in the cardio fitness space? How will we create an experience so fun people who hate cardio will want to get outside and move?

Great question!

Our focus is strictly on creating a fun, dynamic community around cardio, with these primary factors being the core of our product:

  • Socially collaborative & competitive community letting you engage with people in your area, and beyond in your cardio workouts
  • Interact with teammates and opposing teams in your city & beyond!

  • Direct message friends & foes, as well as create Reddit-style threads to chat with your teammates!

 

  • Running, Biking, Walking? It doesn't matter - our app is made to make whatever cardio you do fun & dynamic! Whether you're walking your dog, running a marathon, or anything in-between, you can capture turf & make whatever you do a bit more fun!
  • Gamified experience more about enjoying your cardio method of choice than forcing you to be a marathoner or sprinter!

 

 

  • Leaderboards and scoring systems centered around activity, team success, and strategy over speed, distance

 

 

  • App customizations for your avatar, claimed territory, forming teams and personal fitness goals setting to make your experience exactly what you want it!

 

 

  • Finish challenges based around your cardio methods of choice!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising $10,000 over the next 30 days. Funding will be used to bring on a full-time dev to finish our prototype and raise our pre-seed, whether we hit our goal or not!

  • For perks, we are offering people...
    • Becoming a beta-user
    • Free in-app purchases!
    • Free premium subscription! 
    • Add an in-app purchase option for the app!

The Impact

Beyond being a fun way to get your cardio in, the real impact we want to make with this app is creating an environment where those (like me) who suck at doing cardio consistently become inspired & even excited to get out and move.

Whether it be mid-afternoon, a quick 10 min jog down the road, or even walking your dog, we hope to create a digital community of casual exercisers that feel motivated to get out and do something everyday with friends in their area and beyond it!

Risks & Challenges

There are several risk here. For one, there are dozens of other cardio fitness apps out there. There is also an app that is similar in nature to what we do we turf capturing - however, we feel like we can not only compete with these apps, but conquer them. Only about 41% of runners consistently use apps as of June 2020, and those who didn't said it was mainly because of "a lack of utility". In other words, tracking their stats and repetitive feedback loop type of games were boring to them, and therefore wasn't enough for them to use an app. However, for products that can transcend only that utility (Peloton, Nike Run Club, and others) they become widely used & retain their users. Our strategy has been tested with over 60 user interviews from different personas, with months of research, fine-tuning, and crafting. We've also earned advisory from the Founder of Map My Run, a cardio fitness app acquired by Under Armor for $150 million, as well as from former Pokemon Go Engineers & Peloton executives. With our research, our team, and our advisory, we believe our product can be successful in the market, and help million become more consistent in their cardio fitness by making it fun!

Other Ways You Can Help

In the case you can't donate, that's no biggie!

Another way to support us would be to join our beta list for free by visiting our website www.cardii.io.

You can also share this page with others who would be interested in supporting and becoming early users of the platform we're creating for walkers, runners, and bikers everywhere!

Our strategy has been tested with over 60 user interviews from different personas, with months of research, fine-tuning, and crafting.
