story:
Idea

Hi! I’m Jan, a programmer, husband and proud father of three great kids:


Why am I here? Well, life sometimes prepares challenges which make our time more difficult. All of my kids have asthma. 

They’re on various medications like syrups, tablets and inhalers all the time. Dosage greatly varies and is often changed according to their needs, so my wife has to make notes and manually calculate the amount of meds which we actually have in packages. Some are easy to check, just visually (tablets or syrups), but others are quite complicated (especially inhalers like Ventolin and Flixotide).

One day, I got an idea. Can we use our smartphone to track all of this stuff? Yes! Why not? Hmm, but is there an app able to do this? Sadly not. I did some research, but apps out there function  just as reminders.

This brought me to the decision - I can create the app by myself. Yes, it’ll be a challenge, but it’d help my family and others. A brand new free app for android! And with help of some guys here, it could be developed even faster!

And so the MTracker was born.

What I Need

The biggest concern is my old hardware used for the project. It’s an old office laptop from 2005 (some Celeron CPU, 4GB RAM, Ubuntu). That’s fine for browsing and emails. It’s just terribly slow for Android studio and other related stuff.

The money raised here will be used for:

  • Hardware upgrade, something that  is more up to date with i5 or i7 and 16GB RAM (discrete graphics is not my interest as I lived with integrated ones more than 11 years)
  • App related stuff like icons, libraries, ...

So far, I have spent 10$ on the logo and icon (outsourced), some hours on the design, icon search, ER diagrams, mock-ups and 70$ for my new case. You can check some ER diagrams and screen mock-ups here (just partial screenshots):



What You Get

A brand new android  app called "MTracker" with these features:

  • medication tracking for multiple patients (separate treatment plans)
  • an option to change plans on-the-fly with automatic recalculation
  • nice statistic data (graphs, charts, reports)
  • database export/import
  • a choice to track other items like bandages (filtered by category)
  • a simple summary of your actual storage
  • and a reminder of course

Basic timeline

  1. Initial design (ER diagrams, screen mock-ups) - COMPLETED
  2. Initial implementation of program core (1-2 months)
  3. Voting - every backer (>10 €) is invited to Trello board (2 weeks; NOTE: this phase will start after campaign end)
  4. Implementation of selected features
  5. Testing phase 1 (1 - 2 weeks)
  6. Beta version release published on Google Play (1 day)
  7. Testing phase 2 (1-2 weeks)
  8. Final release on Google Play (1 day)

The Impact

Among classical “to make this world a better place”, there are some practical (real world) consequences:

  • It can be used by anyone
  • This mobile app will be free forever (no annoying ads, no hidden fees)
  • My android knowledge should increase :)

Risks & Challenges

I’m not an android programmer, so this could be a small challenge. But I love challenges (meaningful ones). On the other hand, there are two risks which could delay/stop this project: my death or really serious health issues like blindness).

I hope this won’t be the case here :)

Also  lack of money could slow down the project, but I’m still motivated to finish it somehow, probably with less features.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. Here are  other ways how to participate:

  • You can make some noise about this project on Facebook, G+, Twitter, you name it. And you can use the Indiegogo share buttons!
  • You can be a translator of this app. The more languages, the better. This will be necessary in the final stage when the app is almost done.
  • You can send some practical advice about look and user experience.
  • You can always donate some hardware (but please, not obsolete).
  • You can create a new app name if you think there's more suitable one :)

story:
There are several factors that affect your sleep quality, like snoring, insomnia, and body position to name a few. EverSleep identifies these and other problems that interfere with your sleep and then gives you the knowledge to take control and wake up rested. 

Snoring disrupts those you're sleeping with just as much as it disrupts your own sleep. EverSleep monitors you snoring and determines how and why it's happening. EverSleep then gives you specific coaching actions to tackle your snoring problems.
 



Whether you can't get to sleep, can't stay asleep or you wake up too early, EverSleep analyses your insomnia, and coaches you through it.
 

EverSleep helps measure the effectiveness of your CPAP, and if there's a concern, we'll alert you to talk to your doctor. 

 



 

Using four lab-quality sensors, EverSleep tracks over 20 different aspects of your sleep.
 


 


 


 


 


 



 


 


 


 






 

 

 

 

 

 

The free iOS and Android app lets you easily set up and manage your profile, track your data trends, and receive coaching specific to improving your sleep.

 

 

 

 

What you get with your pre-order

 

 

 

EverSleep takes all the same technology used in sleep labs and shrinks it down into a comfortable and wireless package.

EverSleep is the only consumer sleep device that measures blood oxygen, pulse rate, breathing disturbances, awake/sleep movements, snoring, bedtimes, and insomnias. 

We aggregate 40 complex measurements, and then correlate those against your detailed profile and nightly sleep-related questions. Our coaching engine then analyzes over 5,000 combinations to deliver very detailed coaching specific to your night of sleep. 

While other devices may show a graph or a month's worth of pulse rate data, EverSleep is like having a coach at your side every morning. 

 

EverSleep was created by a group of experienced engineers, entrepreneurs, and sleep techs. Together they have brought over 25 FDA approved medical devices to market, own 20+ medical device patents, and have decades of experience. Their goal is to make understanding the science behind your sleep easier than ever.

 

 

 

 

EverSleep is ready for production. Here are our Functional prototypes made with real injection-molded housings and our final circuit boards communicating patient data to a PC via USB for engineering development.

 

 

We are able to ship worldwide. We can't ship to the following select countries: Brazil, Chile, China, Ecuador, India, Israel, Peru, Qatar, South Africa, South Korea, Taiwan, and Turkey.VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

We plan to ship the product in October 2017*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.   

*Actual ship dates may vary. International orders subject to CE certification will ship once certification is registered.We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

EverSleep may ship to you directly or from Amazon.  The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. The recipient of orders shipped outside the United States may be subject to significant import taxes, VAT, customs duties, and fees levied by the destination country, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; shipper has no control over these charges, nor can shipper predict what they may be.

Customs policies vary widely from country to country; you should contact your local customs office for more information. When customs clearance procedures are required, it can cause delays beyond our original delivery estimates.

By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first EverSleep devices off the line plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 




What is EverSleep? EverSleep is the world’s most advanced consumer sleep tracker. We use hospital-grade infra-red oximetry technology to monitor your blood oxygen level 30 times per second while you sleep. We combine this with pulse rate measurement, snore, and movement to generate a complete physiological analysis of your night.
How will EverSleep's Coaching help me sleep better? EverSleep gathers much more information than other sleep trackers, AND we correlate those measurements with profile and nightly questions that you answer.   For example, did you know that some insomnia is caused by breathing disruption?  If we measure several breathing disruptions in the few minutes before you wake up with middle-of-the-night insomnia, AND you’ve answered “yes” to a question about "allergies, stuffy nose, or other breathing difficulties", EverSleep coaches you to try an over-the-counter allergy medication.  Often clearing your sinus will prevent the insomnia!  In another interesting example, did you know that fast pulse rate episodes can “fragment” your sleep, causing you to lose precious “quality” sleep time?  If we measure several fast pulse rate episodes, we can calculate how much quality sleep you’ve “lost” due to those episodes.  Now, if you’ve answered “yes” to the question “I’ve had caffeine after lunch”, we correlate the fast pulse rate episodes to the caffeine consumption.  Maybe you are especially sensitive to caffeine but don’t know it - many people are.  This is why you THINK you slept 8 hours, but really only had a few hours of quality sleep.  Our coaching would be to try a few nights without caffeine, and wear the EverSleep again.  We bet you’ll sleep better!
Why is EverSleep different than other sleep trackers? Wearable trackers like the FitBit, Apple Watch, Jawbone, Polar, Withings, Beddit, Misfit, etc., can only measure your movement while you sleep - they rate your sleep by how much you move. EverSleep measures your blood oxygen level, pulse rate, snore, AND movement to help you determine WHY you are sleeping badly.  Then it gives detailed COACHING tips to help with your specific problems.
What is Sleep Fragmentation? People generally sleep in 4 stages.   Stage one is light sleep, typically the first ten minutes of sleeping.  Stage two is about 40 minutes of moderate sleep, your body is getting ready to restore itself!  Stage three is where the serious restorative work happens.  REM sleep usually follows stage 3.   Now, ANY INTERRUPTION in this pattern and you have to “go back” to stage 1 and start over!  This is the problem with sleep apnea, pulse rate “spikes”, involuntary movements, breathing disruptions, insomnias, etc.  They “fragment” your sleep, and cause you to “start over” all night!  This is why you can stay in bed for 8 hours, and you think you’ve been asleep but you didn’t get the QUALITY sleep that you needed.
What is Sleep Apnea? Sleep Apnea is a condition where the soft tissue in your tongue and throat collapses as your muscles relax during sleep. This restriction in your breathing causes snoring, reduced oxygen levels (hypopnea), or even a complete closure of your airway, literally leaving you choking or gasping for air many times per night. Millions of Americans today have undiagnosed sleep apnea, which left untreated, can lead to chronic inflammation and a slew of other medical problems. Sleep apnea is linked to a number of serious chronic diseases, including: Diabetes, Drug Resistant Hypertension / High Blood Pressure, Heart Attack, Stroke, Congestive Heart Failure, and Obesity
How do I know if I need EverSleep? Do you Snore? Are you a restless or "Light" Sleeper?  Do you have trouble falling or staying asleep?  Are you tired during the day? Does your spouse say you seem to stop breathing during the night?  Do you have sleep apnea?  Do you have a CPAP machine and want to monitor your oxygen levels over time? Are you exercising and eating right, and now want to measure sleep improvements?   If you answered YES to any of the above, EverSleep is for you. EverSleep can do all of this in the palm of your hand because it is the only sleep tracker to measure your oxygen levels continuously during the night, with the added benefit of NO ongoing fees or subscriptions.
You mentioned blood oxygen, does EverSleep use needles or draw your blood? EverSleep is completely non-invasive, there are no needles or blood, nothing penetrates your skin. It is completely painless. We use highly calibrated red and infra-red LED lights to “look through” your finger with an advanced light sensor, and then calculate your real-time blood oxygen level. It is sensitive enough to see the changes in your oxygen levels with every pulse of your heart! We immediately sense just a few seconds of interrupted breathing as your oxygen levels drop.
Is EverSleep simple to use? Very simple! There aren’t even any buttons! Just charge EverSleep for a few hours then unplug it. When you are ready to sleep, just wear EverSleep like a wrist watch, apply the finger sensor with a small piece of medical tape (included), and tap the unit twice! In a few seconds, EverSleep lights up green, and you are ready for bed. In the morning, just take it off. EverSleep knows when you remove it, and stops recording.
My EverSleep shows that I have interrupted breathing that might be Sleep Apnea! Now what? The simple answer is to see your doctor, and try some of the self-help coaching tips from the app.  Usually, sleep apnea is caused by an obstructed airway (called “obstructive sleep apnea”) but it is sometimes caused by your brain somehow “forgetting” to breathe during sleep (called “Central Sleep Apnea”). Your doctor may suggest another sleep study in a laboratory, medications, a sleep diary, a special mouthguard or pillow, or even a CPAP machine. Users who suffer from sleep apnea and other disorders can track how treatments, sleep aids, and tips are working for them with EverSleep. Keep your eyes on our website for more information about products and tips for sleep better.  Remember that EverSleep is not a medical device and does not diagnose, treat, or cure any medical conditions. If you think you have a sleep disorder, consult your health care provider for diagnosis and treatment.
My EverSleep shows that I may NOT have Sleep Apnea, but I’m still having poor sleep. Now What? You may have Onset Insomnia (can’t get to sleep), Maintenance Insomnia (can’t stay asleep), or Early Awakening Insomnia (wake up too early.)  You may have Fragmented sleep which interferes with the deep restful sleep your body needs.  EverSleep can detect these and other sleep-related problems. Again, you should see your doctor about a laboratory sleep study for or other lifestyle changes. However, it is important to note that some people sleep badly only occasionally, and these may be cases of Transient Sleep Apnea, or maybe just a stressful week. This is the power of owning EverSleep! You can test yourself for one night or ten nights, and see how weight changes, alcohol, stress, etc. affect your sleep quality.
What about the radio frequency emissions?  EverSleep uses Bluetooth Low Energy 4.0.  To compare, remember that EverSleep broadcasts only about 20 feet while your cell phone can broadcast for 20 miles! EverSleep doesn't broadcast continuously, so an eight hour night is equivalent to one-half of a second of a cell phone call.
Who created EverSleep? The Founders are two career medical device engineers and one career sleep clinician.  The full team includes several software engineers and two more sleep clinicians. 
Why should we use EverSleep? The only sleep wearable that measures oxygen, heart rate, snoring, and movement continuously, and coaches you in the morning.  We fill the gap between simplistic fitness bracelets and a full hospital-grade sleep lab overnight study.  Own EverSleep and use it several times per month - coaching and improving your sleep every time!
How much does EverSleep cost? The Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price is $199, but you can get it for much less now during the Indiegogo campaign.  This is a special campaign only price, so hurry!
Where can we buy EverSleep? EverSleep is an exclusive Indiegogo campaign for now.  Always check www.GetEverSleep.com for more info.
What do we get when we pre-order EverSleep? In the package you get the EverSleep wrist device with attached finger sensor and a comfortable silicone strap, a USB charging cord, a small roll of medical tape (if the sensor needs a little help staying on over night) and the free app.
Why are you crowdfunding? We've completed the design of the device and sensor, and we have a working app.  We've built two separate pilot runs of 20 devices with real circuit boards, real production tooling, real cutting dies, and real molded housings.  Now we need the crowdfunding to "fill the pipeline" and purchase our first high-volume production parts orders, and purchase a few high-volume production tools   Again, the software, firmware, mechanical, and electrical engineering are done, but now we need to fund the first few thousand units.



What features are available? EverSleep is the only sleep wearable that measures oxygen, heart rate, snoring, and movement continuously, and coaches you in the morning.
What colors do you offer? Right now we're offering a white device with white sensor made from medical-grade plastics. 
What sizes do you offer? One size fits all. 
Is it comfortable / attractive / discreet? Yes! You only wear EverSleep at night. It is the size of a wristwatch with a little finger "band aid."  
Which option is best for me? No options needed.  Everybody gets the full featured unit.

 

What is the uniqueness of the technology? The only sleep wearable that measures oxygen, heart rate, snoring, and movement continuously, and coaches you in the morning.
How long does it take to charge EverSleep? Any USB port will charge the EverSleep in just 2 hours. One charge lasts 16 hours of sleep analysis. A USB charging cable is included with EverSleep.
What are the dimensions and weight? 1.13 Oz / 32 Grams.  1.53" wide x 2.04" long x 0.46" thick without strap and sensor
How does EverSleep work? Using two LEDs and a sensitive photodetector, we can measure your body's oxygen content 30 times per second.  This relates to sleep apneas, snoring, hypopnea, and other sleep related breathing disturbances.  We use this same technology to measure your pulse rate, and an 3-axis solid-state accelerometer to measure micro-motions in your arms as you sleep.
What kind of sensors are you using?  Very sensitive 3-axis accelerometer, a precision photodetector, and two LEDs with tuned frequency to measure blood oxygen.
Will there be updates to EverSleep in the future? Software can update over Bluetooth as more features are released.
Is my sleep data safe? EverSleep never stores your name or other personally identifiable information. You can choose to share your data with your friends, family, or your doctor if you want.
How does EverSleep integrate with other connected devices?  Bluetooth 4.0 (BTLE) to our free coaching app on your iPhone or Android mobile.
Is EverSleep waterproof? No, it's not waterproof, but it can easily be wiped with a moist cloth for cleaning.
Where is EverSleep manufactured? Colorado, United States



Does EverSleep have an app? Which phones does it work with? Yes - any Android or iPhone with Bluetooth 4.0
When will the app be available? Available when the unit releases.
Can we also access app functions on a web browser?  Some of the learning, general coaching, and how-to features are available on the www.GetEverSleep.com, but we don't transmit personally identifiable data to the server, so we can't provide any of your personal information on the browser.
How does the device connect to the app? Bluetooth 4.0 low energy (BLTE)
What can we expect from the app? Beautiful full-featured app that lets you measure your sleep, receive coaching in the morning, and review sleep trends.
Will there be updates available through the app? Yes 



How do I set up EverSleep? Just put it on your wrist like a watch.  The finger sensor attaches with a small piece of medical tape (supplied).
How do I turn EverSleep on and off? Just "double tap" directly on the unit to power on!  Just take if off and EverSleep will automatically power down. 
How do I control EverSleep? There are no controls, no user interface. Simply power it on and data will be collected via the app.
What is the care and cleaning of it? Just a simple wipe with a moist cloth or alcohol based cleaner will be fine, if needed.
Is it dishwasher safe / machine washable? No - it is not for the dishwasher or clothes washer.
Does it have an expiry date? No expiration.  You own it forever, with no subscription.



What are the recommend ages? EverSleep is recommended for ages from 10-100.
Where can I use EverSleep? Any time you go to sleep!  It is great on travel, vacation, or other times you do not sleep in your own bed.
Is EverSleep safe? Yes!  It is just as safe as wearing a wrist watch and a finger bandage to bed.  The Bluetooth communication from EverSleep to the app is not continuous and is equivalent to making a 1.2 second phone call!
What certifications does EverSleep have? FCC clearance on the Bluetooth radio module. U.S. Patents Pending
How durable is EverSleep? Very durable!  The housing is made from a combination of motorcycle helmet and bulletproof glass.  The sensor is designed to flex not break.
How is my privacy protected? We never transmit personally identifiable information to our servers.
How secure is EverSleep? BTLE is a very secure protocol with embedded encryption.  Also, the data sent between the device and your phone is obfuscated such that nobody could read or understand the information.
Can someone watch or listen to me? No, our device does not use the video camera.  The application uses the microphone on your mobile device to measure snoring, but no sounds are "recorded" (for instance in a playable "sound file").  We only measure whether or not you are snoring.
Are there any risks associated with use? No more risk than wearing a wrist watch at night with a small bandage on your finger.
Is EverSleep an FDA 510(k) cleared device? No, but the design team has spent their entire careers designing hospital-grade pulse oximeters and other medical devices. Our team has released over 40+ medical devices and holds over 25 patents. We’ve designed the EverSleep with the same technology and care as our other devices. We hope that a professional version of the device will have full FDA clearance in early 2018. Until then, we make no claim that EverSleep can treat, cure, or diagnose any disease.  If you think a medical condition may be impacting your sleep, consult your health care provider for diagnosis and treatment.

 

When does shipping begin? October 2017.
Where does it ship? US and internationally. The purchaser pays for any international shipping, import duties, taxes, and overheads.
How much is shipping? Free in the US.  International orders pay shipping, import duties, taxes, and overheads.
I'm interested in a distribution partnership. Please contact us at info@GetEverSleep.com
Do I have to pay VAT / GST? EverSleep ships to you directly from Amazon.  The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. The recipient of orders shipped outside the United States may be subject to significant import taxes, VAT, customs duties, and fees levied by the destination country, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; Amazon has no control over these charges, nor can Amazon predict what they may be. Customs policies vary widely from country to country; you should contact your local customs office for more information. When customs clearance procedures are required, it can cause delays beyond our original delivery estimates.
What are the risks & challenges of getting the device today? Very Few!!! The design is done, the injection molds are done, the electronics are completed, the firmware is completed.  All functions have been tested and the unit  has been worn for 40+ patient nights already.  The unit communicates with the app on our smartphone via bluetooth.  The crowdfunding will help fund high-volume production tooling and fixtures, but two of the founders are very experienced in high-volume medical device manufacturing.

 

Is there a warranty? 30 day warranty against defects in manufacturing or materials.
What is your refund policy?

Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped. 
What is your return / exchange policy? If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping & handling fees.
How do I upgrade my pre-order to a better one? There is no need - we are shipping the full featured device to all customers.
How do I choose more than one reward?  We offer multi-pack options. 
How can I check the status of my pre-order? Check the Indiegogo Blog, we'll be posting very frequent updates as get get closer to production.
I'm interested in becoming a Beta Tester.  Please contact us, we a specifically looking for clinicians or people already using CPAP.  info@GetEverSleep.com
Why do I have to wait longer than usual? This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build the device, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.
If I have other questions, who should I contact? Press: jonathan@bluetonemarketing.com
Investment Inquiries: info@GetEverSleep.com
Support: support@GetEverSleep.com

 

Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this! We can't do this without you.

EverSleep never stores your name or other personally identifiable information. You can choose to share your data with your friends, family, or your doctor if you want.


How does EverSleep integrate with other connected devices? 
Bluetooth 4.0 (BTLE) to our free coaching app on your iPhone or Android mobile.


Is EverSleep waterproof?
No, it's not waterproof, but it can easily be wiped with a moist cloth for cleaning.


Where is EverSleep manufactured?
Colorado, United States



Does EverSleep have an app? Which phones does it work with?
Yes - any Android or iPhone with Bluetooth 4.0


When will the app be available?
Available when the unit releases.


Can we also access app functions on a web browser? 
Some of the learning, general coaching, and how-to features are available on the www.GetEverSleep.com, but we don't transmit personally identifiable data to the server, so we can't provide any of your personal information on the browser.


How does the device connect to the app?
Bluetooth 4.0 low energy (BLTE)


What can we expect from the app?
Beautiful full-featured app that lets you measure your sleep, receive coaching in the morning, and review sleep trends.


Will there be updates available through the app?
Yes 



How do I set up EverSleep?
Just put it on your wrist like a watch.  The finger sensor attaches with a small piece of medical tape (supplied).


How do I turn EverSleep on and off?
Just "double tap" directly on the unit to power on!  Just take if off and EverSleep will automatically power down. 


How do I control EverSleep?
There are no controls, no user interface. Simply power it on and data will be collected via the app.


What is the care and cleaning of it?
Just a simple wipe with a moist cloth or alcohol based cleaner will be fine, if needed.


Is it dishwasher safe / machine washable?
No - it is not for the dishwasher or clothes washer.


Does it have an expiry date?
No expiration.  You own it forever, with no subscription.



What are the recommend ages?
EverSleep is recommended for ages from 10-100.


Where can I use EverSleep?
Any time you go to sleep!  It is great on travel, vacation, or other times you do not sleep in your own bed.


Is EverSleep safe?
Yes!  It is just as safe as wearing a wrist watch and a finger bandage to bed.  The Bluetooth communication from EverSleep to the app is not continuous and is equivalent to making a 1.2 second phone call!


What certifications does EverSleep have?
FCC clearance on the Bluetooth radio module. U.S. Patents Pending


How durable is EverSleep?
Very durable!  The housing is made from a combination of motorcycle helmet and bulletproof glass.  The sensor is designed to flex not break.


How is my privacy protected?
We never transmit personally identifiable information to our servers.


How secure is EverSleep?
BTLE is a very secure protocol with embedded encryption.  Also, the data sent between the device and your phone is obfuscated such that nobody could read or understand the information.


Can someone watch or listen to me?
No, our device does not use the video camera.  The application uses the microphone on your mobile device to measure snoring, but no sounds are "recorded" (for instance in a playable "sound file").  We only measure whether or not you are snoring.


Are there any risks associated with use?
No more risk than wearing a wrist watch at night with a small bandage on your finger.


Is EverSleep an FDA 510(k) cleared device?
No, but the design team has spent their entire careers designing hospital-grade pulse oximeters and other medical devices. Our team has released over 40+ medical devices and holds over 25 patents. We’ve designed the EverSleep with the same technology and care as our other devices. We hope that a professional version of the device will have full FDA clearance in early 2018. Until then, we make no claim that EverSleep can treat, cure, or diagnose any disease.  If you think a medical condition may be impacting your sleep, consult your health care provider for diagnosis and treatment.

 

When does shipping begin?
October 2017.


Where does it ship?
US and internationally. The purchaser pays for any international shipping, import duties, taxes, and overheads.


How much is shipping?
Free in the US.  International orders pay shipping, import duties, taxes, and overheads.


I'm interested in a distribution partnership.
Please contact us at info@GetEverSleep.com


Do I have to pay VAT / GST?
EverSleep ships to you directly from Amazon.  The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. The recipient of orders shipped outside the United States may be subject to significant import taxes, VAT, customs duties, and fees levied by the destination country, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; Amazon has no control over these charges, nor can Amazon predict what they may be. Customs policies vary widely from country to country; you should contact your local customs office for more information. When customs clearance procedures are required, it can cause delays beyond our original delivery estimates.


What are the risks & challenges of getting the device today?
Very Few!!! The design is done, the injection molds are done, the electronics are completed, the firmware is completed.  All functions have been tested and the unit  has been worn for 40+ patient nights already.  The unit communicates with the app on our smartphone via bluetooth.  The crowdfunding will help fund high-volume production tooling and fixtures, but two of the founders are very experienced in high-volume medical device manufacturing.

 

Is there a warranty?
30 day warranty against defects in manufacturing or materials.


What is your refund policy?
Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped. 


What is your return / exchange policy?
If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping & handling fees.


How do I upgrade my pre-order to a better one?
There is no need - we are shipping the full featured device to all customers.


How do I choose more than one reward? 
We offer multi-pack options. 


How can I check the status of my pre-order?
Check the Indiegogo Blog, we'll be posting very frequent updates as get get closer to production.


I'm interested in becoming a Beta Tester. 
Please contact us, we a specifically looking for clinicians or people already using CPAP.  info@GetEverSleep.com


Why do I have to wait longer than usual?
This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build the device, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.


If I have other questions, who should I contact?
Press: jonathan@bluetonemarketing.comInvestment Inquiries: info@GetEverSleep.comSupport: support@GetEverSleep.com


 Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this! We can't do this without you.

story:
We did it!

We raised $17,551 in 30 days - which is sufficient backing to put the first small batch of Claridream PRO into production!

Huge thanks to all our backers!

You can now get Claridream PRO on claridream.com

---

Do you even remember your dreams any more?

As children we used to have long, fantastic dreams filled with excitement and emotion.

But somehow - as adults in our modern world - we've become disconnected from them!

Claridream PRO will help you remember and re-connect with your dreams - in full color.

Claridream PRO uses a scientifically backed blend of 4 individual dream herb extracts.

The mixture of passion flower and valerian root will increase GABA levels. Meanwhile the club moss extract and choline will simultaneously increase levels of the neurotransmitter Acetylcholine.

Everything in our campaign is fully backed by scientific references!

And all ingredients are fully natural and classed by the US FDA as dietary supplements.

Dream Recall

We all know that we dream every night. Right?

But most people end up struggling to understand where their dreams go.

Why don't we remember our dreams anymore?

In honesty, the answer is a lack of mindfulness and awareness of the sleep process. There are well known techniques that will increase dream recall - such as keeping a dream journal, for example.

But these techniques take time before they will pay off.

Claridream PRO will literally make your dreams so vivid and colorful that your mind has no choice but to remember them!

Clear Dreams

You've probably woken up many times knowing you dreamt during the night - but the level of detail is hazy and unclear. 

Seemingly distant and just out of reach.

Sound familiar?

A truly clear dream can be life changing.

A dream as bright, colorful and real as any other day of your life.

Many of the world’s greatest inventions resulted from clear, vivid dreams - that left the inventors in no doubt when they woke up.

The active ingredients in Claridream PRO will remove that misty haze from around the edge of your dreams.

(and make you say WOW when you wake up in the morning)

Colorful Dreams

Chinese club moss extract (Huperzine-A) is renowned for its influence on the colorfulness of dreams.

I'm talking rich hues of red, deep shades of blue and intensely bright yellows.

You know those colors you get when you press on the back of your eyelids?

Imagine that - but multiplied by about 100x.

This is where the rainbow colors of the Claridream PRO logo were born from.

Lucid Dreams

The ultimate dream is a truly lucid dream.

In a lucid dream, you are aware you are dreaming whilst the dream is occurring.

And sometimes you will even have full control of your actions inside the dream world!

Many people experience short lucid dreams naturally from time to time. But lucid dreaming is also a learnable skill!

Once proficient, you can choose to fly, visit alien civilizations, practice skills, tackle phobias and examine your own fears and insecurities - all in the peace and security of your own sleeping mind.

Chinese club moss extract is a scientifically proven lucidity trigger.

Claridream PRO will dramatically increase your chances of having a lucid dream. And when used in conjunction with lucid dreaming techniques, it's a virtual guarantee.

You want to know the truth about lucid dreaming?

Sure, it's become all the rage recently.

It's a highly marketable concept, right? 

Actually becoming conscious inside the dream world - and all the possibilities that lucidity opens up for you.

But we’re going to tell you a secret. 

The eye mask and head band companies won’t tell you this.

Neither will the other supplement companies.

Lucid dreaming is a skill that is roughly comparable to learning a language or playing an instrument, in terms of the time you need to invest.

There's more to lucid dreaming that just taking our supplement, or putting on a headband.

Yes, it is a life-changing skill. And it's 100% worth doing.

That's why we dedicate time to practicing it.

And that's why:

We include with Claridream PRO, lifetime access to Lucid Dreaming Fast Track our digital platform for lucid dreaming education (RRP $47).

You will join over 5,000 satisfied customers who have used our online platform to teach themselves the art of dream control since 2013.

The course is broken down into 10-minute lessons each night.

And since it's a beautiful, responsive platform, you can learn on your tablet or mobile from the comfort of your couch in the evenings (we suggest a chamomile tea to go with it!).

Here’s a sample of what is covered:

  • Deep relaxation - an essential precursor to dream incubation.
  • Effective visualization - to create intricate dreamscapes while you're lying awake in bed.
  • Dream chaining - how to lucidly re-enter a dream from which you've just awoken.
  • False Awakenings - step by step techniques to convert them into lucid dreams.
  • Nightmares - how to stop them and turn them to lucid dreams.
  • Self Hypnosis - how you can plant the initial seeds of lucidity.
  • Program Dreams in Advance - how to seed your desired dreamscape or dream plot.
  • Summoning Dream Characters - and using your dreaming imagination to play with them.
  • Seeking Wisdom From Your Subconscious - how to communicate with the inner awareness behind your dreams.
  • Lucid Dream Therapy - how to help with anxiety, depression and phobias.
  • Digitally mastered hypnosis and meditation audios - to support your training and help you relax

So it works out perfectly.

Back our campaign and spend 10 minutes in the evenings educating yourself!

Then, when your Claridream PRO drops in through in the mail - you'll be 100% ready to experience mind-blowingly colorful lucid dreams.

That’s why Claridream PRO is more than just a supplement, it’s the world’s only complete dream control system.

We are The World of Lucid Dreaming.

The web’s fullest, most trusted and evidence-based web community on the subject of lucid dreaming.

Founded in 2008, we receive over 4 million visitors every year, have 275,000 Facebook fans and an active community forum of 4,000 regular members and 30,000 email subscribers.

We have over 300 free articles on the learnable skill of lucid dreaming.

And each and every one is based on scientific evidence and peer reviewed studies.

When we looked around the dreaming supplement industry, we didn't like what we saw!

Everything seemed to be in two camps.

On the one hand, there were a small number of sexy brands - but they were using ingredients in paltry amounts. To be honest, we never felt any effects from them.

On the other hand, there were a few brands of generic supplements. These delivered results, but MISSED OUT on potential synergies with other dream herbs.

These synergies were only available to those that were willing to order several separate supplements - and willing to spend hours online reading conflicting reports of what worked and what didn't!

We thought we could improve the situation.

So we set out with a single mind to create the BEST dream enhancement supplement on the market. Period.

Our core principal - we WOULD NOT SKIMP on dosage to reduce cost.

So in January 2016 we set out to research and develop a dream enhancement formula that was second to none.

First Claridream PRO formula mockup - July 2016

Claridream PRO is based on countless hours of researching different dream herbs, what works and what doesn't.

The result is a strong, no-gimmicks product based on 40mg Huperzine-A powder, 140mg valerian root and 34mg passion flower.

Oh - and 260mg chamomile extract as well. This we include for its sleep and relaxation benefits. You see, we found people were getting too excited at the prospect of vivid dreams - and needed something to help them relax and drift off :)

And like everything we do, it's backed by solid science. Both valerian root and passion flower act on GABA receptors. Now GABA and Acetylcholine are released at the same time in the brain. And this is what makes Claridream PRO such an effective product.

Because we haven't skimped, our cost base is higher than any of the other products out there.

If you were to buy these 5 supplements individually, it would cost you over $70 (and that's not including postage!)

But, this is the absolute best blend you can get for dream enhancement - and it actually works.

We don't hide behind a Proprietary Blend either.

Our label is 100% transparent, so you can see exactly what you are getting.

Why do we need your help?

Some of the ingredients in Claridream PRO are expensive and hard to find. Contract manufacturers with the right experience are few and far between.

The high minimum order quantities needed to produce this supplement are beyond our reach.

We have our formula finalized and well tested. FDA compliant labeling and packaging has been approved. And we have great contract manufacturing and fulfillment partners selected.

We know Claridream PRO works and we want to bring reliable dream enhancement to the wider world.

To put Claridream PRO into full scale production, in an FDA approved, GMP certified production facility, we need $50,000.

Back us today and help make this dream a reality.

How many times a week can I take Claridream PRO?

Our product is strong and due to the intense nature of the experience, we recommend taking Claridream PRO no more than once a week.

Are there any side effects?

As with any product, there are always some known side effects that can occur in a small number of cases or a rare allergic reaction. Most people will not experience any of these side effects. Minor stomach cramps or muscle twitches are occasionally reported.

Are there any contraindications?

Don't take Claridream PRO if you are pregnant or breast feeding. Also, if you are already taking any prescription medications or antidepressants then we recommend playing safe and avoiding Claridream PRO for now.

How will I get my FREE access to Lucid Dreaming Fast Track

When you back our campaign, Indiegogo send us a note of your email address. As this is a one-time campaign, there is no automated process to create your account. So we will create your account and email you with login details. This will be a top priority for us! It could be upto a few hours before you get your details. But please bear with us and keep in mind we also need a little time to eat, sleep, breath etc :)

Surely there's a disclaimer?

Yup, here we go.

These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat or cure any disease.

Consult your doctor before taking Claridream PRO.

story:
This campaign is near and dear to my heart, because I have had to personally experience the problem at hand. I was in a house fire that resulted in amputations of two of my limbs. Having lived the limitations from wearing Prosthetics due to constant pain, I decided to turn my pain into purpose by coming up with a solution to the problem. As a psychologist, I can say the problem is not only physical, as it has an emotional component as well. For instance, amputees may feel as though they are prisoners in their own body, which can trigger isolation, discouragement, and even depression.
 
Through the frustrations of not being able to attend many important events or simply take a short walk, I tried several homemade solutions. Then the idea for a product came to mind, but I realized I would need professional help to bring it to life. Now I have retained the service of a company that would be in charge of production. I have already invested several thousands of dollars in the project. However, I would need funding to make the idea come to fruition, hence the reason for this campaign, which is a relaunch. Below is the link to the previous campaign.
 
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/turning-pain...
 
Any contribution will be greatly appreciated, as it will transform the lives of many. Aside from monetary contribution, sharing this campaign would also be a huge help. Thank you in advance for your support.

Aside from monetary contribution, sharing this campaign would also be a huge help. Thank you in advance for your support.

story:
Experience Immediate Back Pain Relief

Personalized relief with cold or heat and soothing-to-intense vibrating massage.

DuoTherm puts the power of pain control at the touch of a button.

DuoTherm Has Your Back

80% of People Experience Back Pain

Whether injury or strain, physical problems need physical solutions. Pharmaceuticals like opioids are addictive: for the 120 million people with pain, we need better options NOW.

DuoTherm combines 14 years of vibration studies, pain research, and common sense into a single, effective, pain relieving device.

If you experience chronic back pain or acute pain from a recent injury, DuoTherm has your back.

No single therapy solves chronic pain.

Because pain changes by the day and even hour,

YOU NEED OPTIONS.

Research-Supported Therapy

The new DuoTherm uses six different scientifically proven pain relief methods to take power over your pain. The best judge of what makes you feel better is YOU.

Promotes blood flow and stimulates acute and sharp pain blocking nerves through "Gate Control"

Decreases spasm and reduces chronic strain pain locally with TENS-comparable frequencies

Relaxes tense and spasming muscles, promotes blood flow, replaces pain with comfort

Reduces inflammation and swelling, blocks pain with gate control and pain relieving feedback loop

Relaxes spasmed muscles by focusing massage on myofascial trigger points

Science shows that the more control we have over something, the less we perceive pain. DuoTherm puts the power of pain control in your hands.

DuoTherm is the ONLY device to combine

high-frequency vibration with ice or heat for immediate pain relief.

Whether your pain is from sitting in an office, standing in a hospital or restaurant, driving for a living, or from lifting or injury, DuoTherm provides portable, powerful pain relief.

End Unnecessary Pain

“This mission may sound simple, but pain relief is complicated. The most important thing I’ve learned from 20 years as a pediatrician and pain researcher is that pain is personal. No one can tell you what works best for YOU - and trying options over time gives power over pain.”

- Amy Baxter MD

It started in 2004, when emergency pediatrician and pain relief lecturer Amy Baxter invented a device for kids’ shots. She got an NIH grant to prove it worked, and in 2009 her vibrating ice device “Buzzy” was introduced to block needle pain. To date, pain from over 31 million needle procedures has been blocked with award-winning Buzzy, for kids and adults.

When the opioid crisis hit,the Pain Care Labs team applied the patented Buzzy Cool-Pulse™ technology to extremities with a new product --VibraCool. VibraCool provided a drug-free option for people suffering from tendinits, plantar fasciitis, and other chronic pain. But the Pain Care Labs kept getting the same question over again: "When are you making one for the back?"

After prototyping, researching, and listening to what customers wanted in a low-back device, DuoTherm was born.  The new DuoTherm uses six different scientifically proven pain relief methods. There are options for soothing or intense vibration, cold or heat, general pressure or concentrated acupressure. 

There’s only one way to know what works best for YOU. Put it on.

 

Pain Care Labs (formerly known as MMJ Labs) has been featured in the following publications:

and has received awards from the following institutions:

Our Team

Hear What Our Beta Testers Are Saying

Jennifer M. - Heavy Lifter

“I Love it!  It feels like a massage chair, but more targeted and intense. So customizable - l like having variety of options.  And it’s easy!” 

LaRhonda J.- Fitness Enthusiast

“I LOVE that I have the ability to choose based on how I’m feeling that day.”

Paul B.  - 10 Hour Office Days

“True test was that I stood for 15-20 minutes with it on. My back didn't tense up and didn't hurt like it normally does...Really like better than TENS. This is not unpleasant. You have a similar if not better effect than TENS, without the jolts & twitching." 

Traci P. - Multiple Back Surgeries

“I’ve tried vibration and heat and cold.  This is the only thing I’ve ever tried that lets me do all of them with one device. I usually have to buy two or three products, I love that this is just one.”

U.S. Pain Foundation - U.S. Pain foundation is a 501(c)(3) organization dedicated to serving those who live with pain conditions and their care providers. The mission of U.S. Pain Foundation is to empower, educate, connect, and advocate for people living with chronic conditions that cause pain.  Your donation will help them directly provide assistance to their Pain Warriors of all ages and backgrounds, from everyday heroes, to Veterans, to children. Learn more at https://uspainfoundation.org.

Project Athena - The Project Athena Foundation is a 501c3 non-profit foundation dedicated to helping women survivors of medical or other traumatic setbacks achieve their adventurous dreams. Your donation will provide these women with the tools they need for the life-affirming transition from Survivor to Athlete without being sidelined by injuries or pain. Learn more at http://projectathena.org.

ATI Foundation - Founded by ATI Physical Therapy in 2003, the ATI Foundation is a 501(c)(3) charitable organization that gives help and hope to children with physical impairments. ATI Foundation supports ATI Physical Therapy’s outreach program to underserved communities, globally. Many in these communities have limited mobility due to their pain. Your donation will give hope back and enable these patients to treat the pain rather than just accept it as well as allow them to more easily perform daily tasks that pain often limits them in doing. Learn more at https://www.atipt.com/ati-foundation.

 

What is Gate Control Pain Relief?  Cold and vibration work through physiology called “Gate Control." The small fast pain nerves run alongside huge fast motion nerves that can block out pain, like when you bump your elbow and rub it to keep it from hurting. Pain is a whisper, vibration is yelling.  Cold and too much pressure are slow nerves - they start out quiet but then get bigger signal the longer they’re triggered. Pain nerves also run along with cold nerves, which is why an ice pack numbs up the skin over time when you have an injury.  Motion and cold and pain are all trying to fit through the same “gate” in the back of your spine, fighting to send a signal to the brain. If you use strong enough cold and motion, they squeeze through but pain can’t get through the gate, hence “Gate Control," or as we call it “Cool-Pulse."

Is there any research on DuoTherm? We’ve been collecting information on the DuoTherm prototypes, but since we aren't in production yet there are no studies directly on DuoTherm. There are LOTS of studies on the things that make it work, though.  Hot, cold, low-frequency vibration, and acupressure have been found effective for back pain. Pain Care Labs’ patented devices are the only ones on the market with ultra high frequency vibration; our high vibration frequency has been proven effective in two studies for sharp pain.  Pain Care Labs is the first to combine thermal and vibration- there are 23 studies on our Cool-Pulse Buzzy device for sharp pain.

Why crowdfunding? 

We often get questions about why we chose to raise money to develop DuoTherm on a crowdfunding platform, and particularly why Indiegogo. People have suggested that we go on Shark Tank again. Others ask why we don't use venture capitalists or banks.

Crowdfunding gives us direct access to the very people who want to see our pain relief concept become a product. Unlike more traditional funding sources, the “crowd” reacts very quickly and passionately. Often people with pain suffer quietly - even since starting the campaign, we have learned lessons about pain relief we wouldn't know if we just made what we THINK people want. And we've changed the product because of that feedback.

Many people recognize that while a contribution to a campaign is a big risk, they are willing to trust to contribute to making something important, and because when the product becomes a reality it will benefit them directly.


Thank you for taking a risk on DuoTherm. We are grateful for your support.

Pharmaceuticals like opioids are addictive: for the 120 million people with pain, we need better options NOW.DuoTherm combines 14 years of vibration studies, pain research, and common sense into a single, effective, pain relieving device.If you experience chronic back pain or acute pain from a recent injury, DuoTherm has your back.No single therapy solves chronic pain.Because pain changes by the day and even hour,YOU NEED OPTIONS.Research-Supported TherapyThe new DuoTherm uses six different scientifically proven pain relief methods to take power over your pain. The best judge of what makes you feel better is YOU.Promotes blood flow and stimulates acute and sharp pain blocking nerves through "Gate Control"Decreases spasm and reduces chronic strain pain locally with TENS-comparable frequenciesRelaxes tense and spasming muscles, promotes blood flow, replaces pain with comfortReduces inflammation and swelling, blocks pain with gate control and pain relieving feedback loopRelaxes spasmed muscles by focusing massage on myofascial trigger pointsScience shows that the more control we have over something, the less we perceive pain. The most important thing I’ve learned from 20 years as a pediatrician and pain researcher is that pain is personal. story:
See updates for details!

 

 

The Product:

Originally designed and engineered for elite athletes, GEEL SOCKS by boo-g™ has evolved into the best, most comfortable, most practical comfort and protective sock for anyone and everyone seeking comfort and relief from general foot and heel pain, ankle, knee and back pain.

A stylish, durable design GEEL SOCKS by boo-g™ is the preferred new age comfort that will allow you to get back to doing the things you love comfortably and pain free.

 

Worn by members of the CFL's Hamilton Tiger Cats!

 

Proud Promotional Partner:

 

Our Story:

Originally designed and engineered through a personal experience with severe heel pain eventually diagnosed as plantar fasciitis and a drive to do what they said could not be done, patent pending GEEL SOCKS by boo-g™ has evolved into the best, most comfortable, most practical comfort and protective performance sock for those seeking comfort and relief from general foot and heel pain, ankle, knee and back pain.

"It all started with our 14 year old son at the time. He was experiencing severe heel pain after long basketball practices and games. We tried ice, rest and a host of different socks, shoes and insoles. Nothing seemed to really help. We took him to a podiatrist who said he had flat feet (which he does) and prescribed custom made insoles for his basketball shoes. This caused more pain. Eventually we took him to our family doctor who diagnosed him with Plantar Fasciitis.  Surprisingly, the doctor's simple solution was the magic answer (at least for the moment while in shoes). Our son would train and play for hours with no pain…… Until he got home and had to take his shoes off. Once out of the shoes he would be hobbling around the house in the same pain as always. As parents, you hate to see your kids in pain. So we had to come up with something. Sure enough we figured it out. GEEL SOCKS were born."

Stylish, durable and easy to wear/wash, GEEL SOCKS by boo-g™ has become the preferred new age comfort choice for elite athletes and those who spend long hours on their feet. ​

boo-g Apparel Inc.™ is more than a brand, it’s a lifestyle. A “Bottom to the Top”, “Something from Nothing”, “Rose through the Concrete” lifestyle. A lifestyle that appreciates the struggles and changes life takes one through. Rise above, eliminate excuses, and push through adversity. Live. Love. Believe. Be boo-g.

Help us change the sock game by bringing true comfort and protection to the feet of those who are trapped by the pain they suffer.

Help us bring comfort and protection to the athlete who plays hard and trains harder.

Help us bring comfort and protection to the one who is toiling hard on their feet just to make ends meet.

Help us change your expectations of socks.

 

What is GEEL?

 

Why we are here:

We have gotten to this point entirely on our own. With thousands of pairs sampled and tested, we have sourced the best materials and our manufacturing partners are ready and in place. Now we need you. Most manufactures require minimum orders of several thousand pairs. However, our manufacturing partners have been great to us and has worked closely with us producing multiple small sample orders until we got things right (Although we paid for it). Now ready for mass production we need to move forward with a full production run.

Hitting our target goal on this campaign will allow us to secure enough initial orders to make a full production run bringing our costs down, in turn making GEEL SOCKS more affordable for all. Otherwise we’d have to either continue to make small sample orders at high cost, or keep thousands of pairs sitting around in a warehouse, tying up valuable assets as we find buyers one-by-one.

Funding raised through this campaign will go towards production, manufacturing, and shipping cost of our first full production run in black and white. Meeting our stretch goals will allow us to manufacture more product in various colours and designs. Any additional funding will be used in the development of evolutionary innovative new product lines to come in the near future!

                                          

 

Manufacturing & Packaging:

With our main manufacturing partner being in Seoul South Korea, the socks are currently being manufactured and packaged in South Korea.  All designs originate in Canada and final inspections are completed in Canada, allowing us to personally ensure every pair of socks meet the boo-g™ standard before they reach your feet.

 

Risks & Challenges

The economy is a threat to all business in today’s world. With performance and stylish fashion socks being a luxury or desired item they can easily lose their value in a weaker economy. However, GEEL SOCKS by boo-g™ is more than a performance sock, it meets a Real Need and is a Real Solution to a Real Problem. Therefore, GEEL SOCKS by boo-g™ are more than a luxury or desire, GEEL SOCKS by boo-g™ will be a must have item for millions who suffer from foot and heel pain everyday.

With our main product GEEL SOCKS by boo-g™ currently being manufactured in Seoul, Korea, we face the reality of today’s world and the fact that any social or governmental changes or unrest could pose a threat to our production efforts. This is a threat we are constantly aware of and will definitely be looking to secure an alternative manufacturing partner here in North America to eliminate this threat altogether or at least be able to counter any disruption or interruption such a threat could create in the future. Ideally we would like to have a more hands on role in the manufacturing process.

Here at boo-g™ we understand the importance of brand reputation, especially for a new brand trying to build the trust and customer loyalty we intend to. We have spent nearly 3 years in preparation for this launch, which consists of design, product development, establishing logistics and executing multiple pre-production runs to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience for all.

However, while we’ve consulted with numerous logistics experts and sample tested our manufacturer many times to ensure we can deliver an amazing product on time, as with any high volume production run, there are almost always some unforeseen circumstances that occur. We cannot predict and prevent everything but we will be extremely transparent and open with regards to updates on the status of production and shipment.

Our manufacturer partner holds 30+ years of experience producing high quality products. They work with some of the world’s biggest brands and have the capability, scale and expertise to meet our demands as we grow. We have the utmost confidence in their ability to deliver a superior product on time.

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

 

What are you going to do with the money you raise?

Funding raised through this campaign will go towards production, manufacturing, and shipping cost of our first full production run in black and white. Meeting our stretch goals will allow us to manufacture more product in various colours and designs. Any additional funding will be used in the development of evolutionary innovative new product lines to come in the near future!

 

When do I get my socks?

Our manufacturing partners are standing by and excited to start producing GEEL SOCKS at full capacity. As soon as our campaign ends, they will get to work. Allowing 20 days to receive the funds we raised we can expect to have GEEL SOCKS ON YOUR FEET within 3 months after the end of the campaign. And we will do everything within our control to expedite the process to get them to you as soon as possible.

 

How do I wash them?

GEEL SOCKS wash and wear like a regular sock. We wanted to make sure we created a sock that you could wear every day without worrying about any special washing instructions. GEEL SOCKS will hold up to the high heat of any dryer and come out ready to wear every time.

 

What if I don't like them?

Unlikely, however, stranger things have happened. That said, we stand by our product 100% so if for any reason you aren't happy with your GEEL SOCKS just contact us at info@boo-g.ca and we'll arrange for an exchange or refund.

 

Can I wear my GEEL SOCKS outside the gym?

Absolutely! You can wear them wherever you like. While GEEL SOCKS were designed and engineered for the elite athlete, they have evolved into the best, most comfortable, most practical comfort and protective sock for anyone and everyone seeking comfort and relief from general foot and heel pain, ankle, knee and back pain.

 

What do I do if I don't want to take them off because they're so comfy?

Well, the only answer to that question is make sure to have enough GEEL SOCKS on hand to always be able to put on a fresh pair. We recommend at least one pair a day, plus an additional pair for every time you exercise throughout the week.

 

What do I do if people try to steal my socks?

Not surprising. We've seen it happen. Roommate, significant other, even kids will all look for the opportunity to steal your GEEL SOCKS. The only solution here is to make sure these people have their own. GEEL SOCKS make for excellent gifts and give back at the same time.

 

What's this whole "be boo-g" thing about?

When we say “be boo-g”, we mean it as a way of approaching every day. It's a reminder to push yourself harder. To be bolder. To be better. To be different. To never give up. Eliminate excuses and rise above all. A reminder that you are somebody that can achieve greatness. And a reminder that we we're all created and are all someone’s children. "be boo-g"

 

What is boo-g cares?

While boo-g was created by the passion, Richard and Irma intend to form (boo-g cares) a not for profit organization for the passion, which will provide youth with Academic, Athletic and Skills Training opportunities they wold not otherwise attain on their own.  A proceed from each sale of every boo-g product sold going will go towards funding boo-g cares in the future. We believe the youth are our future, and providing them with positive opportunities today leads to a brighter, more productive, safer tomorrow.

story:
Short Summary

As we continue to expand our lifespans, we need to spend more time thinking about what we are doing to improve the quality of our lives over longer periods of time. It is no longer sufficient to keep people breathing: we need to keep them exercising. According to one study, just 1 in 8 people will be totally fit throughout their lifetime on Earth by 2040. 1 in 8. That number is outrageously low, and if we want to do any better in the long term, it is going to take a whole lot of work.

Bringing together more than 100 years of research, I am introducing a new fitness device that uses the power of frequencies in order to help any adult reach peak performance and become totally fit for longer periods of time. This portable device runs of a 9-volt battery, uses 10 different frequencies (including the love frequency), and features LED lights for information, two copper grips, a tech sheet, and an easy-to-follow guide. If you are ready to take control of your fitness, this is the device for you. It’s like walking around with a personal trainer in your hands all day!
 

What We Need & What You Get

At this moment, we have come to you, friends, for help raising $2500. These funds will cover the startup costs of the business. In the next phase we will focus on manufacturing, marketing, and distributing our fitness device on a larger scale. This is your chance to be a part of something revolutionary and take part in a movement for better health and happier lives! As a thank-you, we are offering our device at a huge discount off the MSRP exclusively through this crowdfunding campaign, just as our way of saying “thanks.” Note: Take a look at the "Perks".

Risks & Challenges

With any new technology, the biggest risks are getting it right and communicating its value. We are confident that we can do both with your support! The funds that we raise will be largely used to optimize our supply chain, preventing problems before they occur.

Other Ways You Can Help

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post the campaign link on any social media platforms you use, such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, or Snapchat. Your support, both monetary and non-monetary, will make a huge difference in our effort to get this fitness device out to a world market.

Thank you!
story_txt:
Short Summary
As we continue to expand our lifespans, we need to spend more time thinking about what we are doing to improve the quality of our lives over longer periods of time. It is no longer sufficient to keep people breathing: we need to keep them exercising. According to one study, just 1 in 8 people will be totally fit throughout their lifetime on Earth by 2040. 1 in 8. That number is outrageously low, and if we want to do any better in the long term, it is going to take a whole lot of work.
Bringing together more than 100 years of research, I am introducing a new fitness device that uses the power of frequencies in order to help any adult reach peak performance and become totally fit for longer periods of time. This portable device runs of a 9-volt battery, uses 10 different frequencies (including the love frequency), and features LED lights for information, two copper grips, a tech sheet, and an easy-to-follow guide. If you are ready to take control of your fitness, this is the device for you. It’s like walking around with a personal trainer in your hands all day! 

What We Need & What You Get
At this moment, we have come to you, friends, for help raising $2500. These funds will cover the startup costs of the business. In the next phase we will focus on manufacturing, marketing, and distributing our fitness device on a larger scale. This is your chance to be a part of something revolutionary and take part in a movement for better health and happier lives! As a thank-you, we are offering our device at a huge discount off the MSRP exclusively through this crowdfunding campaign, just as our way of saying “thanks.” Note: Take a look at the "Perks".
Risks & ChallengesWith any new technology, the biggest risks are getting it right and communicating its value. We are confident that we can do both with your support! The funds that we raise will be largely used to optimize our supply chain, preventing problems before they occur.
Other Ways You Can Help
Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post the campaign link on any social media platforms you use, such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, or Snapchat. Your support, both monetary and non-monetary, will make a huge difference in our effort to get this fitness device out to a world market.
Thank you!

story:
The Honey Pot was born out of one woman’s need to naturally heal herself. Beatrice became a woman on a mission, searching for natural remedies to help prevent these unruly infections. Rather than stay locked in a vicious cycle of taking antibiotics that would temporarily fight the infection only for it to reemerge later, Beatrice charged ahead and created The Honey Pot Feminine Wash - her very own natural healing aid.

Our mission is to educate, support, and provide women around the world with the tools and resources that promote feminine health and wellness. We do this by engaging and empowering the women we serve one healthy honey pot at a time. 

Through our functional plant-based feminine care system, our goal is to provide women with a healthy alternative to feminine care that is free of chemicals, parabens, carcinogens, and sulfates. Our washes are gynecologist approved, clinically tested and pH balanced. 

Say hello to the future of feminine care. 

 

As the first plant-based feminine care system on the market, we were always aware that we would have to create a line of healthy, safe tampons that were free from dioxins, fragrance and other potentially toxic chemicals. With your help and support, we will be able to offer our customers a line of tampons made with one plant-based ingredient - organic cotton. Our tampons will come in regular, super and super plus as well as a multi-pack featuring all three absorbencies. When our tampons roll out in Spring 2018, we will finally have our entire plant-based feminine care system completed! Exciting, right?

We are living in historic times. The world is waking up to the truth that there is a war on women. A war on our bodies, our health, and our wellness. A war on birth control and our right to choose. From the women’s marches to large corporations settling out of court for poisoning women with toxic carcinogenic feminine care, the revolution is here!

We need your help to continue to fuel the resistance to mass market manufacturers and companies that continue to produce nasty carcinogenic filled feminine care and pass it off as safe and healthy. Be a part of the movement to take your body back. Join the revolution that matters the most!

Our vaginas matter.

 
 

 

Did you know the vagina is the most absorbent part of a woman's body? Every feminine care product that you use is potentially being absorbed into your body via your vagina. Conventional feminine washes and wipes to menstrual pads and tampons are formulated with synthetic ingredients including artificial fragrances, dyes, and countless harsh chemicals. Every time we use conventional feminine care, our vaginas are absorbing the chemicals used to create these daily and monthly products which can lead to infection, irritation and even infertility.

Plant-based feminine care is the only way to go when it comes to creating a healthy, feminine care regimen. Choose products made by nature with ingredients that naturally cleanse, protect and nurture. The Honey Pot Company only uses quality plant-based ingredients and materials in all of our products. From the botanicals and herbs in our feminine washes to the chlorine and pesticide-free cotton in our herbal menstrual pads - our products are the safe, natural alternative to today's mass market chemical laden offerings.

 

 

 

The Honey Pot Company is more than just a feminine care company. We are advocates for women's health around the world. By purchasing our products, you are supporting women and young girls in Uganda in a very special way. Every month we donate a portion of our proceeds to Afri-Pads, a non-profit organization in Uganda that provides young girls with reusable menstrual pads so they don't have to miss a week of school during their monthly cycle. Afri-Pads also teaches the women in the village how to make reusable pads so they can sell them at the local market and make money for their families. We are proud to be a part of such an impactful non-profit that is truly making a difference in women's lives in Uganda.

 

2017 has been a stellar year for The Honey Pot Company. In April, we launched our washes and wipes in 1011 stores and in August, we launched our herbal menstrual pads online. We have grown leaps and bounds and are now looking to push the envelope once again. With your help, we can round out our plant-based feminine care system with a line of organic cotton tampons. Imagine getting all of your feminine care needs met by one healthy, natural feminine care company. That's our mission. Help us make 2018 an even better year than 2017! We appreciate your support.

story:
FEATURES






 

 

 

HOW IT WORKS

Review the Training Guide provided from start to finish,
then choose one of two options to organize your journal. 


The Training Guide will further detail how the information
is organized, color coded, and designed for usage.

 

 

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

The journal is ready for mass production: 

  • I set to raise funds early among family & friends and covered 15% of my goal, so that I have a smaller goal when setting up this campaign. 
  • I set the campaign to flexible funding, because I will still be actively crowdfunding it in person in my home-town. 
  • All of the funding will be for the production of the journal, packaging, & shipping. 

     

     

    ABOUT

    My personal fitness journey started during my time in service (thanks to my NCO/Sgt). I was someone who carried this sentiment: I could eat anything and not gain weight. I later learned that the correct statement was: I only ate when I felt like it, sometimes a lot, sometimes a little. I later learned how much my body actually needed and how important it is not to go over or under.



    A simple gesture; he provided me with a word document and in that document a basic fitness plan. He took me to the gym for 2 weeks to guide me on equipment usage and form, then left me on my way. Three years later and three years ago, I was still going to the gym weekly. At this moment, I was planning on what my next career move was. I thought about becoming a personal trainer and I studied the books, but it wasn't enough... I wanted to impact more people (and my training method was akin to my time in the Corps, so I didn't want to yell at any poor soul just trying to learn). I thought about the word document and how I could utilize that format. I started sharing work out plans and anyone that asked, I created one for them. That wasn't enough, either. 

    Each person and each individual live with different work schedules and how they utilize their leisure. Creating plans after plan, doesn't teach them how to "adapt & overcome" or adjust accordingly. I had to think back of why I didn't start lifting in the first place and what challenges I met inside the gym. I just wanted a simple plan. What is a triceps press? How do I do it? Why am I doing it on this day, with this muscle? How do I use this machine? What are my movements? What are some tips, things I should be aware of? These are a lot of questions.. how do I consolidate it? Creating a pattern? 

    After three years, it turned into a journal with 100+ exercises with their own log section, pages to pull out and reinsert for customization (into 3-day plans to 6-day plans for example), tracking progress, and something to reuse over and over. 

     

     

    RISKS & CHALLENGES

    The risk and challenge is making it affordable, as seen in the image above of the fitness journal comparisons. The main goal is to provide something that someone like before-gym-me would benefit and current-gym-me would benefit from. Figuring out which methods are cost-effective, yet keeping the product of quality. With that said, I hope you agree and enjoy what I created, most of all that it benefits you. 

     

     

    PURPOSE & GOALS

    The purpose of this journal is to become the starting point or gateway into health & fitness. The journal is meant to help build a foundation and with that foundation established, for the user to build off on top of it. There are a numerous amount of fitness mediums to explore: bodybuilding, power-lifting, runners, obstacle course enthusiast, and so forth. The step to getting there is starting, the step to starting is here. 

    The goal? The goal is to make health & fitness easier to attain.
