story:
Drugshoppe’s mission is a future of better medicines through low-cost R&D

Today, the cost of medical R&D is at an all time high. Although scientists continue to make amazing progress researching new treatments, too often these new medicines are too expensive for patients to afford. A common refrain from the industry is the high cost of drug innovation. 

At Drugshoppe, researchers from Yale and Rice worked tirelessly to develop a new approach combining chemical and biological studies with cutting-edge predictive modeling and data analytics approaches.  Independently validated studies have proven that our technology can outperform big institutions – producing the same or better drug development results at 10-100X lower cost. It's simple math - if we lower the cost drug R&D, we can lower the cost of medicine. 

More and more, pharma companies are taking advantage of the climate of rising costs to justify price gouging. We understand that making medicine is about more than just money - this is why we’re pledging 10% of our profits from this drug to Camp Hope, a Houston program focused on mental health for returning veterans.

Who are we?

We’re Erol Bakkalbasi and Corwin Miller, co-founders of Drugshoppe. We've been friends for years, and started planning Drugshoppe when we lived together back in our early twenties. While a lot has changed since then - we both still have apartments filled with used lab equipment and a passion for unconventional thinking in medicine.

 

Erol Bakkalbasi is an inventor, R&D manager, and chemist with 10+ years of R&D experience focused on  experimental therapeutics including both small molecules and biologics. He's worked at 6 life science ventures in R&D and management roles, and has presented at MD Anderson Cancer Center and Rice University. Erol holds a MS from the Baylor College of Medicine and a BS from Rice. Erol is an avid follower of modern rational drug design, 

 

Dr. Corwin Miller is an inventor and world-class research scientist with 12+ years research a wide range of topics including drug-resistance, RNA biology, and inorganic chemistry. Dr. Miller's work is published in journals like PNAS and the New England Journal of Medicine. He holds a PhD from Rice University and a BS from Sewanee. Corwin recently left his postdoctoral position at Yale University to start Drugshoppe.

 

When we started Drugshoppe, we had the audacious aim of trying to reduce the cost of medicine by making R&D more efficient. We believed that many of the expenses involved in making new drugs were unnecessary, and that we could greatly reduce those costs. To prove it, we both quit our jobs, took massive pay cuts, and did the craziest thing imaginable - started our own company.

Better medicine for PTSD and major depression is desperately needed

This campaign will directly support our research into a new antidepressant drug. Depression is one of the most common mental illnesses in the world, and today suicide from depression is the number one cause of death among US soldiers. Despite this, antidepressants have barely improved since the 1950’s, and today are so ineffective that they lead to remission less than half the time.

We’ve partnered with depression experts at East Tennessee State University to develop a new type of antidepressant drug that targets inflammation in the brain. Together in a recent study in the International Journal of Neuropsychopharmacology, we have already shown this approach to be more effective than current antidepressants alone in standard disease models, and could provide a truly transformative new treatment for depression.

Now we need your help

We estimate we will need $50,000 to develop a new antidepressant drug candidate. Your donation will help pay for:

  • Laboratory space
  • Research supplies and reagents
  • Paying our research team (they like food)
  • Professional expenses (legal, accounting, etc)

Developing new medicine is a major challenge, and every new drug has a long path to travel before it reaches patients in need, but our studies so far have brought us closer than ever before to a better type of antidepressant. Considering the prevalence of this disease, we know this is a chance worth taking.

We’re asking anyone who can to help contribute. Your support will directly support the development of a new antidepressant medicine, and will help us build a low-cost pipeline to develop as many new drugs as possible.

Part of our mission is to strive to be a ethical “fair-trade” force within the industry. This is reflected in our practices, including those shown below

If we want to see a better pharmaceutical industry in our lifetimes, then we all have to build it.

We appreciate any support you can give-  please share our campaign and help spread the word!

To learn more about Drugshoppe, visit our website at: http://www.dsdrugdesign.com/

story:
Hello! I'm Meghan Nechrebecki and as a healthcare administration expert, I've been working for over a decade to transform the U.S. healthcare experience.

THE PROBLEM

Let's face it... health care is complex, confusing, and overwhelming to navigate.

It’s no surprise that in the U.S. today,  9 out of 10 adults are considered "health illiterate" and lack the basic understanding of how to manage their care and prevent diseases!

Now it may seem funny and cute when you watch the educated young professionals in our video, but the situation is far more serious and urgent for individuals across the country who aren't otherwise young and healthy:

  • Seniors and elderly patients with multiple chronic conditions who are supposed to take upwards of 5 daily medications and manage appointments across specialists
  • Cancer patients who have to manage chemotherapy, radiation therapy, and surgery who don't speak English as their first language
  • First-time pregnant women + couples who end up with emergency c-sections and babies in the Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU)
  • Regular individuals like yourself who end up with broken limbs from accidents or emergency appendectomies that are out of their control. 

We will ALL have to navigate the healthcare system at some point in our lives and these situations can literally mean life or death and can also be VERY expensive.

Unfortunately, we have seen it far too many times where patients choose to avoid care or struggle to navigate around the health system. They become stressed and overwhelmed and often don’t have the most desirable outcome—ending up in the ER…or hospitalized…or dealing with huge medical bills.

Would your loved ones be able to answer these sample real-life questions? 

Health care is continuing to become more complex, confusing, and expensive. 

Medical Bills are Pushing Millions of Americans Past Their Breaking Point

Cancer’s Complications: Confusing Bills, Maddening Errors And Endless Phone Calls

Even Doctors Can’t Navigate Our ‘Broken Health Care System’

THE SOLUTION

THE HEALTH CUBE is the first-of-its-kind online platform filled with curated, engaging, and empowering videos, toolkits, and coaching that gives you the exact information you need to navigate the U.S. healthcare system.​ 

Health care should NOT be a puzzle that you have to solve. While you are pulling out your hair, there are healthcare experts who KNOW the answers! And you should have access to that information...in a clear, concise, engaging way that centers around you and your needs! #happysmileseverywhere

How will The Health Cube help you? 

The Health Cube will have curated healthcare expertise by topic that answers all your questions along with key tips and tricks you wouldn't even know to ask! 

We will help you navigate specific healthcare situations and topics, such as:

  • How to Sign Up for Health Insurance

  • What to Do When You Experience an Urgent Health Issue

  • How to Navigate a Hospitalization

  • How to Navigate the Pregnancy Journey

  • Medical Decision Making for Your Loved Ones

  • Leading a Healthy Life Through Pain + Symptom Management (Opioid Education)

  • How to Achieve Your Best Physical Health 

  • How to Achieve Your Best Mental Health

  • How to Navigate Living with Cancer

Will you join us to make health care better?

We envision a healthcare future that is very different from the one we have to experience today.

In order to kickstart us in creating this high-quality video content + innovative tech platform, we are campaigning for a total of $71,500.

With your help, we will be able to interview top healthcare experts, script + film high-quality 4k videos, and create toolkits filled with key tips + tricks on the topics that matter most to you, all on a sleek, easy-to-access web + app platform.
 
We will also be creating content in multiple languages. We want to make health care as simple as possible for everyone as we create content that can have global positive impact!
 

Check out this sample video from our free YouTube video library that was a gift to us from FocusTV in Los Angeles to kickstart our idea: 

By contributing to us today, you will help create a tech platform filled with curated videos that truly help people. Every dollar counts and we are SO thankful for every contribution we receive! Even if we don't achieve our goal of $71,500, we will use all the funds we receive to create the first videos for The Health Cube to start creating positive impact across the U.S. and beyond. Thank you so much in advance for your contribution to the cause!

WE WANT TO HEAR FROM YOU!

When you send in a contribution be sure to add a comment voting on which topics matter most to you! Have any crazy stories about navigating health care? Please comment + share!

PLEASE SHARE!

Please share this link with your friends, family, and colleagues and share the link across your social media! All support is incredibly appreciated!! xoxo 

NOW IS THE TIME!

We’ve worked in health care for years and have consistently seen it firsthand. Patients don't know how to navigate the healthcare system and they end up more sick with huge medical bills that otherwise could have been avoided. 
 
The Health Cube will change this! Back us today so we can help you + your loved ones lead healthy, happy lives without the stress and confusion! 

Cheers to Your Health and Happiness! 

About Health Care Transformation: Our mission is to deliver a better consumer experience throughout the health continuum by providing modern, comprehensible, and entertaining healthcare content in a way that engages and empowers consumers to own, manage, and advocate for their own care in order to achieve optimal health. We believe it is our duty as innovative healthcare strategists and thought leaders to push the boundaries within health care delivery to make a positive, measurable impact across the globe. 

   

About our Media Partner, She TV Media: a female-founded, full-service video production company creating empowering and inspiring branded content through documentaries, commercials, and promotional videos. Their passion lies in projects that are world-changing in a positive way, and for this reason, they support our mission and believe creating videos that impact the healthcare industry and improve patient experience is incredibly important.

Here's Meghan with Meredith and Natalie- the founders of She TV Media- after carrying about 1,000 lbs of video production equipment!
story_txt:
Hello! I'm Meghan Nechrebecki and as a healthcare administration expert, I've been working for over a decade to transform the U.S. healthcare experience.
THE PROBLEM
Let's face it... health care is complex, confusing, and overwhelming to navigate.
It’s no surprise that in the U.S. today,  9 out of 10 adults are considered "health illiterate" and lack the basic understanding of how to manage their care and prevent diseases!
Now it may seem funny and cute when you watch the educated young professionals in our video, but the situation is far more serious and urgent for individuals across the country who aren't otherwise young and healthy:

Seniors and elderly patients with multiple chronic conditions who are supposed to take upwards of 5 daily medications and manage appointments across specialists
Cancer patients who have to manage chemotherapy, radiation therapy, and surgery who don't speak English as their first language

First-time pregnant women + couples who end up with emergency c-sections and babies in the Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU)

Regular individuals like yourself who end up with broken limbs from accidents or emergency appendectomies that are out of their control. 

We will ALL have to navigate the healthcare system at some point in our lives and these situations can literally mean life or death and can also be VERY expensive.

Unfortunately, we have seen it far too many times where patients choose to avoid care or struggle to navigate around the health system. They become stressed and overwhelmed and often don’t have the most desirable outcome—ending up in the ER…or hospitalized…or dealing with huge medical bills.
Would your loved ones be able to answer these sample real-life questions? 

Health care is continuing to become more complex, confusing, and expensive. 
Medical Bills are Pushing Millions of Americans Past Their Breaking Point
Cancer’s Complications: Confusing Bills, Maddening Errors And Endless Phone Calls
Even Doctors Can’t Navigate Our ‘Broken Health Care System’
THE SOLUTION
THE HEALTH CUBE is the first-of-its-kind online platform filled with curated, engaging, and empowering videos, toolkits, and coaching that gives you the exact information you need to navigate the U.S. healthcare system.​ 
Health care should NOT be a puzzle that you have to solve. While you are pulling out your hair, there are healthcare experts who KNOW the answers! And you should have access to that information...in a clear, concise, engaging way that centers around you and your needs! #happysmileseverywhere

How will The Health Cube help you? 
The Health Cube will have curated healthcare expertise by topic that answers all your questions along with key tips and tricks you wouldn't even know to ask! 

We will help you navigate specific healthcare situations and topics, such as:

How to Sign Up for Health Insurance
What to Do When You Experience an Urgent Health Issue
How to Navigate a Hospitalization
How to Navigate the Pregnancy Journey
Medical Decision Making for Your Loved Ones
Leading a Healthy Life Through Pain + Symptom Management (Opioid Education)
How to Achieve Your Best Physical Health 
How to Achieve Your Best Mental Health
How to Navigate Living with Cancer


Will you join us to make health care better?
We envision a healthcare future that is very different from the one we have to experience today.
In order to kickstart us in creating this high-quality video content + innovative tech platform, we are campaigning for a total of $71,500. 


With your help, we will be able to interview top healthcare experts, script + film high-quality 4k videos, and create toolkits filled with key tips + tricks on the topics that matter most to you, all on a sleek, easy-to-access web + app platform.
 
We will also be creating content in multiple languages. We want to make health care as simple as possible for everyone as we create content that can have global positive impact!
 
Check out this sample video from our free YouTube video library that was a gift to us from FocusTV in Los Angeles to kickstart our idea: 

By contributing to us today, you will help create a tech platform filled with curated videos that truly help people. Every dollar counts and we are SO thankful for every contribution we receive! Even if we don't achieve our goal of $71,500, we will use all the funds we receive to create the first videos for The Health Cube to start creating positive impact across the U.S. and beyond. Thank you so much in advance for your contribution to the cause!
WE WANT TO HEAR FROM YOU!
When you send in a contribution be sure to add a comment voting on which topics matter most to you! Have any crazy stories about navigating health care? Please comment + share!
PLEASE SHARE!
Please share this link with your friends, family, and colleagues and share the link across your social media! All support is incredibly appreciated!! xoxo 
NOW IS THE TIME!
We’ve worked in health care for years and have consistently seen it firsthand. Patients don't know how to navigate the healthcare system and they end up more sick with huge medical bills that otherwise could have been avoided. 
 
The Health Cube will change this! Back us today so we can help you + your loved ones lead healthy, happy lives without the stress and confusion! 

Cheers to Your Health and Happiness!

story:
Latest News from Herlip

January 19th, 2021

We are so excited to announce that Herlip® Cold Sore Rapid Relief Gel will be available to purchase from February 1st, 2021. 

Herlip® formula was in the making for 6 years (2013-2019).  In March 2019, we had hoped to raise the funds via crowdfunding and launch in mid-2020.  But like many businesses around the world, we were held up by the effects of COVID-19.  Thanks to the great commitment, patience, and passion from all members of our Herlip Team, we were able to push our launch date back, raise funds from the investors' network and complete what we started some time ago – the launch of a breakthrough 8-action rapid relief cold sore product in the market.

We are excited to share that everyone who supported us, in the beginning, will be receiving their first order starting from February 1st.  We will be sending 2 bottles of Herlip® gel for every single bottle ordered.  This is simply to thank you for showing your support and patience.

I would like to thank everyone that contributed, in one way or another, to the realization of the Herlip®  product.  

Please note that Herlip® Cold Sore Rapid Relief Gel is only available via our official online store www.herlip.com.au. 

Kind regards

Velimir Pajic (DrWellbe)

Creator of Herlip®

 

Herlip®

World's first 8x multi-action formula is unlike any other on the market, simultaneously providing; anti-viral action against HSV-1, assistance with wound healing, relief by soothing and cooling the area, acting as an analgesic and anti-inflammatory, giving an anti-itch effect and, finally, moisturizing the affected area.

The Unique Combination of Actives
australian manuka honey 50mg/g, zinc oxide 38mg/g, lysine 14.9mg/g, propolis liquid extract 12mg/g, melissa officinalis 10.5mg/g, glycine 10mg/g, menthol 1.2mg/g, folic acid (vitamin B9) 1mg/g and ubiquinol-10 (CoQ10) 500 microgram/g.

Rapid Relief Formula

Visible results in 24 hours* The application of Herlip® gel every 4 hrs during a blister or latter phase will result in a visible difference in appearance in 24 hours.  *If applied within 20 minutes from the first occurrence of tingling, Herlip® gel may prevent the appearance of cold sores altogether.

20+ naturally sourced ingredients:  our Herlip® gel contains 20+ naturally sourced and sustainable ingredients, with no artificial colours, fragrances, petrochemicals or derivatives – just scientifically-formulated for natural, fast-acting cold sore care with no harmful or unnecessary ingredients.

100% Australian made: this product is made in Australian GMP certified facility and listed on ARTG (TGA) register.

Eco-friendly packaging: we proudly use 100% recyclable paper boxes.

story:
Family is Precious, Keep Them Safe!

This Amazing Smartwatch will Revolutionize Your Children's & Family Health

Monitor Your Families Medical Vitals 24 Hours a Day, 7 Days a Week

This is not a Medical device and does not claim to cure, treat, or prevent an illness or serious medical condition, it is an early warning system

Buddy - The Family Health Monitor Smartwatch with Body Temperature, Blood Pressure, Heart Rate and Health Alerts/Notifications for Children, Adults and Elderly

Because disease and health issues can strike at any time, we have designed a smartwatch that lets you monitor your children's and/or family’s vital statistics 24 hours a day 7 days a week. This innovative smartwatch checks temperature, blood pressure and heart rate all day, every day and is also ideal for "at risk" groups.

With any unnatural increases in these statistics the smartwatch will automatically send you an alert/notification directly to your phone with GPS location. Whether it's your child playing in the garden or an elderly relative that lives far away, you will know instantly if any of their vital statistics are outside of acceptable medical range.

 

For Children, Adults & Seniors

Instant Medical Alerts

24 hr Temperature monitoring

24 hr Blood pressure monitoring

24 hr Heart rate monitoring

24 hr GPS tracking, for location

Waterproof

A Fully Functional Fitness Watch

 

Keep Your Kids and Your Family Safe Plus, Know Exactly Where They Are!

In these worrying and dangerous times it is important to know when family and loved ones have a fever, high blood pressure or elevated heart rate as these are major indicators in everyone's medical health. 

In conjunction with medical doctors and advanced computer programmers we have developed a unique and innovative Smartwatch that notifies you if your children, elderly relatives and/or loved ones become ill. Plus, we have also included a gsm sim card function to track the wearer, so you will know exactly where they are, giving you advanced early warning, wherever they are!

How It Works

For every degree the body's internal temperature rises, the heart beats about 10 beats per minute faster. But an increasing heart rate does not always cause your blood pressure to increase at the same rate. Even though your heart is beating more times per minute, healthy blood vessels dilate (get larger) to allow more blood to flow through more easily. The Family Doctor Smartwatch uses the latest technology plus a unique intelligent algorithm that analyzes a combination of different body functions to ascertain the overall health of the user with alerts directly to your phone. From the minute you first wear the smartwatch your health history will start to collate your medical statics. This unique software will then compare your data is within acceptable medical ranges. When it is outside of these parameters an alert will be sent and the watch will indicate that there is a health problem. 

Design

Initially this was designed to inform us of our children’s location plus monitor body temperature and other vital statistics. So if your child was say, at friends or grandparents you will know exactly where they are and will be notified directly if their temperature or if other vitals start to change. This will allow you to contact and immediately go to their aid. It will even work if they are sleeping in bed at night. 

Once the wearers temperature starts increasing the watch will monitor and record temperature levels and once they are outside safe parameters our Family Doctor App will alert you to the problem, saving valuable time. This rapid action will save the user needless suffering by helping to reduce the fever, and/or administering medication earlier and quicker. There is even an emergency call button on the app that is linked directly to your phone.

Since the Covid-19 outbreak we also turned our attention to those most at risk from this dreadful disease, the elderly. Loads of our older generation spend lots of time alone and ailments can often go unnoticed or unattended for long periods of time. Our smart technology watch will help to combat this...for seniors, kids and adults. 

Let’s take a step forward to protect our families and loved ones!

Now we are at the stage where we have a working prototype that is not the final design and waiting for the first sample batches of the final design to be delivered. Every person involved in this project are parents and just like you, we all worry about our children, parents and loved ones. Now we have a unique way to help everyone to better protect our families and loved ones.

This intelligent medical fitness band includes temperature measurement (uses the latest sensors), blood pressure, heart rate data with additional features including fitness tracking functions and a health history log.

UK & Ukraine Joint Venture 

This is a joint UK & Ukrainian venture which utilizes expert Ukrainian Programmers, UK Designers and Medical Advisers from all over the world. We are currently examining manufacturing these smartwatches in both the UK, Ukraine and possibly the USA.

Funds

The adult version is already complete and we are awaiting delivery of final production samples. Funds raised will be used to add additional functions and to manufacture a watch mold for the children's watch sizes which need to be smaller so as not to affect the sensitivity of the sensor contact. Kids watches also need a slightly different watch strap to ensure a good fit.

Although the Smart algorithm is ready, funds will also be spent improving the app display as our original version will be brought up-to-date. If sufficient funds are raised we also plan to add a phone call function to allow you to speak directly to the wearer plus the addition of fitness band functions for the adult watches. We are also wanting to design a system whereby the watch will flash repeatedly when there is a problem thereby alerting the user and people within close proximity.  

 

 

Smartwatch, Features & Benefits

Temperature watch & Medical watch

Blood pressure

Heart rate monitoring 

GPS tracking, for kids/seniors location

Revolutionary medical watch

Free International Postage

Early Fever Warning allows additional time for treatment

Family protection for viruses and fevers

Reduced worry by tracking kids & relatives that are not close-by

Family Health Monitoring

Perfect for Adults, Elderly & Children

 

A Personal Medical Smartwatch which will Transform Family Health

This smartwatch can have a massive impact on personal medical care both now and in years to come. There are a growing number of medical ailments that this Smartwatch has the ability to ascertain, from fevers, viruses, hypertension etc, and in the future we are looking to develop this even further by adding a corresponding diagnosis list of possible ailments that are relevant to the vital statistics and will upgrade the App once this has been achieved.

Challenges

To develop this to the level whereby it is widely accepted in hospitals and medical centres all over the world. This will be achieved through continued research, testing and analysis.

You Can Also Help Spread the News of this Amazing New Product

If you are not in a position to contribute would you be so kind as to be the first of your friends and family to share this page on your social media and ask to put the word out for us? You can use the Indiegogo share tools to simply click and share.

Take care and be safe.

Thanks.

story:
When the player staying on the water or walking on the water, the tool can support they’re weight by buoyancy provided by the special tructure;besides，it can also help  the player to run on the water by the buoyancy and Paddle resistance. 

 

How to use the device and precautions

Learning the device of “walkonthewater” is similar to learn skating, skateboarding and roller skating.in the Beginning, people will be difficult to keep balance, you can get basically balance after trying and practising a few times,  . Once you are skilled to use it, you will not fall down, and the more skilled you are, the easier it will be. You can walk or run on the water, and if you are tired, you can stop and have a rest. You can also sit on the device for a rest, and if you gained the technique of using it, you can walk and run on the water, That's a very cool experience! It will make you healthier and stronger, and improve your ability of maintaining balanced and flexible! If you learn how to use the device of “walkonthewater”, you will get a good sense of accomplishment, and you will be more healthy and happier!


If you are skilled, you won't fall into the water. In winter, you can also play itwith a pair of waterproof long socks and swimming suits or diving suits to prevent the cold.
 

Diving suit or swimsuit

 

Be careful! When new players start learning the “Walkonthewater”, they may fall off the water several times. You’d better to practise on a waterfront or beach full of soft sand ! If you practise it in the swimming pool, The side of the pool should be covered with soft floor cushions in case of falls! You can also wear a helmet and other protective equipment. Only the skilled players can go to the beach to challenge the waves. Players need to go through certain exercises before they can master this technology. Players must wear life jackets.

 

 

 

There is a pair of shoes similar like slippers in the device. 
It is easy for players to put their feet in the shoes or take off their feet.
If the player falls off the water, the feet can easily leave the shoe and the body separates from the device. People who can't swim must wear life jackets

 
      
 
      

       

 

People can use it as a physical training tool to train people's physical strength, endurance, balance ability, physical flexibility and so on.

You can use this device to play in the middle of the lake:

We are considering a new design option. When the device stays on the water, we can connect the two devices to make it a boat. "Walkonwater" is not only a water sports equipment, it can also become a water work tool, which can be used for fishing, lifesaving, etc.

 

 

Introduction of the product

A set of devices is divided into left and right, one foot for one side.The total weight of the device is about 6 kg. The yellow part is a buoyant structure. The black main structure in the middle of the device is made of carbon fiber. During these four years, we used a variety of materials in the development process, such as steel, wood, bamboo and aluminum alloy. We found these materials to be ineffective because they are too heavy or not strong enough. At the end, we found that carbon fiber is the best for us to make such devices.

 
 

      

Handrail of the device  can be disassembled or assembled for easy transportation and carrying.

The main structure of the device has a length of about 100 cm, a width of about 40 cm, and a height of about 50 cm. The handrail  has a length of 100 cm and a diameter of 2 cm.

 

There are red, yellow, blue, green or Orange for you to choose

Each product has its own number. The number you can choose is any number starts from No.00031. If the number you choose has been chosen by others, please choose another one. You are the first group of users of “walkonthewater” in the world. Your own device is marked with a unique number, so you can store it and it will become very precious in the future.  When you place an order, please write the serial number of the product you selected（For example: No. 00111，No.01234）, and send me the email.  1151065175@qq.com

It is almost 2020, and in the new year, this device will be a great New Year gift!

 

                    

 

Although we are constantly improving, the products you get will be the best batch we have made so far. If you have any better Suggestions, please contact me. We will appreciate your valuable opinions（email：1151065175@qq.com）  

 

Make your favorite patterns on the surface of the device

When you get the walkonthewater device, you can create your favorite patterns, texts and logos on the surface of the device. You can paint on it. You can ask the graphic advertising company to help you make your favorite patterns, texts, logos, and then paste them. You can also paint your favorite patterns on the surface of the device with paint. But be careful! Don't make the surface of your device ugly and can't be modified!  

Pattern design example:

 

  

  

  

 

What is the difference between personal version and the business version? Introduction to the personal and commercial version

Business version instruments are used in the water sports entertainment venues for profit（ If the customer uses the walkonthewater device for half an hour to an hour, the boss can charge probably $20 to $50). Since many people use them almost every day, they are much more stronger than the personal version. The business version is made of better materials and the manufacturing process is more stringent.

Personal version has no need to be as solid as the Iron Man.

 

Product patents

Our products have been awarded a Chinese patent, and three other Chinese patents are in the process of being applied for. We also have international patent rights in PCT. In order to have the global market, we will continue to apply for new PCT international patents.

PCT international patent

 

   

 China patent                                                  

 

Awards


Our walkonthewater project won a gold medal at the 2018 Bangkok International Intellectual Property, Invention, Innovation and Technology Expo and the 2019 Macau International Innovation and Invention Exhibition.

 

Introduction of the company

Shenzhen Walkonthewater Science and Technology Co., Ltd. is located in Shenzhen and Hong Kong. Our ideal is to make Walkonthewater an international company which is good for the well-beings of the people and the development of society.

 

Our China company registration license

At present, our main business is to develop, operate and sell water sports entertainment device of "walkonthewater". Walkonthewater devices have been loved and praised by people when they are displayed to the public, and the market prospects are very broad. The company will operate and sell portable water devices worldwide. We strive to promote this product to the rest of the world in three to four years to bring more health and happiness to people's lives. After one or two years, we will  organize the walkonthewater sports competition every year. This must be a very interesting and challenging game!

 

Our team

From July 2015, we began to draw the original design of this device. 

Now,  We are looking forward to a success. we are convinced that many people from all over the world will play the walkonwater sport in the future.

There have been many people who have helped us.Here, we are very grateful to those who have helped us!

You know, if we want to create a good company, then we must work hard to do a lot of things, such as: company reputation, product quality, social responsibility, customer service, benefit sharing, and so on.

     

 

 

                       

LI BAOHUA   General manager                                                                                          

One of the inventors of device

                 

AOSHIHONG                                                                                                                                                    Product design manager

After-sale service

We all know that a successful company must provide excellent service to its customers.
If you pay for our devices, we will provide our services to you seriously.
If your device breaks down in the future, please feel free to send email to us .  The warranty period of the product is 3 years

 Bonus: one free life vest included for each devicet:

              

 

Price Description:  The main structure of each set of equipment consists of carbon fiber tubes and carbon fiber sheets,  The cost of carbon fiber materials is relatively high0. We will not seek greedy profits, but we need reasonable profits. Please understand us, thank you!

 

Preparing materials for production

In order to be able to deliver on time, we have already stocked the first part of the production materials.

      

Various carbon fiber tubes  and  Carbon fiber board

                  

       

Mold diagram                                                   

 

You can be our shareholder and partner

The project of “walkonthewater” can be operated in aquatic sports and entertainment venues, so you can charge from players. You can imagine that dozens or even hundreds of people walking and running on the water, it must be a lively and interesting scene!This is a very good business project! The Walkonthewater project has tremendous market potential around the world, so you can be our shareholder. You can pay some money, such as $200,000, and you have one-tenth of our company;   for example, $100,000, you have one-twentieth of our company.  A few years later, this commercial project will bring you considerable profits!

 

Contact US

No. 689, 6th Floor, ZTE R&D Building, No. 13 Gaoxin South 4th Road, Nanshan District, Shenzhen.

story_txt:
When the player staying on the water or walking on the water, the tool can support they’re weight by buoyancy provided by the special tructure;besides，it can also help  the player to run on the water by the buoyancy and Paddle resistance.  How to use the device and precautionsLearning the device of “walkonthewater” is similar to learn skating, skateboarding and roller skating.in the Beginning, people will be difficult to keep balance, you can get basically balance after trying and practising a few times,  . Once you are skilled to use it, you will not fall down, and the more skilled you are, the easier it will be. You can walk or run on the water, and if you are tired, you can stop and have a rest. You can also sit on the device for a rest, and if you gained the technique of using it, you can walk and run on the water, That's a very cool experience! It will make you healthier and stronger, and improve your ability of maintaining balanced and flexible! If you learn how to use the device of “walkonthewater”, you will get a good sense of accomplishment, and you will be more healthy and happier!If you are skilled, you won't fall into the water. In winter, you can also play itwith a pair of waterproof long socks and swimming suits or diving suits to prevent the cold. Diving suit or swimsuit Be careful! When new players start learning the “Walkonthewater”, they may fall off the water several times. You’d better to practise on a waterfront or beach full of soft sand ! If you practise it in the swimming pool, The side of the pool should be covered with soft floor cushions in case of falls! You can also wear a helmet and other protective equipment. Only the skilled players can go to the beach to challenge the waves. Players need to go through certain exercises before they can master this technology. Players must wear life jackets.   There is a pair of shoes similar like slippers in the device. It is easy for players to put their feet in the shoes or take off their feet.If the player falls off the water, the feet can easily leave the shoe and the body separates from the device. People who can't swim must wear life jackets 
      
 
      
        People can use it as a physical training tool to train people's physical strength, endurance, balance ability, physical flexibility and so on.You can use this device to play in the middle of the lake:We are considering a new design option. When the device stays on the water, we can connect the two devices to make it a boat. "Walkonwater" is not only a water sports equipment, it can also become a water work tool, which can be used for fishing, lifesaving, etc.

 
 Introduction of the productA set of devices is divided into left and right, one foot for one side.The total weight of the device is about 6 kg. The yellow part is a buoyant structure. The black main structure in the middle of the device is made of carbon fiber. During these four years, we used a variety of materials in the development process, such as steel, wood, bamboo and aluminum alloy. We found these materials to be ineffective because they are too heavy or not strong enough. At the end, we found that carbon fiber is the best for us to make such devices.        Handrail of the device  can be disassembled or assembled for easy transportation and carrying.The main structure of the device has a length of about 100 cm, a width of about 40 cm, and a height of about 50 cm. The handrail  has a length of 100 cm and a diameter of 2 cm. There are red, yellow, blue, green or Orange for you to chooseEach product has its own number. The number you can choose is any number starts from No.00031. If the number you choose has been chosen by others, please choose another one. You are the first group of users of “walkonthewater” in the world. Your own device is marked with a unique number, so you can store it and it will become very precious in the future.  When you place an order, please write the serial number of the product you selected（For example: No. 00111，No.01234）, and send me the email.  1151065175@qq.comIt is almost 2020, and in the new year, this device will be a great New Year gift!                      Although we are constantly improving, the products you get will be the best batch we have made so far. If you have any better Suggestions, please contact me. We will appreciate your valuable opinions（email：1151065175@qq.com）   Make your favorite patterns on the surface of the deviceWhen you get the walkonthewater device, you can create your favorite patterns, texts and logos on the surface of the device. You can paint on it. You can ask the graphic advertising company to help you make your favorite patterns, texts, logos, and then paste them. You can also paint your favorite patterns on the surface of the device with paint. But be careful! Don't make the surface of your device ugly and can't be modified!  Pattern design example:        What is the difference between personal version and the business version? Introduction to the personal and commercial versionBusiness version instruments are used in the water sports entertainment venues for profit（ If the customer uses the walkonthewater device for half an hour to an hour, the boss can charge probably $20 to $50). Since many people use them almost every day, they are much more stronger than the personal version. The business version is made of better materials and the manufacturing process is more stringent.Personal version has no need to be as solid as the Iron Man. Product patentsOur products have been awarded a Chinese patent, and three other Chinese patents are in the process of being applied for. We also have international patent rights in PCT. In order to have the global market, we will continue to apply for new PCT international patents.PCT international patent     China patent                                                   AwardsOur walkonthewater project won a gold medal at the 2018 Bangkok International Intellectual Property, Invention, Innovation and Technology Expo and the 2019 Macau International Innovation and Invention Exhibition. Introduction of the companyShenzhen Walkonthewater Science and Technology Co., Ltd. is located in Shenzhen and Hong Kong. Our ideal is to make Walkonthewater an international company which is good for the well-beings of the people and the development of society. Our China company registration licenseAt present, our main business is to develop, operate and sell water sports entertainment device of "walkonthewater". Walkonthewater devices have been loved and praised by people when they are displayed to the public, and the market prospects are very broad. The company will operate and sell portable water devices worldwide. We strive to promote this product to the rest of the world in three to four years to bring more health and happiness to people's lives. After one or two years, we will  organize the walkonthewater sports competition every year. This must be a very interesting and challenging game! Our teamFrom July 2015, we began to draw the original design of this device. Now,  We are looking forward to a success. we are convinced that many people from all over the world will play the walkonwater sport in the future.There have been many people who have helped us.Here, we are very grateful to those who have helped us!You know, if we want to create a good company, then we must work hard to do a lot of things, such as: company reputation, product quality, social responsibility, customer service, benefit sharing, and so on.                              LI BAOHUA   General manager                                                                                          One of the inventors of device                 AOSHIHONG                                                                                                                                                    Product design manager                 ZHANGHUIPENG                                                                                                                                                    Product developmen After-sale serviceWe all know that a successful company must provide excellent service to its customers.If you pay for our devices, we will provide our services to you seriously.If your device breaks down in the future, please feel free to send email to us .  The warranty period of the product is 3 years Bonus: one free life vest included for each devicet:               Price Description:  The main structure of each set of equipment consists of carbon fiber tubes and carbon fiber sheets,  The cost of carbon fiber materials is relatively high0. story:
Summary 

Your skin is the largest organ in your body, highly absorbent, tasked with protecting our delicate insides from the elements, making it the largest gateway into our bloodstream and our first line of defense. Common daily products that may seem completely benign, for example; lotions, soaps, hair products, deodorants and much more that we expose ourselves to on a daily basis may be more sinister than ever imagined. Test have proven that most commercially sold and commonly used products contain toxic fragrances and synthetic chemicals that are causing a host of side affects. Soaphisticated is dedicated to ending these practices with your help! 

Soaphisticated™ is committed to exposing the truth, and solving a major problem for our body's largest organ, our shield and first line of defense! By using what Mother Nature has already provided us, coupled with best manufacturing practices and a fun creative spin on the most used daily products, Soaphisticated is changing the narrative on a subject many may not even realize is an issue... Revitalization, skin conditions and even protecting our planet are all possibilities if we get back to our roots, and get soaphisticated!  Incorporating 100% pure essential oils through a cold-processed soap method to ensure all the aromatherapeutic benefits are left intact, together with a practices that plumps up our soap with extra vegetable-based fats to ensure these “superfats” provide the extra moisturizing qualities we all love. You will not only feel the difference, but will even see it!

Because Soaphisticated was founded on principals and fundamentals that align with protecting Mother Nature by reduced packaging and in many cases, using non at all, we only thought it would only make sense to give back as much as we can to those that share this commonality! By corporate tithing,  10% of all proceeds are contributed to Bee Informed and 4Ocean. With your support, we can make a huge statement and stance, end egregious manufacturing practices, and make these all natural, Vegan, benefiting products the new norm.  By helping with this goal you get Insider membership which allows you to buy our products at cost for life.

The Impact

Soaphisticated's goal is to be the voice for the voiceless, from our oceans, plants, animals, and yes, even your skin, we need to take this issue serious, and more serious than ever before! Every contribution allows us to spread the truth with results, put a larger and larger dent into the practices that is having atrocious affects to our planet, and facilitate companies that have a serious purpose like Bee Informed® and 4Oceans, lending them more resources to do even more then they already do! We have a huge fight ahead, but all good things start with a good hard fought fight, and with all of your support, we can stand out in the crowd of chemical ridden products easily, coupled  with our unique and creative products, the truth can be held and felt, making our products louder and prouder!  

We currently serve thousands of customers in which we have also had the opportunity to develop personal relationships with many of them and have a return rate of over 75%! This number is not quantitative to the amount of money being made, it is a testament, a symbolic number that signifies change for the long term, and not a hype that seldom has any real impact! We have created an abundance and wide variety of products to ensure we have a vast selection for all demographics and walks. This out of the gate strategy was and is challenging, but for this to work on a scale that leads to paramount and monumental change, we had to take the harder path. 

The sad truth in modern times is that we are unwittingly exposing ourselves to more harmful toxins and chemicals from products and general exposure daily, and living in such a fast paced society we are letting the fine print get away from us, which is why we, you, us, need to think ahead and not in the now as we have seen where that road leads... This is more than hygiene products, this is about harmful particle matter, emissions, BPA's, Dioxins, Triclosan, PFC's, Atrazine and a host of additional chemicals we come into contact with every day which can be eradicated and defended against if you take a stance with Soaphisticated and the companies we support. What we do today is the makeup of tomorrow, lets make it a good one! 

With our very own domestic team and manufacturer, every product is made in the USA as well as all of our ingredients are proudly sourced here in the great USA.  Unlike most cosmetic/hygiene companies,  all of their products are sourced from China, which means, by law, they are required to test on animals, exposing their so called "Vegan" products, as just another lie to keep everyone buying truly bad products. Soaphisticated is on a mission to end these practices, and ensure that our products are widely available to all that truly care about their skin, our planet and even your health!

Other Ways You Can Help

 

If you cannot donate funds for the cause, you can still contribute! Help spread the word about Soaphisticated and it collaborative efforts to help maintain a healthy body and planet!  

Be sure to share our Indiegogo mission with everyone you can! We want to help educate and inform as many as possible! Together we can change the world!
